text: For she said within herself , If I may but touch his garment , I shall be whole .
text2: Ijcon oquichiu pampa yejhua oquinemilij : “ Tla san nicajsis itlaquen , nejhua nipajtis . ”

text: But Jesus turned him about , and when he saw her , he said , Daughter , be of good comfort ; thy faith hath made thee whole . And the woman was made whole from that hour .
text2: Niman Jesús onocueptiquis , ocontac on sihuatl , niman oquijlij : ― Xmoyolchicahua , noconeu . Aman yotipajtic pampa otitlaneltocac . Quemaj nimantzin opajtic .

text: And when Jesus came into the ruler ' s house , and saw the minstrels and the people making a noise ,
text2: Ijcuac Jesús oajsic ne ichan on tlayecanquetl , niman oquitac ica on músicos nemiyaj listos para contocasquej on ichpocatzin , niman ica on tlacamej sa najcomantinemiyaj ,

text: He said unto them , Give place : for the maid is not dead , but sleepeth . And they laughed him to scorn .
text2: oquimijlij : ― Xquisacan nican , pampa on ichpocatzin xe miqui , yej san cochtica . Niman yejhuamej san ocuetzquilijquej .

text: But when the people were put forth , he went in , and took her by the hand , and the maid arose .
text2: Ijcuac otlan quinquixtiaj on tlacamej , Jesús ocalaquito niman oquitzquij ipan ima on ichpocatzin , niman yejhua onotelquetz .

text: And the fame hereof went abroad into all that land .
text2: Niman nochihuiyan nimantzin omachiyato on tlen onochiu .

text: And when Jesus departed thence , two blind men followed him , crying , and saying , Thou Son of David , have mercy on us .
text2: Jesús ompa oquis . Niman chica nejnentiaya , omemej ciegos oquitocaquej , niman quitzajtzilijtiayaj : ― ¡ Xtechicneli , xtechpalehui tejhua huejca teixhuiu itech David !

text: And when he was come into the house , the blind men came to him : and Jesus saith unto them , Believe ye that I am able to do this ? They said unto him , Yea , Lord .
text2: Niman ijcuac Jesús ocalac ipan se cajli , on ciegos oquinisihuijquej , niman Jesús oquintlajtoltij : ― ¿ Nemejhuamej nenquineltocaj ica huelis nemechpajtis ? Yejhuamej oquijtojquej : ― Quemaj , toTeco .

text: Then touched he their eyes , saying , According to your faith be it unto you .
text2: Ijcuacon Jesús oquinmatoquilij imixtololojhuan niman oquimijlij : ― Ma nochihua quen quimelahua nemotlaneltoc .

text: And their eyes were opened ; and Jesus straitly charged them , saying , See that no man know it .
text2: Niman on imixtololojhuan opajtiquej . Niman Jesús sanoyej oquintlachicahuilij . Oquimijlij : ― Xchihuacan canica para ma ca yacaj quimatis aquinon omechpajtij .

text: But they , when they were departed , spread abroad his fame in all that country .
text2: Pero yejhuamej ohuajquisquej , oquitetlajtlajtohuilijquej nochihuiyan on tlen Jesús oquichiu .

text: As they went out , behold , they brought to him a dumb man possessed with a devil .
text2: Ijcuac yejhuamej huajquistiayaj ne ipan on cajli , sequimej tlacamej ocuajhuiquilijquej Jesús se tlacatl nontzin yejhuan quipiaya se xcuajli espíritu .

text: And when the devil was cast out , the dumb spake : and the multitudes marvelled , saying , It was never so seen in Israel .
text2: Ijcuac Jesús oquixtij on xcuajli espíritu , on nontzin opeu tlajtohua . On tlacamej tlamojcaitayaj niman quijtohuayaj : ― Ipan in país itoca Israel xqueman tiquitayaj tlajtlamach quen yejhua in .

text: But the Pharisees said , He casteth out devils through the prince of the devils .
text2: Pero on fariseos quijtohuayaj : ― Yejhua in tlacatl quitequixtilia on xcuajcualtin espíritus , pampa on poder quiselia itech intlayecancau sa no yejhuamej on espíritus .

text: And Jesus went about all the cities and villages , teaching in their synagogues , and preaching the gospel of the kingdom , and healing every sickness and every disease among the people .
text2: Jesús panotiaya nochihuiyan ipan pueblos niman cuadrillas . Niman nochihuiyan yejhua temachtijtiaya ipan intiopanhuan on hebreos niman quiteijlijtiaya on cuajli tlajtojli ica quen ijqui Dios tlamandarohua . Jesús quipajtijtiaya nochi cocolistli niman masqui san catlejhua cualolistli .

text: But when he saw the multitudes , he was moved with compassion on them , because they fainted , and were scattered abroad , as sheep having no shepherd .
text2: Ijcuac Jesús oquintac on tojlamej , sanoyej oquimicnelij , pampa yejhuamej najmanayaj niman xquipiayaj yolchicahualistli . Yejhuamej nemiyaj quen on borreguitos yejhuan xquipiaj intlajpixcau .

text: Then saith he unto his disciples , The harvest truly is plenteous , but the labourers are few ;
text2: Ijcuacon oquimijlij inomachtijcahuan : ― Ica tlen melahuac tiquitaj ica sanoyej miyec tlatoctli , pero xmiyequej nemij tequitquej para pixcasquej .

text: Pray ye therefore the Lord of the harvest , that he will send forth labourers into his harvest .
text2: Yejhua ica , tej , xtlajtlanilican iTeco on tlaquilyotl más ma quinhuajtitlani on pixcaquej para ma pixcaquij .

text: And when he had called unto him his twelve disciples , he gave them power against unclean spirits , to cast them out , and to heal all manner of sickness and all manner of disease .
text2: Quemaj Jesús oquinsentlalij on majtlactli huan ome inomachtijcahuan , niman oquinmacac poder para ma quitequixtilican on xcuajcualtin espíritus niman para quipajtisquej nochi cocolistli niman masqui san catlejhua cualolistli .

text: Now the names of the twelve apostles are these ; The first , Simon , who is called Peter , and Andrew his brother ; James the son of Zebedee , and John his brother ;
text2: Ijquin intojtoca on majtlactli huan ome apóstoles : achtopa Simón , yejhuan no itoca Pedro , niman Andrés on icniu , Jacobo niman Juan on icniu yejhuan iconehuan Zebedeo ,

text: Philip , and Bartholomew ; Thomas , and Matthew the publican ; James the son of Alphaeus , and Lebbaeus , whose surname was Thaddaeus ;
text2: Felipe , Bartolomé , Tomás , Mateo on yejhuan tlacobrarojquetl catca ican impuestos , Jacobo yejhuan iconeu Alfeo , Lebeo , yejhuan no itoca Tadeo ,

text: Simon the Canaanite , and Judas Iscariot , who also betrayed him .
text2: Simón , on yejhuan tehuan tlapohuajli catca ne intech on cananistas , niman Judas Iscariote , yejhuan más saquin oquitemactilij Jesús .

text: These twelve Jesus sent forth , and commanded them , saying , Go not into the way of the Gentiles , and into any city of the Samaritans enter ye not :
text2: Jesús oquintitlan on majtlactli huan ome apóstoles , niman ijquin oquinnajnahuatij : ― Ma ca nenyasquej campa chantij on yejhuan xhebreos , nion ipan on pueblos de Samaria .

text: But go rather to the lost sheep of the house of Israel .
text2: Yej xhuiyan ne campa on hebreos chantij . Yejhuamej quen iborreguitos Dios yejhuan polijcanemij .

text: And as ye go , preach , saying , The kingdom of heaven is at hand .
text2: Xhuiyan niman ijquin xteijlitij : “ Ye huajlau on tonajli ijcuac Dios tlamandaros nican quen tlamandarohua ne ilhuicac . ”

text: Heal the sick , cleanse the lepers , raise the dead , cast out devils : freely ye have received , freely give .
text2: Xquimpajtican on yejhuan palanij innacayo niman on ocsequimej cocoxquej . Xquinyolihuitican on mimiquej . Xquintequixtilican on xcuajcualtin espíritus . Nemejhuamej xican tomin nenquiseliaj yejhua in poder , yejhua ica xtequitiltican niman ma ca xtecobrarocan .

text: Provide neither gold , nor silver , nor brass in your purses ,
text2: ' Ma ca xquitquican tomin .

text: Nor scrip for your journey , neither two coats , neither shoes , nor yet staves : for the workman is worthy of his meat .
text2: Ma ca xquitquican nemotlacual para nencuasquej ipan nemojhui . Ma ca ocsequi xquitquican nemotlaquen , nion nemocachuan . Nion ma ca xquitquican nemocojtopil . Nochi in tlajtlamach ma ca xquitquican , pampa on tequitquetl quimelahua quimacasquej itlaxtlahuil .

text: And into whatsoever city or town ye shall enter , inquire who in it is worthy ; and there abide till ye go thence .
text2: ' Ijcuac nemejhuamej nemajsisquej ipan se hueyican noso ipan se pueblo , ompa xtejtemocan yacaj cuajli tlacatl yejhuan nenhuelisquej nenquitlalisquej nemoyojlo itech , niman ichan xmocahuacan hasta ijcuac ocse pueblo nenyasquej .

text: And when ye come into an house , salute it .
text2: Ijcuac nencalaquisquej ipan se cajli , ijquin xtetlajpalocan : “ Xpiacan yolsehuilistli . ”

text: And if the house be worthy , let your peace come upon it : but if it be not worthy , let your peace return to you .
text2: Tla on tlacamej yejhuan chantij ipan on cajli cuajli mechselisquej , Dios quintiochihuas ican yolsehuilistli . Pero tla yejhuamej xcuajli mechselisquej , Dios xquinmacas yolsehuilistli .

text: And whosoever shall not receive you , nor hear your words , when ye depart out of that house or city , shake off the dust of your feet .
text2: Niman tla on yejhuan chanejquej ipan on cajli noso ipan on pueblo xmechselisquej nion xquinequisquej mechcaquisquej , tla ijcon xquisacan niman xtzejtzelocan nemocxi ica on tlalteutli .

text: Verily I say unto you , It shall be more tolerable for the land of Sodom and Gomorrha in the day of judgment , than for that city .
text2: Ica tlen melahuac nemechijlia ica ipan on tonajli ijcuac Dios tetlaxtlahuilis , on yejhuan chanejquej ipan on pueblo más temojtij quiselisquej tlajtlacolmacalistli xquen on tlacamej yejhuan ochantijquej ne Sodoma niman Gomorra .

text: Behold , I send you forth as sheep in the midst of wolves : be ye therefore wise as serpents , and harmless as doves .
text2: ' ¡ Xcaquican ! Nejhua nemechtitlani intzajlan on xcuajcualtin tlacamej quen on borreguitos yejhuan quistinemij intzajlan on lobos . Yejhua ica xmotacan sa no nemejhuamej quen on cohuamej niman xyolyemanquej quen on palomas .

text: But beware of men : for they will deliver you up to the councils , and they will scourge you in their synagogues ;
text2: Xmotacan sa no nemejhuamej , pampa on tlacamej mechtemacasquej intech on tetlacanonotzquej , niman no mechhuihuitequisquej ipan intiopanhuan .

text: And ye shall be brought before governors and kings for my sake , for a testimony against them and the Gentiles .
text2: Mechhuicasquej imixpan on gobernadores niman reyes san pampa nennechneltocaj . Ijcuac ijcon nemopan nochihuas , noca xtlajtocan imixpan niman imixpan on yejhuan xhebreos .

text: But when they deliver you up , take no thought how or what ye shall speak : for it shall be given you in that same hour what ye shall speak .
text2: Niman ijcuac mechtemactilisquej intech on tequihuajquej , ma ca sa xcomatztiacan tlinon nenquijtosquej noso quen ijqui nenquijtosquej , pampa ijcuac ajsis on hora para nentlajtosquej , Dios mechmacas tlinon nenquijtosquej .

text: For it is not ye that speak , but the Spirit of your Father which speaketh in you .
text2: On tlajtoltin yejhuan nenquijtosquej xnemoyaxca yes , yej on iEspíritu nemoTajtzin yejhua mechmacas on tlajtoltin .

text: And the brother shall deliver up the brother to death , and the father the child : and the children shall rise up against their parents , and cause them to be put to death .
text2: ' On tlacamej quintemacasquej imicnihuan ma quinmictican , niman on tatajtin no quintemacasquej inconehuan , niman on teconehuan quintlahuelixnamiquisquej intajhuan niman quichihuasquej para ma miquican . Ijcon quinchihuilisquej pampa yejhuamej nechneltocaj .

text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name ' s sake : but he that endureth to the end shall be saved .
text2: Nochi tlacatl mechtlahuelitas san pampa nennechneltocaj . Pero yejhuan melajcanemis ican itlaneltoc hasta ijcuac nochi tlamis , Dios yejhua quimaquixtis .

text: But when they persecute you in this city , flee ye into another : for verily I say unto you , Ye shall not have gone over the cities of Israel , till the Son of man be come .
text2: Ijcuac mechtlahuelitasquej niman tlajtlamach ica mechtlajyohuiltisquej ipan se pueblo , xhuiyan ipan ocse . Tej , ica tlen melahuac nemechijlia ica nejhua yejhuan oninochiu Tlacatl nihuajlas ijcuac nemejhuamej xe tlami nenyahuij ipan nochi inpueblos on hebreos .

text: The disciple is not above his master , nor the servant above his lord .
text2: ' Xacaj nomachtijquetl más hueyixticaj xquen on itemachtijcau , nion yacaj tlanamactli más hueyixticaj xquen on iteco .

text: It is enough for the disciple that he be as his master , and the servant as his lord . If they have called the master of the house Beelzebub , how much more shall they call them of his household ?
text2: On nomachtijquetl ma noyoltlali quijyohuis on tlajyohuilistli yejhuan quijyohuiya on itemachtijcau , niman on tlanamactli no quen yejhua on iteco . Tla nejhua nechtocayotiaj nidiablo , tla ijcon nemejhuamej más mechtocayotisquej ica tlajtlamach .

text: Fear them not therefore : for there is nothing covered , that shall not be revealed ; and hid , that shall not be known .
text2: ' Ma ca xquinmacajsican on tlacamej . Tej , nochi on temachtijli yejhuan iyanticaj pa nesis , niman nochi on temachtijli yejhuan ichtaca oncaj machiyas .

text: What I tell you in darkness , that speak ye in light : and what ye hear in the ear , that preach ye upon the housetops .
text2: Tlinon nejhua nemechijlia campa xacaj nemi , nemejhuamej xtemachiltican ne campa tojlan . Niman tlinon nejhua nemechichtacaijlia , nochi tlacatl xpanextilican .

text: And fear not them which kill the body , but are not able to kill the soul : but rather fear him which is able to destroy both soul and body in hell .
text2: Ma ca xquinmacajsican on yejhuan hueli quimictiaj nemotlalnacayo pero xhuelij itlaj quichihuiliaj nemoalma . Yej xmacajsican Dios yejhuan huelis quixoxotonis nemotlalnacayo niman cahuas nemoalma ne mictlan campa tetlajyohuiltiloyan .

text: Are not two sparrows sold for a farthing ? and one of them shall not fall on the ground without your Father .
text2: ' ¿ Tlen xsan se tomin valerohuaj omemej tototzitzintin ? Pero nion semej yejhuamej on tototzitzintin hueli huetzi tla on toTajtzin xcahuilia .

text: But the very hairs of your head are all numbered .
text2: Tej , hasta on tzontli ipan nemotzontecon nochi oncaj tlapohuajli cada sesentetl .

text: Fear ye not therefore , ye are of more value than many sparrows .
text2: Yejhua ica , tej , ma ca xmomojtican . Nemejhuamej más nenhueyiquijtosnequij xquen miyequej tototzitzintin .

text: Whosoever therefore shall confess me before men , him will I confess also before my Father which is in heaven .
text2: ' Nochimej on yejhuan imixpan on tlacamej quijtosquej ica nechseliaj quen intemaquixtijcau , nejhua no niquijtos ixpan noTajtzin ilhuicac chanej ica niquinselia .

text: But whosoever shall deny me before men , him will I also deny before my Father which is in heaven .
text2: Pero on yejhuan nonenequisquej nopampa imixpan on tlacamej , nejhua no ninonenequis impampa ixpan noTajtzin ilhuicac chanej .

text: Think not that I am come to send peace on earth : I came not to send peace , but a sword .
text2: ' Ma ca xnemilican ica nejhua onicuajquic yolsehuilistli ipan tlalticpactli . Nejhua , tej , xonicuajquic yolsehuilistli , yej nopampa notlahuelitalos .

text: For I am come to set a man at variance against his father , and the daughter against her mother , and the daughter in law against her mother in law .
text2: Onihuajlaj para noxexelosquej on tlacamej . Nopampa se telpochtli quipias tlahuejli itech itaj , niman se ichpochtli quipias tlahuejli itech inan , niman se sihuamontli quipias tlahuejli itech imonan .

text: And a man ' s foes shall be they of his own household .
text2: Ijcon , tej , se quipias itlahuelicniu sa no ihuan ichanchanecahuan .

text: He that loveth father or mother more than me is not worthy of me : and he that loveth son or daughter more than me is not worthy of me .
text2: ' On yejhuan quitlajsojtlas itaj noso inan más xquen nejhua , xquimelahua noyaxca yes . Niman yejhuan quitlajsojtlas itelpoch noso ichpoch más xquen nejhua , xquimelahua noyaxca yes .

text: And he that taketh not his cross , and followeth after me , is not worthy of me .
text2: Niman on yejhuan xquinequis quiselis on tlajyohuilistli ipan inemilis niman xquinequis nohuan yas , xquimelahua noyaxca yes .

text: He that findeth his life shall lose it : and he that loseth his life for my sake shall find it .
text2: On yejhuan quimanahuis inemilis para ma ca miquis nopampa , quipolos ialma . Pero on yejhuan quipolos inemilis san nopampa , yejhua quimaquixtis ialma .

text: He that receiveth you receiveth me , and he that receiveth me receiveth him that sent me .
text2: ' On yejhuan mechselia , sa no ijqui quen nejhua nechselisquia . Niman yejhuan nechselia no quiselia on yejhuan onechajtitlan .

text: He that receiveth a prophet in the name of a prophet shall receive a prophet ' s reward ; and he that receiveth a righteous man in the name of a righteous man shall receive a righteous man ' s reward .
text2: Yejhuan quiselia se tiotlajtojquetl pampa on tiotlajtojquetl quichihua itequiu Dios , sa no ijqui quiselis itlaxtlahuil quen quimacaj se tiotlajtojquetl . Niman yejhuan quiselia se cuajli tlacatl pampa yejhua cuajli tlacatl , sa no ijqui quiselis itlaxtlahuil quen quimacaj se cuajli tlacatl .

text: And whosoever shall give to drink unto one of these little ones a cup of cold water only in the name of a disciple , verily I say unto you , he shall in no wise lose his reward .
text2: Niman san aquinon yejhuan quimacas siquiera se vaso asesec semej nonomachtijcahuan , ica tlen melahuac quipias itlaxtlahuil .

text: And it came to pass , when Jesus had made an end of commanding his twelve disciples , he departed thence to teach and to preach in their cities .
text2: Ijcuac Jesús otlan quinnajnahuatia on majtlactli huan ome inomachtijcahuan , onejcuanij ompa , niman oyaj para otemachtito niman otenojnotzato ne ipan ipueblos on región .

text: Now when John had heard in the prison the works of Christ , he sent two of his disciples ,
text2: Ijcuac Juan yejhuan tzacuticatca oquimat tlinon Cristo quichihuaya , yejhua oquintitlan omemej inomachtijcahuan

text: And said unto him , Art thou he that should come , or do we look for another ?
text2: para quitlajtoltisquej tla yejhua melahuac Cristo yejhuan ye oncaj para huajlas , noso yej quichasquej ocse .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Go and shew John again those things which ye do hear and see :
text2: Quemaj Jesús ijquin oquinnanquilij on inomachtijcahuan Juan : ― Xhuiyan niman xquijlican Juan on tlen nemejhuamej nenquitztoquej niman nencactoquej .

text: The blind receive their sight , and the lame walk , the lepers are cleansed , and the deaf hear , the dead are raised up , and the poor have the gospel preached to them .
text2: Xtlajtlajtohuilican ica aman tlachaj on yejhuan ciegos , niman ica on yejhuan huilatzitzintin quistinemij , niman on yejhuan palaniyaj innacayo pajtij , niman on yejhuan nacastzatzamej tlacaquij , niman on yejhuan mimiquej yolihuij niman noquetztehua ipan intlalcon . Niman no xtlajtlajtohuilican ica on yejhuan mayanquej caquij on cuajli tlajtojli yejhuan quitemaca temaquixtilistli .

text: And blessed is he , whosoever shall not be offended in me .
text2: Dios quitiochihuas on yejhuan xqueman ometlamatis san nopampa .

text: And as they departed , Jesus began to say unto the multitudes concerning John , What went ye out into the wilderness to see ? A reed shaken with the wind ?
text2: Chica inomachtijcahuan Juan oyajquej , Jesús opeu quinnojnotza on tlacamej ica Juan , niman oquimijlij : ― ¿ Aquinon onenquitatoj ne tlapatlaco ? ¿ Onenquitatoj se tlacatl yejhuan nolinia itlaneltoc quen se ohuatl nolinijticaj ica on ajacatl ?

text: But what went ye out for to see ? A man clothed in soft raiment ? behold , they that wear soft clothing are in kings ' houses .
text2: ¿ Aquinon , tej , onenquitatoj ? ¿ Onenquitatoj se tlacatl yejhuan tlaquempepetlacaj ? Nemejhuamej nenquimatztoquej ica on yejhuan sanoyej tlaquempepetlacaj nemij ne inchan on reyes .

text: But what went ye out for to see ? A prophet ? yea , I say unto you , and more than a prophet .
text2: Tla ijcon , ¿ aquinon onenquitatoj ? ¿ Onenquitatoj se tiotlajtojquetl ? Quemaj on melahuac , niman yejhua más hueyixticaj xquen se tiotlajtojquetl .

text: For this is he , of whom it is written , Behold , I send my messenger before thy face , which shall prepare thy way before thee .
text2: In Juan yejhua on tenojnotzquetl yejhuan itechcopa in Yectlajcuilojli ijquin quijtohua : On yejhuan noachtotenojnotzcau nictitlanis moyecapan para yejhua mitzyectlalilis mojhui para tias ipan .

text: Verily I say unto you , Among them that are born of women there hath not risen a greater than John the Baptist : notwithstanding he that is least in the kingdom of heaven is greater than he .
text2: Ica tlen melahuac nemechijlia ica intzajlan nochimej on tlacamej xqueman yacaj otlacat yejhuan más hueyixticaj xquen Juan on tlacuatequijquetl . Pero in no melahuac ica on yejhuan quinocahuilia ma quimandaro Dios , más hueyixticaj xquen Juan .

text: And from the days of John the Baptist until now the kingdom of heaven suffereth violence , and the violent take it by force .
text2: Desde ijcuac Juan on tlacuatequijquetl opeu quiteijlia on cuajli tlajtojli niman opeu tlacuatequia hasta aman , sanoyej noyolchicahualo para quinocahuiliaj Dios ne ilhuicac ma quinhuajmandarojtia . Pero yejhua san hueli quinhuajmandarohua on yejhuan itech noyolchicahuaj .

text: For all the prophets and the law prophesied until John .
text2: Hasta ijcuac Juan ohuajlaj , nochimej on tiotlajtojquej niman on itlanahuatil Moisés otlajtlajtojquej quen ijqui Dios tlamandaros .

text: And if ye will receive it , this is Elias , which was for to come .
text2: Niman tla nemejhuamej nenquinequij nenquineltocasquej intemachtil , Juan sa no yejhua on tiotlajtojquetl Elías yejhuan onijtoj ica huajlas .

text: He that hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Tla nemejhuamej nenquipiaj nemotlamachilis , xcajsicamatican on tlen oniquijtoj .

text: But whereunto shall I liken this generation ? It is like unto children sitting in the markets , and calling unto their fellows ,
text2: ' ¿ Tlinon ica huelis niquimixtlalos on tlacamej yejhuan nemij ipan in tonaltin ? Yejhuamej ijcomej quen on telpocamej yejhuan nosehuiaj ne ipan plaza , niman ijquin quintzajtziliaj on intetlajsojcahuan :

text: And saying , We have piped unto you , and ye have not danced ; we have mourned unto you , and ye have not lamented .
text2: “ Otemechtlapichilijquej ica on acatlapitzajli quen quintlapichiliaj ipan se nonamictilistli , pero nemejhuamej xonemijtotijquej . Otemechcuicatlalijquej ica on tlacuicajli teajman yejhuan nocuicatiaj ijcuac se miqui niman xonenchocaquej . ”

text: For John came neither eating nor drinking , and they say , He hath a devil .
text2: Ijcuac Juan ohuajlaj , nosahuaya niman xitlaj coniya . Pero yejhuamej oquijtojquej ica yejhua oquipix se xcuajli espíritu .

text: The Son of man came eating and drinking , and they say , Behold a man gluttonous , and a winebibber , a friend of publicans and sinners . But wisdom is justified of her children .
text2: Quemaj onihuajlaj , nejhua yejhuan oninochiu Tlacatl . Ijcuac nejhua yejhuan nitlacuani niman natlini onihuajlaj , yejhuamej oquijtojquej ica melahuac nitlacuan , niman ica sanoyej natlini . Niman oquijtojquej ica nitetlajsojcau itech on tlajtlacolejquej niman on yejhuan tlacobrarojquej ica on impuestos . Pero on ihueyi tlamatquilis Dios noteititia yejhua ica on tlen nochihua .

text: Then began he to upbraid the cities wherein most of his mighty works were done , because they repented not :
text2: Quemaj Jesús opeu quiteijlia ijqui quen on tlacamej yejhuan chantij ipan on pueblos campa más oquichiu imilagros ica sanoyej tlajtlacohuayaj . Yejhua ijquin temachtiaya , pampa on tlacamej yejhuan chantij ipan on pueblos xcajcahuayaj ica quichihuayaj on tlen xcuajli .

text: Woe unto thee , Chorazin ! woe unto thee , Bethsaida ! for if the mighty works , which were done in you , had been done in Tyre and Sidon , they would have repented long ago in sackcloth and ashes .
text2: Oquimijlij : ― ¡ Lástima para yejhuamej on yejhuan chantij ipan on pueblo itoca Corazín niman ipan on pueblo itoca Betsaida ! Xcuajli yes para yejhuamej pampa Dios sanoyej quincastigaros . Ijquin quinchihuilis pampa oquitaquej miyec milagros , pero xocajcajquej ica oquichijquej on tlen xcuajli . Tla on chanejquej ipan on huejhueyican intoca Tiro niman Sidón quitasquiaj on milagros yejhuan oquitaquej Corazín niman Betsaida , yejhuamej cahuasquiaj ica quichihuasquiaj on tlen xcuajli . Niman yejhuamej quitlalisquiaj tlaquentli tlachijchiutli ican ichtli niman quinotemilisquiaj tliconextli ipan intzontecon , para quiteititisquiaj ica yocajcajquej quichihuaj on tlen xcuajli .

text: But I say unto you , It shall be more tolerable for Tyre and Sidon at the day of judgment , than for you .
text2: Niman nemechijlia ica ipan on tonajli ijcuac Dios tetlaxtlahuilis , yejhuamej más hueyi tlajyohuilistli quiselisquej xquen on tlacamej yejhuan ochantijquej ne Tiro niman Sidón .

text: And thou , Capernaum , which art exalted unto heaven , shalt be brought down to hell : for if the mighty works , which have been done in thee , had been done in Sodom , it would have remained until this day .
text2: Niman yejhuan chanejquej ipan on pueblo Capernaum sanoyej nohueyimatij ipampa on hueyilistli yejhuan quipia ipueblo . Pero inhueyimatilis quintlajcalis ne mictlan , pampa tla ne ipan on hueyican itoca Sodoma nochihuasquiaj on milagros yejhuan onochijquej ipan , manisquia on hueyican oc nemi .

text: But I say unto you , That it shall be more tolerable for the land of Sodom in the day of judgment , than for thee .
text2: Niman nemechijlia ica ipan on tonajli ijcuac Dios tetlaxtlahuilis , yejhuamej on yejhuan chantij ne Capernaum más hueyi tlajyohuilistli quiselisquej xquen on tlacamej yejhuan ochantijquej ne Sodoma .

text: At that time Jesus answered and said , I thank thee , O Father , Lord of heaven and earth , because thou hast hid these things from the wise and prudent , and hast revealed them unto babes .
text2: Ipan on tonajli Jesús oquichiu oración . Ijquin oquijtoj : ― Nimitzyectenehua noTajtzin , tejhua yejhuan iTeco on ilhuicac niman in tlalticpactli . Nimitzyectenehua pampa nochi in tlajtlamach xotiquinmachiltij on tlajmatquej niman on tlacajsicamatquej , pero otiquinmachiltij on yejhuan quen coconej .

text: Even so , Father : for so it seemed good in thy sight .
text2: Melahuac noTajtzin , ijcon oticchiu quen oticnec .

text: All things are delivered unto me of my Father : and no man knoweth the Son , but the Father ; neither knoweth any man the Father , save the Son , and he to whomsoever the Son will reveal him .
text2: ' Nochi tlajtlamach noTajtzin onechmactilij . Xacaj nechixmati , nejhua yejhuan niiConeu , yej san yejhua on noTajtzin . Niman xacaj quixmati noTajtzin , yej san nejhua yejhuan niiConeu niman on yejhuan niquintlapejpenia para niquintitia .

text: Come unto me , all ye that labour and are heavy laden , and I will give you rest .
text2: ' Xhuajlacan notech nemochimej yejhuan yonensiauquej pampa hasta aman xnenquinextiaj temaquixtilistli niman pampa on tlajtlamach tepajsolohualistin sanoyej mechyetiliaj , niman nejhua nemechmacas nesehuijli .

text: Take my yoke upon you , and learn of me ; for I am meek and lowly in heart : and ye shall find rest unto your souls .
text2: Xmocahuilican ma nemechpalehui niman xmocahuilican ma nemechmachti , pampa nejhua niyolsejqui niman niyolyemanqui , niman notech nenquinextisquej nesehuilistli para nemoalma .

text: For my yoke is easy , and my burden is light .
text2: On temachtijli yejhuan nejhua nemechmaca xtepopoloj para nenquitlacamatisquej , niman on tlanahuatijli yejhuan nejhua nemechmaca no xtepopoloj .

text: At that time Jesus went on the sabbath day through the corn ; and his disciples were an hungred , and began to pluck the ears of corn , and to eat .
text2: Ipan se tonajli ijcuac nosehuiaj on hebreos , Jesús nejnentiaya ne campaca tlatocyoj ican trigo . Inomachtijcahuan opeu apismiquij niman opeu quimaxicopinaj on trigo para quicuasquej on iteyo .

text: But when the Pharisees saw it , they said unto him , Behold , thy disciples do that which is not lawful to do upon the sabbath day .
text2: Ijcuac on fariseos ijcon oquitaquej , oquijlijquej Jesús : ― Xquinta , monomachtijcahuan tequitij , niman totlanahuatil xtechcahuilia para titequitisquej ipan on tonajli ijcuac on tlacamej nosehuiaj .

text: But he said unto them , Have ye not read what David did , when he was an hungred , and they that were with him ;
text2: Pero yejhua oquimijlij : ― ¿ Nemejhuamej xqueman nenquimomachtianij on tlen oquichijca David ijcuac yejhua niman itehuicalhuan oapismiquej ?

text: How he entered into the house of God , and did eat the shewbread , which was not lawful for him to eat , neither for them which were with him , but only for the priests ?
text2: Yejhua ocalac ichan Dios niman ihuan itehuicalhuan oquicuaj on pan yejhuan oquihuentlalilijcaj Dios , masqui on itlanahuatil Moisés san quincahuiliaya on tiopixquej quicuayaj on pan .

text: Or have ye not read in the law , how that on the sabbath days the priests in the temple profane the sabbath , and are blameless ?
text2: ¿ Noso ca yej xqueman nenquimomachtiaj on itlanahuatil Moisés , ica on tiopixquej ipan hueyi tiopan xnosehuiaj ipan on tonaltin ijcuac nosehuiaj on hebreos , niman ica yejhuamej xquipiaj tlajtlacojli ijcuac ijquin quichihuaj ?

text: But I say unto you , That in this place is one greater than the temple .
text2: Tej , nemechijlia ica nican nemi on yejhuan más hueyixticaj xquen on hueyi tiopan .

text: But if ye had known what this meaneth , I will have mercy , and not sacrifice , ye would not have condemned the guiltless .
text2: On Yectlajcuilojli quijtohua : “ Nejhua nicnequi teicnelilistli , niman ma ca yej xquinhuentlalican on yolquej . ” Tla nencajsicamatisquiaj tlinon quijtosnequi yejhua in Yectlajcuilojli , xnenquintlajtlacolmacasquiaj on tlacamej yejhuan xmelahuac quichihuaj on tlen ica nenquintlajtlacolmacaj .

text: For the Son of man is Lord even of the sabbath day .
text2: Tej , nejhua yejhuan oninochiu Tlacatl nicpia tequihuayotl para niquijtos tlinon cuajli para se quichihuas ipan on tonajli ijcuac on hebreos nosehuiaj .

text: And when he was departed thence , he went into their synagogue :
text2: Quemaj Jesús onejcuanij ompa , niman ocalaquito ipan on intiopan on hebreos .

text: And , behold , there was a man which had his hand withered . And they asked him , saying , Is it lawful to heal on the sabbath days ? that they might accuse him .
text2: Ompa nemiya se tlacatl yejhuan quipiaya se ima huaqui . No nemiyaj quesquimej tlacamej yejhuan quinequiyaj quinextilisquej tlinon ica huelisquej quiteixpanhuisquej Jesús . Yejhua ica oquitlajtoltijquej : ― ¿ Totlanahuatil techcahuilia para ticpajtisquej se cocoxqui ipan on tonajli ijcuac titosehuiaj ?

text: And he said unto them , What man shall there be among you , that shall have one sheep , and if it fall into a pit on the sabbath day , will he not lay hold on it , and lift it out ?
text2: Jesús oquinnanquilij : ― Tla semej nemejhuamej quipia se iborreguito niman on borreguito onhuetzi ijtic se pozo ipan on tonajli ijcuac on hebreos nosehuiaj , ¿ xau para conquixtia ?

text: How much then is a man better than a sheep ? Wherefore it is lawful to do well on the sabbath days .
text2: Tej , se tlacatl más hueyi quijtosnequi xquen on borreguito . Ijcon , tej , totlanahutil techcahuilia ticchihuasquej on tlen cuajli ipan on tonajli ijcuac titosehuiaj .

text: Then saith he to the man , Stretch forth thine hand . And he stretched it forth ; and it was restored whole , like as the other .
text2: Ijcuacon Jesús oquijlij on tlacatl yejhuan quipiaya se ima huaqui : ― Xmelahua moma . Niman ijcuac oquimelau , opajtic on ima , niman cuajli onocau quen on ocse ima .

text: Then the Pharisees went out , and held a council against him , how they might destroy him .
text2: Quemaj oquisquej on fariseos ipan intiopan on hebreos , niman opejquej notlajtoltiaj quen ijqui huelisquej quimictisquej Jesús .

text: But when Jesus knew it , he withdrew himself from thence : and great multitudes followed him , and he healed them all ;
text2: Jesús oquimat on tlinon quinequij quichihuasquej niman yejhua ica onejcuanij . Miyec tlacatl oyaj ihuan , niman yejhua quimpajtiaya nochimej on cocoxquej .

text: And charged them that they should not make him known :
text2: Yejhua quinnahuatiaya para ma ca quiteijlisquej aquin yejhua .

text: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by Esaias the prophet , saying ,
text2: Yejhua in onochiu para otenquis on tlen oquiteijlijca on tiotlajtojquetl Isaías , ijcuac oquijtoj :

text: Behold my servant , whom I have chosen ; my beloved , in whom my soul is well pleased : I will put my spirit upon him , and he shall shew judgment to the Gentiles .
text2: In yejhua notequipanojcau yejhuan onictlapejpenij , quijtohua Dios . Yejhua nictlajsojtla , niman itech nipacticaj . Ipan nictlalia noEspíritu para quimijlis on xhebreos ica cada se nictlaxtlahuilis quen quitocarohua on tlen quichihua .

text: He shall not strive , nor cry ; neither shall any man hear his voice in the streets .
text2: Xtehuan nocamatlanis , nion xtehuan notzajtzilis . Niman no xacaj caquis sa tzajtzi ijcuac temachtia ipan calles .

text: A bruised reed shall he not break , and smoking flax shall he not quench , till he send forth judgment unto victory .
text2: Yejhua xquitlajcali on yejhuan xcojtic xijqui quen se tlacatl quitlajcali se acatl yejhuan xcuajli . Yejhua xquisehuis itlahuil ialma on yejhuan xhueyi tlahuijli quipia ipan ialma , xquen se tlacatl quisehuia yejhua on mecha yejhuan sa popocaticaj . Yejhua quimpalehuijtias hasta queman tetlanis nochi on tlen cuajli .

text: And in his name shall the Gentiles trust .
text2: Niman on xhebreos quineltocasquej ica yejhua quinmaquixtis .

text: Then was brought unto him one possessed with a devil , blind , and dumb : and he healed him , insomuch that the blind and dumb both spake and saw .
text2: Quemaj ocuiquilijquej Jesús se tlacatl ciego niman nontzin yejhuan quipia se xcuajli espíritu . Jesús oquipajtij . Ijcon , tej , on tlacatl ohuel otlachix niman ohuel otlajtoj .

text: And all the people were amazed , and said , Is not this the son of David ?
text2: Nochi tlacatl otlamojcaitac , niman oquijtoj : ― ¿ Manin in yejhua huejca teixhuiu itech David yejhuan Dios oquitlapejpenij para techmandaros ?

text: But when the Pharisees heard it , they said , This fellow doth not cast out devils , but by Beelzebub the prince of the devils .
text2: Pero ijcuac on fariseos ijcon ocacquej , oquijtojquej : ― Yejhua in tlacatl quintequixtilia on xcuajcualtin espíritus san ican ipoder on diablo , on yejhuan inhueyi tlayecancau .

text: And Jesus knew their thoughts , and said unto them , Every kingdom divided against itself is brought to desolation ; and every city or house divided against itself shall not stand :
text2: Jesús quimatzticatca tlinon yejhuamej quinemilijticatcaj , niman oquimijlij : ― Tla se país notlajcoxelohua , xoxotoni . Niman nochi hueyican noso chanyotl yejhuan noxexelohuaj ican tlahuejli , xqueman huejcahuij san secan nemij .

text: And if Satan cast out Satan , he is divided against himself ; how shall then his kingdom stand ?
text2: Satanás , tej , quinmandarohua on xcuajcualtin espíritus . Niman tla sa no yejhua quitequixtilia on xcuajcualtin espíritus , ¿ quen ijqui , tej , huelis san secan nemisquej ?

text: And if I by Beelzebub cast out devils , by whom do your children cast them out ? therefore they shall be your judges .
text2: Tla nejhua nictequixtilia on xcuajcualtin espíritus ican ipoder on diablo quen nennechtenehuiliaj , tla ijcon , ¿ aquinon quinmaca poder para quitequixtiliaj on yejhuan nopohuaj nemotech ? Sa no yejhuamej , tej , quijtosquej tla melahuac noso ca on tlen onennechijlijquej .

text: But if I cast out devils by the Spirit of God , then the kingdom of God is come unto you .
text2: Pero nejhua nictequixtilia on xcuajcualtin espíritus ican iEspíritu Dios , niman yejhua in quijtosnequi ica Dios yohuajlaj para mechmandaros .

text: Or else how can one enter into a strong man ' s house , and spoil his goods , except he first bind the strong man ? and then he will spoil his house .
text2: ' ¿ Quen ijqui , tej , huelis yacaj calaquis ichan se tlacatl yejhuan sanoyej cojtic niman cuilis on tlen quipia , tla xachtopa quisalohua ? San ijcon , tej , huelis quixtilis on tlen yejhua quipia .

text: He that is not with me is against me ; and he that gathereth not with me scattereth abroad .
text2: ' On yejhuan xnohuan nopohua , quejecohua quiteltlalis notequiu . Niman on yejhuan xnohuan pixca , quichajchayahua on tlaquilyotl .

text: Wherefore I say unto you , All manner of sin and blasphemy shall be forgiven unto men : but the blasphemy against the Holy Ghost shall not be forgiven unto men .
text2: Yejhua ica nemechijlia ica Dios huelis quintlapojpolhuis nochi intlajtlacolhuan on tlacamej niman nochi tlahuijhuicaltilistli . Pero tla yej cuijhuicaltis on Espíritu Santo , yejhua xqueman quintlapojpolhuis .

text: And whosoever speaketh a word against the Son of man , it shall be forgiven him : but whosoever speaketh against the Holy Ghost , it shall not be forgiven him , neither in this world , neither in the world to come .
text2: Niman san aquinon yejhuan nechtenehuilis se tlajtojli yejhuan xcuajli nejhua yejhuan oninochiu Tlacatl , Dios huelis quitlapojpolhuilis , pero on yejhuan quitenehuilis tlen xcuajli on Espíritu Santo , Dios xquitlapojpolhuis ipan in nemilistli nion ipan ocse .

text: Either make the tree good , and his fruit good ; or else make the tree corrupt , and his fruit corrupt : for the tree is known by his fruit .
text2: ' Tla on cojtlaquilyotl yejhua cuajli , quitlaquitia cuajli itlaquiliyo . Niman tla on cojtlaquilyotl yejhua xcuajli , xcuajli tlaqui itlaquiliyo . Yejhua ica , tej , on cojtlaquilyotl nenquixmatisquej tla cuajli noso xcuajli ica on itlaquiliyo .

text: O generation of vipers , how can ye , being evil , speak good things ? for out of the abundance of the heart the mouth speaketh .
text2: ¡ Teconehuan intech cohuamej ! Xnenhuelisquej nenquijtosquej on tlajtlamach tlen cuajli ijcuac nemejhuamej xnencuajcualtin . Tej , on tlen quisa ipan tecamac hualehua ne ipan teyojlo campa yejhua ica tlatentoc .

text: A good man out of the good treasure of the heart bringeth forth good things : and an evil man out of the evil treasure bringeth forth evil things .
text2: On yejhuan cuajli tlacatl quijtohua tlajtlamach tlen cuajli pampa ipan iyojlo quipia on tlen cuajli . Niman on yejhuan xcuajli tlacatl quijtohua tlajtlamach tlen xcuajli pampa ipan iyojlo xquipia on tlen cuajli .

text: But I say unto you , That every idle word that men shall speak , they shall give account thereof in the day of judgment .
text2: Niman nejhua nemechijlia ica ipan on tonajli ijcuac Dios quintlaxtlahuilis on tlacamej , nochimej yejhuamej quimacasquej cuenta Dios nochi on tlen camaijnehuaj .

text: For by thy words thou shalt be justified , and by thy words thou shalt be condemned .
text2: Ijcon , tej , ican nemotlajtol yejhuan cuajli xnemotlajtlacolmacasquej , pero ican nemotlajtol yejhuan xcuajli nemotlajtlacolmacasquej .

text: Then certain of the scribes and of the Pharisees answered , saying , Master , we would see a sign from thee .
text2: Quemaj semej fariseos niman on yejhuan temachtijquej ican itlanahuatil Moisés oquijlijquej Jesús : ― Temachtijquetl , ticnequij tiquitasquej xchihua itlaj tlamajhuisojli milagrosa .

text: But he answered and said unto them , An evil and adulterous generation seeketh after a sign ; and there shall no sign be given to it , but the sign of the prophet Jonas :
text2: Jesús oquimijlij : ― On xcuajcualtin tlacamej , yejhuan ixcoejehuaj Dios quen se sihuatl ixcoejehua ihuehuentzin , quinequij quitasquej se tlamajhuisojli milagrosa . Pero xniquintitis ocse más , yej san yejhua on tlen oquichiu on tiotlajtojquetl Jonás .

text: For as Jonas was three days and three nights in the whale ' s belly ; so shall the Son of man be three days and three nights in the heart of the earth .
text2: Ijcon quen Jonás onen yeyi tonajli niman yeyi yehuajli ijtic on hueyi michin , no ijqui nejhua yejhuan oninochiu Tlacatl yeyi tonajli niman yeyi yehuajli ninemis ne ijtic on tlajli .

text: The men of Nineveh shall rise in judgment with this generation , and shall condemn it : because they repented at the preaching of Jonas ; and , behold , a greater than Jonas is here .
text2: On yejhuan ochantijquej ne ipan on hueyican itoca Nínive ocacquej Jonás yejhuan oquimijlij on itemachtil Dios . Niman ijcuac ocacquej , yejhuamej ocajcajquej ica quichihuaj on tlen xcuajli . Tej , nemechijlia ica nican nemi on yejhuan más hueyixticaj xquen Jonás , niman on tlacamej yejhuan aman nemij xcajcahuaj ica quichihuaj on tlen xcuajli . Yejhua ica ijcuac on yejhuan aman nemij notelquetzasquej ixpan Dios ipan on tonajli ijcuac yejhua quintlaxtlahuilis nochimej , on yejhuan ochantijquej ne Nínive noquetztehuasquej niman quintlajtlacolmacasquej in tlacamej .

text: The queen of the south shall rise up in the judgment with this generation , and shall condemn it : for she came from the uttermost parts of the earth to hear the wisdom of Solomon ; and , behold , a greater than Solomon is here .
text2: No ijqui on sihuatlamandarojquetl ne Sur ohualeu ne campa sanoyej huejca para ocaquico on itlamatquilis Salomón . Tej , nemechijlia ica nican nemi on yejhuan más hueyixticaj xquen Salomón . Yejhua ica on sihuatlamandarojquetl ne Sur no noquetztehuas ipan on tonajli ijcuac Dios quintlaxtlahuilis nochimej , niman yejhua quintlajtlacolmacas in tlacamej yejhuan chantij ipan in tonaltin .

text: When the unclean spirit is gone out of a man , he walketh through dry places , seeking rest , and findeth none .
text2: ' Ijcuac se xcuajli espíritu quisa ijtic se tlacatl , pehua quistinemi campa tlayohuatoc . Quitejtemojtinemi canon nosehuis . Niman ijcuac xhueli quinextia , quinemilia :

text: Then he saith , I will return into my house from whence I came out ; and when he is come , he findeth it empty , swept , and garnished .
text2: “ Ocsejpa nias ne nochan campa oniquis . ” Ijcuac yejco , quinextia on tlacatl quen se cajli yejhuan xacaj quitequitiltia , tlachpancan ijtic , niman cuajli tlaojoncaj .

text: Then goeth he , and taketh with himself seven other spirits more wicked than himself , and they enter in and dwell there : and the last state of that man is worse than the first . Even so shall it be also unto this wicked generation .
text2: Quemaj yau cominana ocse chicomemej más xcuajcualtin espíritus xquen yejhua , niman nochimej calaquij para chantisquej ijtic on tlacatl . Ijcuacon on tlacatl más sanoyej xcuajli nocahua xquen ijcuac san se on xcuajli espíritu quipiaya . No ijqui impan nochihuas in xcuajcualtin tlacamej yejhuan chantij ipan in tonaltin .

text: While he yet talked to the people , behold , his mother and his brethren stood without , desiring to speak with him .
text2: Jesús oc quinnojnotzticatca on tlacamej , ijcuac oajsiquej inan niman icnihuan . Onocajquej ipan ojtli , niman quinequiyaj ihuan tlajtosquej .

text: Then one said unto him , Behold , thy mother and thy brethren stand without , desiring to speak with thee .
text2: Yacaj oquijlij Jesús : ― Monan niman mocnihuan ompa nemij ipan ojtli , niman mitznotzasnequij .

text: But he answered and said unto him that told him , Who is my mother ? and who are my brethren ?
text2: Pero yejhua oquinanquilij niman oquijlij on yejhuan oquimachiltij : ― ¿ Aquinon on nonan , niman aquinomej on nocnihuan ?

text: And he stretched forth his hand toward his disciples , and said , Behold my mother and my brethren !
text2: Quemaj ocominmajpilhuij on inomachtijcahuan , niman oquijtoj : ― In yejhuamej nonan niman nocnihuan ,

text: For whosoever shall do the will of my Father which is in heaven , the same is my brother , and sister , and mother .
text2: pampa san aquinon yejhuan quichihua on tlen quinequi noTatzin ilhuicac chanej , on yejhua nocniu noso yejhua nonan .

text: The same day went Jesus out of the house , and sat by the sea side .
text2: Ipan sa no yejhua on tonajli , Jesús oquis ne ipan on cajli niman onotlalij ne itenco on mar .

text: And great multitudes were gathered together unto him , so that he went into a ship , and sat ; and the whole multitude stood on the shore .
text2: Ica sanoyej miyec tlacatl onosentlalij ne campa yejhua nemiya , Jesús otlejcoc ipan se barco niman onotlalij , niman nochi tlacatl onocau ne itenco on mar .

text: And he spake many things unto them in parables , saying , Behold , a sower went forth to sow ;
text2: Niman opeu quinmachtia miyec tlajtlamach ican ejemplos . Quimijliaya : ― Sen tlaxinijquetl oyaj tlaxinito .

text: And when he sowed , some seeds fell by the way side , and the fowls came and devoured them up :
text2: Ijcuac tlaxinijtiaya , sequi xinachtli oxinito ipan ojtli , niman on totomej ohualajquej niman ocuajquej .

text: Some fell upon stony places , where they had not much earth : and forthwith they sprung up , because they had no deepness of earth :
text2: Ocsequi xinachtli oxinito ipan tepetlayoj campa xmás oncaj tlajli . On xinachtli nimantzin oquis , pampa xmás huejcatlan oncatca on tlajli campa oxin .

text: And when the sun was up , they were scorched ; and because they had no root , they withered away .
text2: Pero ijcuac oquis on tonaltzintli , ocoseu imilyo on trigo . Niman ica xhuejcatlan quipiaya inelhuayo , ohuajhuac .

text: And some fell among thorns ; and the thorns sprung up , and choked them :
text2: Ocsequi xinachtli oxinito intzajlan on huitzcojtin . On huitzcojtin saniman onoscaltijquej niman oquixomictiquej imilyo on trigo .

text: But other fell into good ground , and brought forth fruit , some an hundredfold , some sixtyfold , some thirtyfold .
text2: Pero ocsequi xinachtli oxin ipan on cuajli tlajli , niman oquipix cuajli itlaquiliyo . Sequi xinachtli oquitlaquitij se ciento iteyo , ocsequi sesenta , niman ocsequi treinta .

text: Who hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Tla nemejhuamej nenquipiaj nemotlamachilis , xcajsicamatican on ejemplo .

text: And the disciples came , and said unto him , Why speakest thou unto them in parables ?
text2: Quemaj on nomachtijquej oquinisihuijquej Jesús , niman oquitlajtoltijquej : ― ¿ Tlica tiquinnojnotza on tlacamej ican ejemplos ?

text: He answered and said unto them , Because it is given unto you to know the mysteries of the kingdom of heaven , but to them it is not given .
text2: Yejhua oquimijlij : ― Nemejhuamej Dios yomechcahuilij para nenquimatisquej on tlinon iyanticatca quen ijqui yejhua tlamandarohua . Pero yejhuamej in tlacamej xquincahuilia ma quimatican .

text: For whosoever hath , to him shall be given , and he shall have more abundance : but whosoever hath not , from him shall be taken away even that he hath .
text2: San aquinon yejhuan cajsicamati itemachtil Dios , Dios quipalehuis para más cajsicamatis sanoyej miyec . Pero on yejhuan xcajsicamati itemachtil Dios , quixtilisquej on tlen achijtzin cajsicamati .

text: Therefore speak I to them in parables : because they seeing see not ; and hearing they hear not , neither do they understand .
text2: Yejhua ica niquinnojnotza ican ejemplos , pampa masqui quitaj on tlen nicchihua , yejhuamej xquinomacaj cuenta , niman masqui caquij on tlen niquijtohua , yejhuamej xcajsicamatij .

text: And in them is fulfilled the prophecy of Esaias , which saith , By hearing ye shall hear , and shall not understand ; and seeing ye shall see , and shall not perceive :
text2: Ijcon , tej , cuajli impan nochihua tlen on tiotlajtojquetl Isaías oquijtoj : Nemejhuamej ican nemonacashuan nentlacaquisquej , pero xitlaj nencajsicamatisquej . Ican nemixtololojhuan nentlachasquej , pero xnenquimatisquej tlinon quijtosnequi on tlen nenquitasquej .

text: For this people ' s heart is waxed gross , and their ears are dull of hearing , and their eyes they have closed ; lest at any time they should see with their eyes , and hear with their ears , and should understand with their heart , and should be converted , and I should heal them .
text2: Yejhua in nochihua , pampa intlamachilis in tlacamej xtequiti . Yejhuamej nonacastzajtzacuasquej niman nixtzajtzacuasquej para ma ca tlachasquej ican imixtololojhuan , nion ma ca tlacaquisquej ican innacashuan , nion ma ca itlaj cajsicamatisquej ican intlamachilis , nion ma ca nocuepasquej notechica para nejhua niquinmaquixtis .

text: But blessed are your eyes , for they see : and your ears , for they hear .
text2: ' Pero Dios mechtiochihua nemejhuamej , pampa nentlachaj ican nemixtololojhuan , niman nenquimatij tlinon quijtosnequi on tlen nenquitaj . Niman no nencajsicamatij on tlen nencaquij niquijtohua .

text: For verily I say unto you , That many prophets and righteous men have desired to see those things which ye see , and have not seen them ; and to hear those things which ye hear , and have not heard them .
text2: Ica tlen melahuac nemechijlia ica miyequej tiotlajtojquej niman on yejhuan cuajcualtin tlacamej sanoyej oquinequej quitasquej yejhua in tlen nemejhuamej nenquitaj , pero xoquitaquej . Niman yejhuamej sanoyej oquinequej caquisquej in tlen nemejhuamej nencaquij , pero xocacquej .

text: Hear ye therefore the parable of the sower .
text2: ' Xcaquican , tej , on tlen quijtosnequi iejemplo on tlaxinijquetl .

text: When any one heareth the word of the kingdom , and understandeth it not , then cometh the wicked one , and catcheth away that which was sown in his heart . This is he which received seed by the way side .
text2: On ojtli yejhuan ipan oxinito quesqui xinachtli quijtosnequi inyojlo on tlacamej yejhuan ica caquij itlajtol Dios yejhuan quimijlia ica Dios quinequi quinmandaros , niman xcajsicamatij . Yejhua ica on Satanás huajlau niman quinquixtilia itlajtol Dios ipan inyojlo .

text: But he that received the seed into stony places , the same is he that heareth the word , and anon with joy receiveth it ;
text2: On tlajli yejhuan tepetlayoj quijtosnequi inyojlo on tlacamej yejhuan ica cuelcaquij itlajtol Dios niman ican pactli quiseliaj .

text: Yet hath he not root in himself , but dureth for a while : for when tribulation or persecution ariseth because of the word , by and by he is offended .
text2: Pero yejhua in tlacamej xmás cuajli quitzquiaj on tlajtojli . Yejhua ica , ijcuac impan huajlau on tlen tepajsoloj niman on tlen tetlajyohuiltia ipampa itlajtol Dios , nimantzin cahuaj intlaneltoc .

text: He also that received seed among the thorns is he that heareth the word ; and the care of this world , and the deceitfulness of riches , choke the word , and he becometh unfruitful .
text2: On tlajli yejhuan huitzyoj quijtosnequi inyojlo on tlacamej yejhuan cuelcaquij itlajtol Dios . Pero pampa sa comatztoquej quen ijqui nopanoltisquej niman sanoyej quinequij notomintisquej , quelcahuaj itlajtol Dios . Ijcon , tej , itlajtol Dios xhueli quimpalehuiya yejhuamej .

text: But he that received seed into the good ground is he that heareth the word , and understandeth it ; which also beareth fruit , and bringeth forth , some an hundredfold , some sixty , some thirty .
text2: Pero on cuajli tlajli quijtosnequi inyojlo on tlacamej yejhuan ica cuelcaquij niman cajsicamatij itlajtol Dios , niman intech quisa se cuajli tlaquiliyotl . Yejhuamej sa no ijqui quen on xinachtli yejhuan oquitlaquitij se ciento iteyo , niman ocsequimej sa no ijqui quen on yejhuan oquitlaquitij yepoajli , noso sa no ijqui quen on yejhuan oquitlaquitij sempoajli huan majtlactli .

text: Another parable put he forth unto them , saying , The kingdom of heaven is likened unto a man which sowed good seed in his field :
text2: Jesús no oquintlalilij in ocse ejemplo : ― Niman ipan in tlalticpactli campa Dios tlamandarohua sa no ijqui quen se tlajli campa se tlacatl quitoca ican cuajli xinachtli .

text: But while men slept , his enemy came and sowed tares among the wheat , and went his way .
text2: Pero ijcuac iteco on tlajli niman itequitcahuan cochticatcaj , ocalaquito se itlahuelicniu niman oquitocac on xcuajli xojtli intzajlan on trigo . Niman quemaj onejcuanij .

text: But when the blade was sprung up , and brought forth fruit , then appeared the tares also .
text2: Ijcuac on trigo onoscaltij niman omiyahuatlapan , no ompa ones on xcuajli xojtli .

text: So the servants of the householder came and said unto him , Sir , didst not thou sow good seed in thy field ? from whence then hath it tares ?
text2: Quemaj on tequitquej ohualajquej itech on iteco on tlajli , niman oquijlijquej : “ Señor , tla yejhua on xinachtli yejhuan otictocac ne ipan on motlal cuajli catca , ¿ canon , tej , ohualeu on xcuajli xojtli ? ”

text: He said unto them , An enemy hath done this . The servants said unto him , Wilt thou then that we go and gather them up ?
text2: Niman iteco on tlajli oquimijlij : “ Yacaj notlahuelicniu oquichiu yejhua on . ” Quemaj itequitcahuan oquitlajtoltijquej : “ ¿ Ticnequi para ma ticuihuitlatij on xcuajli xojtli ? ”

text: But he said , Nay ; lest while ye gather up the tares , ye root up also the wheat with them .
text2: Niman yejhua oquimijlij : “ Ca , xnicnequi , pampa ijcuac nencuihuitlasquej on xcuajli xojtli , no huelis tehuan nencuihuitlasquej on trigo .

text: Let both grow together until the harvest : and in the time of harvest I will say to the reapers , Gather ye together first the tares , and bind them in bundles to burn them : but gather the wheat into my barn .
text2: Más cuajli xcahuilican ma ihuan noscalti hasta ma chicahui on trigo . Niman ijcuac yochicau , niquinnahuatis on pixcaquej achtopa ma quisentlalican on xcuajli xojtli niman ma quisalocan por manojos para tlatlas . Niman quemaj niquinnahuatis ma quisentlalican on trigo niman ma quitlalican ipan nocuescon . ”

text: Another parable put he forth unto them , saying , The kingdom of heaven is like to a grain of mustard seed , which a man took , and sowed in his field :
text2: Jesús no oquintlalilij yejhua in ocse ejemplo : ― On tlacamej yejhuan Dios quinmandarohua ipan in tlalticpactli miyequixtihuij sa no ijqui quen iteyo mostaza ijcuac se tlacatl yoquitocac ipan itlal nomayehualojtiu .

text: Which indeed is the least of all seeds : but when it is grown , it is the greatest among herbs , and becometh a tree , so that the birds of the air come and lodge in the branches thereof .
text2: On melahuac ica yejhua más pitentzin xinachtli xquen nochimej on xinachtin yejhuan onoquej . Pero ijcuac noscaltia , nochihua más hueyi xquen nochi on tlen quitocaj . Yejhua hueyiya quen itlaj hueyi cojtli , niman hasta on totomej huajlahuij itech niman notepajsoltiaj ipan imatzitzihuan .

text: Another parable spake he unto them ; The kingdom of heaven is like unto leaven , which a woman took , and hid in three measures of meal , till the whole was leavened .
text2: No oquintlalilij yejhua in ocse ejemplo : ― On tlacamej yejhuan Dios quinmandarohua ipan in tlalticpactli ijcomej quen on tlaxocolilistli yejhuan se sihuatl quimanelohua ican yeyi tlatemachihuajli harina hasta queman nochi najcocui .

text: All these things spake Jesus unto the multitude in parables ; and without a parable spake he not unto them :
text2: Nochi yejhua in Jesús oquimijlij on tlacamej ican ejemplos niman xitlaj quimijliaya tla xican ejemplo .

text: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet , saying , I will open my mouth in parables ; I will utter things which have been kept secret from the foundation of the world .
text2: Yejhua ijquin oquichiu san para otenquis on tlen oquijtoj on tiotlajtojquetl ijcuac ijquin oquijcuiloj : Nitenojnotzas ican ejemplos , niman niquijtos on tlajtlamach yejhuan ichtaca oncaj desde ijcuac Dios oquichijchiu in tlalticpactli .

text: Then Jesus sent the multitude away , and went into the house : and his disciples came unto him , saying , Declare unto us the parable of the tares of the field .
text2: Quemaj Jesús oquimijlij on tojlan ica ye yau . Quemaj ocalaquito ipan on cajli , niman inomachtijcahuan oquinisihuijquej , niman oquijlijquej : ― Cuajli xtechmelajcaijli iejemplo yejhua on xcuajli xojtli yejhuan oquis ne itzajlan on trigo .

text: He answered and said unto them , He that soweth the good seed is the Son of man ;
text2: Ijcuacon Jesús oquimijlij : ― On yejhuan quitoca on cuajli xinachtli sa no nejhua yejhuan oninochiu Tlacatl ,

text: The field is the world ; the good seed are the children of the kingdom ; but the tares are the children of the wicked one ;
text2: niman on tlajli yejhuan trigojyoj sa no yejhua in tlalticpactli . On cuajli xinachtli quijtosnequi on tlacamej yejhuan teconehuan itech Dios , niman on xcuajli xojtli quijtosnequi on yejhuan teconehuan itech diablo ,

text: The enemy that sowed them is the devil ; the harvest is the end of the world ; and the reapers are the angels .
text2: niman on tetlahuelicniu yejhuan oquitocac on xcuajli xojtli sa no yejhua on diablo . On tonaltin ijcuac on pixcaquej quitequij on trigo quijtosnequi on tonaltin ijcuac tlatlalpolihuis , niman on pixcaquej yejhuan quitequij on trigo sa no yejhuamej on ilhuicactequitquej .

text: As therefore the tares are gathered and burned in the fire ; so shall it be in the end of this world .
text2: Ijcon quen on xcuajli xojtli nosentlalia niman conxiniaj ipan tlitl para tlatla , no ijqui nochihuas ijcuac tlatlalpolihuis .

text: The Son of man shall send forth his angels , and they shall gather out of his kingdom all things that offend , and them which do iniquity ;
text2: Nejhua yejhuan oninochiu Tlacatl niquinhuajtitlanis noilhuicactequitcahuan para quinhuajsentlalisquej niman quinquixtisquej intzajlan on tlacamej yejhuan niquinmandarohua nochimej on yejhuan quichihuaj para ocsequimej ma tlajtlacocan , niman on yejhuan quichihuaj on tlen xcuajli .

text: And shall cast them into a furnace of fire : there shall be wailing and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Niman cominxinisquej ne tlico campa yejhuamej sanoyej chocasquej niman notlantotopotzasquej .

text: Then shall the righteous shine forth as the sun in the kingdom of their Father . Who hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Ijcuacon on yejhuan cuajcualtin petlanisquej quen on tonaltzintli ne campa inTajtzin tlamandarohua . Tla nemejhuamej nenquipiaj nemotlamachilis , xcajsicamatican on ejemplo .

text: Again , the kingdom of heaven is like unto treasure hid in a field ; the which when a man hath found , he hideth , and for joy thereof goeth and selleth all that he hath , and buyeth that field .
text2: ' On tlacatl yejhuan quinequi Dios ma quimandaro quen se tlacatl yejhuan oquinextij on tesoro ipan se tlajli campa iyanticatca . Ijcuac oquinextij on tesoro , ocsejpa ompa oquiyan . Niman ican paquilistli oyaj ichan , niman oquinamacato nochi tlen quipia . Quemaj ocou on tlajli campa oquinextij on tesoro .

text: Again , the kingdom of heaven is like unto a merchant man , seeking goodly pearls :
text2: ' On tlacatl yejhuan quinequi calaquis ne campa Dios tlamandarohua , no quitejtemojtinemi on perlas yejhuan sanoyej cualtetzitzintin .

text: Who , when he had found one pearl of great price , went and sold all that he had , and bought it .
text2: Niman ijcuac quinextia se yejhuan sanoyej patioj , yau ichan , niman quinamaca nochi tlen quipia , niman cohua on perla .

text: Again , the kingdom of heaven is like unto a net , that was cast into the sea , and gathered of every kind :
text2: ' Ne campa Dios ilhuicac chanej tlamandarohua no ijqui quen se matlatl yejhuan conchapaniaj ipan mar niman quisentlalia miyec sesetlamantic michimej .

text: Which , when it was full , they drew to shore , and sat down , and gathered the good into vessels , but cast the bad away .
text2: Ijcuac temi on matlatl , on michajsiquej quixtiaj ne itenco on mar , niman ompa notlaliaj para quintlapejpeniaj on michimej . Yejhuamej quejehuaj on yejhuan cuajcualtin ipan chiquiutin , niman quixiniaj on yejhuan xcuajcualtin .

text: So shall it be at the end of the world : the angels shall come forth , and sever the wicked from among the just ,
text2: Ijcon nochihuas ijcuac tlatlalpolihuis . On ilhuicactequitquej quisasquej para quinxelosquej on yejhuan xcuajcualtin tlacamej intech on yejhuan cuajcualtin tlacamej .

text: And shall cast them into the furnace of fire : there shall be wailing and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Niman cominxinisquej on xcuajcualtin tlacamej ne tlico campa sanoyej chocasquej niman notlantisisquej .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Have ye understood all these things ? They say unto him , Yea , Lord .
text2: Quemaj Jesús oquintlajtoltij : ― ¿ Nencajsicamatij nochi yejhua in ? Yejhuamej oquijtojquej : ― Quemaj , toTeco .

text: Then said he unto them , Therefore every scribe which is instructed unto the kingdom of heaven is like unto a man that is an householder , which bringeth forth out of his treasure things new and old .
text2: Quemaj oquimijlij : ― Ijcuac se temachtijquetl ica on tlanahuatijli nomachtia quen Dios tlamandarohua , hueli quitemachtia on yencuic temachtilistli niman on yejhuan xencuic . Yejhua , tej , sa no ijqui quen se tlayejyejquetl ipan se cajli yejhuan quimati quen ijqui quixtia itech on tlen quipia tlajtlamach yejhuan yencuic niman yejhuan xencuic .

text: And it came to pass , that when Jesus had finished these parables , he departed thence .
text2: Ijcuac Jesús otlan quiteijlia in ejemplos , oyaj .

text: And when he was come into his own country , he taught them in their synagogue , insomuch that they were astonished , and said , Whence hath this man this wisdom , and these mighty works ?
text2: Ijcuac oajsic ipan ipueblo , opeu temachtia ne ipan intiopan on tlacamej . Yejhuamej oometlamatquej niman ocualancatlanemilijquej . Yejhua ica quijtohuayaj : ― ¿ Canon ohuelito in tlacatl on tlamatquilistli ? ¿ Quen ijqui hueli quichihua yejhua in milagros ?

text: Is not this the carpenter ' s son ? is not his mother called Mary ? and his brethren , James , and Joses , and Simon , and Judas ?
text2: In , tej , yejhua iconeu on cojxinqui , niman no yejhua inan María . Yejhua icnihuan Jacobo , José , Simón niman Judas .

text: And his sisters , are they not all with us ? Whence then hath this man all these things ?
text2: Niman nochimej icnihuan yejhuan sihuamej no nican totzajlan chantij . ¿ Canon , tej , hueli quimati niman quichihua nochi yejhua in tlajtlamach ?

text: And they were offended in him . But Jesus said unto them , A prophet is not without honour , save in his own country , and in his own house .
text2: Niman yejhuamej ocualanquej itechcopa Jesús . Pero yejhua oquimijlij : ― Sen tiotlajtojquetl nochihuiyan quitlacaitaj , pero ipan ipueblo niman intzajlan ichanchanecahuan xquitlacaitaj .

text: And he did not many mighty works there because of their unbelief .
text2: Niman ompa xoquichiu miyec milagros , pampa yejhuamej xquineltocayaj .

text: At that time Herod the tetrarch heard of the fame of Jesus ,
text2: Ipan on tonaltin , Herodes , on gobernador ne Galilea , ocac on tlen huejhueyi quichihuaya Jesús .

text: And said unto his servants , This is John the Baptist ; he is risen from the dead ; and therefore mighty works do shew forth themselves in him .
text2: Niman yejhua oquimijlij itequitcahuan yejhuan quipalehuiyaj para tlamandarohua : ― On yejhua Juan on tlacuatequijquetl . Yejhua yonoyolihuitij niman yonoquetzteu intzajlan on mimiquej . Yejhua ica yejhua hueli quichihua on milagros .

text: For Herod had laid hold on John , and bound him , and put him in prison for Herodias ' sake , his brother Philip ' s wife .
text2: Herodes ijcon oquijtoj , pampa yejhua otlanahuatij ma cajsican Juan , niman ma quisalocan ican teposcadenas niman ma quitzacuacan para quipactis Herodías yejhuan isihuau . Yejhua in Herodías isihuau catca Felipe on icniu Herodes .

text: For John said unto him , It is not lawful for thee to have her .
text2: Herodes oquitzacu Juan pampa yejhua quijliaya : ― Itlanahuatil Dios xmitzcahuilia ticpias isihuau mocniu quen mosihuau .

text: And when he would have put him to death , he feared the multitude , because they counted him as a prophet .
text2: Herodes quinequiya quimictis Juan , pero quinmacajsiya on tlacamej , pampa nochimej quineltocayaj ica Juan se tiotlajtojquetl .

text: But when Herod ' s birthday was kept , the daughter of Herodias danced before them , and pleased Herod .
text2: Pero ijcuac oquichijquej ilhuitl ipan ilhuiu Herodes , imixpan on itenotzcahuan onijtotij ichpoch Herodías . Niman Herodes sanoyej ocuelitac quen onijtotij on ichpochtli .

text: Whereupon he promised with an oath to give her whatsoever she would ask .
text2: Yejhua ica oquiprometerohuilij niman onocalactij ican itlajtol para quimacas san tlinon yejhua quitlajtlanis .

text: And she , being before instructed of her mother , said , Give me here John Baptist ' s head in a charger .
text2: Ijcuacon yejhua ican itlanahuatil inan oquijlij Herodes : ― Nican ipan se plato xnechmaca itzontecon Juan on tlacuatequijquetl .

text: And the king was sorry : nevertheless for the oath ' s sake , and them which sat with him at meat , he commanded it to be given her .
text2: Ijcuacon on rey Herodes onajman , pero pampa yonocalactijca ican itlajtol , niman impampa on itenotzcahuan yejhuan ihuan tlacuaj , on rey otlanahuatij para ma quimacacan .

text: And he sent , and beheaded John in the prison .
text2: Oquintitlan on isoldados ma quiquechtzontequitij Juan ne campa tzacuticaj .

text: And his head was brought in a charger , and given to the damsel : and she brought it to her mother .
text2: Quemaj ocuajquiquej itzontecon ipan se plato , niman oquimacaquej on ichpochtli . Quemaj yejhua oquitquic niman oquimactilij inan .

text: And his disciples came , and took up the body , and buried it , and went and told Jesus .
text2: Quemaj ohualajquej on yejhuan inomachtijcahuan Juan , niman oquitquiquej on itlalnacayo niman ocahuatoj ipan tlalcontli . Quemaj oyajquej oquimachiltitoj Jesús on tlinon onochiu .

text: When Jesus heard of it , he departed thence by ship into a desert place apart : and when the people had heard thereof , they followed him on foot out of the cities .
text2: Ijcuac Jesús ijcon oquimat , onejcuanij ompa niman oyaj ipan barco campaca xacaj nemi . Pero ijcuac on tlacamej oquimatquej ica Jesús ye yau , yejhuamej oquisquej ipan on pueblos , niman onejnentiajquej ocuitlapanhuijquej .

text: And Jesus went forth , and saw a great multitude , and was moved with compassion toward them , and he healed their sick .
text2: Ijcuac Jesús oquis ipan on barco , oquitac ica miyec tlacatl ompa quichixticatca . Yejhua oquimicnelij niman oquimpajtij on cocoxquej yejhuan quinhuicayaj .

text: And when it was evening , his disciples came to him , saying , This is a desert place , and the time is now past ; send the multitude away , that they may go into the villages , and buy themselves victuals .
text2: Ijcuac ye tiotlac catca , on inomachtijcahuan Jesús ohualajquej itech , niman oquijlijquej : ― Ye tiotlac , niman xacaj nican chanti . Xquintitlani on tlacamej para ma huiyan ipan on pueblitos niman ma cohuacan tlen quicuasquej .

text: But Jesus said unto them , They need not depart ; give ye them to eat .
text2: Jesús oquimijlij : ― Ca , xquipiaj tlica yasquej . Sa no nemejhuamej xquinmacacan tlinon quicuasquej .

text: And they say unto him , We have here but five loaves , and two fishes .
text2: Yejhuamej oquijlijquej : ― Pero san ticpiaj macuijli pan niman ome michin .

text: He said , Bring them hither to me .
text2: Jesús oquimijlij : ― Xnechajcuilican nican .

text: And he commanded the multitude to sit down on the grass , and took the five loaves , and the two fishes , and looking up to heaven , he blessed , and brake , and gave the loaves to his disciples , and the disciples to the multitude .
text2: Quemaj otlanahuatij para on tlacamej ma notlajtlalican ipan on sacayoj . Quemaj ijcuac ocontilan on macuijli pan niman on ome michimej , oajcotlachix ne ilhuicac niman oquimacac tlaxtlahuijli Dios para on tlacuajli . Niman quemaj oquitlatlapan on pan niman oquinmacac on inomachtijcahuan para ma quinxexelohuilican on tlacamej .

text: And they did all eat , and were filled : and they took up of the fragments that remained twelve baskets full .
text2: Nochimej otlacuajquej niman cuajli oixhuiquej . Quemaj on nomachtijquej ica on tlatlajcotzitzin tlen onocau oquitemiltijquej majtlactli huan ome chiquiutin .

text: And they that had eaten were about five thousand men , beside women and children .
text2: On yejhuan otlacuajquej canaj macuijli mil tlacamej , pero xtehuamej tlapohualti on sihuamej nion on coconej yejhuan no otlacuajquej .

text: And straightway Jesus constrained his disciples to get into a ship , and to go before him unto the other side , while he sent the multitudes away .
text2: Quemaj Jesús oquinnahuatij on inomachtijcahuan para ma calaquican ipan on barco , niman ma yecatztiacan ipan ocse ilado on mar chica yejhua quinnahuatiaya on tlacamej .

text: And when he had sent the multitudes away , he went up into a mountain apart to pray : and when the evening was come , he was there alone .
text2: Más saquin , ijcuac yoquintitlan on tlacamej , Jesús otlejcoc ipan on tepetl para iselti oquichihuato oración . Ijcuac otlayohuac , Jesús iselti ompa nemiya .

text: But the ship was now in the midst of the sea , tossed with waves : for the wind was contrary .
text2: Ipan on mismo tiempo on barco ye atlajcotian yaya , niman on olas ontlahuitequiyaj itech on barco , pampa sanoyej chicahuac ajacatl tlahuitequiya intech yejhuamej .

text: And in the fourth watch of the night Jesus went unto them , walking on the sea .
text2: Ijcuac canaj ipan yeyi hora ica cualcan , Jesús nejnentiaya ne ixco on mar niman oquinnisihuij inomachtijcahuan .

text: And when the disciples saw him walking on the sea , they were troubled , saying , It is a spirit ; and they cried out for fear .
text2: Niman ijcuac on inomachtijcahuan oquitaquej nejnentiu ne ixco on mar , sanoyej onomojtijquej . Yejhuamej oquijtojquej : ― ¡ Aj ! ¡ Ne nemi se tlamojtiloni ! Niman omojcatzajtziquej .

text: But straightway Jesus spake unto them , saying , Be of good cheer ; it is I ; be not afraid .
text2: Pero Jesús nimantzin oquinnotz , niman oquimijlij : ― Xmoyolchicahuacan . Nejhua niJesús . Ma ca xmomojtican .

text: And Peter answered him and said , Lord , if it be thou , bid me come unto thee on the water .
text2: Ijcuacon Pedro oconanquilij , niman oquijlij : ― NoTeco , tla tejhua , xtlanahuati ma nihuiya ipan on atl hasta campa tejhua tinemi .

text: And he said , Come . And when Peter was come down out of the ship , he walked on the water , to go to Jesus .
text2: Jesús oquijlij : ― Xhuajla , tej . Ijcuacon Pedro otemoc ipan on barco , niman opeu nejnemi ipan on mar para yas campa nemi Jesús .

text: But when he saw the wind boisterous , he was afraid ; and beginning to sink , he cried , saying , Lord , save me .
text2: Pero ijcuac oquitac on temojtij ajacatl , onomojtij niman opeu apolaqui . Quemaj ijquin otzajtzic : ― ¡ Xnechmaquixti , noTeco !

text: And immediately Jesus stretched forth his hand , and caught him , and said unto him , O thou of little faith , wherefore didst thou doubt ?
text2: Nimantzin Jesús oquitzquij ipan ima , niman oquijlij : ― ¡ Semi achijtzin ticpia tlaneltoctli ! ¿ Tlica otiometlamat ?

text: And when they were come into the ship , the wind ceased .
text2: Niman ijcuac yejhuamej otlejcoquej ipan on barco , onoteltij on ica chicahuac ajacaya .

text: Then they that were in the ship came and worshipped him , saying , Of a truth thou art the Son of God .
text2: Quemaj on yejhuan nemiyaj ne ipan barco onotlacuenquetzquej ne ixpan Jesús , niman oquimahuistilijquej . Oquijlijquej : ― Tlacaj melahuac tejhua tiiConetzin Dios .

text: And when they were gone over , they came into the land of Gennesaret .
text2: Niman ijcuac oquipanahuijquej on mar , oajsiquej ipan on tlajli itoca Genesaret .

text: And when the men of that place had knowledge of him , they sent out into all that country round about , and brought unto him all that were diseased ;
text2: Ijcuac on tlacamej yejhuan chanejquej ipan on lugar oconixmatquej , oquitemachiltitoj nochihuiyan ipan on regiónes ica Jesús ye ompa nemi . Yejhua ica oquinhuajhuicaquej nochimej on cocoxquej ne campa Jesús nemiya .

text: And besought him that they might only touch the hem of his garment : and as many as touched were made perfectly whole .
text2: Niman on tlacamej sanoyej oquitlajtlanilijquej para on cocoxquej ma quincahuili ma quimatoquilican , masqui san itencotzin on itlaquen . Niman nochimej yejhuan oquimatoquilijquej , opajtiquej .

text: Then came to Jesus scribes and Pharisees , which were of Jerusalem , saying ,
text2: Quemaj semej fariseos niman on temachtijquej ican tlanahuatijli yejhuan ohualejquej ne ipan on hueyican de Jerusalén oquinisihuijquej Jesús , niman oquitlajtoltijquej :

text: Why do thy disciples transgress the tradition of the elders ? for they wash not their hands when they eat bread .
text2: ― ¿ Tlica monomachtijcahuan xquitlacamatij incostumbre on achtojtajhuan ? Monomachtijcahuan , tej , xnomajtequiaj ijcuac tlacuaj ijqui quen on achtojtatajtin tlamandarohuaj .

text: But he answered and said unto them , Why do ye also transgress the commandment of God by your tradition ?
text2: Pero Jesús oquimijlij : ― ¿ Man tlica nemejhuamej no xnenquitlacamatij on itlanahuatil Dios , san para nenquitlacamatij on nemocostumbres ?

text: For God commanded , saying , Honour thy father and mother : and , He that curseth father or mother , let him die the death .
text2: Dios oquijtoj : “ Xtlacaita motaj niman monan . ” Niman no oquijtoj : “ Yejhuan itlaj xcuajli quitenehuilis itaj noso inan , ma quimictican . ”

text: But ye say , Whosoever shall say to his father or his mother , It is a gift , by whatsoever thou mightest be profited by me ;
text2: Pero nemejhuamej nenquijtohuaj ica se tlacatl huelis quijlis itaj noso inan yejhuan quipolohua itlaj : “ Xhuelis nimitzpalehuis ica on tlen mitzpolohua pampa nochi tlen nicpia yonicmactilij Dios . ”

text: And honour not his father or his mother , he shall be free . Thus have ye made the commandment of God of none effect by your tradition .
text2: Yejhua ica on , tej , tlen nenquijtohuaj quijtosnequi ica on tlacatl xoc quitocarohua quipalehuis itaj noso inan ica on tlen quipolohua . Ijcon , tej , nemejhuamej yonencuepquej quen xitlaj quijtosnequi on itlanahuatil Dios san para nenquitlacamatij on costumbres yejhuan otemachtijcaj on achtojtatajtin .

text: Ye hypocrites , well did Esaias prophesy of you , saying ,
text2: ¡ Omexayacyejquej ! Cuajli oquijtoj on tiotlajtojquetl Isaías nemotechcopa ijcuac oquijcuiloj quen Dios oquijtoj . Oquijtoj :

text: This people draweth nigh unto me with their mouth , and honoureth me with their lips ; but their heart is far from me .
text2: Yejhuamej in tlacamej nechtlacaitaj ican on tlen quijtohuaj , pero xnechtlacaitaj ican inyojlo .

text: But in vain they do worship me , teaching for doctrines the commandments of men .
text2: San nencaj nechmahuistiliaj , pampa yejhuamej quitemachtiaj on tlanahuatiltin yejhuan sa no yejhuamej on tlacamej oquitlalijquej quen itlanahuatilhuan yesquiaj Dios .

text: And he called the multitude , and said unto them , Hear , and understand :
text2: Quemaj Jesús oquinnotz nochimej on tlacamej , niman oquimijlij : ― Xcaquican niman xcajsicamatican .

text: Not that which goeth into the mouth defileth a man ; but that which cometh out of the mouth , this defileth a man .
text2: On tlen calaqui icamac se tlacatl xquijtlacohua , yej yejhua on tlen quisa icamac se tlacatl , yejhua quijtlacohua .

text: Then came his disciples , and said unto him , Knowest thou that the Pharisees were offended , after they heard this saying ?
text2: Ijcuacon on nomachtijquej oquinisihuijquej Jesús , niman oquijlijquej : ― ¿ Ticmati ica on fariseos ocualanquej ijcuac ocacquej on tlen otiquijtoj ?

text: But he answered and said , Every plant , which my heavenly Father hath not planted , shall be rooted up .
text2: Pero yejhua oquimijlij : ― San tlen xojtli noso cojtli yejhuan noTajtzin ilhuicac chanej xoquitocac , hasta ipan inelhuayo nohuihuitlas .

text: Let them alone : they be blind leaders of the blind . And if the blind lead the blind , both shall fall into the ditch .
text2: Ma ca , tej , xquimpajsolocan . Yejhuamej quen on ciegos quinyecanaj ocsequimej ciegos . Tla se ciego quiyecanas ocse ciego , nochimej on omemej onxinisquej ne campa huejcatlan .

text: Then answered Peter and said unto him , Declare unto us this parable .
text2: Ijcuacon Pedro oquijlij Jesús : ― Cuajli xtechmelajcaijli yejhua in ejemplo .

text: And Jesus said , Are ye also yet without understanding ?
text2: Jesús oquijtoj : ― ¿ Nemejhuamej no oc xnencajsicamatij ?

text: Do not ye yet understand , that whatsoever entereth in at the mouth goeth into the belly , and is cast out into the draught ?
text2: ¿ Xnencajsicamatij ica nochi tlen calaqui ipan icamac se tlacatl yau ipan ijti niman quemaj quisa ipan on itlalnacayo ?

text: But those things which proceed out of the mouth come forth from the heart ; and they defile the man .
text2: Pero on tlen quijtohua se tlacatl hualehua ipan iyojlo , niman in quijtlacohua on tlacatl .

text: For out of the heart proceed evil thoughts , murders , adulteries , fornications , thefts , false witness , blasphemies :
text2: Yejhua in melahuac , pampa ipan iyojlo quisa on xcuajcualtin tlamachilistli , on temictilistli , on sihuapajpatlalistli , on ahuilnemilistli , on tlachtequilistli , on tetlajtolcatztehualistli , niman on tlahuijhuicaltilistli .

text: These are the things which defile a man : but to eat with unwashen hands defileth not a man .
text2: Yejhua in tlajtlamach quijtlacohua se tlacatl . Pero tla se tlacatl xnomajtequiya ijcuac tlacua , quen on tlayecanquej ipan on tiopan temachtiaj , on xteijtlacohua .

text: Then Jesus went thence , and departed into the coasts of Tyre and Sidon .
text2: Jesús onejcuanij niman oyaj ne ipan on región campa nisiu intech on omemej huejhueyican intoca Tiro niman Sidón .

text: And , behold , a woman of Canaan came out of the same coasts , and cried unto him , saying , Have mercy on me , O Lord , thou Son of David ; my daughter is grievously vexed with a devil .
text2: Niman se sihuatl cananea yejhuan chantiya ipan on región ohuajtzajtzitiaj itech Jesús : ― ¡ NoTeco , huejca teixhuiu itech David , xnechicneli niman xnechpalehui ! Nochpoch quipia se xcuajli espíritu niman sanoyej temojtij quitlajyohuiltia .

text: But he answered her not a word . And his disciples came and besought him , saying , Send her away ; for she crieth after us .
text2: Pero Jesús xoquichihuilij cuenta . Quemaj on inomachtijcahuan oquinisihuijquej Jesús niman sanoyej oquitlajtlanilijquej : ― Xnahuati ma huiya pampa huajtzajtzitiu tocuitlapan .

text: But he answered and said , I am not sent but unto the lost sheep of the house of Israel .
text2: Ijcuacon Jesús oquijtoj : ― NoTaj san onechajtitlan intech on hebreos yejhuan ixpolijtinemij .

text: Then came she and worshipped him , saying , Lord , help me .
text2: Pero on sihuatl oquinisihuij niman ixpan onotlacuenquetz , niman oquijlij : ― ¡ NoTeco , xnechpalehui !

text: But he answered and said , It is not meet to take the children ' s bread , and to cast it to dogs .
text2: Pero Jesús oquijlij : ― Tejhua xtihebrea . Tla nimitzpalehuis , yejhua in sa no ijqui quen nicualtisquia se chichi intlacual on iconehuan Dios .
