text: And came out of the graves after his resurrection , and went into the holy city , and appeared unto many .
text2: Niman ijcuac Jesús oyoliu niman onoquetzteu , on iyaxcahuan Dios oquisquej ijtic intlalcon , niman oyajquej ne ipan on yectiticaj hueyican itoca Jerusalén campa miyec tlacatl oquintac .

text: Now when the centurion , and they that were with him , watching Jesus , saw the earthquake , and those things that were done , they feared greatly , saying , Truly this was the Son of God .
text2: Ijcuac on capitán niman on soldados , yejhuan ompa inhuan quitlajpiayaj Jesús , oquimatquej tlalolinticaj niman oquitaquej ocsequi tlajtlamach nochijticaj , sanoyej onomojtijquej , niman oquijtojquej : ― In tlacatl melahuac iConeu catca Dios .

text: And many women were there beholding afar off , which followed Jesus from Galilee , ministering unto him :
text2: San huejcatzin nemiyaj miyequej sihuamej yejhuan ocuajhuicaquej Jesús de ne Galilea hasta Jerusalén para oquipalehuijquej .

text: Among which was Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James and Joses , and the mother of Zebedee ' s children .
text2: María yejhuan hualehua ne ipan on hueyican itoca Magdala , María on yejhuan innan Jacobo niman José , niman innan on iconehuan Zebedeo ompa nemiyaj inhuan ocsequimej .

text: When the even was come , there came a rich man of Arimathaea , named Joseph , who also himself was Jesus ' disciple :
text2: Ijcuac ye tlayohuatitiaya , ohuajlaj se tlacatl rico itoca José . Yejhuan hualehuaya ipan on pueblo itoca Arimatea . Yejhua no inomachtijcau catca Jesús .

text: He went to Pilate , and begged the body of Jesus . Then Pilate commanded the body to be delivered .
text2: Oyaj itech Pilato , niman oquitlajtlanilij itlalnacayo Jesús . Niman Pilato otlanahuatij ma quimacacan .

text: And when Joseph had taken the body , he wrapped it in a clean linen cloth ,
text2: José oquitemohuij itlalnacayo Jesús , niman oquitejcuix ican se tlaquentli istac yejhuan patioj niman chipahuac .

text: And laid it in his own new tomb , which he had hewn out in the rock : and he rolled a great stone to the door of the sepulchre , and departed .
text2: Quemaj ocahuato ipan se yencuic tlalcontli yejhuan oquichijchiu ipan se techinantli . Niman quemaj ocuejcueptiaj se tetl sanoyej hueyi para oquitentzacu . Niman ijcuac yoquitentzacu on tlalcontli , oyaj .

text: And there was Mary Magdalene , and the other Mary , sitting over against the sepulchre .
text2: Niman María yejhuan hualehua Magdala ihuan on ocse María onotlajtlalijquej ixpan on tlalcontli .

text: Now the next day , that followed the day of the preparation , the chief priests and Pharisees came together unto Pilate ,
text2: Huajmostla , ipan on tonajli ijcuac on hebreos nosehuiaj , intlayecancahuan on tiopixquej niman on fariseos oyajquej , oquitatoj Pilato ,

text: Saying , Sir , we remember that that deceiver said , while he was yet alive , After three days I will rise again .
text2: niman oquijlijquej : ― Señor , tejhuamej otiquelnamiquej ijcuac on tlacajcayajquetl oc nemiya , oquijtoj ica más saquin ipan yeyi tonajli yolihuis niman noquetztehuas ne ipan itlalcon .

text: Command therefore that the sepulchre be made sure until the third day , lest his disciples come by night , and steal him away , and say unto the people , He is risen from the dead : so the last error shall be worse than the first .
text2: Yejhua ica , tejhuamej ticnequij xtlanahuati ma cuajli quitlajpiatij on tlalcontli hasta ma ajsi on yeyi tonajli para on inomachtijcahuan ma ca cualichtequisquej on itlalnacayo , niman quemaj quimijlisquej on tlacamej : “ Aman yoyoliu niman yonoquetzteu ipan itlalcon . ” Tla ijcon nochihuas , más temojtij onyas tlacajcayahualistli xquen ijcuac oquijtoj ica ijcon quichihuas .

text: Pilate said unto them , Ye have a watch : go your way , make it as sure as ye can .
text2: Pilato oquimijlij : ― Ompa on nenquimpiaj quesquimej soldados . Xhuiyan , niman hasta campa nenhuelisquej cuajli xtlajpiacan on tlalcontli .

text: So they went , and made the sepulchre sure , sealing the stone , and setting a watch .
text2: Quemaj oyajquej niman oquitlalijquej se sello ipan on tetl yejhuan ica tentzacuticatca para quitasquej tla yacaj calaqui ne ijtic on tlalcontli . Niman quemaj ompa oquincajquej on soldados para ma quitlajpiacan .

text: In the end of the sabbath , as it began to dawn toward the first day of the week , came Mary Magdalene and the other Mary to see the sepulchre .
text2: Ijcuac opanoc on tonajli ica nosehuiaj on hebreos niman yohuajtlanes ipan on tonajli domingo , María yejhuan hualehua ne Magdala ihuan on ocse María oyajquej oquitatoj on tlalcontli .

text: And , behold , there was a great earthquake : for the angel of the Lord descended from heaven , and came and rolled back the stone from the door , and sat upon it .
text2: Niman nimantzin ohuajtlalolin , pampa se ilhuicactequitquetl , yejhuan toTeco ocuajtitlan , ohuajtemoc ne ilhuicac . Ijcuac oyejcoc ne itech on tlalcontli , oquejcuanij on tetl yejhuan ica tentzacuticatca niman ipan onotlalij .

text: His countenance was like lightning , and his raiment white as snow :
text2: Yejhua sanoyej petlanqui catca quen itlaj tlapetlanajli , niman itlaquen istac catca quen itlaj nieve .

text: And for fear of him the keepers did shake , and became as dead men .
text2: Niman ijcuac on soldados oquitaquej on ilhuicactequitquetl , onomojtijquej , ocuecuetlacaquej niman onocajquej quen omijmiquej .

text: And the angel answered and said unto the women , Fear not ye : for I know that ye seek Jesus , which was crucified .
text2: Quemaj on ilhuicactequitquetl oquimijlij on sihuamej : ― Ma ca xmomojtican . Nejhua nicmatzticaj ica onenquitacoj Jesús yejhuan oquimajmasohualtijquej ipan on cojnepanojli .

text: He is not here : for he is risen , as he said . Come , see the place where the Lord lay .
text2: Yejhua xnican nemi . Yejhua yoyoliu niman yonoquetzteu ipan itlalcon quen oquijtojca quichihuas . Xhuajlacan , xquitacan campa oquitecacaj .

text: And go quickly , and tell his disciples that he is risen from the dead ; and , behold , he goeth before you into Galilee ; there shall ye see him : lo , I have told you .
text2: Nimantzin xhuiyan , niman xquimijlican on inomachtijcahuan : “ On yejhuan omic , aman yoyoliu niman yonoquetzteu ipan itlalcon . Aman , tej , yejhua nemoyecapan yas ne Galilea niman ompa nenquitasquej . ” Aman yonemechijlij on tlen nonequi nemechijlis .

text: And they departed quickly from the sepulchre with fear and great joy ; and did run to bring his disciples word .
text2: Niman on sihuamej nimantzin onejcuanijquej ne itech on tlalcontli ican nemojtijli niman no ican miyec paquilistli . Yejhuamej onotlajtlalojquej para oquinmachiltitoj on nomachtijquej on tlen oquimijlij on ilhuicactequitquetl .

text: And as they went to tell his disciples , behold , Jesus met them , saying , All hail . And they came and held him by the feet , and worshipped him .
text2: Niman chica yejhuamej on sihuamej yayaj , Jesús oquinnotitij niman oquintlajpaloj . Niman yejhuamej oquinisihuijquej , niman oquinapalojquej icxihuan , niman oquimahuistilijquej .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , Be not afraid : go tell my brethren that they go into Galilee , and there shall they see me .
text2: Yejhua oquimijlij : ― Ma ca xmomojtican . Xhuiyan , xquinmachiltitij nocnihuan ma huiyan ne Galilea , niman ompa nechitasquej .

text: Now when they were going , behold , some of the watch came into the city , and shewed unto the chief priests all the things that were done .
text2: Chica yejhuamej on sihuamej yayaj , sequimej soldados , yejhuan quitlajpiayaj on tlalcontli , oyajquej ne ipan on hueyican , niman oquintlajtlajtohuilijquej intlayecancahuan on tiopixquej nochi on tlen onochiu .

text: And when they were assembled with the elders , and had taken counsel , they gave large money unto the soldiers ,
text2: Yejhuamej on tiopixquej oyajquej oquinnotzatoj on tlajtlajmatquej . Niman ijcuac san secan yoquinojlijquej quen ijqui quiyanasquej on tlen melahuac ica Jesús yoyoliu niman yonoquetzteu ipan itlalcon , yejhuamej oquinmacaquej miyec tomin on soldados .

text: Saying , Say ye , His disciples came by night , and stole him away while we slept .
text2: Niman ijquin oquimijlijquej : ― Xquimijlican on tlacamej ica ijcuac tlayohua , chica nemejhuamej nencochticatcaj , on inomachtijcahuan ohualajquej niman oquichtequej itlalnacayo .

text: And if this come to the governor ' s ears , we will persuade him , and secure you .
text2: Niman tla on gobernador caquis , tejhuamej ticyoltlalisquej niman ticchihuasquej para ma ca itlaj mechchihuilisquej .

text: So they took the money , and did as they were taught : and this saying is commonly reported among the Jews until this day .
text2: Quemaj on soldados oquiselijquej on tomin , niman oyajquej oquichihuatoj quen oquimijlijquej . Niman desde ipan on tonajli hasta aman ijqui quitetlajtlajtohuiliaj on hebreos .

text: Then the eleven disciples went away into Galilee , into a mountain where Jesus had appointed them .
text2: Ijcon , tej , on majtlactli huan se nomachtijquej oyajquej ne Galilea ipan on tepetl campa Jesús oquimijlij para yasquej .

text: And when they saw him , they worshipped him : but some doubted .
text2: Niman ijcuac yejhuamej oquitaquej Jesús , oquimahuistilijquej . Pero sequimej ometlamatiyaj .

text: And Jesus came and spake unto them , saying , All power is given unto me in heaven and in earth .
text2: Quemaj Jesús oquinnisihuij , niman oquimijlij : ― Nejhua yonechmacaquej nochi tequihuajyotl para nitlamandarohua ne ilhuicac niman nican ipan in tlalticpactli .

text: Go ye therefore , and teach all nations , baptizing them in the name of the Father , and of the Son , and of the Holy Ghost :
text2: Yejhua ica , tej , xhuiyan imanyan nochi on tlalticpactli , niman xquinmachtican nochimej on tlacamej para yejhuamej no nonomachtijcahuan yesquej . Xquincuatequican ican itoca noTajtzin , niman ican itoca on iConetzin , niman ican itocatzin on Espíritu Santo .

text: Teaching them to observe all things whatsoever I have commanded you : and , lo , I am with you alway , even unto the end of the world . Amen .
text2: Niman xquinmachtican para ma quitlacamatican nochi tlen yonemechnahuatij . Niman xmatican ica nejhua mojmostla nemohuan ninemi hasta ijcuac tlatlalpolihuis . Ma ijqui nochihua .

text: The beginning of the gospel of Jesus Christ , the Son of God ;
text2: Ijquin otzimpeu in cuajli tlajtojli ica Jesucristo yejhua iConetzin Dios .

text: As it is written in the prophets , Behold , I send my messenger before thy face , which shall prepare thy way before thee .
text2: On tiotlajtojquetl Isaías oquijcuilojca on tlinon Dios oquijlijca iconeu . Dios oquijlij : Xcaqui in . Nictitlanis se notenojnotzcau moyecapan . Yejhua quintlalilis inyojlo melajqui para mitzselisquej .

text: The voice of one crying in the wilderness , Prepare ye the way of the Lord , make his paths straight .
text2: On notlaquehual tzajtzi ipan se tlapatlaco . Quimijlia on tojlamej tlacamej : “ Xyectlalican nemoyojlo pampa ye huajlau toTeco . Xmejmelahuacan nemonemilis ijcon quen on tlacamej cueltlaliaj niman quimejmelahuaj se ojtli ijcuac huajlau se tlacatl yejhuan hueyixticaj . ”

text: John did baptize in the wilderness , and preach the baptism of repentance for the remission of sins .
text2: Juan , on tlacuatequijquetl , tlacuatequiaya ne ipan on tlapatlaco , niman quinmachtiayaj on tlacamej ma noyolcuepacan niman ma nocuatequican , niman Dios quintlapojpolhuis intlajtlacol .

text: And there went out unto him all the land of Judaea , and they of Jerusalem , and were all baptized of him in the river of Jordan , confessing their sins .
text2: Huajlayaj cuajcaquiyaj nochimej on chanejquej ipan on hueyican Jerusalén niman on yejhuan nochihuiyan chantiyaj ne Judea . Niman ijcuac yejhuamej yonoyolcuitijquej , Juan quincuatequiayaj ne ipan on atentli itoca Jordán .

text: And John was clothed with camel ' s hair , and with a girdle of a skin about his loins ; and he did eat locusts and wild honey ;
text2: Juan notlaquentiaya ican itojmiyo on yolqui itoca camello , niman notlajcosalohuaya ican se ilpicatl tlachijchiutli ican cuetlaxtli . Quincuaya on yolcatzitzintin yejhuan quen chapolimej , niman no coniya on cojnecutli .

text: And preached , saying , There cometh one mightier than I after me , the latchet of whose shoes I am not worthy to stoop down and unloose .
text2: Niman quinmachtiaya ijquin : ― Huajlau ocse , yejhuan quipia más poder xquen nejhua . Nejhua nion achijtzin xnechmelahua nictojtomas icacmecayo .

text: I indeed have baptized you with water : but he shall baptize you with the Holy Ghost .
text2: Nejhua melahuac , tej , yonemechcuatequij ican atl , pero yejhua mechcuatequis ican Espíritu Santo .

text: And it came to pass in those days , that Jesus came from Nazareth of Galilee , and was baptized of John in Jordan .
text2: Ipan on tonaltin Jesús oquis Nazaret de Galilea , niman Juan ocuatequij ne ipan on atentli itoca Jordán .

text: And straightway coming up out of the water , he saw the heavens opened , and the Spirit like a dove descending upon him :
text2: Niman ijcuac Jesús ohuajquis ne ijtic on atl , oquitac on ilhuicac otlapou , niman on Espíritu Santo huajtemohuaya quen itlaj paloma ipan .

text: And there came a voice from heaven , saying , Thou art my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased .
text2: Niman ohualeu itlajtol toTajtzin ne ilhuicac . Quijtohua : ― Tejhua tinotlajsojcaConetzin , niman sanoyej moca nipacticaj .

text: And immediately the Spirit driveth him into the wilderness .
text2: Quemaj nimantzin on Espíritu Santo oquichihualtij Jesús ma huiya ne ipan on tlapatlaco .

text: And he was there in the wilderness forty days , tempted of Satan ; and was with the wild beasts ; and the angels ministered unto him .
text2: Niman Jesús ompa onen ompoajli tonaltin campa nemij on huejhueyi yolcamej yejhuan tecuanimej . Niman on diablo ompa oquitlatlatac Jesús para ma tlajtlaco . Quemaj ohualajquej on ilhuicactequitquej , niman ompa quipalehuiyayaj .

text: Now after that John was put in prison , Jesus came into Galilee , preaching the gospel of the kingdom of God ,
text2: Quemaj ijcuac Juan yocasiquej , Jesús oajsic ne Galilea campa quitemachtiaya on cuajli tlajtojli ica quen ijqui Dios tlamandarohua .

text: And saying , The time is fulfilled , and the kingdom of God is at hand : repent ye , and believe the gospel .
text2: Quijtohuaya Jesús : ― Ye huajlau on tonajli ijcuac Dios tlamandaros . Xcajcahuacan ica nenquichihuaj on tlen xcuajli , niman xneltocacan on temachtilistli yejhuan quitemaca temaquixtilistli .

text: Now as he walked by the sea of Galilee , he saw Simon and Andrew his brother casting a net into the sea : for they were fishers .
text2: Se tonajli ijcuac nejnentiaya ne itenco on mar itoca Galilea , Jesús ocomintac Simón niman icniu Andrés . Yejhuamej michajasiquej catcaj , niman conchapaniayaj inmatl ne ipan on atl .

text: And Jesus said unto them , Come ye after me , and I will make you to become fishers of men .
text2: Niman Jesús oquimijlij : ― Nemejhuamej nenquintejtemohuaj michimej . Pero aman xhuajhuiyan nohuan , niman nenquintejtemosquej tlacamej para nenquinhuicasquej itech Dios .

text: And straightway they forsook their nets , and followed him .
text2: Yejhuamej nimantzin ocajquej inmatlahuan , niman ihuan oyajquej .

text: And when he had gone a little further thence , he saw James the son of Zebedee , and John his brother , who also were in the ship mending their nets .
text2: Quemaj Jesús onejnen achijtzin más , niman ocomintac omemej icniutin intoca catcaj Jacobo niman Juan . Yejhuamej iconehuan Zebedeo . Nemiyaj ipan se barco , niman quintlamanilijticatcaj on inmatlahuan .

text: And straightway he called them : and they left their father Zebedee in the ship with the hired servants , and went after him .
text2: Nimantzin ocominnotz para ma huajhuiyan ihuan , niman yejhuamej ocajtejquej intataj Zebedeo ne ipan on barco inhuan on itlaquehualhuan , niman oyajquej ihuan Jesús .

text: And they went into Capernaum ; and straightway on the sabbath day he entered into the synagogue , and taught .
text2: Niman oajsiquej ne ipan on pueblo itoca Capernaum . Ijcuac oyejcoc on tonajli sábado , yejhua on tonajli ijcuac on hebreos nosehuiaj , Jesús ocalac ne ipan intiopan on hebreos , niman ompa otemachtij .

text: And they were astonished at his doctrine : for he taught them as one that had authority , and not as the scribes .
text2: Yejhua xtemachtiaya quen on temachtijquej ican itlanahuatil Dios , yej temachtiaya quen se yejhuan quipia tequihuajyotl . Yejhua ica on tlacamej sanoyej omojcatlachixquej .

text: And there was in their synagogue a man with an unclean spirit ; and he cried out ,
text2: Ne ipan intiopan on hebreos nemiya se tlacatl yejhuan quipiaya se xcuajli espíritu . Niman on tlacatl otzajtzic ,

text: Saying , Let us alone ; what have we to do with thee , thou Jesus of Nazareth ? art thou come to destroy us ? I know thee who thou art , the Holy One of God .
text2: oquijlij : ― ¿ Tlinon ticchihuas tohuan , tejhua Jesús aquin otihualeu Nazaret ? ¿ Otihuajlaj para titechxoxotonico ? Nejhua nimitzixmatzticaj , niman nicmatzticaj ica tejhua tiichipauConetzin Dios .

text: And Jesus rebuked him , saying , Hold thy peace , and come out of him .
text2: Jesús ocajhuac on xcuajli espíritu , niman oquijlij : ― ¡ Ma ca xnahuati , niman xquisa ijtic yejhua in tlacatl !

text: And when the unclean spirit had torn him , and cried with a loud voice , he came out of him .
text2: Niman on xcuajli espíritu sanoyej chicahuac oquitzejtzeloj on tlacatl , niman otzajtzic chicahuac . Quemaj oquis .

text: And they were all amazed , insomuch that they questioned among themselves , saying , What thing is this ? what new doctrine is this ? for with authority commandeth he even the unclean spirits , and they do obey him .
text2: Nochimej omojmojcatlachixquej , niman nochimej quinotlajtoltiayaj yejhuamej : ― ¿ Tlinon in ? In nesi yencuic tlamachtijli . Ican itequihuajyo Dios in tlacatl tlamandarohua , niman hasta on xcuajcualtin espíritus quitlacamatij .

text: And immediately his fame spread abroad throughout all the region round about Galilee .
text2: Nimantzin omachiyac ne imanyan Galilea tlinon oquichiu Jesús .

text: And forthwith , when they were come out of the synagogue , they entered into the house of Simon and Andrew , with James and John .
text2: Quemaj Jesús oquis ne ipan intiopan on hebreos , niman oyaj ihuan Jacobo niman Juan ne inchan Simón niman Andrés .

text: But Simon ' s wife ' s mother lay sick of a fever , and anon they tell him of her .
text2: Niman imonan Simón ompa onoya ipan se tlapechtli . Yejhua quipiaya totonqui . Niman nimantzin oquijlijquej Jesús ica on imonan Pedro cualo .

text: And he came and took her by the hand , and lifted her up ; and immediately the fever left her , and she ministered unto them .
text2: Niman quemaj Jesús oquinisihuij , ocontilan ipan ima , niman oquitelquetz . Nimantzin ocau on totonqui , niman quemaj opeu quintlacualtia .

text: And at even , when the sun did set , they brought unto him all that were diseased , and them that were possessed with devils .
text2: Ijcuac yocalac tonajli , yejhuamej quinhuajhuicayaj nochimej on quech cualohuayaj , niman on yejhuan quipiayaj on xcuajcualtin espíritus .

text: And all the city was gathered together at the door .
text2: Niman nochimej on yejhuan chantiyaj ipan on hueyican onosentlalijquej ne quiahuatenco .

text: And he healed many that were sick of divers diseases , and cast out many devils ; and suffered not the devils to speak , because they knew him .
text2: Niman Jesús oquimpajtij miyequej on cocoxquej , on yejhuan cada se quipiaya ocse tlamantic cualolistin , niman miyequej oquinquixtilij on xcuajcualtin espíritus . Pero xquincahuiliaya para on xcuajcualtin espíritus ma tlajtocan , pampa yejhuamej quimatzticatcaj ica yejhua aquinon .

text: And in the morning , rising up a great while before day , he went out , and departed into a solitary place , and there prayed .
text2: Huajmostla huelipan , ijcuac oc tlayohuatoc catca , Jesús onocoteu , niman oquis ipan on pueblo , niman oyaj neca campaca xacaj nemi . Ompa oquichihuato oración .

text: And Simon and they that were with him followed after him .
text2: Más saquin , Simón niman on ocsequimej inomachtijcahuan Jesús oyajquej para oquitejtemotoj .

text: And when they had found him , they said unto him , All men seek for thee .
text2: Ijcuac oquinextitoj , oquijlijquej : ― Miyec tlacatl mitztejtemohua .

text: And he said unto them , Let us go into the next towns , that I may preach there also : for therefore came I forth .
text2: Yejhua oquinnanquijlij : ― Tiahuij ocsecan pueblos campaca nisiu para ompa no nitemachtis , pampa yejhua ica onihuajlaj .

text: And he preached in their synagogues throughout all Galilee , and cast out devils .
text2: Quemaj Jesús temachtijtinemiya ipan intiopan on hebreos nochihuiyan ne imanyan Galilea . No quinquixtiliaya on tlacamej xcuajcualtin espíritus .

text: And there came a leper to him , beseeching him , and kneeling down to him , and saying unto him , If thou wilt , thou canst make me clean .
text2: Ohuajlaj se tlacatl itech Jesús yejhuan palaniya inacayo ican on cualolistli itoca lepra . Ixpan onotlacuenquetz niman oquiajmancatlajtlanilij . Oquijlij : ― Tla ticnequi , huelis tinechpajtis .

text: And Jesus , moved with compassion , put forth his hand , and touched him , and saith unto him , I will ; be thou clean .
text2: Niman Jesús oquicnelij . Oquimatocac , niman oquijlij : ― Nicnequi . Aman xpajti .

text: And as soon as he had spoken , immediately the leprosy departed from him , and he was cleansed .
text2: Niman ijcuac Jesús ijcon oquijtoj , on cualolistli nimantzin opopoliu ipan on tlacatl . Opajtic inacayo .

text: And again he entered into Capernaum , after some days ; and it was noised that he was in the house .
text2: Quemaj ipan quesqui tonajli más saquin , ocsejpa Jesús oyejcoc ne Capernaum . Niman ocacquej ica yejhua nemiya ne techan .

text: And straightway many were gathered together , insomuch that there was no room to receive them , no , not so much as about the door : and he preached the word unto them .
text2: Nimantzin onosentlalijtetzquej sanoyej tojlamej tlacamej hasta xoc onaquiyaj . Sanoyej oten on cajli , nion siquiera ne quiahuatenco xoc onaquiyaj . Yejhua quitemachtiaya on itlajtol toTajtzin .

text: And they come unto him , bringing one sick of the palsy , which was borne of four .
text2: Niman quemaj oyejcoquej nahuimej tlacamej yejhuan cualajantiayaj se tlacatl yejhuan sepojtoc .

text: And when they could not come nigh unto him for the press , they uncovered the roof where he was : and when they had broken it up , they let down the bed wherein the sick of the palsy lay .
text2: Niman quemaj ica xohuelquej ocalaquej pampa sanoyej tojlan catca , yej oquitlejcoltijquej ne icuatipan on cajli . Ompa , tej , ocuatlapojquej on cajli ne imelacan Jesús . Niman quemaj ocuajtemoltijquej on sepojtoc ican se cojtlapechtli .

text: When Jesus saw their faith , he said unto the sick of the palsy , Son , thy sins be forgiven thee .
text2: Ijcuac Jesús oquitac ica yejhuamej quineltocayaj ica yejhua hueli tepajtia , oquijlij on cocoxqui : ― Noconeu , motlajtlacolhuan yotlapojpolhuilojquej .

text: But there were certain of the scribes sitting there , and reasoning in their hearts ,
text2: Pero ompa yejyehuaticatcaj sequimej temachtijquej ican itlanahuatil Dios . Ijquin yejhuamej quinemilijticatcaj ipan inyojlo :

text: Why doth this man thus speak blasphemies ? who can forgive sins but God only ?
text2: “ In tlacatl , ¿ tlica tlajtlajtohua ijquin ? In tlacatl cuijhuicaltia Dios . Xacaj hueli quitetlapojpolhuilia on tlajtlacojli , yej san yejhua Dios . ”

text: And immediately when Jesus perceived in his spirit that they so reasoned within themselves , he said unto them , Why reason ye these things in your hearts ?
text2: Pero Jesús quimatzticatca ipan iyojlo tlinon yejhuamej quinemilijticatcaj , niman oquimijlij : ― ¿ Tlica ijcon nenquinemiliaj ipan nemoyojlo ?

text: Whether is it easier to say to the sick of the palsy , Thy sins be forgiven thee ; or to say , Arise , and take up thy bed , and walk ?
text2: ¿ Catlejhua más xtepopoloj niquijtos : “ Motlajtlacolhuan yotlapojpolhuilojquej ” , noso niquijtos : “ Xmoquetztehua , xcajcocui motlapech niman xnejnemi ” ?

text: But that ye may know that the Son of man hath power on earth to forgive sins , ( he saith to the sick of the palsy , )
text2: Aman cuajli nemechititis ica nejhua yejhuan oninochiu Tlacatl nicpia tequihuayotl ipan in tlalticpactli para nictetlapojpolhuilis on tlajtlacojli . Quemaj Jesús oquijlij on tlacatl yejhuan sepojtoc :

text: I say unto thee , Arise , and take up thy bed , and go thy way into thine house .
text2: ― Tejhua nimitzijlia : Xmoquetztehua , xcajcocui motlapech niman xhuiya mochan .

text: And immediately he arose , took up the bed , and went forth before them all ; insomuch that they were all amazed , and glorified God , saying , We never saw it on this fashion .
text2: Quemaj on yejhuan sepojtoya nimantzin onotelquetz , ocajcocu itlapech , niman quemaj imixpan nochimej ohuajquis . Yejhua ica nochimej sanoyej omojmojcatlachixquej , niman opeu cueyiliaj Dios . Quijtohuayaj : ― Xqueman tiquitayaj ijquin .

text: And he went forth again by the sea side ; and all the multitude resorted unto him , and he taught them .
text2: Quemaj Jesús ocsejpa oyaj ne itenco on mar . Onosentlalij miyec tlacatl , niman oquinmachtij .

text: And as he passed by , he saw Levi the son of Alphaeus sitting at the receipt of custom , and said unto him , Follow me . And he arose and followed him .
text2: Ijcuac oquis ompa ipan iojhui , oquitac Leví iconeu Alfeo . Yejhua yehuaticatca ne campa tlacobrarohua ica on impuestos . Niman Jesús oquijlij : ― Xhuajla nohuan . Leví nimantzin ohuajnotelquetz niman oyaj ihuan Jesús .

text: And it came to pass , that , as Jesus sat at meat in his house , many publicans and sinners sat also together with Jesus and his disciples : for there were many , and they followed him .
text2: Más saquin ijcuac Jesús tlacuajticatca ne ichan Leví , sequimej tlacamej yejhuan tlacobrarojquej ica on impuestos niman on ocsequimej yejhuan tlajtlacolejquej onosentlalijquej ihuan Jesús niman inomachtijcahuan ne ipan mesa . Ijcon onochiu pampa miyequej yayaj ihuan Jesús .

text: And when the scribes and Pharisees saw him eat with publicans and sinners , they said unto his disciples , How is it that he eateth and drinketh with publicans and sinners ?
text2: Pero on temachtijquej ican itlanahuatil Dios niman on fariseos , ijcuac oquitaquej ica inhuan tlacuaya on tlacobrarojquej niman tlajtlacolejquej , oquimijlijquej on inomachtijcahuan Jesús : ― ¿ Tlica nemotemachtijcau tlacua niman coni inhuan on tlacobrarojquej niman on tlajtlacolejquej ?

text: When Jesus heard it , he saith unto them , They that are whole have no need of the physician , but they that are sick : I came not to call the righteous , but sinners to repentance .
text2: Jesús ocac tlinon oquijtojquej , niman oquimijlij : ― Para on yejhuan xcualoj xnonequij on tepajtijquetl , pero on yejhuan cualoj quemaj . Nejhua xonihuajlaj para niquinnotzas on yejhuan yolmelajquej , yej para niquinnotzas on yejhuan tlajtlacolejquej .

text: And the disciples of John and of the Pharisees used to fast : and they come and say unto him , Why do the disciples of John and of the Pharisees fast , but thy disciples fast not ?
text2: Se tonajli , ijcuac on fariseos niman on inomachtijcahuan Juan nosahuayaj , sequimej tlacamej oyajquej itech Jesús , niman oquijlijquej : ― On innomachtijcahuan on fariseos niman inomachtijcahuan Juan nosahuaj . ¿ Tlica on monomachtijcahuan xnosahuaj ?

text: And Jesus said unto them , Can the children of the bridechamber fast , while the bridegroom is with them ? as long as they have the bridegroom with them , they cannot fast .
text2: Jesús oquimijlij : ― ¿ Tlen huelisquej nosahuasquej on yejhuan tlanotzaltin campa nonamictihua chica on montli ompa inhuan nemi ? Ijcuac on montli ompa nemi tehuan , xhuelisquej nosahuasquej .

text: But the days will come , when the bridegroom shall be taken away from them , and then shall they fast in those days .
text2: Pero yejcos on tonajli ijcuac nejhua yejhuan quen nimontli nechquixtisquej intech on notenotzcahuan . Niman ijcuacon quemaj yejhuamej nosahuasquej .

text: No man also seweth a piece of new cloth on an old garment : else the new piece that filled it up taketh away from the old , and the rent is made worse .
text2: ' Xacaj quitlamanilia se tlaquentli ijsoltic ica on tlaquentli yejhuan yencuic , pampa on yejhuan yencuic tlaquentli tzolihui , niman más hueyica quicotona on tlaquentli ijsoltic .

text: And no man putteth new wine into old bottles : else the new wine doth burst the bottles , and the wine is spilled , and the bottles will be marred : but new wine must be put into new bottles .
text2: Niman no xacaj quitlalia on vino yencuic ipan on bolsas yejhuan tlachijchiutin ican on cuetlaxtin ijsoltiquej , pampa on vino posonis , niman on bolsas toponisquej , niman quemaj on vino ihuan on bolsas ixpolihuisquej . Yejhua ica xtlalican on vino yencuic ipan on bolsas yencuiquej .

text: And it came to pass , that he went through the corn fields on the sabbath day ; and his disciples began , as they went , to pluck the ears of corn .
text2: Se tonajli , yejhuan ijcuac on hebreos nosehuiaj , Jesús panotiaya inhuan on inomachtijcahuan neca campaca oncatca mijli . Niman on inomachtijcahuan opeu cojcopinaj on inyahuayo on mijli de trigo .

text: And the Pharisees said unto him , Behold , why do they on the sabbath day that which is not lawful ?
text2: Quemaj on fariseos oquijlijquej : ― Xquita . On monomachtijcahuan tequitij ipan in tonajli de nesehuijli . Totlanahuatil xtechcahuilia titequitisquej ipan on tonajli de nesehuijli .

text: And he said unto them , Have ye never read what David did , when he had need , and was an hungred , he , and they that were with him ?
text2: Pero Jesús oquimijlij : ― ¿ Nemejhuamej xqueman nenquimomachtianij on tlen oquichijca David ijcuac yejhua niman itehuicalhuan oapismiquej ?

text: How he went into the house of God in the days of Abiathar the high priest , and did eat the shewbread , which is not lawful to eat but for the priests , and gave also to them which were with him ?
text2: Yejhua ocalac ipan itiopan Dios ijcuac Abiatar yejhua on más hueyi intlayecancau catca intech yejhuamej on tiopixquej . Niman yejhua oquicuaj on pan yejhuan tlatiochiutli . Ijquin oquichiu masqui on itlanahuatil Moisés san quincahuiliaya on tiopixquej quicuayaj on pan . Niman David no oquinmacac on tlacamej yejhuan no ompa inhuan nemiya .

text: And he said unto them , The sabbath was made for man , and not man for the sabbath :
text2: Quemaj Jesús oquimijlij : ― On tonajli de nesehuijli Dios oquitlalij impampa on tlacamej . Xoquintlalij on tlacamej ipampa on tonajli de nesehuijli .

text: Therefore the Son of man is Lord also of the sabbath .
text2: Yejhua ica nejhua yejhuan oninochiu Tlacatl nechmelahua para niquijtos tlinon cuajli para se quichihuas ipan on tonajli de nesehuijli .

text: And he entered again into the synagogue ; and there was a man there which had a withered hand .
text2: Jesús ocalac ocsejpa ne ipan se tiopan . Niman ompa nemiya se tlacatl yejhuan quipiaya se ima huaqui .

text: And they watched him , whether he would heal him on the sabbath day ; that they might accuse him .
text2: No ompa nemiyaj sequimej yejhuan sa quipijpiayaj Jesús , para quitasquej tla quipajtis on tlacatl ipan on tonajli de nesehuijli . Ijcon oquichijquej para quipiasquej tlinon ica huelis quiteixpanhuisquej .

text: And he saith unto the man which had the withered hand , Stand forth .
text2: Jesús oquijlij on tlacatl yejhuan mahuaquiya , ma notelquetza ne tlajcotian .

text: And he saith unto them , Is it lawful to do good on the sabbath days , or to do evil ? to save life , or to kill ? But they held their peace .
text2: Quemaj oquintlajtoltij on tlacamej : ― ¿ Totlanahuatil tlinon techcahuilia ticchihuasquej ipan on tonajli de nesehuijli ? ¿ Techcahuilia ticchihuilisquej on tlen cuajli on tlacamej , noso on tlen xcuajli ? ¿ Techcahuilia ticmaquixtisquej on nemilistli , noso ticmictisquej ? Pero yejhuamej xoquinanquilijquej .

text: And when he had looked round about on them with anger , being grieved for the hardness of their hearts , he saith unto the man , Stretch forth thine hand . And he stretched it out : and his hand was restored whole as the other .
text2: Quemaj Jesús oquintlahueltlajtlatac , niman sanoyej onajman sa ica on inyoltechicahualis . Niman oquijlij on tlacatl : ― Xmelahua moma . On tlacatl oquimelau ima niman opajtic .

text: And the Pharisees went forth , and straightway took counsel with the Herodians against him , how they might destroy him .
text2: Ijcuacon ohuajquisquej on fariseos , niman opejquej quinotlajtoltiaj inhuan on itetlajsojcahuan Herodes quen ijqui huelisquej quimictisquej Jesús .

text: But Jesus withdrew himself with his disciples to the sea : and a great multitude from Galilee followed him , and from Judaea ,
text2: Jesús onejcuanij , niman oyaj ne itenco on mar inhuan inomachtijcahuan . Niman sanoyej miyec tlacatl yejhuan chanej ne Galilea oyajquej no . No ijqui oyajquej yejhuan chanejquej ne Judea ,

text: And from Jerusalem , and from Idumaea , and from beyond Jordan ; and they about Tyre and Sidon , a great multitude , when they had heard what great things he did , came unto him .
text2: niman ne hueycan Jerusalén , niman ne Idumea , niman ne iquisayan tonajli de on atentli Jordán , niman ne nisiu on hueyican Tiro niman on hueyican Sidón . Yejhuamej oyajquej para oquitatoj Jesús pampa ocacquej nochi tlinon quichihuaya .

text: And he spake to his disciples , that a small ship should wait on him because of the multitude , lest they should throng him .
text2: Jesús oquimijlij on inomachtijcahuan ma onya listo se barco campa huelis tlejcos , para ma ca quipitzmictisquej on tlacamej .

text: For he had healed many ; insomuch that they pressed upon him for to touch him , as many as had plagues .
text2: Nemiyaj sanoyej tojlan tlacamej pampa oquimpajtij miyequej cocoxquej , niman yejhua ica nochimej yejhuan quipiayaj cualolistli quitelosnequiyaj para pajtisquej .

text: And unclean spirits , when they saw him , fell down before him , and cried , saying , Thou art the Son of God .
text2: Niman on tlacamej , yejhuan quipiayaj on xcuajcualtin espíritus notlajcaliyaj icxitlan Jesús , niman on xcuajcualtin espíritus chicahuac tzajtziyaj , quijtohuayaj : ― Tejhua tiiConetzin Dios .

text: And he straitly charged them that they should not make him known .
text2: Pero Jesús oquinchicajcanahuatij ma ca quiteijlisquej aquin yejhua .

text: And he goeth up into a mountain , and calleth unto him whom he would : and they came unto him .
text2: Quemaj Jesús otlejcoc ne ipan se tepetl niman oquinhuajnotz san aquinomej yejhua oquinec . Niman yejhuamej oyajquej itech .

text: And he ordained twelve , that they should be with him , and that he might send them forth to preach ,
text2: Niman oquintlalij on majtlactli huan ome tlacamej ipan on tequitl para ma nemican ihuan , niman para quintitlanis ontemachtisquej .

text: And to have power to heal sicknesses , and to cast out devils :
text2: Niman oquinmacac poder para quimpajtisquej on cocoxquej , niman para quintequixtilisquej on xcuajcualtin espíritus .

text: And Simon he surnamed Peter ;
text2: Oquitlalij Simón yejhuan no oquitocayotij Pedro .

text: And James the son of Zebedee , and John the brother of James ; and he surnamed them Boanerges , which is , The sons of thunder :
text2: No oquintlalij Jacobo iconeu Zebedeo , niman Juan yejhuan icniu Jacobo . Jesús oquintocayotij Boanerges yejhuan quijtosnequi tetlajtlahuelmej .

text: And Andrew , and Philip , and Bartholomew , and Matthew , and Thomas , and James the son of Alphaeus , and Thaddaeus , and Simon the Canaanite ,
text2: No ijqui oquintlalij Andrés , Felipe , Bartolomé , Mateo , Tomás , Jacobo yejhuan iconeu Alfeo , Tadeo , Simón on yejhuan no tehuan catca ne intech on intoca cananistas ,

text: And Judas Iscariot , which also betrayed him : and they went into an house .
text2: niman Judas Iscariote yejhuan más saquin oquitemactilij Jesús .

text: And the multitude cometh together again , so that they could not so much as eat bread .
text2: Quemaj Jesús oyaj ne techan , niman ocsejpa onosentlalij miyec tlacatl , niman nion achijtzin xhueliyaj tlacuayaj Jesús niman inomachtijcahuan .

text: And when his friends heard of it , they went out to lay hold on him : for they said , He is beside himself .
text2: Ijcuac on quen quintaya oquimatquej , ohualajquej para cuicasquej , pampa yejhuamej cuitiayaj yotlamachilispoliu .

text: And the scribes which came down from Jerusalem said , He hath Beelzebub , and by the prince of the devils casteth he out devils .
text2: Yejhuamej on temachtijquej ican itlanahuatil Dios , yejhuan ohualejquej ne Jerusalén , quijtohuayaj : ― Jesús quipia on diablo itoca Beelzebú yejhuan tlayecanquetl intech nochimej on xcuajcualtin espíritus . Yejhua quimacaticaj Jesús on hueyilistli para quinquixtis on xcuajcualtin espíritus .

text: And he called them unto him , and said unto them in parables , How can Satan cast out Satan ?
text2: Quemaj Jesús oquinnotz , niman oquimijlij : ― ¿ Quen ijqui huelis on diablo quixtis on xcuajcualtin espíritus tla sa no yejhua ?

text: And if a kingdom be divided against itself , that kingdom cannot stand .
text2: Tla se país noxexelos , niman pehuas nohuijsoquisquej sa no yejhuamej , on país xhuelis nemis .

text: And if a house be divided against itself , that house cannot stand .
text2: Niman no ijqui , tla se chanyotl noxexelos , niman pehuas nohuijsoquisquej sa no yejhuamej , on chanyotl xhuelis onyas .

text: And if Satan rise up against himself , and be divided , he cannot stand , but hath an end .
text2: No ijqui , tla on diablo noxelos intech on xcuajcualtin espíritus niman pehuas quinhuijsoquis , xoc huelisquej itlaj quichihuasquej .

text: No man can enter into a strong man ' s house , and spoil his goods , except he will first bind the strong man ; and then he will spoil his house .
text2: ' No ijqui , tla yacaj ichtequi quinequi calaquis ichan se tlacatl yejhuan cojtiticaj para quixtilis on tlinon quipia , achtoj ica oncaj quisalos on yejhuan cojtic tlacatl . Niman ijcuacon huelis quicuilis nochi on tlen quipia ipan ichan .

text: Verily I say unto you , All sins shall be forgiven unto the sons of men , and blasphemies wherewith soever they shall blaspheme :
text2: ' Melahuac , tej , nemechijlia ica Dios huelis quintlapojpolhuis on tlacamej nochi intlajtlacol niman on tlahuijhuicaltilistli san catlejhua nochi quech ica tlahuijhuicaltihuaj .

text: But he that shall blaspheme against the Holy Ghost hath never forgiveness , but is in danger of eternal damnation :
text2: Pero tla se tlacatl cuijhuicaltis on Espíritu Santo , Dios xqueman quitlapojpolhuis , yej nochipa quipias itlajtlacol .

text: Because they said , He hath an unclean spirit .
text2: Ijcon oquijtoj pampa on temachtijquej ican itlanahuatil Dios quijtojticatca ica yejhua quipiaya se xcuajli espíritu .

text: There came then his brethren and his mother , and , standing without , sent unto him , calling him .
text2: Quemaj ohualajquej inan niman icnihuan Jesús . Yejhuamej onocajquej ipan calle , niman otlatitlanquej ma quinotzatij Jesús .

text: And the multitude sat about him , and they said unto him , Behold , thy mother and thy brethren without seek for thee .
text2: On tojlan yejhuan nemiyaj iyehualijcan Jesús ne calijtic , oquijlijquej : ― Monan niman mocnihuan nemij ipan calle , niman quinequij mitzitasquej .

text: And he answered them , saying , Who is my mother , or my brethren ?
text2: Pero yejhua oquinnanquilij , oquimijlij : ― ¿ Aquinon nonan niman nocnihuan ?

text: And he looked round about on them which sat about him , and said , Behold my mother and my brethren !
text2: Quemaj yejhua ocomintac on yejhuan ompa nemiyaj iyehualijcan , niman quemaj oquijtoj : ― In yejhuamej nonan niman nocnihuan .

text: For whosoever shall do the will of God , the same is my brother , and my sister , and mother .
text2: Nochi aquin quichihuas on tlen Dios quinequi , yejhua nocniu tlacatl , noso nocniu sihuatl , niman yejhua nonan .

text: And he began again to teach by the sea side : and there was gathered unto him a great multitude , so that he entered into a ship , and sat in the sea ; and the whole multitude was by the sea on the land .
text2: Ocsejpa Jesús otemachtij ne itenco on mar . Ica sanoyej miyec tlacatl onosentlalij ne campa yejhua nemiya , Jesús otlejcoc ipan se barco yejhuan oncatca ipan on mar , niman onotlalij . On tlacamej nemiyaj ne itenco on mar .

text: And he taught them many things by parables , and said unto them in his doctrine ,
text2: Niman yejhua quinmachtiaya miyec tlajtlamach ican ejemplos , niman ijquin quimijliaya :

text: Hearken ; Behold , there went out a sower to sow :
text2: ― Xcaquican cuajli tlinon nemechilhuis . Sen tlacatl oyaj oquixinito on xinachtli de trigo .

text: And it came to pass , as he sowed , some fell by the way side , and the fowls of the air came and devoured it up .
text2: Chica tocaya , sequi xinachtli oxinito ipan ojtli , niman on totomej ohuajlajquej niman oquicuajquej .

text: And some fell on stony ground , where it had not much earth ; and immediately it sprang up , because it had no depth of earth :
text2: Ocsequi xinachtli oxinito ipan tepetlayoj campa xmás oncaj tlajli , niman on xinachtli nimantzin oixhuac , pampa xmás huejcatlan oncatcaj on tlajli campa oxin .

text: But when the sun was up , it was scorched ; and because it had no root , it withered away .
text2: Pero ijcuac oquis on tonaltzintli , ocoseu imilyo on trigo . Niman ica xhuejcatlan quipiaya inelhuayo , ohuajhuac .

text: And some fell among thorns , and the thorns grew up , and choked it , and it yielded no fruit .
text2: Niman ocsequi xinachtli oxinito intzajlan on huitzcojtin . On huitzcojtin saniman onoscaltijquej niman oquixomictijquej imilyo on trigo . Yejhua ica xotlac .

text: And other fell on good ground , and did yield fruit that sprang up and increased ; and brought forth , some thirty , and some sixty , and some an hundred .
text2: Pero sequi xinachtli oxin ipan cuajli tlajli . Onoscaltij , niman sanoyej cuajli otlac . Sequi oquitlaquitij sempoajli huan majtlactli iteyo , niman sequi yepoajli iteyo , niman sequi se ciento .

text: And he said unto them , He that hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: No oquimijlij : ― Tla nemejhuamej nenquipiaj nemotlamachilis , xcajsicamatican on ejemplo .

text: And when he was alone , they that were about him with the twelve asked of him the parable .
text2: Niman quemaj saquin ijcuac Jesús sa iselti nemiya inhuan on inomachtijcahuan niman sa quesqui tlacatl , yejhuamej oquitlajtlanilijquej Jesús para ma quimijli tlinon quijtosnequi on ejemplos .

text: And he said unto them , Unto you it is given to know the mystery of the kingdom of God : but unto them that are without , all these things are done in parables :
text2: Oquimijlij : ― Nemejhuamej Dios yomechcahuilij para nenquimatisquej on tlinon iyanticatca quen ijqui yejhua tlamandarohua . Pero on ocsequimej niquinmachtia san ican ejemplos

text: That seeing they may see , and not perceive ; and hearing they may hear , and not understand ; lest at any time they should be converted , and their sins should be forgiven them .
text2: para masqui quicaquisquej on tlinon niquijtohua , niman quitasquej tlinon nicchihua , xcajsicamatisquej , para ma ca noyolcuepasquej niman quintlapojpolhuis Dios on intlajtlacol .

text: And he said unto them , Know ye not this parable ? and how then will ye know all parables ?
text2: Quemaj oquimijlij : ― Tla xnencajsicamatij in ejemplo , ¿ quen ijqui nencajsicamatisquej ocsequi ejemplos ?

text: The sower soweth the word .
text2: Yejhua on tlacatl yejhuan toca , on quen on yejhuan quiteijlia on itlajtoltzin Dios niman on xinachtli quen itlajtol Dios .

text: And these are they by the way side , where the word is sown ; but when they have heard , Satan cometh immediately , and taketh away the word that was sown in their hearts .
text2: On ojtli campa ohuetz on xinachtli sa no ijqui quen on inyojlo sequimej tlacamej yejhuan quicaquij on itlajtol Dios . Pero nimantzin huajlau on diablo , niman quitlalcahualtia ica on itlajtol Dios yejhuan oquitocaquej ipan inyojlo .

text: And these are they likewise which are sown on stony ground ; who , when they have heard the word , immediately receive it with gladness ;
text2: On tlajli yejhuan tepetlayoj quijtosnequi inyojlo on tlacamej yejhuan cuelcaquij itlajtol Dios , niman ican pactli quiseliaj on tlajtojli .

text: And have no root in themselves , and so endure but for a time : afterward , when affliction or persecution ariseth for the word ' s sake , immediately they are offended .
text2: Pero yejhua in tlacamej xmás cuajli quitzquiaj on tlajtojli . Yejhua ica ijcuac impan huajlau on tlen tepajsoloj niman quintlahuelitaj niman tlajtlamach ica quintlajyohuiltiaj ipampa itlajtol Dios , nimantzin cahuaj intlaneltoc .

text: And these are they which are sown among thorns ; such as hear the word ,
text2: On tlajli yejhuan huitzyoj quijtosnequi inyojlo on tlacamej yejhuan cuelcaquij itlajtol Dios .

text: And the cares of this world , and the deceitfulness of riches , and the lusts of other things entering in , choke the word , and it becometh unfruitful .
text2: Pero pampa sa comatztoquej quen ijqui nopanoltisquej , niman sanoyej quinequij notomintisquej , niman ocsequi tlajtlamach quinejnemiliaj , quelcahuaj on itlajtol Dios . Ijcon itlajtol Dios xhueli quimpalehuiya yejhuamej .

text: And these are they which are sown on good ground ; such as hear the word , and receive it , and bring forth fruit , some thirtyfold , some sixty , and some an hundred .
text2: Pero on cuajli tlajli quijtosnequi inyojlo on tlacamej yejhuan ica cuelcaquij itlajtol Dios , niman quiseliaj , niman intech quisa se cuajli tlacyotl . Yejhuamej sa no ijqui quen on xinachtli yejhuan oquitlaquitij sempoajli huan majtlactli iteyo , niman ocsequimej sa no ijqui quen on yejhuan oquitlaquitij yepoajli , noso sa no ijqui quen on yejhuan oquitlaquitij se ciento .

text: And he said unto them , Is a candle brought to be put under a bushel , or under a bed ? and not to be set on a candlestick ?
text2: No oquimijlij : ― Xacaj cuajqui se tlahuijli , niman quitlalia ne itzintlan se chiquiutli noso ne itzintlan tlapechtli . On tlahuijli nenquitlaliaj ne tlacpac para ijcon ma tlahuilpanti cuajli .

text: For there is nothing hid , which shall not be manifested ; neither was any thing kept secret , but that it should come abroad .
text2: Yejhua on tlen iyanticaj , yejhuamej quimatisquej ipan ocse tonaltin . Nochi on yejhuan aman xquimatij , quimatisquej .

text: If any man have ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Tla yacaj quipia itlamachilis , ma cajsicamatican cuajli .

text: And he said unto them , Take heed what ye hear : with what measure ye mete , it shall be measured to you : and unto you that hear shall more be given .
text2: Xnemilican cuajli tlinon nenquicaquij , pampa ica on tlen tejhua tictequitiltia para tiquintlajtlacolmaca ocsequimej , Dios no yejhua quitequitiltis para mitztlajtlacolmacas . Niman más miyec ica mitztlajtlacolmacas .

text: For he that hath , to him shall be given : and he that hath not , from him shall be taken even that which he hath .
text2: Tej , yejhuan quipia cajsicamatilistli , Dios quimacas más , niman on yejhuan xquipia cajsicamatilistli , Dios quixtilis hasta nochi quech quipia .

text: And he said , So is the kingdom of God , as if a man should cast seed into the ground ;
text2: No oquijtoj Jesús : ― On yejhuan Dios quinmandarohua nochihuaj quen on xinachtli yejhuan se tlacatl quitoca ne ipan tlajli .

text: And should sleep , and rise night and day , and the seed should spring and grow up , he knoweth not how .
text2: Mojmostla on tlacatl cochi tlayohua niman nocuitehua cualcan . Niman on xinachtli ixhua , niman quemaj noscaltia , pero yejhua xquimati quen ijqui .

text: For the earth bringeth forth fruit of herself ; first the blade , then the ear , after that the full corn in the ear .
text2: On tlajli san iselti quiscaltia . Achtoj quisa on imilohuayotzin , quemaj on imiyahuayo , niman quemaj xilotzintli , quemaj yelotl , camahuac , niman quemaj sintli .

text: But when the fruit is brought forth , immediately he putteth in the sickle , because the harvest is come .
text2: Niman quemaj ijcuac yotlachicau , on tlacatl nimantzin calactilia machete , pampa yoyejcoc on pixquilistli .

text: And he said , Whereunto shall we liken the kingdom of God ? or with what comparison shall we compare it ?
text2: No oquijtoj Jesús : ― Nemechijlis quen ijqui Dios tlamandarohua . Masqui Dios quinmandarohua aman sanoyej achijtzin on tlacamej , pero más miyequiyasquej .

text: It is like a grain of mustard seed , which , when it is sown in the earth , is less than all the seeds that be in the earth :
text2: Sa no ijqui quen se tlacatl oquitocac on iteyo on itoca mostaza . On mostaza quipia más pitentzin iteyo xquen nochi quech xinachtli yejhuan oncaj nican ipan in tlalticpactli .

text: But when it is sown , it groweth up , and becometh greater than all herbs , and shooteth out great branches ; so that the fowls of the air may lodge under the shadow of it .
text2: Pero ijcuac yonotocac noscaltia , niman hueyiya más huejcapania xquen nochi quech xiutli . Sanoyej nomajmatia hasta on totomej huelij ompa quichijchihuaj intepajsol ne ipan imahuan campa tlajsehuayoc .

text: And with many such parables spake he the word unto them , as they were able to hear it .
text2: Quinmachtiaya on cuajli tlajtojli ican ejemplos hasta campa xoc hueliyaj cajsicamatiyaj .

text: But without a parable spake he not unto them : and when they were alone , he expounded all things to his disciples .
text2: Yejhua quinmachtiaya san ican ejemplos niman xitlaj quimijliaya tla xican ejemplo . Pero ijcuac Jesús sa iselti nemiya inhuan on inomachtijcahuan , yejhua quinmachtiaya tlinon quijtosnequi on ejemplos .

text: And the same day , when the even was come , he saith unto them , Let us pass over unto the other side .
text2: Ipan on tonajli ijcuac yotlayohuac , Jesús oquimijlij on inomachtijcahuan : ― Tiahuij ne ocse ilado in mar .

text: And when they had sent away the multitude , they took him even as he was in the ship . And there were also with him other little ships .
text2: Quemaj ijcuac yoquinnahuatijquej on tlacamej ma huiyan , on nomachtijquej ocuicaquej Jesús ipan on barco ijcon quen nemiya . Ocsequimej barcos oyajquej ihuan .

text: And there arose a great storm of wind , and the waves beat into the ship , so that it was now full .
text2: Niman quemaj más achi saquin , ohuajlaj se ajacatl sanoyej chicahuac , niman on atl oncoxoniya ne ijtic on barco hasta ye temiya .

text: And he was in the hinder part of the ship , asleep on a pillow : and they awake him , and say unto him , Master , carest thou not that we perish ?
text2: Jesús cochticatca nepa tlacuitlapan ipan se cuejtomatl . Niman quemaj oquitlachaltitoj , niman oquijlijquej : ― Totemachtijcau , ¿ tlica yej ticochticaj chica tejhuamej ye tiamimictoquej ? ¡ Xtechpalehui !

text: And he arose , and rebuked the wind , and said unto the sea , Peace , be still . And the wind ceased , and there was a great calm .
text2: Quemaj Jesús onotelquetz , oquinahuatij on ajacatl , niman oquijlij on mar : ― Xmotelti , niman ma ca sa tlamach xchihua . Niman quemaj ohuajnoteltij on ajacatl . Nimantzin nochi ocactiaj , niman nochi cuajli onocau .

text: And he said unto them , Why are ye so fearful ? how is it that ye have no faith ?
text2: Niman quemaj oquimijlij on inomachtijcahuan : ― ¿ Tlica sanoyej nemomojtiaj ? ¿ Tlen , xnennechneltocaj hasta aman ?

text: And they feared exceedingly , and said one to another , What manner of man is this , that even the wind and the sea obey him ?
text2: Yejhuamej sanoyej nomojtiayaj , niman quinojliayaj ihuan ocsequimej : ― ¿ Manin aquin tlacatl in ica on ajacatl niman on mar quitlacamatij ?

text: And they came over unto the other side of the sea , into the country of the Gadarenes .
text2: Oajsiquej ne ocsecan itenco on mar ipan iregión Gadara .

text: And when he was come out of the ship , immediately there met him out of the tombs a man with an unclean spirit ,
text2: Niman ijcuac Jesús yohuajquis ipan on barco , oquinamiquito se tlacatl yejhuan quipiaya se xcuajli espíritu . Ohualeu neca ijtic ostomej campa notocayaj on mimiquej .

text: Who had his dwelling among the tombs ; and no man could bind him , no , not with chains :
text2: Ompa , tej , ichan catca . Niman xacaj hueliya quiteltiaya , nion siquiera ican on teposcadenas .

text: Because that he had been often bound with fetters and chains , and the chains had been plucked asunder by him , and the fetters broken in pieces : neither could any man tame him .
text2: Sanoyej miyecpa oquisalojcaj ican teposcadenas niman tepostli yehualtic yejhuan para quiteltiaya imahuan niman icxihuan . Pero nochipa ijcuac quitlaliliayaj , yejhua quitecojcotonaya on teposcadenas , niman quincuejcuechtiliaya on tepostin yejyehualtiquej . Niman xacaj hueliya quiteltiaya .

text: And always , night and day , he was in the mountains , and in the tombs , crying , and cutting himself with stones .
text2: Tlayohua niman tlajocaj tzajtzitinemiya , niman nocojcocohuaya ican temej ne imanyan on ostomej campa notocayaj on mimiquej niman ipan on tepemej .

text: But when he saw Jesus afar off , he ran and worshipped him ,
text2: Pero ijcuac ocontac Jesús huejcatzin , huajlau onotlaloj campa yejhua nemiya , niman ixpan onotlacuenquetz .

text: And cried with a loud voice , and said , What have I to do with thee , Jesus , thou Son of the most high God ? I adjure thee by God , that thou torment me not .
text2: Niman oquitzajtzilij chicahuac : ― ¿ Tlinon ticnequi nohuan Jesús , tejhua tiiConeu Dios yejhuan más hueyixticaj ? Nimitzajmancatlajtlanilia ixpan Dios , ma ca xnechtlajyohuilti .

text: For he said unto him , Come out of the man , thou unclean spirit .
text2: Otzajtzic ijcon pampa Jesús yoquijlijca : ― Xcuajli espíritu , xquisa ijtic in tlacatl .

text: And he asked him , What is thy name ? And he answered , saying , My name is Legion : for we are many .
text2: Jesús oquitlajtoltij : ― ¿ Quen ijqui motoca ? Yejhua oquinanquilij : ― Nejhua nicpia miyec notoca pampa sanoyej timiyequej .

text: And he besought him much that he would not send them away out of the country .
text2: Niman yejhuamej on xcuajcualtin espíritus sanoyej quitlajtlaniliayaj Jesús para ma ca ma quinquixti ompaca ne .

text: Now there was there nigh unto the mountains a great herd of swine feeding .
text2: Niman ompa nemiyaj miyequej pitzomej ipan se tepetl campa tlacuajcuajtinemiyaj .

text: And all the devils besought him , saying , Send us into the swine , that we may enter into them .
text2: Niman on xcuajcualtin espíritus sanoyej quitlajtlaniliayaj Jesús : ― Xtechtitlani ne intech on pitzomej niman ma ticalaquican impan .

text: And forthwith Jesus gave them leave . And the unclean spirits went out , and entered into the swine : and the herd ran violently down a steep place into the sea , ( they were about two thousand ; ) and were choked in the sea .
text2: Niman Jesús oquincahuilij , niman on xcuajcualtin espíritus oquisquej ipan on tlacatl , niman ocalaquej impan on pitzomej . On pitzomej canaj ome mil catca . Yejhuamej on tlatlacsaquej niman ne ipan se teostotl campa huejcatlan oxixinitoj hasta ijtic on mar . Ompa , tej , nochimej oamimiquej .

text: And they that fed the swine fled , and told it in the city , and in the country . And they went out to see what it was that was done .
text2: On yejhuan tlajpiayaj ica on pitzomej , ican inmojcayo ontlatlacsaquej . Oquitetlajtlajtohuilitoj ne ipan on pueblos niman nochihuiyan ipan campo . Niman on tojlan oyajquej para oquitatoj on tlen onochiu .

text: And they come to Jesus , and see him that was possessed with the devil , and had the legion , sitting , and clothed , and in his right mind : and they were afraid .
text2: Ijcuac oyejcoquej campa nemiya Jesús , oquitaquej on tlacatl yejhuan ipan oquisquej on xcuajcualtin espíritus . Yejhua yehuaticatca , niman ye nemiya ican itlaquen , niman ye quipiaya cuajli itlamachilis . Yejhuamej sanoyej onomojtijquej .

text: And they that saw it told them how it befell to him that was possessed with the devil , and also concerning the swine .
text2: Niman quemaj yejhuamej on yejhuan oquitaquej quen ijqui onochiu , nochi oquitetlajtlajtohuilijquej quen onochiu ica on yejhuan quipiayaj on xcuajcualtin espíritus , niman quen onochiu ica on pitzomej .

text: And they began to pray him to depart out of their coasts .
text2: Niman yejhuamej sanoyej oquitlajtlanilijquej Jesús para ma quisa ompaca ne .

text: And when he was come into the ship , he that had been possessed with the devil prayed him that he might be with him .
text2: Ijcuac Jesús ocsejpa otlejcoc ipan on barco , on tlacatl yejhuan quimpiaya on xcuajcualtin espíritus sanoyej oquitlajtlanilij para ma huiya ihuan .

text: Howbeit Jesus suffered him not , but saith unto him , Go home to thy friends , and tell them how great things the Lord hath done for thee , and hath had compassion on thee .
text2: Pero Jesús xocahuilij , yej oquijlij : ― Xhuiya mochan , niman xquimijli on quen tiquinta nochi on huejhueyi tlajtlamach tlen Dios omitzchihuilij , niman quen omitzicnelij .

text: And he departed , and began to publish in Decapolis how great things Jesus had done for him : and all men did marvel .
text2: Tej , on tlacatl oyaj ne ipan on región yejhuan quimpia majtlactli pueblos , niman nochi oquitetlajtlajtohuilij tlinon Jesús oquichiu ipampa , niman nochimej tlamojcaitayaj .

text: And when Jesus was passed over again by ship unto the other side , much people gathered unto him : and he was nigh unto the sea .
text2: Ijcuac Jesús ocsejpa yopanoc ipan ocse lado de on mar ipan on barco , onosentlalij miyec tlacatl itech . Niman yejhua ompa nemiya itenco on mar .

text: And , behold , there cometh one of the rulers of the synagogue , Jairus by name ; and when he saw him , he fell at his feet ,
text2: Quemaj oyejcotetz se tlacatl itoca Jairo . Yejhua se tlayecanquetl ne ipan intiopan on hebreos . Ijcuac oquitac Jesús , ixpan onotlacuenquetz .

text: And besought him greatly , saying , My little daughter lieth at the point of death : I pray thee , come and lay thy hands on her , that she may be healed ; and she shall live .
text2: Yejhua oquiajmancatlajtlanilij , oquijlij : ― Nochpocatzin ye micticaj . Nimitztlajtlanilia sanoyej , xhuiya , niman xtlaliti momahuan ipan yejhua para ma pajti , niman ma nemi .

text: And Jesus went with him ; and much people followed him , and thronged him .
text2: Quemaj Jesús oyaj ihuan , niman oyajquej miyequej tlacamej ihuan . Sa quipitzmictiayaj .

text: And a certain woman , which had an issue of blood twelve years ,
text2: No ompa tehuan nemiya se sihuatl , yejhuan quipia matlactli huan ome xipan ica yeshuetztinemiya .

text: And had suffered many things of many physicians , and had spent all that she had , and was nothing bettered , but rather grew worse ,
text2: Miyequej tlapajtijquej sanoyej yoquitlajyohuiltijcaj . Yejhua yoquitlajtlamijca nochi on tlinon quipiaya , pero xopajtic , yej más tlanahuiya .

text: When she had heard of Jesus , came in the press behind , and touched his garment .
text2: On sihuatl oquicac ica Jesús hueli tepajtia . Yejhua ica yejhua ohuajlaj inhuan on tlacamej . Oquinisihuij Jesús san icuitlapan , niman ocajsic itlaquen .

text: For she said , If I may touch but his clothes , I shall be whole .
text2: Ijcon oquichiu pampa quinemiliaya : “ Tla san nicajsis itlaquen , nipajtis . ”

text: And straightway the fountain of her blood was dried up ; and she felt in her body that she was healed of that plague .
text2: Nimantzin xoc yeshuetziya . On sihuatl nimantzin oquimat ipan itlalnacayo ica opajtic .

text: And Jesus , immediately knowing in himself that virtue had gone out of him , turned him about in the press , and said , Who touched my clothes ?
text2: Ijcuacon Jesús oquimat ica on poder itech oquis . Yejhua ica ohuajnocuep ne tetzajlan niman oquitetlajtoltij : ― ¿ Aquinon oquimatocac notlaquen ?

text: And his disciples said unto him , Thou seest the multitude thronging thee , and sayest thou , Who touched me ?
text2: On inomachtijcahuan oquilijquej : ― Tiquitzticaj ica in tlacamej mitzpitzmictiaj . Yejhua ica , ¿ tlica titlajtlani aquinon oquimatocac notlaquen ?

text: And he looked round about to see her that had done this thing .
text2: Pero Jesús tlatlachaya iyehualijcan para quitas aquinon oquimatocac .

text: But the woman fearing and trembling , knowing what was done in her , came and fell down before him , and told him all the truth .
text2: Ijcuacon on sihuatl yehuan quimatzticatca tlinon ipan yonochiu , ohuajlaj itech Jesús , niman onotlacuenquetz ixpan . Yejhua sanoyej nomojtiaya , niman cuecuetlacaya . Yejhua oquijlij nochi tlen melahuac .

text: And he said unto her , Daughter , thy faith hath made thee whole ; go in peace , and be whole of thy plague .
text2: Quemaj Jesús oquijlij : ― Noconeu , otipajtic pampa otitlaneltocac . Xhuiya ican yolsehuilistli . On cualolistli xoc ticpia .

text: While he yet spake , there came from the ruler of the synagogue ' s house certain which said , Thy daughter is dead : why troublest thou the Master any further ?
text2: Jesús oc tlajtlajtojticatca ijcuac oyejcotetzquej sequimej tlacamej yejhuan ohualejquej ne ichan itlayecancau on tiopan . Niman yejhuamej oquijlijquej : ― Mochpoch yomic . Ma ca sa más xpajsolo on temachtijquetl .

text: As soon as Jesus heard the word that was spoken , he saith unto the ruler of the synagogue , Be not afraid , only believe .
text2: Jesús xoquinchihuilij cuenta on tlinon oquijtojquej , niman oquijlij on tlayecanquetl ipan on tiopan : ― Ma ca xmomojti , yej san xnechneltoca melahuac .

text: And he suffered no man to follow him , save Peter , and James , and John the brother of James .
text2: Niman Jesús xocahuilij yacaj más ihuan ocalac , yej san Pedro niman on omemej icniutin Jacobo niman Juan .

text: And he cometh to the house of the ruler of the synagogue , and seeth the tumult , and them that wept and wailed greatly .
text2: Ijcuac oajsiquej ne ichan on tlayecanquetl ipan on tiopan , Jesús oquitac ica on tlacamej sanoyej yonajcomanquej , niman ica chocayaj , niman sa amancatzajtziyaj sanoyej .

text: And when he was come in , he saith unto them , Why make ye this ado , and weep ? the damsel is not dead , but sleepeth .
text2: Jesús ocalac , niman oquimijlij : ― ¿ Tlica nenmajcomanaj , niman nenchocaj ? On sihuaconetl xmiqui , yej san cochtica .

text: And they laughed him to scorn . But when he had put them all out , he taketh the father and the mother of the damsel , and them that were with him , and entereth in where the damsel was lying .
text2: Pero yejhuamej ocuetzquilijquej . Quemaj Jesús oquinquixtij ne quiahuac on yejhuan ompa nemiyaj , niman ocuicac san itataj niman on inanaj on sihuaconetl , niman yejhuamej on yeyimej inomachtijcahuan . Niman ocalacquej ne campa onoc on sihuaconetl .

text: And he took the damsel by the hand , and said unto her , Talitha cumi ; which is , being interpreted , Damsel , I say unto thee , arise .
text2: Quemaj oconquitzquij ima on sihuaconetl , niman oquijlij : ― Talita , cumi ― yejhuan quijtosnequi : Sihuaconetl , nejhua nimitzijlia , xmotelquetza .

text: And straightway the damsel arose , and walked ; for she was of the age of twelve years . And they were astonished with a great astonishment .
text2: Nimantzin on sihuaconetl , yejhuan quipiaya majtlactli huan ome xipan , onoquetzteu , niman quemaj opeu nejnemi . Niman nimantzin yejhuamej sanoyej otlamojcaitajquej .

text: And he charged them straitly that no man should know it ; and commanded that something should be given her to eat .
text2: Pero Jesús oquintlachicahuilij para ma ca yacaj quijlisquej on tlinon yejhua oquichiu . Quemaj Jesús otlanahuatij ma quitlacualtican on sihuaconetl .

text: And he went out from thence , and came into his own country ; and his disciples follow him .
text2: Quemaj Jesús ohuajquis niman oyaj ne ipan on pueblo campa onoscaltij . Niman on inomachtijcahuan oyajquej ihuan .

text: And when the sabbath day was come , he began to teach in the synagogue : and many hearing him were astonished , saying , From whence hath this man these things ? and what wisdom is this which is given unto him , that even such mighty works are wrought by his hands ?
text2: Ijcuac oajsic on sábado , opeu temachtia ipan intiopan on hebreos . Niman miyec tlacatl oquicac , niman otlamojcaitajquej . Oquijtojquej : ― ¿ Hasta canon ohuelito nochi in tlen quijtohua ? niman ¿ aquinon oquimacac in tlamatquilistli ? niman ¿ quen quichihua in milagros ?

text: Is not this the carpenter , the son of Mary , the brother of James , and Joses , and of Juda , and Simon ? and are not his sisters here with us ? And they were offended at him .
text2: ¿ Tlen xejhua cojxinqui , niman iconeu María ? ¿ Xejhua icniu Jacobo , niman José , niman Judas niman Simón ? ¿ Xnican ipan in pueblo chantij on icnihuan yejhuan sihuamej ? Niman onotlahueltijquej ipampa .

text: But Jesus said unto them , A prophet is not without honour , but in his own country , and among his own kin , and in his own house .
text2: Jesús oquimijlij : ― Se tiotlajtojquetl nochihuiyan quitlacaitaj , pero ne ipan ipueblo niman on quen quinta niman ichanchanecahuan xquitlacaitaj .

text: And he could there do no mighty work , save that he laid his hands upon a few sick folk , and healed them .
text2: Xohuel oquichiu ompa itlaj milagro . San quesquimej cocoxquej impan oquintlalij imahuan , niman oquimpajtij .

text: And he marvelled because of their unbelief . And he went round about the villages , teaching .
text2: Jesús sanoyej tlamojcaitaya pampa yejhuamej xquineltocayaj . Niman Jesús panotiaya nochihuiyan ipan on pueblos , niman temachtijtiaya .

text: And he called unto him the twelve , and began to send them forth by two and two ; and gave them power over unclean spirits ;
text2: Niman quemaj oquinsentlalij on majtlactli huan ome inomachtijcahuan , niman opeu quintijtitlani ojomemej . Niman yejhua oquinmacac poder para ma quitequixtilican on xcuajcualtin espíritus .

text: And commanded them that they should take nothing for their journey , save a staff only ; no scrip , no bread , no money in their purse :
text2: Niman oquinnahuatij ma ca itlaj quitquisquej para ipan ojtli san incojtopil . Oquimijlij para ma ca quitquisquej inbolsa , nion tlaxcajli , nion tomin ,

text: But be shod with sandals ; and not put on two coats .
text2: yej san ma quitequitiltican incac niman insentetlaquen .

text: And he said unto them , In what place soever ye enter into an house , there abide till ye depart from that place .
text2: Quemaj oquimijlij : ― Ijcuac nemajsiquej ipan se pueblo , xmocahuacan ipan se cajli hasta nenquisasquej ipan on pueblo .

text: And whosoever shall not receive you , nor hear you , when ye depart thence , shake off the dust under your feet for a testimony against them . Verily I say unto you , It shall be more tolerable for Sodom and Gomorrha in the day of judgment , than for that city .
text2: Tla nemajsij ipan se pueblo campa xmechselisquej , nion mechcaquisquej , xtzejtzelocan nemocxi on tlalteutli ijcuac nenquisasquej . Melahuac , tej , nemechijlia ica ijcuac Dios quiyolcuitis niman quitlajtlacolmacas on pueblo , más tlajyohuis xquen Sodoma niman Gomorra .

text: And they went out , and preached that men should repent .
text2: Quemaj yejhuamej oquisquej , niman oyajquej . Quinmachtijtiayaj on tlacamej para ma noyolcuepacan .

text: And they cast out many devils , and anointed with oil many that were sick , and healed them .
text2: No oquinquixtijquej miyequej xcuajcualtin espíritus , niman oquintlalilijquej aceite ipan miyequej on cocoxquej , niman oquimpatijquej .

text: And king Herod heard of him ; ( for his name was spread abroad : ) and he said , That John the Baptist was risen from the dead , and therefore mighty works do shew forth themselves in him .
text2: Niman on rey Herodes ocac ica notenehua Jesús pampa itoca nohuiyan yomachiyac . Sequimej quijtohuayaj : ― Jesús hueli quichihua on milagros pampa melahuac , tej , yejhua Juan yejhuan Dios yoquiyolihuitij niman yoquetzteu ne intzajlan on mimiquej .

text: Others said , That it is Elias . And others said , That it is a prophet , or as one of the prophets .
text2: Pero sequimej quijtohuayaj : ― Yejhua on tiotlajtojquetl Elías . Niman ocsequimej quijtohuayaj : ― Yejhua se tiotlajtojquetl noso yacaj semej on achtoj tiotlajtojquej .

text: But when Herod heard thereof , he said , It is John , whom I beheaded : he is risen from the dead .
text2: Pero ijcuac Herodes ocac , oquijtoj : ― Yejhua in Juan on tlacuatequijquetl yejhuan onitlatitlan para oquechtzontequej . Aman yonoyolihuitij niman yonoquetzteu ne intzajlan on mimiquej .

text: For Herod himself had sent forth and laid hold upon John , and bound him in prison for Herodias ' sake , his brother Philip ' s wife : for he had married her .
text2: Ijquin Herodes oquijtoj pampa yejhua otlanahuatij para ma cajsican Juan , niman oquisalojquej ican teposcadena ne campa tzacuticaj para quipactis Herodías . Yejhua in Herodías , isihuau catca Felipe on icniu Herodes , pero Herodes oquicuilij para yejhua isihuau .

text: For John had said unto Herod , It is not lawful for thee to have thy brother ' s wife .
text2: Herodes oquitzacu Juan pampa yejhua quijlijtinemiya Herodes : ― Itlanahuatil Dios xmitzcahuilia ticpias isihuau mocniu quen mosihuau .

text: Therefore Herodias had a quarrel against him , and would have killed him ; but she could not :
text2: Herodías , tej , sanoyej quitlahuelitaya Juan , niman quinequiya quimictis , pero yejhua xhueliya

text: For Herod feared John , knowing that he was a just man and an holy , and observed him ; and when he heard him , he did many things , and heard him gladly .
text2: pampa Herodes quitlacaitaya Juan , niman quimatzticatca ica yejhua cuajli tlacatl yolchipahuac . Yejhua ica Herodes quimanahuiaya . Ijcuac Herodes contaya sanoyej cuelcaquiya , masqui xoc quimatiya tlen quichihuas .

text: And when a convenient day was come , that Herod on his birthday made a supper to his lords , high captains , and chief estates of Galilee ;
text2: Quemaj oyejcoc on tonajli yejhuan cuajli catca para Herodías . Ijcuac on Herodes oquichiu ilhuitl pampa yejhua ilhuiu catca , oquinnotz on tequihuajquej , niman on comandantes niman on huejhueyixtoquej ne Galilea .

text: And when the daughter of the said Herodias came in , and danced , and pleased Herod and them that sat with him , the king said unto the damsel , Ask of me whatsoever thou wilt , and I will give it thee .
text2: Niman on ichpoch Herodías no ocalac , niman onijtotij . Niman on rey Herodes niman yejhuan oquinnotz sanoyej ocuelitaquej . Yejhua ica Herodes oquijlij on ichpochtli : ― Xnechtlajtlanili nochi san tlinon ticnequis , niman nimitzmacas .

text: And he sware unto her , Whatsoever thou shalt ask of me , I will give it thee , unto the half of my kingdom .
text2: Niman no oquijlij : ― Ican notlajtol nimitzijlia : “ Nochi tlinon tinechtlajtlanis nimitzmacas , masqui hasta tlajcotipan in campa nejhua nitlamandarohua . ”

text: And she went forth , and said unto her mother , What shall I ask ? And she said , The head of John the Baptist .
text2: On ichpochtli oquis niman oquitlajtoltijtetzito inan . Oquijlij : ― ¿ Tlinon nictlajtlanilis ? Niman yejhua oquijlij : ― Xtlajtlanili itzontecon Juan on tlacuatequijquetl .

text: And she came in straightway with haste unto the king , and asked , saying , I will that thou give me by and by in a charger the head of John the Baptist .
text2: Niman quemaj nimantzin on ichpochtli ocsejpa ocalaquito . Oquitlajtlanito , oquijlij on rey : ― Ipan se plato xnechmaca amantzin itzontecon Juan on tlacuatequijquetl .

text: And the king was exceeding sorry ; yet for his oath ' s sake , and for their sakes which sat with him , he would not reject her .
text2: Niman quemaj on rey Herodes sanoyej onajman . Pero pampa yejhua yonocalactijca ican itlajtol , niman impampa itenotzcahuan yejhuan ihuan tlacuaj , on rey oquichiu quen oquijtojca .

text: And immediately the king sent an executioner , and commanded his head to be brought : and he went and beheaded him in the prison ,
text2: Nimantzin on rey oquititlan se itlajpixcau soldado , niman oquinahuatij para ma cuajqui on itzontecon Juan ipan se plato . On soldado oyaj , niman oquechtzontequito Juan ne campa tzacuticatca ,

text: And brought his head in a charger , and gave it to the damsel : and the damsel gave it to her mother .
text2: niman ocuajquic itzontecon ipan se plato . Yejhua oquimacac on ichpochtli , niman on ichpochtli oquimacac inan .

text: And when his disciples heard of it , they came and took up his corpse , and laid it in a tomb .
text2: Ijcuac on inomachtijcahuan Juan oquimatquej ica yomic Juan , ohualajquej niman ocuicaquej . Quemaj oquitocatoj ne ipan se tlalcontli .

text: And the apostles gathered themselves together unto Jesus , and told him all things , both what they had done , and what they had taught .
text2: Quemaj on iapostolhuan Jesús onosentlalijquej ihuan , niman oquitlajtlajtohuilijquej nochi tlinon oquichijquej , niman tlinon otemachtijquej .

text: And he said unto them , Come ye yourselves apart into a desert place , and rest a while : for there were many coming and going , and they had no leisure so much as to eat .
text2: Yayaj niman huajlayaj tojlamej , niman Jesús inhuan iapostolhuan nion xquipiayaj tiempo para tlacuasquej . Yejhua ica Jesús oquimijlij on iapostolhuan : ― Xhuajhuiyan , tiahuij neca campaca xacaj nemi , niman ompa tihuelisquej titosehuisquej achijtzin .

text: And they departed into a desert place by ship privately .
text2: Quemaj oyajquej ipan se barco ne tlapatlaco campa xacaj nemi .

text: And the people saw them departing , and many knew him , and ran afoot thither out of all cities , and outwent them , and came together unto him .
text2: Niman ijcuac oyajquej , miyequej oquintaquej , niman oconixmatquej Jesús . Niman on tlacamej ipan nochihuiyan pueblos campaca san nisiu onotlajtlalojquej , niman oajsiquej más achtoj , niman on barco oajsic más saquin .

text: And Jesus , when he came out , saw much people , and was moved with compassion toward them , because they were as sheep not having a shepherd : and he began to teach them many things .
text2: Ijcuac Jesús ohuajquis ne ipan on barco , oquintac sanoyej yotojlantic . Yejhua sanoyej oquimicnelij , pampa nemiyaj quen itlaj borregos yejhuan xquipiaj intlajpixcau . Quemaj Jesús opeu quinmachtia miyec tlajtlamach .

text: And when the day was now far spent , his disciples came unto him , and said , This is a desert place , and now the time is far passed :
text2: Ijcuac más tiotlac , on inomachtijcahuan oquijlijquej : ― Xacaj chanti nican , niman ye tiotlactiticaj .

text: Send them away , that they may go into the country round about , and into the villages , and buy themselves bread : for they have nothing to eat .
text2: Xquintitlani para ma huiyan neca ipan on pueblitos niman neca ipan on cuadrillas campaca san nisiu para ma cohuacan itlaj para quicuasquej .

text: He answered and said unto them , Give ye them to eat . And they say unto him , Shall we go and buy two hundred pennyworth of bread , and give them to eat ?
text2: Pero yejhua oquimijlij : ― Nemejhuamej xquintlacualtican . Niman oquijlijquej : ― ¿ Ticnequi ma tihuiyan , niman ma ticohuatij pan ? Sen tlacatl nonequi tequitis canaj chicueyi metztli para huelis cohuas on pan para nochimej in tojlamej .

text: He saith unto them , How many loaves have ye ? go and see . And when they knew , they say , Five , and two fishes .
text2: Oquimijlij : ― ¿ Quesqui pan nenquipiaj ? Xhuiyan , niman xquitacan quesqui nenquipiaj . Niman quemaj ijcuac oquimatquej , oquijlijquej : ― Ticpiaj macuijli pan niman ome michimej .

text: And he commanded them to make all sit down by companies upon the green grass .
text2: Quemaj Jesús oquinnahuatij ma notlajtlalican ipan on sacatl ojoncuaj .

text: And they sat down in ranks , by hundreds , and by fifties .
text2: Niman quemaj onotlajtlalijquej ojoncuaj sejsen ciento niman tlatlajco ciento .

text: And when he had taken the five loaves and the two fishes , he looked up to heaven , and blessed , and brake the loaves , and gave them to his disciples to set before them ; and the two fishes divided he among them all .
text2: Quemaj ijcuac Jesús ocontilan on macuijli pan niman ome michin , oajcotlachix ne ilhuicac niman oquimacac tlaxtlahuijli Dios para on tlacuajli . Niman quemaj oquitlatlapan on pan , niman oquinmacac inomachtijcahuan para ma quinxelohuilican on tlacamej . No oquitexelohuilijquej on ome michin .

text: And they did all eat , and were filled .
text2: Nochimej otlacuajquej , niman cuajli oixhuiquej .

text: And they took up twelve baskets full of the fragments , and of the fishes .
text2: Niman quemaj ica on tlatlajcotzitzin tlen onocau , oquitemiltiquej majtlactli huan ome chiquiutin .

text: And they that did eat of the loaves were about five thousand men .
text2: Niman on yejhuan otlacuajquej macuijli mil tlacamej .

text: And straightway he constrained his disciples to get into the ship , and to go to the other side before unto Bethsaida , while he sent away the people .
text2: Quemaj Jesús nimantzin oquinnahuatij on inomachtijcahuan para ma calaquican ipan on barco , niman ma yecatztiacan ne ocse ilado on mar ipan on pueblo itoca Betsaida , chica yejhua quinnahuatiaya on tlacamej para ma huiyan .

text: And when he had sent them away , he departed into a mountain to pray .
text2: Más saquin , ijcuac yoquintitlan on tlacamej , yejhua otlejcoc ipan se tepetl , niman ompa oquichiu oración .

text: And when even was come , the ship was in the midst of the sea , and he alone on the land .
text2: Ijcuac otlayohuac , on barco yaya ne atlajcotian ipan on mar , niman Jesús nemiya iselti ne ipan on tepetl .

text: And he saw them toiling in rowing ; for the wind was contrary unto them : and about the fourth watch of the night he cometh unto them , walking upon the sea , and would have passed by them .
text2: Jesús oquitac ica on inomachtijcahuan yosiauquej ica quinejnemitiayaj on barco pampa on ajacatl quimixnamiquiya . Niman canaj ipan yeyi hora ica cualcan , yejhua nejnentiaya ne ixco on mar hasta ijqui oajsic ne campa nemiyaj on inomachtijcahuan . Yejhua quinemiliaya quimpanahuis .

text: But when they saw him walking upon the sea , they supposed it had been a spirit , and cried out :
text2: Pero ijcuac on nomachtijquej oquitaquej nejnentiu ne ixco on mar , yejhuamej cuitiayaj se xcuajli tlamojtiloni . Yejhuamej chicahuac otzajtziquej ,

text: For they all saw him , and were troubled . And immediately he talked with them , and saith unto them , Be of good cheer : it is I ; be not afraid .
text2: pampa nochimej oquitaquej , niman sanoyej onomojtijquej . Quemaj nimantzin Jesús oquimijlij : ― ¡ Xmoyolchicahuacan niman ma ca xmomojtican ! Nejhua niJesús .
