text2: Yejhuamej on yejhuan ricos quitemacaj san yejhua on tlen yoquinsobraroj . Pero in sihuatl , masqui mayanqui , oquitemacac nochi hasta on tlen ica nopanoltisquia .

text: And as he went out of the temple , one of his disciples saith unto him , Master , see what manner of stones and what buildings are here !
text2: Ijcuac Jesús huajquistiaya ne ipan on hueyi tiopan , se on inomachtijcau oquijlij : ― Notemachtijcau , xquita . Sanoyej huejhueyimej on temej yejhuan ica tlachijchiutin on caltin niman sanoyej huejhueyimej on caltin .

text: And Jesus answering said unto him , Seest thou these great buildings ? there shall not be left one stone upon another , that shall not be thrown down .
text2: Ijcuacon Jesús oquijlij : ― ¿ Tiquinta in huejhueyimej caltin ? Nican xnocahuas nion se tetl tlapani ipan ocse pampa nochi quixoxotonisquej .

text: And as he sat upon the mount of Olives over against the temple , Peter and James and John and Andrew asked him privately ,
text2: Niman ijcuac yehuaticatca Jesús ne ipan on tepetl itoca Olivos ne ixpan on hueyi tiopan , Pedro , Jacobo , Juan niman Andrés san iseltimej oquitlajtoltijquej :

text: Tell us , when shall these things be ? and what shall be the sign when all these things shall be fulfilled ?
text2: ― Xtechijli , ¿ quemanon ijcon nochihuas on tlajtlamach , niman tlen tlamajhuisojli noteititis ijcuac in tlajtlamach ye pehuas nochihuas ?

text: And Jesus answering them began to say , Take heed lest any man deceive you :
text2: Jesús opeu quinmachtia , oquimijlij : ― Xmotacan sa no nemejhuamej para ma ca yacaj mechcajcayahuas ,

text: For many shall come in my name , saying , I am Christ ; and shall deceive many .
text2: pampa miyequej huajlasquej yejhuan ican noTocatzin cualijtojtiasquej : “ Nejhua niCristo . ” Niman yejhuamej quincajcayahuasquej miyequej .

text: And when ye shall hear of wars and rumours of wars , be ye not troubled : for such things must needs be ; but the end shall not be yet .
text2: ' Niman ijcuac nencaquisquej ica oncaj guerras nisiu niman no neca huejca , ma ca xmoyolpajsolocan . Tej , nochi on ica oncaj achtopa nochihuas . Pero ijcuac ijcon nochihuas , oc xejhua tiempo para ipan in tlalticpactli tlatlajtlamis .

text: For nation shall rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom : and there shall be earthquakes in divers places , and there shall be famines and troubles : these are the beginnings of sorrows .
text2: On tequihuaquej nohuijsoquisquej inhuan ocsequimej tequihuajquej , niman on países nohuijsoquisquej inhuan ocsequimej países , niman tlalolinis miyecan , niman onyas apistli . Pero in xica nochi yes , yej más onyas tlajyohuilistli .

text: But take heed to yourselves : for they shall deliver you up to councils ; and in the synagogues ye shall be beaten : and ye shall be brought before rulers and kings for my sake , for a testimony against them .
text2: ' Xmotacan sa no nemejhuamej , pampa san nopampa semej nemejhuamej mechtemacasquej ne intech on tequihuajquej , niman semej nemejhuamej mechhuihuitequisquej ne ipan intiopanhuan on hebreos , niman semej nemejhuamej mechhuicasquej san nopampa ne intech on presidentes niman intech on reyes . Ijcuacon noca nentenojnotzasquej .

text: And the gospel must first be published among all nations .
text2: On cuajli tlajtojli yejhuan quitemaca temaquixtilistli achtoj noteijlis nochihuiyan , niman quemaj tlatlajtlamis .

text: But when they shall lead you , and deliver you up , take no thought beforehand what ye shall speak , neither do ye premeditate : but whatsoever shall be given you in that hour , that speak ye : for it is not ye that speak , but the Holy Ghost .
text2: Niman ijcuac mechajhuicasquej niman mechtemacasquej ne intech on tequihuajquej , ma ca sa xcomatztiacan tlinon nenquijtosquej , niman ma ca xnemilijtiacan . Xquijtocan tlinon Dios mechmacas para nenquijtosquej ipan on hora , pampa xnemejhuamej nentlajtosquej , yej tlajtos on Espíritu Santo .

text: Now the brother shall betray the brother to death , and the father the son ; and children shall rise up against their parents , and shall cause them to be put to death .
text2: Sequimej quintemacasquej imicnihuan para ma quinmictican pampa nechneltocaj . Niman sequimej tatajtin no ijqui quintemacasquej iconehuan para ma quinmictican pampa nechneltocaj . Niman on teconehuan noquetztehuasquej impan on tatajtin niman nanantin , niman no quintemacasquej para quinmictisquej .

text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name ' s sake : but he that shall endure unto the end , the same shall be saved .
text2: Nochi tlacatl mechtlahuelitas san pampa nennechneltocaj . Pero on yejhuan quixicos nochi , on yejhua maquisas .

text: But when ye shall see the abomination of desolation , spoken of by Daniel the prophet , standing where it ought not , ( let him that readeth understand , ) then let them that be in Judaea flee to the mountains :
text2: ' Nenquitasquej nochihuas yejhua on tlen xcuajli tlaijtlacohua niman on tlen tetzinquixtia quitlalisquej ne campa xquitocarohua para nemis ijcon quen on tiotlajtojquetl Daniel oquijcuiloj . ( Ijcuac timomachtis , xcajsicamati sanoyej cuajli . ) Quemaj on yejhuan nemisquej ne Judea , ma ontlatlacsacan neca ipan tepeyoj .

text: And let him that is on the housetop not go down into the house , neither enter therein , to take any thing out of his house :
text2: Niman on yejhuan ipan on tonajli nemis ne icuatipan on cajli , ma ca huajtemos para concuis itlaj ne icalijtic .

text: And let him that is in the field not turn back again for to take up his garment .
text2: Niman on yejhuan nemis ne ipan imil ixtlahuacan , ma ca nocuepas ichan para concuis itlaj itlaquen .

text: But woe to them that are with child , and to them that give suck in those days !
text2: Sanoyej xcuajli yes para on sihuamej yejhuan ipan on tonaltin yocanquej inconeu , niman on sihuamej yejhuan ipan on tonaltin tlachichitisquej .

text: And pray ye that your flight be not in the winter .
text2: Xchihuacan oración niman xtlajtlanilican Dios para ma ca nochihuas ijcuac sanoyej sehua ,

text: For in those days shall be affliction , such as was not from the beginning of the creation which God created unto this time , neither shall be .
text2: pampa ijcuacon sanoyej miyec onyas tlajyohuilistli quen yejhuan xqueman oncaj desde ijcuac Dios oquitlalij in tlalticpactli , niman xqueman yes .

text: And except that the Lord had shortened those days , no flesh should be saved : but for the elect ' s sake , whom he hath chosen , he hath shortened the days .
text2: Pero toTeco xcahuilis para on tlacamej tlajyohuisquej miyec tonaltin pampa quimicnelis on yejhuan yoquintlapejpenij . Tla yejhua quincahuilisquia tlajyohuisquiaj miyec tonaltin , nochimej miquisquiaj .

text: And then if any man shall say to you , Lo , here is Christ ; or , lo , he is there ; believe him not :
text2: ' Niman tla ijcuacon yacaj mechijlis : “ Xquitacan , nican nemi Cristo ” , noso “ Xquitacan , ompa on nemi ” , ma ca xneltocacan .

text: For false Christs and false prophets shall rise , and shall shew signs and wonders , to seduce , if it were possible , even the elect .
text2: Ma ca xneltocacan pampa huajlasquej on tlacajcayajquej yejhuan notenehuasquej Cristos noso tiotlajtojquej . Niman yejhuamej quichihuasquej on tlamajhuisoltin niman milagros para tecajcayahuasquej niman hasta on yejhuan Dios yoquintlapejpenij . Pero yejhuamej xhuelisquej quincajcayahuasquej on yejhuan Dios yoquintlapejpenij .

text: But take ye heed : behold , I have foretold you all things .
text2: Xmotacan sa no nemejhuamej . Xquipia tlica nenhuetzisquej pampa ye nemechmachiltijticaj nochi tlen nochihuas .

text: But in those days , after that tribulation , the sun shall be darkened , and the moon shall not give her light ,
text2: ' Ijcuac yopanoquej on tonaltin ican tlajyohuilistli , xoc tlahuilos on tonaltzintli niman on metztli xoc petlanis .

text: And the stars of heaven shall fall , and the powers that are in heaven shall be shaken .
text2: On sitlalimej huajxinisquej ne ipan cielo , niman hasta on tlen cojtilijticaj on cielo nolinis .

text: And then shall they see the Son of man coming in the clouds with great power and glory .
text2: ' Niman quemaj nechitasquej nejhua yejhuan oninochiu Tlacatl , nihuajlas ipan on moxtli ican nohueyi poder niman ican nohueyilis .

text: And then shall he send his angels , and shall gather together his elect from the four winds , from the uttermost part of the earth to the uttermost part of heaven .
text2: Niman quemaj niquinhuajtitlanis on noilhuicactequitcahuan para quinsentlalisquej nochimej on yejhuan Dios yoquintlapejpenij nochihuiyan ipan in tlalticpactli .

text: Now learn a parable of the fig tree ; When her branch is yet tender , and putteth forth leaves , ye know that summer is near :
text2: ' Xcajsicamatican in ejemplo itech on higuera . Ijcuac on imahuan seliaj , niman quisa on ixouyo , nemejhuamej nenquimatij ica ye nisiu xopantlaj .

text: So ye in like manner , when ye shall see these things come to pass , know that it is nigh , even at the doors .
text2: Sa no ijqui in , ijcuac nenquitasquej nochi yejhua in tlajtlamach ye nochijticaj , xmatican ica ye nisiu para nihuajnocuepas ocsejpa .

text: Verily I say unto you , that this generation shall not pass , till all these things be done .
text2: Ica tlen melahuac nemechijlia ica nochi in tlajtlamach nochihuas ijcuac xe miquij on tlacamej yejhuan nemij ipan in tiempo .

text: Heaven and earth shall pass away : but my words shall not pass away .
text2: On cielo niman in tlalticpactli popolihuis , pero notlajtol xqueman popolihuis .

text: But of that day and that hour knoweth no man , no , not the angels which are in heaven , neither the Son , but the Father .
text2: ' On tonajli niman on hora ijcuac tlatlalpolihuis xacaj quimati , nion yejhuamej on ilhuicactequitquej ne ilhuicac nemij , nion nejhua , yejhuan niiConeu Dios . Yej san noTajtzin quimati .

text: Take ye heed , watch and pray : for ye know not when the time is .
text2: ' ¡ Xmotacan sa no nemejhuamej ! Xtlachixtiacan niman xchihuacan oración , pampa xnenquimatij quemanon yejcos on tonajli .

text: For the Son of man is as a man taking a far journey , who left his house , and gave authority to his servants , and to every man his work , and commanded the porter to watch .
text2: In sa no ijqui quen se tlacatl yejhuan cajtehua ichan niman ompaxalohua sanoyej huejca . Niman quinnajnahuatitehua on itlaquehualhuan , niman quinmajmaca tequitl , niman ocse tlacatl cajtehua ne quiahuatenco para ma tlajpia .

text: Watch ye therefore : for ye know not when the master of the house cometh , at even , or at midnight , or at the cockcrowing , or in the morning :
text2: Oquimijlij iteco on cajli : “ Xtlachixtiacan , tej , pampa xnenquimatij quemanon nejcos , tla tlayohua , noso tlajcoihuan , noso ijcuac tzajtzitoquej on caxtiltin , noso ijcuac yotlanes . ”

text: Lest coming suddenly he find you sleeping .
text2: Xtlachixtiacan , tej , para ma ca san isicapan nihuajnocuepas ijcuac xnennechchixtoquej , niman nemechnextijtejcos nencochij .

text: And what I say unto you I say unto all , Watch .
text2: Niman in tlajtlamach tlen nemechijlia , nochi tlacatl niquijlia : “ Ma tlachixtiacan . ”

text: After two days was the feast of the passover , and of unleavened bread : and the chief priests and the scribes sought how they might take him by craft , and put him to death .
text2: Ipan ome tonajli ilhuitl yes itoca pascua . Ipan on ilhuitl quicuaj pan yejhuan xquipia tlaxocolilistli . Niman intlayecancahuan on tiopixquej niman on temachtijquej ican itlanahuatil Dios ichtaca quitejtemohuiliayaj quen ijqui cajcayahuasquej Jesús para cajsisquej , niman quimictisquej .

text: But they said , Not on the feast day , lest there be an uproar of the people .
text2: Pero quijtohuayaj ma ca ipan on ilhuitl para ma ca on tlacamej najcomanasquej .

text: And being in Bethany in the house of Simon the leper , as he sat at meat , there came a woman having an alabaster box of ointment of spikenard very precious ; and she brake the box , and poured it on his head .
text2: Jesús nemiya ne Betania ichan Simón on yejhuan oquipatijca ijcuac palaniya inacayo . Niman ijcuac yehuaticatca ne ipan mesa , ohuajlaj se sihuatl . Ocuajquic se on quen itlaj botella yejhuan tlachijchiutli ican tetl fino . On botella tentiaya ican on ajhuiyalistli itoca nardo yejhuan sanoyej patioj . Quemaj yejhua oquitlapan on botella para oquitlapoj , niman oquitequilij Jesús ipan itzontecon .

text: And there were some that had indignation within themselves , and said , Why was this waste of the ointment made ?
text2: Pero sequimej yejhuan ompa nemiyaj ocualanquej , niman quinnojliayaj : ― ¿ Tlica oixpoliu in ajhuiyalistli ?

text: For it might have been sold for more than three hundred pence , and have been given to the poor . And they murmured against her .
text2: In huelisquia nonamacasquia para notlanisquiaj tomin canaj sa no ijqui quen quitlani se tlacatl tla tequiti se xipan . Niman ica on tomin tiquimpalehuisquiaj on mayanquej . Niman yejhuamej cajhuayaj on sihuatl .

text: And Jesus said , Let her alone ; why trouble ye her ? she hath wrought a good work on me .
text2: Pero Jesús oquimijlij : ― Xcahuacan , ¿ Tlica nenquipajsolohuaj ? Yejhua in tlen yejhua nechchihuilia sanoyej cuajli .

text: For ye have the poor with you always , and whensoever ye will ye may do them good : but me ye have not always .
text2: Nemejhuamej nochipa nemotzajlan nenquimpiasquej on mayanquej , niman san quemanon nenquinequisquej huelis nenquinchihuilisquej cuajli . Pero nejhua xnochipa nican nennechpiasquej nemohuan .

text: She hath done what she could : she is come aforehand to anoint my body to the burying .
text2: In sihuatl oquichiu hasta campa ohuel . Yejhua yonachtojhuij ica yocajhuiyalij notlalnacayo para nechtlaltocasquej .

text: Verily I say unto you , Wheresoever this gospel shall be preached throughout the whole world , this also that she hath done shall be spoken of for a memorial of her .
text2: Ica tlen melahuac nemechijlia ica nochihuiyan ipan in tlalticpactli campa noteijlis on temachtilistli yejhuan quitemaca temaquixtilistli , no noteijlis on tlen oquichiu in sihuatl para yejhua quelnamiquisquej .

text: And Judas Iscariot , one of the twelve , went unto the chief priests , to betray him unto them .
text2: Ijcuacon Judas Iscariote , se on ica majtlactli huan ome inomachtijcahuan Jesús , oyaj intech intlayecancahuan on tiopixquej para oquintlajtlatohuilito quen ijqui huelis quinmactilis Jesús .

text: And when they heard it , they were glad , and promised to give him money . And he sought how he might conveniently betray him .
text2: Ijcuac yejhuamej ijquin ocacquej , yejhuamej sanoyej opacquej , niman onotlajtolmacaquej para Judas quimacasquej tomin . Quemaj Judas opeu quitejtemohua quen ijqui quitemactilis Jesús .

text: And the first day of unleavened bread , when they killed the passover , his disciples said unto him , Where wilt thou that we go and prepare that thou mayest eat the passover ?
text2: Ipan on achtoj tonajli ica on ilhuitl , ijcuac nocuaya on pan yejhuan xquipia tlaxocolilistli , niman ijcuac quihuentlaliaj on borreguito , on inomachtijcahuan Jesús oquitlajtoltijquej : ― ¿ Canon ticnequi ma tihuiyan niman ma timitzcuectlalilitij on tlacuajli yejhuan ticuas ipan in ilhuitl pascua ?

text: And he sendeth forth two of his disciples , and saith unto them , Go ye into the city , and there shall meet you a man bearing a pitcher of water : follow him .
text2: Quemaj oquintitlan omemej inomachtijcahuan , niman oquimijlij : ― Xhuiyan ne ipan on hueyican , niman ompa nenquinamiquisquej se tlacatl yejhuan quitqui se tzotzocojli ican atl . Xhuiyan ihuan .

text: And wheresoever he shall go in , say ye to the goodman of the house , The Master saith , Where is the guestchamber , where I shall eat the passover with my disciples ?
text2: Niman ne campa calaquis , xquijlican iteco on cajli : “ On Temachtijquetl quijtohua : ¿ canon oncaj on calijtic campa nicuas on tlajcuajli ipan on ilhuitl pascua inhuan nonomachtijcahuan ? ”

text: And he will shew you a large upper room furnished and prepared : there make ready for us .
text2: Niman yejhua mechititis se hueyi calijtic ye listo ne ipan on sa ica nochi caltlanepantli tlacpac . Ompa , tej , xchihuacan on tlacuajli .

text: And his disciples went forth , and came into the city , and found as he had said unto them : and they made ready the passover .
text2: On inomachtijcahuan oyajquej ne ipan on hueyican , niman ijqui oquinextijquej quen Jesús oquimijlij . Ompa , tej , ocuectlalijquej on tlacuajli para tlacuasquej ipan on ilhuitl pascua .

text: And in the evening he cometh with the twelve .
text2: Ijcuac yotlayohuac , oajsic Jesús inhuan on majtlactli huan omemej nomachtijquej .

text: And as they sat and did eat , Jesus said , Verily I say unto you , One of you which eateth with me shall betray me .
text2: Niman ijcuac nemiyaj ne ipan mesa tlacuayaj , Jesús oquimijlij : ― Ica tlen melahuac nemechijlia ica semej nemejhuamej nechtemactilis . Yejhua nican tlacuajticaj nohuan .

text: And they began to be sorrowful , and to say unto him one by one , Is it I ? and another said , Is it I ?
text2: Quemaj yejhuamej sanoyej onajmanquej , niman opejquej quitlajtoltiaj Jesús sesentemej : ― ¿ Tlen manin nejhua ? Niman ocse no oquijtoj : ― ¿ Tlen manin nejhua ?

text: And he answered and said unto them , It is one of the twelve , that dippeth with me in the dish .
text2: Jesús oquimijlij : ― Semej nemejhuamej nenmajtlactli huan ome yejhuan quipatzohua on pan ipan on plato campa nejhua nicpatzohua on pan .

text: The Son of man indeed goeth , as it is written of him : but woe to that man by whom the Son of man is betrayed ! good were it for that man if he had never been born .
text2: Nejhua yejhuan oninochiu Tlacatl nimiquis ijqui quen quijtohua on Yectlajcuilojli , pero lástima para on yejhuan nechtemactilis . Más cuajli yesquia tla xqueman tlacatisquia .

text: And as they did eat , Jesus took bread , and blessed , and brake it , and gave to them , and said , Take , eat : this is my body .
text2: Chica tlacuajticatcaj , Jesús ocontilan on pan , niman oquimacac tlaxtlahuijli Dios . Niman quemaj ijcuac yoquitlatlapan , oquinmacac on inomachtijcahuan . Oquimijlij : ― Xcuacan . In pan yejhua quixnescayotia notlalnacayo .

text: And he took the cup , and when he had given thanks , he gave it to them : and they all drank of it .
text2: Niman quemaj ocontilan on copa niman oquimacac tlaxtlahuijli Dios . Niman quemaj oquinmacac on inomachtijcahuan , niman nochimej oconiquej .

text: And he said unto them , This is my blood of the new testament , which is shed for many .
text2: Niman oquimijlij : ― In tlen nenconisquej noyesyo yejhuan ica notzimpehualtia on yencuic pacto , niman in noyesyo toyahuis para miyequej tlapojpolhuilos intlajtlacol .

text: Verily I say unto you , I will drink no more of the fruit of the vine , until that day that I drink it new in the kingdom of God .
text2: Ica tlen melahuac nemechijlia ica xoc queman niconis iyayo in uva hasta ipan on tonajli ijcuac niconis yencuic iyayo on uvas campa tlamandarohua Dios .

text: And when they had sung an hymn , they went out into the mount of Olives .
text2: Niman ijcuac yoquinocuicatijquej se tlacuicajli , oyajquej ne ipan on tepetl itoca Olivos .

text: And Jesus saith unto them , All ye shall be offended because of me this night : for it is written , I will smite the shepherd , and the sheep shall be scattered .
text2: Niman Jesús oquimijlij : ― Nemochimej nemejhuamej nennechtlalcahuisquej pampa on Yectlajcuilojli ijquin quijtohua : “ Nicmictis on tlajpixqui , niman on borregos pojpolihuisquej . ”

text: But after that I am risen , I will go before you into Galilee .
text2: Pero ijcuac nejhua yoniyoliu niman yoninoquetzteu ipan notlalcon , nias ne Galilea nemoyecapan .

text: But Peter said unto him , Although all shall be offended , yet will not I .
text2: Quemaj Pedro oquijlij : ― Masqui nochimej mitztlalcahuisquej , nejhua ca .

text: And Jesus saith unto him , Verily I say unto thee , That this day , even in this night , before the cock crow twice , thou shalt deny me thrice .
text2: Pero Jesús oquijlij : ― Ica tlen melahuac nimitzijlia ica aman ipan in tlayohua , ijcuac xe tzajtzi on caxtil ocpa , tejhua tiquijtos yexpa ica xtinechixmati .

text: But he spake the more vehemently , If I should die with thee , I will not deny thee in any wise . Likewise also said they all .
text2: Pero yejhua quichihuaya canica , niman oquijtoj : ― Masqui hasta ijqui mohuan nimiquis , nejhua xniquijtos ica xnimitzixmati . Niman nochimej ijqui quijtohuayaj .

text: And they came to a place which was named Gethsemane : and he saith to his disciples , Sit ye here , while I shall pray .
text2: Quemaj oajsiquej ne campa itoca Getsemaní , niman ompa Jesús oquimijlij on inomachtijcahuan : ― Xmotlajtlalican nican chica nejhua nicchihuas oración .

text: And he taketh with him Peter and James and John , and began to be sore amazed , and to be very heavy ;
text2: Quemaj Jesús más neca oquinhuicac Pedro , Juan niman Jacobo . Niman Jesús opeu sanoyej najmana niman noyolcocohua .

text: And saith unto them , My soul is exceeding sorrowful unto death : tarry ye here , and watch .
text2: Niman oquimijlij : ― Nejhua sanoyej ninajmana . Machisti niajmancamiquis . Nemejhuamej nican xmocahuacan , niman xtlachixtiacan .

text: And he went forward a little , and fell on the ground , and prayed that , if it were possible , the hour might pass from him .
text2: Quemaj Jesús oyaj achijtzin más tlayecapan , niman onixacamantetlajcal ne ipan tlajli . Oquichiu oración tla huelisquia xquipanosquia on tlajyohuilistli yejhuan ipan huajlas .

text: And he said , Abba , Father , all things are possible unto thee ; take away this cup from me : nevertheless not what I will , but what thou wilt .
text2: Niman oquijtoj : ― NoTajtzin , tejhua tihueli nochi . Xnechmaquixti ican in tlajyohuilistli yejhuan nechcha , pero ma ca ma nochihua quen nejhua nicnequi , yej ma nochihua quen tejhua ticnequi .

text: And he cometh , and findeth them sleeping , and saith unto Peter , Simon , sleepest thou ? couldest not thou watch one hour ?
text2: Quemaj oyaj ne intech on inomachtijcahuan , niman oquinnextito cochtoquej . Niman oquijlij Pedro : ― Simón , ¿ ticochi ? ¿ Xtihueli titlachixticaj nion se hora ?

text: Watch ye and pray , lest ye enter into temptation . The spirit truly is ready , but the flesh is weak .
text2: Niman oquimijlij : ― Xtlachixtiacan , niman xchihuacan oración para on diablo xmechtlatlatas para xtlajtlacocan . Melahuac , tej , nemoespíritu quinequij quichihuas cuajli , pero nemonacayo xcojtic .

text: And again he went away , and prayed , and spake the same words .
text2: Quemaj ocsejpa oyaj , niman oquichiu oración sa no ijqui oquijtoj .

text: And when he returned , he found them asleep again , ( for their eyes were heavy , ) neither wist they what to answer him .
text2: Quemaj ocsejpa ohuajlaj , niman oquinnextijtejcoc cochij on inomachtijcahuan , pampa sanoyej cochisnequiyaj . Niman yejhuamej xquimatiyaj tlinon quijlisquej .

text: And he cometh the third time , and saith unto them , Sleep on now , and take your rest : it is enough , the hour is come ; behold , the Son of man is betrayed into the hands of sinners .
text2: Niman ica yexpa ohuajlaj intech , niman oquimijlij : ― ¿ Hasta aman nencochij niman nemosehuitoquej ? Yoyejcoc on hora ijcuac nechtemactilisquej . Xquitacan . Nejhua yejhuan oninochiu Tlacatl nechtemactilisquej ipan inmahuan on tlajtlacolejquej .

text: Rise up , let us go ; lo , he that betrayeth me is at hand .
text2: Xmotelquetzacan . Tiahuij . Ye huajlau on yejhuan nechtemactilis .

text: And immediately , while he yet spake , cometh Judas , one of the twelve , and with him a great multitude with swords and staves , from the chief priests and the scribes and the elders .
text2: Jesús oc tlajtojticatca ijcuac oyejcoc Judas , on yejhuan tehuan nopohua intech on majtlactli huan ome nomachtijcamej . Niman yejhua cuajhuicaya miyec tlacatl yejhuan cuajquiya inespadas , niman sequimej cuajquiyaj cojtin . Yejhuamej huajlayaj ican intlanahuatil on tlayecanquej tiopixquej , niman on temachtijquej ican itlanahuatil Dios niman on tlajtlajmatquej .

text: And he that betrayed him had given them a token , saying , Whomsoever I shall kiss , that same is he ; take him , and lead him away safely .
text2: Niman Judas , on yejhuan quitemactiliaya Jesús , ijquin oquimijlijca on tlacamej : ― On yejhuan nictencuas , yejhua Jesús . Xcajsican , cuajli xsasalocan niman xcuicacan .

text: And as soon as he was come , he goeth straightway to him , and saith , Master , master ; and kissed him .
text2: Quemaj Judas nimantzin oquinisihuij Jesús , niman oquijlij : ― Notemachtijcau . Niman quemaj oquitencuaj .

text: And they laid their hands on him , and took him .
text2: Quemaj oquimayauquej , niman ocajsiquej .

text: And one of them that stood by drew a sword , and smote a servant of the high priest , and cut off his ear .
text2: Pero semej on yejhuan ompa nemiyaj ihuan Jesús oquixicopintiaj iespada niman oquinacastzontec se tlacatl itlaquehual on más hueyi tlayecanqui intech on tiopixquej .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , Are ye come out , as against a thief , with swords and with staves to take me ?
text2: Quemaj Jesús oquimijlij on tlacamej : ― ¿ Onenhuajlajquej nemejhuamej ican espadas niman cojtin para nennechajsicoj quen yacaj nitlachtequetl yesquia ?

text: I was daily with you in the temple teaching , and ye took me not : but the scriptures must be fulfilled .
text2: Nejhua mojmostla nemohuan ninemiya para nemechmachtiaya ne ipan ihueyi tiopan Dios . Nemechmachtiaya niman xqueman onennechajsiquej . Pero onennechajsiquej para ma nochihua quen tlajcuilolnesticaj ipan on Yectlajcuilojli .

text: And they all forsook him , and fled .
text2: Quemaj on inomachtijcahuan ocajtejquej Jesús , niman ochojcholojquej .

text: And there followed him a certain young man , having a linen cloth cast about his naked body ; and the young men laid hold on him :
text2: Niman se telpochtli quitocaya Jesús san huejca . Niman san quitquia se sábana ica notlapachojtiaya . Niman ocajsiquej ,

text: And he left the linen cloth , and fled from them naked .
text2: pero yejhua ocajteu on isábana niman ijqui oyaj tetzotzoltic .

text: And they led Jesus away to the high priest : and with him were assembled all the chief priests and the elders and the scribes .
text2: Quemaj ocuicaquej Jesús ne itech on más hueyi intlayecancau on tiopixquej . Niman ompa onosentlalijquej nochimej on tlayecanquej tiopixquej , niman on tlajtlajmatquej , niman on temachtijquej ican itlanahuatil Dios .

text: And Peter followed him afar off , even into the palace of the high priest : and he sat with the servants , and warmed himself at the fire .
text2: Niman Pedro ocuitlapanhuijtiaj san huejca hasta queman oajsic ne ijtic iquiahuac on cajli yejhuan ical on yejhuan más hueyi intlayecancau on tiopixquej . Niman ompa yehuaticatca inhuan on policías yejhuan tlajpiayaj ipan on hueyi tiopan . Nototonijticatcaj ne itech on tlitl .

text: And the chief priests and all the council sought for witness against Jesus to put him to death ; and found none .
text2: Intlayecancahuan on tiopixquej niman nochimej on tetlacanonotzquej quitejtemohuiliayaj quen ijqui quiteixpanhuisquej Jesús para ijqui huelis quimictisquej , pero xquinextiliayaj .

text: For many bare false witness against him , but their witness agreed not together .
text2: Niman miyec quitlajtolquetztehuiliayaj Jesús , pero xsan se tlajtojli quipiayaj .

text: And there arose certain , and bare false witness against him , saying ,
text2: Sequimej huajnotelquetzquej , niman opeu quiteixpanhuiyaj . Quijtohuayaj on tlen xmelahuac .

text: We heard him say , I will destroy this temple that is made with hands , and within three days I will build another made without hands .
text2: Quijtohuayaj : ― Oticaquilijquej oquijtoj : “ Nejhua nicxoxotonis ihueyi tiopan Dios yejhuan oquichijchijquej on tlacamej . Niman ipan yeyi tonajli ocse nicchijchihuas yejhuan xtlachijchiutli yes ican tlacamej . ”

text: But neither so did their witness agree together .
text2: Pero nochimej xsan se tlajtojli quipiayaj .

text: And the high priest stood up in the midst , and asked Jesus , saying , Answerest thou nothing ? what is it which these witness against thee ?
text2: Quemaj on más hueyixticaj tlayecanquetl intech on tiopixquej ohuajnotelquetz imixpan nochimej , niman oquitlajtoltij Jesús : ― ¿ Xitlaj ica titlananquilis ? ¿ Tlinon in quiteixpantilijtoquej yejhuamej in moca tejhua ?

text: But he held his peace , and answered nothing . Again the high priest asked him , and said unto him , Art thou the Christ , the Son of the Blessed ?
text2: Pero Jesús xonahuat . Xtenanquiliaya . On más hueyixticaj tlayecanquetl intech on tiopixquej ocsejpa oquitlajtoltij , oquijlij : ― ¿ Tejhua tiCristo , tiiConeu on Dios yejhuan quiselia yectenehualistli ?

text: And Jesus said , I am : and ye shall see the Son of man sitting on the right hand of power , and coming in the clouds of heaven .
text2: Quemaj oquijtoj Jesús : ― Quemaj , nejhua . Niman nennechitasquej nejhua yejhuan oninochiu Tlacatl ninotlalis iyecmacopa Dios yejhuan quipia nochi poder . Niman no nennechitasquej nihuajlas ipan on moxtli yejhuan ne ilhuicac quisticaj .

text: Then the high priest rent his clothes , and saith , What need we any further witnesses ?
text2: Ijcuacon on más hueyixticaj tlayecanquetl intech on tiopixquej sanoyej ocualan niman onotlaquencocotontiaj , niman oquijtoj : ― ¿ Tlinon para tiquinnequij más teteixpantilijquej ?

text: Ye have heard the blasphemy : what think ye ? And they all condemned him to be guilty of death .
text2: Yonencaquej quen yocuijhuicaltij Dios . ¿ Quen nenquinemiliaj nemejhuamej ? Quemaj yejhuamej nochimej oquitlajtlacoltijquej para ma quimictican .

text: And some began to spit on him , and to cover his face , and to buffet him , and to say unto him , Prophesy : and the servants did strike him with the palms of their hands .
text2: Quemaj sequimej opejquej quichijchaj , niman oquixtlapachojquej , niman ocuijhuitequej . Niman quijliayaj : ― Xtlajto tiotlajtojquetl . Xtechijli aquinon omitzmailij . Niman quemaj on policías yejhuan tlajpiaj ipan on hueyi tiopan ocuicaquej , niman ocuijhuitequej .

text: And as Peter was beneath in the palace , there cometh one of the maids of the high priest :
text2: Ijcuac Pedro nemiya ne tlatzintlan ne quiahuac , ohuajlaj se sihuatl yejhuan quipalehuiya on más hueyi tlayecanquetl intech on tiopixquej .

text: And when she saw Peter warming himself , she looked upon him , and said , And thou also wast with Jesus of Nazareth .
text2: Niman ijcuac oquitac Pedro ompa nototonijticatca itech on tlitl , opeu quitlajtlata , niman oquijlij : ― Tejhua no tiquistinemiya ihuan Jesús yejhuan hualehua Nazaret .

text: But he denied , saying , I know not , neither understand I what thou sayest . And he went out into the porch ; and the cock crew .
text2: Pero Pedro oquinenec , niman oquijtoj : ― Xniquixmati , nion nicmati tlinon on tiquijtohua . Niman quemaj Pedro oquis ne quiahuac , niman oyaj ne quiahuatenco . Niman quemaj ompa otzajtzic se caxtil .

text: And a maid saw him again , and began to say to them that stood by , This is one of them .
text2: Niman on sihuatl ocsejpa ocontac , niman oquimijlij on yejhuan ompa nemiyaj : ― In tlacatl tehuan nopohua itech Jesús .

text: And he denied it again . And a little after , they that stood by said again to Peter , Surely thou art one of them : for thou art a Galilaean , and thy speech agreeth thereto .
text2: Pero yejhua ocsejpa oquinenec , niman achijtzin más saquin ocsejpa yejhuamej on yejhuan ompa nemiyaj , oquijlijquej Pedro : ― Melahuac , tejhua titehuan pampa tejhua tihualehua ne Galilea , niman ijqui titlajtlajtohua quen yejhuamej .

text: But he began to curse and to swear , saying , I know not this man of whom ye speak .
text2: Pedro opeu quijtohua : ― Ma nimiqui tla xniquijtohua on tlen melahuac . Nejhua xniquixmati on tlacatl aquin nenquijtohuaj .

text: And the second time the cock crew . And Peter called to mind the word that Jesus said unto him , Before the cock crow twice , thou shalt deny me thrice . And when he thought thereon , he wept .
text2: Quemaj nimantzin otzajtziteu on caxtil ica ocpa . Quemaj Pedro oquelnamic on tlen Jesús oquijlijca : “ Achtoj ijcuac xe tzajtzi on caxtil ocpa , tejhua tinechnenequis yexpa . ” Niman ijcuac yejhua oquelnamic on tlajtojli opeu choca .

text: And straightway in the morning the chief priests held a consultation with the elders and scribes and the whole council , and bound Jesus , and carried him away , and delivered him to Pilate .
text2: Ijcuac otlanes , intlayecancahuan on tiopixquej , on tlajtlajmatquej , on temachtijquej ican itlanahuatil Dios niman nochimej on tetlacanonotzquej oquinemilijquej tlinon quichihuilisquej Jesús . Quemaj ijcuac yoquisalojquej , ocuicaquej niman quitemactilitoj ne itech on gobernador itoca Pilato .

text: And Pilate asked him , Art thou the King of the Jews ? And he answering said unto him , Thou sayest it .
text2: Niman Pilato oquitlajtoltij : ― ¿ Tejhua tiinrey on hebreos ? Jesús oquinanquilij : ― Quemaj , ijqui quen tejhua tiquijtohua .

text: And the chief priests accused him of many things : but he answered nothing .
text2: Niman on tlayecanquej tiopixquej quiteixpanhuiayaj ican miyec tlajtlamach .

text: And Pilate asked him again , saying , Answerest thou nothing ? behold how many things they witness against thee .
text2: Quemaj Pilato ocsejpa oquitlajtoltij , oquijlij : ― ¿ Xitlaj ica titlananquilis ? Xquita quech san tlajtlamach ica mitzteixpanhuijtoquej .

text: But Jesus yet answered nothing ; so that Pilate marvelled .
text2: Pero Jesús xitlaj ica oquinanquilij . Yejhua ica Pilato otlamojcaitac , niman xquimatiya tlinon quinemilis .

text: Now at that feast he released unto them one prisoner , whomsoever they desired .
text2: Cada xipan ipan on ilhuitl itoca pascua , Pilato quinmacahuiliani on tlacamej se tlacatl yejhuan tzacuticatca yejhuan yejhuamej quitlajtlaniyaj .

text: And there was one named Barabbas , which lay bound with them that had made insurrection with him , who had committed murder in the insurrection .
text2: Niman nemiya se tlacatl itoca Barrabás , tzacuticatca ihuan ocsequimej yejhuan inhuan onoquetztejca . Yejhuamej otemictijcaj ijcuac onajcomancaj .

text: And the multitude crying aloud began to desire him to do as he had ever done unto them .
text2: Quemaj on tlacamej ohualajquej , niman oquitlajtlanilijquej Pilato para ma quixti se yejhuan tzacuticaj quen quichihuani nochipa ipan on ilhuitl .

text: But Pilate answered them , saying , Will ye that I release unto you the King of the Jews ?
text2: Niman Pilato oquinnanquilij : ― ¿ Nenquinequij para ma nemechmacahuili inRey on hebreos ?

text: For he knew that the chief priests had delivered him for envy .
text2: Pilato ijquin oquijtoj pampa yejhua quimatzticatca ica san ican innexicol on tlayecanquej tiopixquej oquitemactilijquej Jesús .

text: But the chief priests moved the people , that he should rather release Barabbas unto them .
text2: Pero on tlayecanquej tiopixquej oquinchihualtijquej on tlacamej para ma tlajtlanican Barrabás , niman ma ca ma quitlajtlanican Jesús .

text: And Pilate answered and said again unto them , What will ye then that I shall do unto him whom ye call the King of the Jews ?
text2: Quemaj Pilato oquintlajtoltij : ― ¿ Niman , tej , tlinon nicchihuas ihuan on yejhuan nemejhuamej nenquitocayotiaj inRey on hebreos ?

text: And they cried out again , Crucify him .
text2: Quemaj yejhuamej oquijlijquej chicahuac ocsejpa : ― ¡ Xmajmasohualti ipan cojnepanojli !

text: Then Pilate said unto them , Why , what evil hath he done ? And they cried out the more exceedingly , Crucify him .
text2: Pilato oquimijlij : ― ¿ Tlinon , tej , xcuajli oquichiu ? Pero yejhuamej ocsejpa más chicahuac otzajtziquej : ― ¡ Xmajmasohualti ipan cojnepanojli !

text: And so Pilate , willing to content the people , released Barabbas unto them , and delivered Jesus , when he had scourged him , to be crucified .
text2: Pampa Pilato quinequiya cuajli nocahuas inhuan on tlacamej , oquinmacahuilij Barrabás . Quemaj oquinnahuatij on isoldados para ma cuijhuitequican Jesús . Niman quemaj oquitemactilij para ma quimajmasohualtican ipan cojnepanojli .

text: And the soldiers led him away into the hall , called Praetorium ; and they call together the whole band .
text2: Ijcuacon , on soldados ocuicaquej Jesús ne iquiahuac on palacio , niman oquinnotzquej nochimej on ocsequimej soldados .

text: And they clothed him with purple , and platted a crown of thorns , and put it about his head ,
text2: Oquitlaliltijquej se tlaquentli morado , niman oquichijchijquej se huitzcorona , niman oquimaniltijquej ne ipan itzontecon .

text: And began to salute him , Hail , King of the Jews !
text2: Quemaj opeu quitlajpalohuaj , quijliayaj : ― ¡ Cuajli xnemi tejhua Rey intech on hebreos !

text: And they smote him on the head with a reed , and did spit upon him , and bowing their knees worshipped him .
text2: Quemaj ocuahuijhuitequej ican se ojtlatl , oquichijchaquej , niman onotlacuenquetzquej ixpan sa no ijqui quen quimahuistiliasquiaj .

text: And when they had mocked him , they took off the purple from him , and put his own clothes on him , and led him out to crucify him .
text2: Quemaj ijcuac ica yonajahuiltijquej , oquixtilijquej on tlaquentli morado , niman oquitlaliltijquej on itlaquen . Quemaj ocuicaquej para oquimajmasohualtitoj ne ipan cojnepanojli .

text: And they compel one Simon a Cyrenian , who passed by , coming out of the country , the father of Alexander and Rufus , to bear his cross .
text2: Ijcuacon huajpanotiaya se tlacatl itoca Simón yejhuan chanej catca ne Cirene . Yejhua itaj catca Alejandro niman Rufo , niman ohualeu campa otequitito ipan imijla . Yejhua oquinahuatijquej para ma quitqui on icojnepanol Jesús .

text: And they bring him unto the place Golgotha , which is , being interpreted , The place of a skull .
text2: Ocuicaquej Jesús ne campa itoca Gólgota , más cuajli quijtosnequi Micatzontecomatl .

text: And they gave him to drink wine mingled with myrrh : but he received it not .
text2: Niman oquitequihuiltijquej on vino tlanelojli ihuan mirra . Pero Jesús xoquiselij .

text: And when they had crucified him , they parted his garments , casting lots upon them , what every man should take .
text2: Quemaj oquimajmasohualtijquej ne ipan on cojnepanojli , niman yejhuamej onotlatlanquej para quitasquej cada se tlinon quitquis ica yejhua on itlaquen Jesús .

text: And it was the third hour , and they crucified him .
text2: Las nueve catca , ijcuac cualcan , oquimajmasohualtijquej Jesús ne ipan on cojnepanojli .

text: And the superscription of his accusation was written over , THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Niman para nochimej ma quitacan tlica miqui ne ipan on cojnepanojli , ijquin oquijcuilojquej : “ Yejhua in inRey on hebreos . ”

text: And with him they crucify two thieves ; the one on his right hand , and the other on his left .
text2: Niman on omemej tlacamej tlachtequej oquinmajmasohualtijquej ipan cojnepanoltin ihuan Jesús , se iyecmacopa niman ocse iopochmacopa .

text: And the scripture was fulfilled , which saith , And he was numbered with the transgressors .
text2: Onochiu ijcon quen tlajcuilolnesticaj ne ipan on Yectlajcuilojli . Quijtohua : “ Otlapohualquis inhuan on xcuajcualtin . ”

text: And they that passed by railed on him , wagging their heads , and saying , Ah , thou that destroyest the temple , and buildest it in three days ,
text2: Niman yejhuamej on yejhuan ompa quipanahuiayaj , cuijhuicaltiayaj , niman nocuahuihuixohuayaj pampa sa ica nahuiltiayaj . Quijliayaj : ― ¡ Aj ! Tejhua yejhuan ticxoxotonis ihueyitiopan Dios niman ipan yeyi tonajli ocsejpa tlamis ticchijchihuas ,

text: Save thyself , and come down from the cross .
text2: xmomaquixti sa no tejhua , niman xhuajtemo ipan on cojnepanojli .

text: Likewise also the chief priests mocking said among themselves with the scribes , He saved others ; himself he cannot save .
text2: Sa no ijqui intlayecancahuan on tiopixquej niman on temachtijquej ican itlanahuatil Dios sa ica nahuiltiayaj Jesús . Yejhuamej quinojliayaj : ― Ocsequimej oquinmaquixtij , pero sa no yejhua xhueli nomaquixtia .

text: Let Christ the King of Israel descend now from the cross , that we may see and believe . And they that were crucified with him reviled him .
text2: Tla yejhua Cristo yejhuan inRey on hebreos , ma huajtemo ne ipan on cojnepanojli para tiquitasquej niman ticneltocasquej ica melahuac yejhua inRey on hebreos . Niman on yejhuan ompa pilcayaj ipan on cojnepanoltin no cuijhuicaltiayaj Jesús .

text: And when the sixth hour was come , there was darkness over the whole land until the ninth hour .
text2: Ijcuac oajsic tlacualispan , otlayohuatiac nochihuiyan , niman tlajyohuatoc catca hasta ijqui oajsic ipan yeyi hora ica tiotlac .

text: And at the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice , saying , Eloi , Eloi , lama sabachthani ? which is , being interpreted , My God , my God , why hast thou forsaken me ?
text2: Niman ipan on hora , Jesús chicahuac otzajtzic : ― Eloi , Eloi , ¿ lama sabactani ? ― yejhuan quijtosnequi : NoDios , noDios , ¿ tlica tinechtlalcahuia ?

text: And some of them that stood by , when they heard it , said , Behold , he calleth Elias .
text2: Sequimej , yejhuan ompa nemiyaj , ocacquej , niman oquijtojquej : ― Xcaquican . Quinotzticaj on tiotlajtojquetl Elías .

text: And one ran and filled a spunge full of vinegar , and put it on a reed , and gave him to drink , saying , Let alone ; let us see whether Elias will come to take him down .
text2: Nimantzin se tlacatl onotlalojtiquis . Yejhua oquictic se tojtontli momoxtic , niman oquipatzo ican xococ vino . Quemaj ocontlalij ipan sen acatl ica oconitij Jesús . Quemaj oquijtoj : ― Xcahuacan , ma tiquitacan tla huajlau Elías cuajtemohuis .

text: And Jesus cried with a loud voice , and gave up the ghost .
text2: Quemaj Jesús chicahuac otzajtzic , niman quemaj ohuajnotlamilij .

text: And the veil of the temple was rent in twain from the top to the bottom .
text2: Ijcuacon , on tlatzacuililtlaquentli yejhuan pilcaya ne ijtic on hueyi tiopan ohuajtlajcocoton tlacpac hasta tlatzintlan .

text: And when the centurion , which stood over against him , saw that he so cried out , and gave up the ghost , he said , Truly this man was the Son of God .
text2: Ijcuac on capitán romano yejhuan ijcaya ixpan Jesús oquitac quen ijqui otzajtzic , niman quen ijqui omic , oquijtoj : ― Yejhua in tlacatl melahuac iConetzin catca Dios .

text: There were also women looking on afar off : among whom was Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James the less and of Joses , and Salome ;
text2: No san huejcatzin sequimej sihuamej conitzticatcaj Jesús . Ompa nemiya María on yejhuan hualehua Magdala , Salomé , niman María on yejhuan inan Jacobo on yejhuan más teyic , niman José .

text: ( Who also , when he was in Galilee , followed him , and ministered unto him ; ) and many other women which came up with him unto Jerusalem .
text2: In sihuamej oyajquej ihuan Jesús , niman oquipalehuijquej ijcuac quistinemiya neca Galilea . No nemiyaj ompa ocsequimej sihuamej yejhuan ohualajquej ne Jerusalén ihuan Jesús .

text: And now when the even was come , because it was the preparation , that is , the day before the sabbath ,
text2: Ipan on tonajli viernes on hebreos cuectlaliayaj nochi tlajtlamach para xtequitiyaj ipan on tonajli sábado . Ipan in tonajli viernes , ijcuac ye tlayohuatitiaya ,

text: Joseph of Arimathaea , and honourable counseller , which also waited for the kingdom of God , came , and went in boldly unto Pilate , and craved the body of Jesus .
text2: ohuajlaj se tlacatl , itoca José , yejhuan hualehua ne ipan on pueblo itoca Arimatea . Yejhua tehuan catca intech on tetlacanonotzquej ne ipan on hueyi tiopan , niman nochimej quitlacaitayaj . Yejhua no quichaya quemanon pehuas tlamandaros Dios . Yejhua onoyolchicau , niman oyaj itech Pilato para oquitlajtlanilij itlalnacayo Jesús .

text: And Pilate marvelled if he were already dead : and calling unto him the centurion , he asked him whether he had been any while dead .
text2: Pilato omojcatlachix ica yomic Jesús . Yejhua ica oquititlan se tlacatl para ma cuajhuica on capitán . Ijcuac on capitán ohuajlaj , Pilato oquitlajtoltij tla melahuac yomic Jesús .

text: And when he knew it of the centurion , he gave the body to Joseph .
text2: Quemaj ijcuac on capitán oquimachiltij ica melahuac yomic , Pilato ocahuilij José para ma quitemolti on itlalnacayotzin Jesús .

text: And he bought fine linen , and took him down , and wrapped him in the linen , and laid him in a sepulchre which was hewn out of a rock , and rolled a stone unto the door of the sepulchre .
text2: Quemaj José ocou se tlaquentli istac sanoyej patioj . Niman ijcuac oquitemohuij on itlalnacayo Jesús , oquitejcuix ican on tlaquentli istac . Quemaj oquitocato ne ijtic se ostotl yejhuan oquichcuajquej ipan tetl . Niman ne itenco ocuejcueptiajquej se tetl sanoyej hueyi , niman ica oquitentzacu .

text: And Mary Magdalene and Mary the mother of Joses beheld where he was laid .
text2: María on yejhuan hualehua ne Magdala , niman María yejhuan inan José oquitatoj canon ocahuatoj itlalnacayotzin Jesús .

text: And when the sabbath was past , Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James , and Salome , had bought sweet spices , that they might come and anoint him .
text2: Ijcuac yopanoc on sábado , María on yejhuan hualehua ne Magdala , María inan Jacobo , niman Salomé ocojquej on ajhuiyalistli para conajhuiyalisquiaj on itlalnacayotzin Jesús .

text: And very early in the morning the first day of the week , they came unto the sepulchre at the rising of the sun .
text2: Huelipan cualcan , ipan on achtoj tonajli ipeuyan on semana , oyajquej ne itech on tlalcontli campa José oquitocato itlalnacayotzin Jesús . Ye huajquistiaya on tonaltzintli .

text: And they said among themselves , Who shall roll us away the stone from the door of the sepulchre ?
text2: Niman ijcuac xe ajsiaj , quinojliayaj yejhuamej : ― ¿ Aquinon techejcuanilis on tetl ne itenco on tlalcontli ?

text: And when they looked , they saw that the stone was rolled away : for it was very great .
text2: Pero ijcuac ontlachixquej , oquitaquej ica on tetl yejhuan sanoyej hueyi ye cueptoc .

text: And entering into the sepulchre , they saw a young man sitting on the right side , clothed in a long white garment ; and they were affrighted .
text2: Quemaj ijcuac ocalaquitoj ne ijtic on ostotl yejhuan tlalcontli , oquitaquej ipan yecmatli se telpochtli . Ompa yehuaticaj niman tejcuixticaj ican se hueyac tlaquentli istac . Niman yejhuamej sanoyej onomotiquej .

text: And he saith unto them , Be not affrighted : Ye seek Jesus of Nazareth , which was crucified : he is risen ; he is not here : behold the place where they laid him .
text2: Pero yejhua oquimijlij : ― Ma ca xmomojtican . Nenquitejtemohuaj Jesús on yejhuan hualehua Nazaret niman oquimajmasohualtiquej ne ipan on cojnepanojli . Pero aman yoyoliu niman yonoquetzteu . Yejhua xnican nemi . Xquitacan nican campa oquitlalijcaj itlalnacayotzin .

text: But go your way , tell his disciples and Peter that he goeth before you into Galilee : there shall ye see him , as he said unto you .
text2: Aman xhuiyan , niman xquijlican inomachtijcahuan niman Pedro ica inyecapan yas ne Galilea , niman ompa nemejhuamej nenquitasquej ijcon quen omechijlij .

text: And they went out quickly , and fled from the sepulchre ; for they trembled and were amazed : neither said they any thing to any man ; for they were afraid .
text2: Quemaj nimantzin on sihuamej oquitlalcahuijquej on tlalcontli niman sa mojcacuecuetlacatiayaj . Xacaj oquijlijquej quen ijqui oquitaquej , pampa sanoyej nomojtiayaj .

text: Now when Jesus was risen early the first day of the week , he appeared first to Mary Magdalene , out of whom he had cast seven devils .
text2: Niman ipeuyan on semana ijcuac Jesús oyoliu niman onoquetzteu ipan itlalcon , Jesús oquinotitij achtoj María on yejhuan hualehua ne Magdala , on yejhuan oquixtilijca chicomemej xcuajcualtin espíritus .

text: And she went and told them that had been with him , as they mourned and wept .
text2: Niman yejhua oyaj , oquinmachiltito on inomachtijcahuan Jesús , yejhuan sanoyej najmanayaj , niman chocayaj .

text: And they , when they had heard that he was alive , and had been seen of her , believed not .
text2: Pero ijcuac ocacquej ica Jesús yoyoliu niman yonoquetzteu ipan itlalcon , niman ica María oquitac , yejhuamej xoquineltocaquej .

text: After that he appeared in another form unto two of them , as they walked , and went into the country .
text2: Más saquin , ocse tlamantic oquinnotitij omemej nomachtijquej chica yejhuamej yayaj ipan ojtli .

text: And they went and told it unto the residue : neither believed they them .
text2: Yejhuamej onocuepquej ne campa nemiyaj on ocsequimej , pero no xoquinneltoquilijquej .

text: Afterward he appeared unto the eleven as they sat at meat , and upbraided them with their unbelief and hardness of heart , because they believed not them which had seen him after he was risen .
text2: Más saquin Jesús oquinnotitij on majtlactli huan se inomachtijcahuan chica tlacuajticatcaj . Ijcuacon oquimajhuac pampa xtlaneltocayaj niman ipampa inyoltechicahualis . Yejhuamej xoquinneltocaquej on yejhuan oquitaquej achtoj ica oyoliu niman onoquetzteu ipan itlalcon .

text: And he said unto them , Go ye into all the world , and preach the gospel to every creature .
text2: Quemaj oquimijlij : ― Xhuiyan nochihuiyan imanyan in tlalticpactli , niman xquijlican nochi tlacatl on cuajli tlajtojli yejhuan quitemaca temaquixtilistli .

text: He that believeth and is baptized shall be saved ; but he that believeth not shall be damned .
text2: On yejhuan quineltocas on cuajli tlajtojli yejhuan quitemaca temaquixtilistli niman nocuatequis nomaquixtis . Pero on yejhuan xquineltocas quitlajtlacolmacasquej .

text: And these signs shall follow them that believe ; In my name shall they cast out devils ; they shall speak with new tongues ;
text2: Niman in tlamajhuisoltin quichihuasquej on aquin tlaneltocasquej . Quinquixtisquej on xcuajcualtin espíritus ica notoca . Tlajtosquej ican ocsequi yencuic tlajtojli .

text: They shall take up serpents ; and if they drink any deadly thing , it shall not hurt them ; they shall lay hands on the sick , and they shall recover .
text2: Tla quinquitzquisquej cohuamej , noso tla conisquej on veneno , xquinchihuilis daño . Quintlalisquej inmahuan impan on cocoxquej niman quimpajtisquej .

text: So then after the Lord had spoken unto them , he was received up into heaven , and sat on the right hand of God .
text2: Niman quemaj ijcuac Jesús yoquinnojnotz , Dios ocuicac ne ilhuicac campa onotlalij ipan iyecmatzin .

text: And they went forth , and preached everywhere , the Lord working with them , and confirming the word with signs following . Amen .
text2: On nomachtijquej opejquej tenojnotzaj niman temachtijtiyaj nochihuiyan . Niman toTeco quimpalehuiyaya , niman itechcopa on milagros yejhuan onochiu ijcuac temachtijtiayaj , quintitiaya on tlacamej ica intemachtil yejhua tlen melahuac .

text: Forasmuch as many have taken in hand to set forth in order a declaration of those things which are most surely believed among us ,
text2: Miyequej tlacamej oquijcuilojquej quen ijqui onochiu on tlajtlamach opanoc totzajlan .

text: Even as they delivered them unto us , which from the beginning were eyewitnesses , and ministers of the word ;
text2: Nochi oquijcuijloquej ijqui quen otechmachiltijquej on yejhuan oquiteixpantilijquej nochi on tlajtlamach tlen onochiu desde itzimpeuyan niman oquiteijlijquej itlajtol Dios .

text: It seemed good to me also , having had perfect understanding of all things from the very first , to write unto thee in order , most excellent Theophilus ,
text2: Nejhua no cuajli oninomachtij nochi yejhua on tlajtlamach yejhuan onochiu desde ne itzimpeuyan . Yejhua ica , tejhua hueyixticaj Teófilo , nicuitia cuajli para nimitztlajcuilhuis niman nimitzmelajcailis ipan iyojhui on quen ijqui onochiu on tlajtlamach .

text: That thou mightest know the certainty of those things , wherein thou hast been instructed .
text2: Ijcon , tej , cuajli ticmatis nochi on tlen melahuac itechica on tlajtlamach yejhuan omitzmachtijquej .

text: There was in the days of Herod , the king of Judaea , a certain priest named Zacharias , of the course of Abia : and his wife was of the daughters of Aaron , and her name was Elisabeth .
text2: Nochi on tlajtlamach opeu ijcuac rey Herodes tequihua catca ipan iregión Judea . Ipan on tonaltin nemiya se tiopixqui itoca catca Zacarías , yejhuan tehuan nopohuaya ipan igrupo on tiopixquej Abías . Isihuau Zacarías itoca catca Elisabet . Yejhua on huejca teixhuiu catca itech on tiopixqui itoca Aarón .

text: And they were both righteous before God , walking in all the commandments and ordinances of the Lord blameless .
text2: On omemej yolchipajquej catcaj ixpan Dios niman quitlacamatiyaj nochi on itlanahuatilhuan niman on tlen oquijtoj toTeco , niman ijcon , tej , xacaj hueliya itlaj ica quintlajtlacolmacaya .

text: And they had no child , because that Elisabeth was barren , and they both were now well stricken in years .
text2: Pero xquipiayaj inconehuan , pampa Elisabet tetzacatl catca , niman sanoyej ye huehuentzitzintin catcaj .

text: And it came to pass , that while he executed the priest ' s office before God in the order of his course ,
text2: Ijcuac oyejcoc on tonaltin para tequitis on grupo campa Zacarías nopohuaya , yejhua otequit ixpan Dios pampa yejhua tiopixqui catca .

text: According to the custom of the priest ' s office , his lot was to burn incense when he went into the temple of the Lord .
text2: Oquipixquej se costumbre intzajlan on tiopixquej ica quitlapejpeniayaj se tiopixqui san ican suerte para calaquiya niman quitlatiaya on xochicopajli ipan ihueyi tiopan toTeco .

text: And the whole multitude of the people were praying without at the time of incense .
text2: Chica quitlatiaya on xochicopajli , nochi on tlacamej quichijticatcaj oración ne quiahuac ixpan on hueyi tiopan .

text: And there appeared unto him an angel of the Lord standing on the right side of the altar of incense .
text2: Quemaj se ilhuicactequitquetl , yejhuan toTeco ocuajtitlan , ohuajnonextij nisiu itech Zacarías . On ilhuicactequitquetl ijcaticatca iyecmacopa on tlaixpan campa notlatiani on xochicopajli .

text: And when Zacharias saw him , he was troubled , and fear fell upon him .
text2: Ijcuac Zacarías oquitac on ilhuicactequitquetl , xoc quimatiya quen quichihuas niman sanoyej onomojtij .

text: But the angel said unto him , Fear not , Zacharias : for thy prayer is heard ; and thy wife Elisabeth shall bear thee a son , and thou shalt call his name John .
text2: Pero on ilhuicactequitquetl oquijlij : ― Ma ca xmomojti , Zacarías . Dios yocac mooraciones , niman mosihuau Elisabet quitlacatilis ioquichconeu . Tictocayotis Juan .

text: And thou shalt have joy and gladness ; and many shall rejoice at his birth .
text2: Sanoyej tipaquis niman no miyequej paquisquej ipampa itlacatilis moconeu .

text: For he shall be great in the sight of the Lord , and shall drink neither wine nor strong drink ; and he shall be filled with the Holy Ghost , even from his mother ' s womb .
text2: Ijquin nochihuas , pampa yejhua hueyixtias ixpan Dios . Yejhua xconis vino nion itlaj se yejhuan tetlahuantij , niman on Espíritu Santo nochi ica quiyecanas desde ijcuac tlacatis .

text: And many of the children of Israel shall he turn to the Lord their God .
text2: Yejhua quichihuas para miyequej tlacamej yejhuan teconehuan itech Israel ma nocuepacan niman ma quitlacamatican toTeco yejhuan inDios .

text: And he shall go before him in the spirit and power of Elias , to turn the hearts of the fathers to the children , and the disobedient to the wisdom of the just ; to make ready a people prepared for the Lord .
text2: Yejhua in Juan yas iyecapan toTeco ican on iyolchicahualis niman on poder yejhuan oquipix on tiotlajtojquetl Elías . Yas iyecapan toTeco , niman quichihuas para on tatajtin ma quintlajsojtlacan inconehuan , niman no quichihuas para on yejhuan xquitlacamatij Dios ma quipiacan on tlamatquilistli , ijcon quen on yejhuan cuajcualtin tlacamej quipiaj . Ijcon quinmelajcatlalis on tlacamej para huelisquej quiselisquej on toTeco .

text: And Zacharias said unto the angel , Whereby shall I know this ? for I am an old man , and my wife well stricken in years .
text2: Pero Zacarías oquitlajtoltij on ilhuicactequitquetl : ― ¿ Quen ijqui nicmatis ica on tlen otiquijtoj melahuac ? pampa nejhua sanoyej ye nihuehuentzin niman nosihuau no ye lamajtzin .

text: And the angel answering said unto him , I am Gabriel , that stand in the presence of God ; and am sent to speak unto thee , and to shew thee these glad tidings .
text2: Niman on ilhuicactequitquetl oquinanquilij : ― Nejhua niGabriel , niman niitequitcau Dios . Dios , tej , onechajtitlan ma nimitznotzaqui para nimitzijlis in cuajli tlajtojli .

text: And , behold , thou shalt be dumb , and not able to speak , until the day that these things shall be performed , because thou believest not my words , which shall be fulfilled in their season .
text2: Pero xoticneltocac tlinon onimitzijlij . Yejhua ica tinontias . Xhuelis titlajtos hasta ijcuac tlacatis moconeu .

text: And the people waited for Zacharias , and marvelled that he tarried so long in the temple .
text2: On tlacamej yejhuan quichixticatcaj Zacarías ne quiahuac xoquimatquej tlinon quinemilisquej , pampa yejhua yohuejcajca ica xhuajquisaya ne ijtic on hueyi tiopan .

text: And when he came out , he could not speak unto them : and they perceived that he had seen a vision in the temple : for he beckoned unto them , and remained speechless .
text2: Niman ijcuac Zacarías ohuajquis , xhueliya quinnojnotzaya . Yejhua ica on tlacamej ocajsicamatquej ica yejhua oquitac itlaj tetlatlachaltilistli yejhuan quen itemicpan ne ijtic on hueyi tiopan . Niman yejhua , tej , sa quinmanotzaya , pampa xoc hueliya tlajtohuaya .

text: And it came to pass , that , as soon as the days of his ministration were accomplished , he departed to his own house .
text2: Ijcuac otlanquej on tonaltin ica Zacarías tequiti ne ipan on hueyi tiopan , oquis niman oyaj ichan .

text: And after those days his wife Elisabeth conceived , and hid herself five months , saying ,
text2: Más saquin , Elisabet on isihuau ones ica ye quipia iconeu , niman macuijli metztli oniyan ne ichan . Ijquin quinemiliaya :

text: Thus hath the Lord dealt with me in the days wherein he looked on me , to take away my reproach among men .
text2: “ Aman toTeco ijquin onechchihuilij ican iteicnelilis para xoc nipinahuas imixpan on tlacamej . ”

text: And in the sixth month the angel Gabriel was sent from God unto a city of Galilee , named Nazareth ,
text2: Ijcuac Elisabet ye quipiaya iconeu chicuasen metztli , Dios ocuajtitlan on ilhuicactequitquetl Gabriel ipan se pueblo de Galilea itoca Nazaret .

text: To a virgin espoused to a man whose name was Joseph , of the house of David ; and the virgin ' s name was Mary .
text2: Dios oquititlan para conotzas se ichpochtli , yejhuan xe yacaj tlacatl quinixmachtiaya , itoca María . María yoquitlalijca compromiso para nonamictis ihuan se tlacatl itoca José yejhuan sa huejca teixhuiu itech David .

text: And the angel came in unto her , and said , Hail , thou that art highly favoured , the Lord is with thee : blessed art thou among women .
text2: On ilhuicactequitquetl oquinisihuij María niman oquijlij : ― Nimitztlajpalohua . ¡ Dios yomitztiochiu ! On toTeco mohuan nemi . Dios más omitztiochiu xquen nochimej on ocsequimej sihuamej .

text: And when she saw him , she was troubled at his saying , and cast in her mind what manner of salutation this should be .
text2: Pero ijcuac María ocac on ilhuicactequitquetl , oquimojcacac itlajtol , niman sa no yejhua quinotlajtoltiaya tlica ijquin quitlajpalohuaya .

text: And the angel said unto her , Fear not , Mary : for thou hast found favour with God .
text2: Pero on ilhuicactequitquetl oquijlij : ― Ma ca xmomojti María , pampa Dios yomitztiochiu .

text: And , behold , thou shalt conceive in thy womb , and bring forth a son , and shalt call his name JESUS .
text2: Aman ticanas moconetzin niman tictlacatilis se oquichconetl . Niman tictocayotis Jesús .

text: He shall be great , and shall be called the Son of the Highest : and the Lord God shall give unto him the throne of his father David :
text2: Yejhua hueyixtias niman itoca yes teConeu itech on yejhuan más hueyixticaj Dios . Niman Dios toTeco quitlalis para Rey yes niman quipias on tequihuajyotl yejhuan ihuejcataj David oquipix .

text: And he shall reign over the house of Jacob for ever ; and of his kingdom there shall be no end .
text2: Yejhua nochipa tequihuaj yes ipan on país de Israel , niman on ica tequihuaj yes xsan ontlamis .

text: Then said Mary unto the angel , How shall this be , seeing I know not a man ?
text2: Quemaj María oquitlajtoltij on ilhuicactequitquetl : ― ¿ Quen ijqui huelis nochihuas yejhua in , pampa nejhua xe yacaj tlacatl ihuan ninemi ?

text: And the angel answered and said unto her , The Holy Ghost shall come upon thee , and the power of the Highest shall overshadow thee : therefore also that holy thing which shall be born of thee shall be called the Son of God .
text2: Niman on ilhuicactequitquetl oquijlij : ― On Espíritu Santo mopan huajlas , niman ipoder on yejhuan más hueyixticaj Dios quichihuas se milagro tejhua mopan . Yejhua ica on conetzintli yejhuan tlacatis chipajtias niman cuitisquej iConetzin Dios .

text: And , behold , thy cousin Elisabeth , she hath also conceived a son in her old age : and this is the sixth month with her , who was called barren .
text2: Xquelnamiqui moprima Elisabet yejhuan quijtohuiliaj tetzacatl . Aman ye quipia chicuasen metztli ica conehua masqui yejhua lamajtzin .

text: For with God nothing shall be impossible .
text2: In ijquin nochihuas pampa xitlaj oncaj yejhuan Dios xhuelis quichihuas .

text: And Mary said , Behold the handmaid of the Lord ; be it unto me according to thy word . And the angel departed from her .
text2: Niman ijcuacon María oquijtoj : ― Nejhua niitequichihuilijcau toTeco . Ma Dios , tej , nechchihuili on tlen otinechijlij . Quemaj on ilhuicactequitquetl oyaj .

text: And Mary arose in those days , and went into the hill country with haste , into a city of Juda ;
text2: Ipan on tonaltin María ocajsic iojhui . Nimantzin oyaj ipan on tepemej hasta oajsic ipan se pueblito yejhuan oncatca ne Judea .

text: And entered into the house of Zacharias , and saluted Elisabeth .
text2: Ijcuac oajsic ipan on pueblo , ocalac ichan Zacarías niman oquitlajpaloj Elisabet .

text: And it came to pass , that , when Elisabeth heard the salutation of Mary , the babe leaped in her womb ; and Elisabeth was filled with the Holy Ghost :
text2: Niman ijcuac Elisabet ocac itetlajpalol María , on iconetzin Elisabet onolinij ijtic , niman on Espíritu Santo nochi ica oquiyecan Elisabet .

text: And she spake out with a loud voice , and said , Blessed art thou among women , and blessed is the fruit of thy womb .
text2: Quemaj Elisabet oquijtoj chicahuac , niman oquijlij María : ― Dios más omitztiochiu xquen nochimej on sihuamej , niman no yoquitiochiu on conetzintli yejhuan tictlacatilis .

text: And whence is this to me , that the mother of my Lord should come to me ?
text2: ¿ Aquin nejhua , tej , ica tejhua yejhuan inan noTeco otihuajlaj para otinechnotzaco ?

text: For , lo , as soon as the voice of thy salutation sounded in mine ears , the babe leaped in my womb for joy .
text2: Nimantzin ijcuac otinechtlajpaloj , noconetzin onolinij ican pactli nican nojtic .

text: And blessed is she that believed : for there shall be a performance of those things which were told her from the Lord .
text2: Dios mitztiochihua para tejhua yejhuan oticneltocac ica nochihuas on tlen toTeco oquijtoj .

text: And Mary said , My soul doth magnify the Lord ,
text2: Quemaj María oquijtoj : Noalma cueyilia toTeco ,

text: And my spirit hath rejoiced in God my Saviour .
text2: niman noyojlo nopactia itech Dios yejhuan noTemaquixtijcau ,

text: For he hath regarded the low estate of his handmaiden : for , behold , from henceforth all generations shall call me blessed .
text2: pampa yejhua onechelnamic nejhua yejhuan xnihueyixticaj itequichihuilijcau . Niman desde aman nochimej nechtocayotisquej nitlatiochicasihuatl .

text: For he that is mighty hath done to me great things ; and holy is his name .
text2: Ijcon nochihuas pampa on huejhueyi tlajtlamach yejhuan tohueyi Dios onechchihuilij . Yejhua yolchipahuac .

text: And his mercy is on them that fear him from generation to generation .
text2: Nochipa quipialis teicnelilistli nochimej yejhuan quitlacaitasquej .

text: He hath shewed strength with his arm ; he hath scattered the proud in the imagination of their hearts .
text2: Yejhua oquiteititij ipoder ican on tlen oquichiu . On yejhuan nohueyimatij niman san tlamach xcuajli quinejnemiliaj , Dios xquincahuilia ma quichihuacan tlen quinequij .

text: He hath put down the mighty from their seats , and exalted them of low degree .
text2: On tequihuajquej oquinquixtij ne campa tequihuajtiticatcaj niman oquinmamacac hueyilistli on yejhuan yolyemanquej .

text: He hath filled the hungry with good things ; and the rich he hath sent empty away .
text2: Yejhuan apismiquiyaj oquinmacac nochi tlen cuajli niman xitlaj oquinmacac on yejhuan ricos .

text: He hath holpen his servant Israel , in remembrance of his mercy ;
text2: Oquipalehuij on país itoca Israel yejhuan itequipanojcau . Yejhua xoquelcau quipialis teicnelilistli on país ,

text: As he spake to our fathers , to Abraham , and to his seed for ever .
text2: ijcon quen oquintlalilij ipan ipromesa on toachtojtajhuan , Abraham niman nochi quech teconehuan para nochipa .

text: And Mary abode with her about three months , and returned to her own house .
text2: María onocau ihuan Elisabet canaj yeyi metztli , niman quemaj onocuep para ichan .

text: Now Elisabeth ' s full time came that she should be delivered ; and she brought forth a son .
text2: Oajsic on tonajli para Elisabet quitlacatilis iconetzin , niman oquitlacatilij se oquichconetl .

text: And her neighbours and her cousins heard how the Lord had shewed great mercy upon her ; and they rejoiced with her .
text2: Quemaj inisiuchantlacaj niman ichanecahuan , ijcuac ocacquej quen toTeco sanoyej cuajli oquitiochiu , paquiyaj ihuan .

text: And it came to pass , that on the eighth day they came to circumcise the child ; and they called him Zacharias , after the name of his father .
text2: Quemaj ipan chicueyi tonajli oyajquej para oquitlalilitoj se nescayotl itoca circuncisión ipan inacayo . Niman quinequiyaj quitocayotisquej Zacarías quen itaj ,

text: And his mother answered and said , Not so ; but he shall be called John .
text2: pero inan oquijtoj : ― Ca . Itoca yes Juan .

text: And they said unto her , There is none of thy kindred that is called by this name .
text2: Niman oquijlijquej : ― ¿ Tlica ijcon itoca yes ? Ipan mochanecahuan xacaj nemi yejhuan ijcon itoca .

text: And they made signs to his father , how he would have him called .
text2: Quemaj oquimanotzquej itaj on conetzintli para quimatisquej quen ijqui yejhua quinequi quitocayotis .

text: And he asked for a writing table , and wrote , saying , His name is John . And they marvelled all .
text2: Niman itaj oquitlajtlan se amatl para ompa quijcuilos quen itoca yes on iconeu . Niman ijquin oquijcuiloj : “ Itoca Juan . ” Niman nochimej omojcatlachixquej yejhua ica in .

text: And his mouth was opened immediately , and his tongue loosed , and he spake , and praised God .
text2: Nimantzin Zacarías ohuel otlajtoj ocsejpa , niman opeu quiyectenehua Dios .

text: And fear came on all that dwelt round about them : and all these sayings were noised abroad throughout all the hill country of Judaea .
text2: Yejhua ica in , nochimej on ichantlacaj otlamojcaitaquej . Niman nochihuiyan ipan on tepemej yejhuan oncaj ipan on iregión Judea noteijliaya on tlen onochiu .

text: And all they that heard them laid them up in their hearts , saying , What manner of child shall this be ! And the hand of the Lord was with him .
text2: Niman nochimej on yejhuan intech on machiyaya yejhua on , pehuayaj tlanemiliayaj niman ijquin quinotlajtoltiayaj : ― ¿ Manin tlinon itequiu yes in oquichconetl ? Melahuac ipoder toTeco ipan oncaj .

text: And his father Zacharias was filled with the Holy Ghost , and prophesied , saying ,
text2: On Espíritu Santo nochi ica oquiyecan Zacarías itaj on oquichconetl niman ica on yectlajtojli yejhuan Dios oquimacac , oquijtoj :

text: Blessed be the Lord God of Israel ; for he hath visited and redeemed his people ,
text2: Ma ticueyilican toTeco Dios , on yejhuan inDios on hebreos pampa yotechnotz niman yotechmaquixtij .

text: And hath raised up an horn of salvation for us in the house of his servant David ;
text2: Yotechmacac se hueyi Temaquixtijquetl yejhuan huejca teixhuiu itech David yejhuan itequipanojcau .

text: As he spake by the mouth of his holy prophets , which have been since the world began :
text2: Ye huejcahui ijquin oquijtoj intechcopa on iyectiotlajtojcahuan

text: That we should be saved from our enemies , and from the hand of all that hate us ;
text2: ica yejhua techmaquixtis intech on totlahuelicnihuan niman itech inpoder nochimej on yejhuan techtlahuelitaj .

text: To perform the mercy promised to our fathers , and to remember his holy covenant ;
text2: Ijcon oquichiu para techmacas on teicnelilistli yejhuan oquimprometerohuijlij toachtojtajhuan , niman xquelcahua ichipahuac pacto .

text: The oath which he sware to our father Abraham ,
text2: In yejhua on promesa yejhuan Dios oquiprometerohuilij itech on toachtojtaj Abraham

text: That he would grant unto us , that we being delivered out of the hand of our enemies might serve him without fear ,
text2: ica techmanahuis intech on totlahuelicnihuan , para xican nemojtijli tictequipanosquej

text: In holiness and righteousness before him , all the days of our life .
text2: ican chipahualistli niman quen cuajli para ticchihuasquej nochi tonaltin ipan tonemilis .

text: And thou , child , shalt be called the prophet of the Highest : for thou shalt go before the face of the Lord to prepare his ways ;
text2: Niman tejhua , noconetzin Juan , mitztocayotisquej itiotlajtojcau on más hueyixticaj Dios , pampa tejhua tias iyecapan on toTeco para ticuectlalijtias iojhuihuan .

text: To give knowledge of salvation unto his people by the remission of their sins ,
text2: Tictemachiltis ica quiselisquej temaquixtilistli ijcuac Dios quintlapojpolhuilis intlajtlacolhuan .

text: Through the tender mercy of our God ; whereby the dayspring from on high hath visited us ,
text2: ToDios quintlapojpolhuiya pampa sanoyej quimicnelia . Ican iteicnelilis quinhuajtitlanilis on Temaquixtijquetl yejhuan hualehua ne ilhuicac .

text: To give light to them that sit in darkness and in the shadow of death , to guide our feet into the way of peace .
text2: Niman on Temaquixtijquetl quinmaquixtis yejhuan tlajtlacohuaj niman yejhuan nemij ipan miquilistli . Yejhuamej no quinmacas yolsehuilistli .

text: And the child grew , and waxed strong in spirit , and was in the deserts till the day of his shewing unto Israel .
text2: Niman on oquichconetl noscaltiaya niman chicajtiaya itech Dios . Niman yejhua ochantic ne campa tlapatlaco hasta ipan on tonajli ijcuac yejhua onoteititij itech on tlacamej yejhuan chantij ipan on país de Israel .

text: And it came to pass in those days , that there went out a decree from Caesar Augustus , that all the world should be taxed .
text2: Ipan on tonaltin , Augusto yejhuan más hueyi tlayecanquetl catca ipan on hueyi país Roma , otlanahuatij para nochi on ichantlacaj ipan on país ma quitemacatij intoca ne ipan on censo .

text: ( And this taxing was first made when Cyrenius was governor of Syria . )
text2: Yejhua in achtoj censo oquichichiquej ijcuac Cirenio tequihuaj catca ipan on iregión Siria .

text: And all went to be taxed , every one into his own city .
text2: Ipan on tonaltin nochi tlacatl yaya cada se ipan ipueblo campa nemiya san secan ichanecahuan para ompa onijcuiloto ipan on censo .

text: And Joseph also went up from Galilee , out of the city of Nazareth , into Judaea , unto the city of David , which is called Bethlehem ; ( because he was of the house and lineage of David : )
text2: José huejca teixhuiu catca itech David . Yejhua ica oquis ipan on pueblo itoca Nazaret , yejhuan oncaj ipan on iregión Galilea , niman oyaj ne ipan on pueblo itoca Belén , yejhuan oncaj ipan on iregión Judea campa otlacatca David .

text: To be taxed with Mary his espoused wife , being great with child .
text2: Yejhua oyaj ne Belén para onijcuiloto ipan on censo ihuan María yejhuan quipiaya compromiso para ihuan nonamictis . María , tej , ye quipiaya iconeu .

text: And so it was , that , while they were there , the days were accomplished that she should be delivered .
text2: Niman chica nemiyaj ne Belén , oyejcoc on tonajli para María quitlacatilis iconetzin .

text: And she brought forth her firstborn son , and wrapped him in swaddling clothes , and laid him in a manger ; because there was no room for them in the inn .
text2: Ompa oquitlacatilij on iachtoj conetzin yejhuan oquichconetl catca . Oquitlatlapachoj ican tlaquentli niman oquitecac ipan se canoa , pampa xoncatca ompa campa yejhuamej nosehuisquej ijtic on mesón campa nosehuiaj on nejnenquej .

text: And there were in the same country shepherds abiding in the field , keeping watch over their flock by night .
text2: Nisiu ne Belén nemiyaj sequimej tlajpixquej yejhuan nochi tlayohua nocahuayaj ne ipan on tepetl campa quintlajpiayaj inborreguitos .

text: And , lo , the angel of the Lord came upon them , and the glory of the Lord shone round about them : and they were sore afraid .
text2: Sen ilhuicactequitquetl yejhuan toTeco Dios ocuajtitlan oquinhuajnotitij . Niman ihueyilis toTeco Dios quen se tlahuijli opetlan inyehualican on tlajpixquej . Ijcuacon , yejhuamej sanoyej onomojtijquej .

text: And the angel said unto them , Fear not : for , behold , I bring you good tidings of great joy , which shall be to all people .
text2: Pero yejhua on ilhuicactequitquetl oquimijlij : ― Ma ca xmomojtican , pampa onihuajlaj para nemechmachiltico se cuajli tlajtojli , yejhuan huelis quipactis nochi tlacatl .

text: For unto you is born this day in the city of David a Saviour , which is Christ the Lord .
text2: Aman ne ipan ipueblo David otlacat nemoTemaquixtijcau . Yejhua Cristo on toTeco .

text: And this shall be a sign unto you ; Ye shall find the babe wrapped in swaddling clothes , lying in a manger .
text2: Niman para nenquixmatisquej , nemejhuamej nenquinextisquej on conetzintli tetejcuixticaj ican se tlaquentli , niman onoc ipan se canoa .

text: And suddenly there was with the angel a multitude of the heavenly host praising God , and saying ,
text2: Quemaj nimantzin ne itech on ilhuica tequitquetl ohuajnonextijquej sanoyej miyequej ocsequimej ilhuicactequitquej yejhuan ohualejquej ne tlacpac ilhuicac . Yejhuamej cueyiliayaj Dios niman quijtohuayaj :

text: Glory to God in the highest , and on earth peace , good will toward men .
text2: ¡ Hueyixtica Dios ne ilhuicac , niman nican ipan tlalticpactli ma onya yolsehuilistli intzajlan on tlacamej yejhuan quipiaj tetlajsojtlalistli !

text: And it came to pass , as the angels were gone away from them into heaven , the shepherds said one to another , Let us now go even unto Bethlehem , and see this thing which is come to pass , which the Lord hath made known unto us .
text2: Quemaj ijcuac on ilhuicactequitquej onocuepquej ne ilhuicac , on tlajpixquej opeu quinojliaj ihuan ocsequimej : ― Tiahuij , tej , ne Belén , niman ticontasquej on tlen onochiu yejhuan otechmachiltij on toTeco .

text: And they came with haste , and found Mary , and Joseph , and the babe lying in a manger .
text2: Nimantzin oyajquej niman oquinextitoj María niman José , niman on conetzintli onoya ipan se canoa campa tlacuaj on yolquej .

text: And when they had seen it , they made known abroad the saying which was told them concerning this child .
text2: Ijcuac oquitaquej , oquintlajtlajtohuilijquej on tlen on ilhuicactequitquetl oquimijlij itech ica yejhua on conetzintli .

text: And all they that heard it wondered at those things which were told them by the shepherds .
text2: Niman nochimej yejhuan oquincaquej otlamojcacaquej ica on tlen on tlajpixquej quijtohuayaj .

text: But Mary kept all these things , and pondered them in her heart .
text2: Pero María oquejeu ipan iyojlo nochi yejhua in tlajtojli niman sanoyej ica tlanemiliaya .

text: And the shepherds returned , glorifying and praising God for all the things that they had heard and seen , as it was told unto them .
text2: On tlajpixquej onocuepquej ne campa oquincajquej on inborreguitos . Niman chica nocuepayaj , ocueyilijquej niman oquiyectenejquej Dios ipampa nochi on tlen ocacquej niman oquitaquej . Nochi onochiu quen on ilhuicactequitquetl oquimijlij .

text: And when eight days were accomplished for the circumcising of the child , his name was called JESUS , which was so named of the angel before he was conceived in the womb .
text2: Ipan chicueyi tonajli oquitlalilijquej on nescayotl itoca circuncisión ipan inacayo on conetzintli niman oquitocayotijquej Jesús . Oquitocayotijquej ica sa no yejhua on tocayotl yejhuan on ilhuicactequitquetl oquijlij María ijcuac oc xe nesiya tla quipia iconeu .

text: And when the days of her purification according to the law of Moses were accomplished , they brought him to Jerusalem , to present him to the Lord ;
text2: Ijcuac yopanoc on tonaltin ica José niman María yonochipajquej ijcon quen tlanahuatia itlanahuatil Moisés , yejhuamej ocuicaquej Jesús ne Jerusalén niman oquiyaxcatijquej on toTeco Dios .

text: ( As it is written in the law of the Lord , Every male that openeth the womb shall be called holy to the Lord ; )
text2: In oquichijquej pampa ipan itlanahutil on toTeco ijquin tlajcuilolnesticaj : “ Nochi yejhuan yencuiyotl oquichconetl ma quiyaxcatican on toTeco . ”

text: And to offer a sacrifice according to that which is said in the law of the Lord , A pair of turtledoves , or two young pigeons .
text2: Niman no oyajquej para oquihuentlalitoj ome cocotetzitzintin noso ome palomas ijcon quen tlanahuatia itlanahuatil toTeco .

text: And , behold , there was a man in Jerusalem , whose name was Simeon ; and the same man was just and devout , waiting for the consolation of Israel : and the Holy Ghost was upon him .
text2: Ipan on tonaltin chantiya ne Jerusalén se tlacatl itoca Simeón . Yejhua cuajli tlacatl catca , niman cuajli quitlacaitaya Dios . Yejhua quichaya quemanon tlacatis on yejhuan quinyoltlalis ichantlacaj on país itoca Israel , niman Espíritu Santo nemiya ipan .

text: And it was revealed unto him by the Holy Ghost , that he should not see death , before he had seen the Lord ' s Christ .
text2: Niman on Espíritu Santo oquimachiltijca ica yejhua xmiquis hasta quitas on Cristo yejhuan toTeco cuajtitlanis .

text: And he came by the Spirit into the temple : and when the parents brought in the child Jesus , to do for him after the custom of the law ,
