text2: pampa on tlacamej yejhuan xquineltocaj Dios san yejhua on tlajtlamach quitejtemohuaj . Pero nemoTajtzin ye quimatzticaj ica mechpolohua on tlajtlamach .

text: But rather seek ye the kingdom of God ; and all these things shall be added unto you .
text2: Yej xchihuacan canica para Dios ma mechmandaro niman ma quinmandaro ocsequimej . Tla ijcon nenquichihuasquej nenquiselisquej in tlajtlamach yejhuan mechpolohua .

text: Fear not , little flock ; for it is your Father ' s good pleasure to give you the kingdom .
text2: ' Ma ca xmomojtican masqui xnenmiyequej , pampa nemoTajtzin quipia pactli para mechcahuilis nencalaquisquej ne campa yejhua tlamandarohua .

text: Sell that ye have , and give alms ; provide yourselves bags which wax not old , a treasure in the heavens that faileth not , where no thief approacheth , neither moth corrupteth .
text2: On tlen nenquipiaj xnamacacan , niman on tomin xquinmacacan on yejhuan mayanquej . Ijcon , tej , xpiacan riquezas yejhuan xqueman ijsolihuij , niman xsentlalican riquezas ne ilhuicac campa xqueman tlamis , niman campa on tlachtequetl xhuelis calaquis nion itlacuanyo conixpolos .

text: For where your treasure is , there will your heart be also .
text2: Tla ijcon , tej , campa nenquipiasquej nemoriquezas , no ompa nenquipiasquej nemoyojlo .

text: Let your loins be girded about , and your lights burning ;
text2: ' Xcololocan nemotlaquen niman xpiacan listo nemotlahuil yejhuan cuajli tlahuilohua

text: And ye yourselves like unto men that wait for their lord , when he will return from the wedding ; that when he cometh and knocketh , they may open unto him immediately .
text2: quen tequitquej yejhuan quichixtoquej inteco ma huajnocuepati ne campa nonamictihua , para nimantzin quitlatlapohuilisquej oc yejcotetzis niman quitetepinis on tlatzacuilyotl .

text: Blessed are those servants , whom the lord when he cometh shall find watching : verily I say unto you , that he shall gird himself , and make them to sit down to meat , and will come forth and serve them .
text2: Tlatiochiutin yesquej para on tequitquej yejhuan ijcuac huajlas inteco quinhuajnextis tlajtlachixtoquej . Ica tlen melahuac nemechijlia ica sa no inteco nochihuas intequichihuilijcau . Quemaj quinnotzas ma huajlacan ipan mesa niman quemaj quintlamacas .

text: And if he shall come in the second watch , or come in the third watch , and find them so , blessed are those servants .
text2: Masqui yejhua yejcos canaj tlajcoihuan noso cualcan , tlatiochiutli yesquej on tequitquej tla inteco quinnextijtejco tlajtlachixtoquej .

text: And this know , that if the goodman of the house had known what hour the thief would come , he would have watched , and not have suffered his house to be broken through .
text2: Niman xmatican yejhua in , ica tla iteco se cajli quimatisquia tlen hora yejcos on tlachtequetl ne ipan ical , yejhua tlachixtiasquia niman xcahuilisquia ma quitlapohuili ical para quitlachtequilis .

text: Be ye therefore ready also : for the Son of man cometh at an hour when ye think not .
text2: Nemejhuamej no ijqui xtlamachixtiacan , pampa ijcuac xnenquinemilijtiasquej , nihuajlas nejhua yejhuan oninochiu Tlacatl .

text: Then Peter said unto him , Lord , speakest thou this parable unto us , or even to all ?
text2: Quemaj Pedro oquitlajtoltij : ― ToTeco , ¿ otictlalij in ejemplo san para tejhuamej , noso para nochimej ?

text: And the Lord said , Who then is that faithful and wise steward , whom his lord shall make ruler over his household , to give them their portion of meat in due season ?
text2: On toTeco oquijtoj : ― ¿ Aquinon on tequitquetl yejhuan nochipa quitlacamati iteco , niman cuajli tlanemilia , niman yejhuan iteco quimactilia ichanchanecahuan , niman on ocsequimej itequitcahuan para quinmaca tlen quimpolohua ijcuac nonequis quiselisquej ?

text: Blessed is that servant , whom his lord when he cometh shall find so doing .
text2: Tlatiochiutli yes on tequitquetl yejhuan ijcuac huajlas iteco cuajnextis quichijticaj on tlen oquinahuatij .

text: Of a truth I say unto you , that he will make him ruler over all that he hath .
text2: Ica tlen melahuac nemechijlia ica iteco quimactilis on tequitquetl nochi tlen yejhua quipia para quejehuas .

text: But and if that servant say in his heart , My lord delayeth his coming ; and shall begin to beat the menservants and maidens , and to eat and drink , and to be drunken ;
text2: Pero tla yejhua on tequitquetl quinemilis ica on iteco oc polihui para huajlas , niman pehuas quinhuisoquis on tlacamej tequitquej niman on sihuamej tequitquej , niman san tlacuas , niman atlis niman tlahuantinemis ,

text: The lord of that servant will come in a day when he looketh not for him , and at an hour when he is not aware , and will cut him in sunder , and will appoint him his portion with the unbelievers .
text2: tla ijcon , iteco huajlas ipan on tonajli ijcuac yejhua xquichixticaj , niman ipan on hora ijcuac xquimati . Niman quemaj iteco temojtij quicastigaros , niman cahuas inhuan on yejhuan xquitlacamatij .

text: And that servant , which knew his lord ' s will , and prepared not himself , neither did according to his will , shall be beaten with many stripes .
text2: ' On tequitquetl yejhuan quimati tlinon quinequi on iteco , pero xnolistojtlalia para quichihuas nion quitlacamati , sanoyej quitlajyohuiltisquej .

text: But he that knew not , and did commit things worthy of stripes , shall be beaten with few stripes . For unto whomsoever much is given , of him shall be much required : and to whom men have committed much , of him they will ask the more .
text2: Pero on tequitquetl yejhuan xquimati tlinon quinequi iteco , niman quichihuas on tlajtlamach yejhuan nonequi quiselis san achijtzin castigo . On yejhuan miyec quinahuatiaj ica oncaj miyec quichihuas . Niman on yejhuan más miyec quinahuatiaj no ijqui ica oncaj más miyec quichihuas .

text: I am come to send fire on the earth ; and what will I if it be already kindled ?
text2: ' Nejhua onihuajlaj ipan in tlalticpactli para niquinmacas on tlacamej yencuic tlaneltoctli yejhuan tlicuis quen tlitl ipan inyojlo . Niman sanoyej nicnequisquia ica ye quipiasquiaj .

text: But I have a baptism to be baptized with ; and how am I straitened till it be accomplished !
text2: Pero antes yejhuamej quipiasquej in , ica oncaj sanoyej nitlajyohuis . Niman sanoyej ninajmana hasta caman in nopan nochihuas .

text: Suppose ye that I am come to give peace on earth ? I tell you , Nay ; but rather division :
text2: ¿ Nenquinemiliaj ica nejhua onihuajlaj para oniquinsentlalico on tlalticpactlacamej ican yolsehuilistli ? Nemechijlia ica ca , yej nopampa noxexelosquej .

text: For from henceforth there shall be five in one house divided , three against two , and two against three .
text2: Desde aman ye pehua macuiltimej chanchanejquej ipan se chanyotl xexelijtiasquej . Yeyimej tlahuelnemisquej inhuan on ocse omemej niman on omemej inhuan on yeyimej .

text: The father shall be divided against the son , and the son against the father ; the mother against the daughter , and the daughter against the mother ; the mother in law against her daughter in law , and the daughter in law against her mother in law .
text2: On tajtli tlahuelnemis ihuan on itelpoch niman on telpochtli ihuan itaj . Niman on nantli tlahuelnemis ihuan ichpoch , niman on ichpoch ihuan inan . On monantli tlahuelnemis ihuan on isihuamon , niman on sihuamontli ihuan on imonan .

text: And he said also to the people , When ye see a cloud rise out of the west , straightway ye say , There cometh a shower ; and so it is .
text2: Jesús no oquimijlij on tlacamej : ― Ijcuac nemejhuamej nenquitaj ica on moxtli noquetztehua ne ica icalaquiyan tonaltzintli , nimantzin nenquijtohuaj ica quiahuis , niman melahuac ijqui nochihua .

text: And when ye see the south wind blow , ye say , There will be heat ; and it cometh to pass .
text2: Niman ijcuac on ajacatl hualehua ne ica sur , nenquijtohuaj ica tona yes , niman ijqui nochihua .

text: Ye hypocrites , ye can discern the face of the sky and of the earth ; but how is it that ye do not discern this time ?
text2: ¡ Omexayacyejquej ! Nemejhuamej hueli nencajsicamatij tlinon nochihuas ne ipan cielo niman nican tlalticpac . ¿ Tlica , tej , xhueli nencajsicamatij tlinon quijtosnequi on tlen nicchihua ipan in tonaltin ?

text: Yea , and why even of yourselves judge ye not what is right ?
text2: ' ¿ Tlica xsan no nemejhuamej nenquitaj quen nemoyoltlaliaj ica cuajli ?

text: When thou goest with thine adversary to the magistrate , as thou art in the way , give diligence that thou mayest be delivered from him ; lest he hale thee to the judge , and the judge deliver thee to the officer , and the officer cast thee into prison .
text2: Ijcuac yacaj mitzhuica para mitzteixpanhuiya ne imixpan on tequihuajquej , xchihua canica para ihuan xmoyolsehui ipan ojtli , para ma ca mitzhuicas ixpan on tequihuaj , niman on tequihuaj mitztemacas intech on policías , niman on policías mitzajsisquej .

text: I tell thee , thou shalt not depart thence , till thou hast paid the very last mite .
text2: Ompa xtiquisas hasta tictlaxtlahuas on sa ica nochi motomin yejhuan mitzquixtilisquej .

text: There were present at that season some that told him of the Galilaeans , whose blood Pilate had mingled with their sacrifices .
text2: Sa no ipan on tonajli ompa nemiyaj sequimej tlacamej yejhuan oquitlajtlajtohuilijquej Jesús quen ijqui Pilato otlanahuatijca para oquinmictijquej sequimej tlacamej yejhuan chanejquej ne Galilea niman ica on inyesyo oquinelojquej ihuan inyesyo on yolquej yejhuan on galileos oquinmictijquej para se huentli .

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , Suppose ye that these Galilaeans were sinners above all the Galilaeans , because they suffered such things ?
text2: Niman Jesús oquimijlij : ― ¿ Nemejhuamej nenquinemiliaj ica on tlacamej galileos ijcon impan onochiu pampa más tlajtlacolejquej catcaj xquen on inchantlacaj ?

text: I tell you , Nay : but , except ye repent , ye shall all likewise perish .
text2: Nemechijlia ica ca . Yej , tla nemejhuamej xnencajcahuasquej ica nenquichihuaj on tlen xcuajli , nochimej nemejhuamej no ijqui nenmiquisquej .

text: Or those eighteen , upon whom the tower in Siloam fell , and slew them , think ye that they were sinners above all men that dwelt in Jerusalem ?
text2: ¿ Tlen nemejhuamej nenquinemiliaj ica on majtlactli huan chichuasen tlacamej yejhuan omiquej ijcuac impan oxoton on torre ne Siloé , yejhuamej más quipiayaj tlajtlacojli xquen on yejhuan chantiyaj ne Jerusalén ?

text: I tell you , Nay : but , except ye repent , ye shall all likewise perish .
text2: Nemechijlia ica ca , yej tla nemejhuamej xnencajcahuasquej ica nenquichihuaj on tlen xcuajli , nochimej nemejhuamej no ijqui nenmiquisquej .

text: He spake also this parable ; A certain man had a fig tree planted in his vineyard ; and he came and sought fruit thereon , and found none .
text2: Quemaj Jesús oquintlalilij yejhua in ejemplo : ― Sen tlacatl quipiaya se higuera cojtli ne ipan itlal , niman se tonajli yejhua oquitato tla yotlac , pero xitlaj oquinextilij itlaquilyo .

text: Then said he unto the dresser of his vineyard , Behold , these three years I come seeking fruit on this fig tree , and find none : cut it down ; why cumbereth it the ground ?
text2: Quemaj yejhua oquijlij on tlacatl yejhuan quinotequiyotiaya on tlajli : “ Xquita , ye quipia yeyi xipan ica nicualitztinemi higos nican ipan in cojtli , niman xqueman niquita tla tlaqui . Más cuajli xtzontequi . ¿ Tlinon para ne san tlalcuiticaj niman xtlaqui ? ”

text: And he answering said unto him , Lord , let it alone this year also , till I shall dig about it , and dung it :
text2: Pero on yejhuan quinotequiyotiaya on tlajli oquijlij : “ Señor , sa yejhua in xipan xcahua . Nejhua nictlalquexanilis niman nictemilis tlapalanajli .

text: And if it bear fruit , well : and if not , then after that thou shalt cut it down .
text2: Tla tlaquis cuajli yes , pero tla xotlac , ijcuacon quemaj titlanahuatis para ma quitzontequican . ”

text: And he was teaching in one of the synagogues on the sabbath .
text2: Ipan se tonajli de nesehuijli , Jesús temachtijticatca ipan se tiopan .

text: And , behold , there was a woman which had a spirit of infirmity eighteen years , and was bowed together , and could in no wise lift up herself .
text2: Niman ompa nemiya se sihuatl yejhuan ye quipiaya majtlactli huan chicueyi xipan ica cualohuaya , pampa on xcuajli espíritu yejhuan ijqui oquichihuilij . Yejhua on sihuatl sa nopachojtinemiya , niman nion achijtzin xhueliya nomelajcatelquetzaya .

text: And when Jesus saw her , he called her to him , and said unto her , Woman , thou art loosed from thine infirmity .
text2: Ijcuac Jesús ijcon oquitac on sihuatl , oquinotz niman oquijlij : ― Sihuatl , ye cuajli yotipajtic de yejhua on cualolistli .

text: And he laid his hands on her : and immediately she was made straight , and glorified God .
text2: Quemaj oquintlalij imahuan ipan niman nimantzin on sihuatl onomelajcatelquetz , niman opeu quihueyilia Dios .

text: And the ruler of the synagogue answered with indignation , because that Jesus had healed on the sabbath day , and said unto the people , There are six days in which men ought to work : in them therefore come and be healed , and not on the sabbath day .
text2: Pero on yejhuan tlayecanquetl catca ipan on tiopan ocualan pampa Jesús otepajtij ipan on tonajli de nesehuijli , niman yejhua oquimijlij on tlacamej : ― Chicuasen tonajli oncaj para tequitihuas . Ipan on tonaltin xhuajlacan para nemopajtisquej , niman ma ca ipan on tonajli de nesehuijli .

text: The Lord then answered him , and said , Thou hypocrite , doth not each one of you on the sabbath loose his ox or his ass from the stall , and lead him away to watering ?
text2: Ijcuacon on toTeco oquijlij : ― Omexayacyejquej , cada se nemejhuamej quitojtoma ihuacax noso ipoloco ipan on tonajli de nesehuijli niman cuica conatlitia .

text: And ought not this woman , being a daughter of Abraham , whom Satan hath bound , lo , these eighteen years , be loosed from this bond on the sabbath day ?
text2: Niman nican nemi yejhua in sihuatl yejhuan huejca teixhuiu itech Abraham niman ye quipia majtlactli huan chicueyi xipan ica Satanás ijcon oquichihualtij . ¿ Xquitocarohuaya nomanahuis de on cualolistli ipan on tonajli de nesehuijli ?

text: And when he had said these things , all his adversaries were ashamed : and all the people rejoiced for all the glorious things that were done by him .
text2: Ijcuac Jesús ijcon oquijtoj , nochimej on itlajhuelicnihuan opinajquej . Pero nochi tlacatl paquia ipampa on huejhueyi tlajtlamach tlen Jesús quichihuaya .

text: Then said he , Unto what is the kingdom of God like ? and whereunto shall I resemble it ?
text2: Quemaj oquijtoj : ― ¿ Quen ijqui noscaltia itequihuayo Dios ? ¿ Tlinon ica huelis niquixnescayotis on itequihuayo Dios ?

text: It is like a grain of mustard seed , which a man took , and cast into his garden ; and it grew , and waxed a great tree ; and the fowls of the air lodged in the branches of it .
text2: Yejhua quen itlaj on xinachtli itoca mostaza yejhuan se tlacatl quitoca ipan itlal . On xinachtli noscaltia hasta ajsi quen itlaj hueyi cojtli . Sanoyej hueyiya hasta on totomej yejhuan pajpatlantinemij quichijchihuaj intepajsol ipan imahuan .

text: And again he said , Whereunto shall I liken the kingdom of God ?
text2: No ijqui oquijtoj Jesús : ― ¿ Tlinon ica más huelis niquixnescayotis on itequihuayo Dios ?

text: It is like leaven , which a woman took and hid in three measures of meal , till the whole was leavened .
text2: Yejhua quen tlaxocolilistli yejhuan se sihuatl quimanelohua ican yeyi tlatemachihuajli harina niman quemaj najcocui nochi on tixtli de harina .

text: And he went through the cities and villages , teaching , and journeying toward Jerusalem .
text2: Ijcuac Jesús panohuaya ipan on ojtli para Jerusalén , opajpanotiaj ipan pueblos niman ipan pueblitos campa temachtiaya .

text: Then said one unto him , Lord , are there few that be saved ? And he said unto them ,
text2: Quemaj se tlacatl ijquin oquitlajtoltij : ― ToTeco , ¿ san quesquimej on yejhuan nomaquixtisquej ? Niman yejhua oquijtoj :

text: Strive to enter in at the strait gate : for many , I say unto you , will seek to enter in , and shall not be able .
text2: ― On tlatzacuilyotl yejhuan tlapojticaj ne ilhuicac pitzahuac . Xchihuacan canica para xcalaquican ne ipan on tlatzacuilyotl pampa nemechijlia ica miyequej quinequisquej calaquisquej pero xhuelisquej .

text: When once the master of the house is risen up , and hath shut to the door , and ye begin to stand without , and to knock at the door , saying , Lord , Lord , open unto us ; and he shall answer and say unto you , I know you not whence ye are :
text2: Ijcuac iTeco on chanyotl notelquetzas niman quitzacuas on tlatzacuilyotl , tla nemejhuamej ipan ojtli onemocajquej , nenquitetelosquej on tlatzacuilyotl niman nenquijtosquej : “ ToTeco , xtechtlatlapohuili . ” Pero yejhua mechijlis : “ Nejhua xnicmati canon nenhualehuaj . ”

text: Then shall ye begin to say , We have eaten and drunk in thy presence , and thou hast taught in our streets .
text2: Ijcuacon nemejhuamej pehuas nenquijtosquej : “ Tejhuamej mohuan otitlacuajquej niman otatliquej , niman tejhua otitemachtij ipan tocalles . ”

text: But he shall say , I tell you , I know you not whence ye are ; depart from me , all ye workers of iniquity .
text2: Pero yejhua mechijlis : “ Nejhua nemechijlia ica xnicmati canon nenhualehuaj . Xnechtlalcahuican nochimej nemejhuamej yejhuan nenquichihuaj on tlen xcuajli . ”

text: There shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth , when ye shall see Abraham , and Isaac , and Jacob , and all the prophets , in the kingdom of God , and you yourselves thrust out .
text2: Sanoyej nenchocasquej niman nemotlantotopotzasquej ijcuac nenquitasquej ica Abraham , Isaac , Jacob niman nochimej on tiotlajtojquej nemij ne campa Dios tequihuatiticaj , chica nemejhuamej mechajquixtisquej .

text: And they shall come from the east , and from the west , and from the north , and from the south , and shall sit down in the kingdom of God .
text2: Niman on tlacamej yejhuan chanejquej ne iquisayan tonajli niman ne icalaquiyan tonajli , niman ne ica norte niman ne ica sur , huajlasquej para notlalisquej tlacuasquej ne ilhuicac ichan Dios .

text: And , behold , there are last which shall be first , and there are first which shall be last .
text2: Ijcuacon on yejhuan aman xhuejhueyixtoquej ijcuacon huejhueyixtiasquej , niman on yejhuan aman huejhueyixtoquej ijcuacon xhuejhueyixtiasquej .

text: The same day there came certain of the Pharisees , saying unto him , Get thee out , and depart hence : for Herod will kill thee .
text2: Sa no ipan on tonajli , itech ohualajquej sequimej fariseos niman oquijlijquej : ― Xmejcuani nican pampa Herodes quinequi mitzmictis .

text: And he said unto them , Go ye , and tell that fox , Behold , I cast out devils , and I do cures to day and to morrow , and the third day I shall be perfected .
text2: Pero yejhua oquimijlij : ― Xhuiyan niman xquijlican on tlacajcayajquetl : “ Xquita , aman niman mostla niquintequixtilia on xcuajcualtin espíritus niman niquimpajtia on cualoj , niman para huiptla nochi nitlamis . ”

text: Nevertheless I must walk to day , and to morrow , and the day following : for it cannot be that a prophet perish out of Jerusalem .
text2: Pero ica oncaj nicnejnemitis nojhui aman , mostla niman huiptla , pampa nochi tiotlajtojquetl ica oncaj miquis ne Jerusalén .

text: O Jerusalem , Jerusalem , which killest the prophets , and stonest them that are sent unto thee ; how often would I have gathered thy children together , as a hen doth gather her brood under her wings , and ye would not !
text2: ' ¡ Ah nemejhuamej chanejquej ne Jerusalén , nemejhuamej nenquinmictiaj on tiotlajtojquej niman nenquintemojmotlaj on yejhuan Dios mechinhuajtitlanilia ! ¡ Miyecpa onicnec nemechsentlalis quen yejhua on cuanaca quinsentlalia iconehuan itzintlan imajtlapalhuan , pero xonenquinequej !

text: Behold , your house is left unto you desolate : and verily I say unto you , Ye shall not see me , until the time come when ye shall say , Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord .
text2: Aman xcaquican . Dios xoc mechpalehuis pampa yejhua yomechtlalcahui . Aman , tej , nemechijlia ica xoc nennechitasquej hasta ipan on tonajli ijcuac nemejhuamej nenquijtosquej : “ Ma toTeco Dios quitiochihua on yejhuan ocuajtitlan . ”

text: And it came to pass , as he went into the house of one of the chief Pharisees to eat bread on the sabbath day , that they watched him .
text2: Ipan se tonajli de nesehuijli ijcuac on hebreos nosehuiaj , Jesús oyaj otlacuato ichan se tlayecanquetl fariseo , niman on ocsequimej fariseos sa quipijpiayaj .

text: And , behold , there was a certain man before him which had the dropsy .
text2: No ompa nemiya se tlacatl yejhuan imahuan niman icxihuan pojposahuiyaj .

text: And Jesus answering spake unto the lawyers and Pharisees , saying , Is it lawful to heal on the sabbath day ?
text2: Quemaj Jesús oquintlajtoltij on temachtijquej ican itlanahuatil Dios niman on fariseos : ― ¿ Totlanahuatil techcahuilia para ipan on tonajli de nesehuijli nopajtis se yejhuan cualo ? ¿ Quemaj noso ca ?

text: And they held their peace . And he took him , and healed him , and let him go ;
text2: Pero yejhuamej xonahuatquej . Quemaj Jesús oconquitzquij on yejhuan cualo , niman oquipajtij niman oquijlij ma huiya .

text: And answered them , saying , Which of you shall have an ass or an ox fallen into a pit , and will not straightway pull him out on the sabbath day ?
text2: Niman on fariseos oquimijlij : ― ¿ Aquinon de nemejhuamej xnimantzin conquixtia tla se ipoloco noso ihuacax onhuetzi ijtic se pozo ipan on tonajli de nesehuijli ?

text: And they could not answer him again to these things .
text2: Niman xohuelquej itlaj ica oquinanquilijquej .

text: And he put forth a parable to those which were bidden , when he marked how they chose out the chief rooms ; saying unto them ,
text2: Ijcuac Jesús oquitac ica on tenotzaltin quitlapejpeniayaj on más huejhueyixtoquej sietas ne itech on mesa , oquitlalij yejhua in ejemplo :

text: When thou art bidden of any man to a wedding , sit not down in the highest room ; lest a more honourable man than thou be bidden of him ;
text2: ― Ijcuac yacaj mitznotzas para tehuan ticpanos on ilhuitl campa nonamictihua , ma ca timosehuis ipan on lugar más hueyixticaj , pampa huelis yejcos ocse yejhuan más hueyixticaj tlanotzajli xquen tejhua .

text: And he that bade thee and him come and say to thee , Give this man place ; and thou begin with shame to take the lowest room .
text2: Tla ijcon , tej , on yejhuan omechnotz yas motech niman mitzijlis : “ On sieta xmaca yejhua in yejhuan más hueyixticaj . ” Niman ijcuac ijcon ticaquis mitzijliaj , ican mopinahuilis tias timotlalis ipan on sieta campa notlaliaj on yejhuan xhuejhueyixtoquej .

text: But when thou art bidden , go and sit down in the lowest room ; that when he that bade thee cometh , he may say unto thee , Friend , go up higher : then shalt thou have worship in the presence of them that sit at meat with thee .
text2: Más cuajli tla ijcuac canaj mitznotzasquej , xmotlali ipan on sieta yejhuan para on yejhuan xhuejhueyixtoquej , para ijcuac motech huajlas on yejhuan omitznotz , mitzijlis : “ Notetlajsojcau , xmotlaliti ne ipan on más hueyixticaj sieta . ” Ijqui ticselis tetlacaitalistli imixpan on tlanotzaltin yejhuan ompa itech on mesa mohuan yejyehuatiasquej .

text: For whosoever exalteth himself shall be abased ; and he that humbleth himself shall be exalted .
text2: Ijcon xchihua , pampa on yejhuan nohueyilia , quicnotlalisquej , niman on yejhuan nocnotlalilia cueyilisquej .

text: Then said he also to him that bade him , When thou makest a dinner or a supper , call not thy friends , nor thy brethren , neither thy kinsmen , nor thy rich neighbours ; lest they also bid thee again , and a recompence be made thee .
text2: Niman on yejhuan oquinotz Jesús no oquijlij : ― Ijcuac ticnequis titetlacualtis tiotlac noso tlayohua , ma ca xquinnotza motetlajsojcahuan , nion mocnihuan , nion on yejhuan sa huejca mocnihuan , nion on monisiuchantlacaj yejhuan xitlaj quinpolohuaj , para ma ca sa no yejhuamej no quemantica mitznotzasquej niman ijcuacon quen mitzcuepilisquej on tlen achtopa tiquincualtis .

text: But when thou makest a feast , call the poor , the maimed , the lame , the blind :
text2: Yej ocse tlamantic xchihua . Ijcuac ticpias itlaj ilhuitl , xquinnotza on yejhuan mayanquej , on yejhuan macocoxquej noso icxitlajcomej , on yejhuan coxomej niman on yejhuan ciegos .

text: And thou shalt be blessed ; for they cannot recompense thee : for thou shalt be recompensed at the resurrection of the just .
text2: Niman Dios mitztiochihuas pampa masqui yejhuamej xhuelisquej mitzcuepilisquej on tlacuajli , tejhua ticpias motlaxtlahuil ipan on tonajli ijcuac on yejhuan yolchipajquej yolihuisquej niman noquetztehuasquej ipan intlalcon .

text: And when one of them that sat at meat with him heard these things , he said unto him , Blessed is he that shall eat bread in the kingdom of God .
text2: Ijcuac semej yejhuamej on yejhuan yejyehuaticatcaj ne itech on mesa ijcon ocac , oquijlij Jesús : ― Melahuac tlatiochiutli yes on yejhuan quicuas pan ne ilhuicac campa Dios tlamandarohua .

text: Then said he unto him , A certain man made a great supper , and bade many :
text2: Quemaj Jesús oquijlij : ― Sen tlacatl oquitemacac se hueyi tiotlac tlajcuajli , niman otlanahuatij ma quinnojnotzatij miyequej tlacamej .

text: And sent his servant at supper time to say to them that were bidden , Come ; for all things are now ready .
text2: Niman ijcuac ye nisiu para tlacuasquej , oquititlan on itequichihuilijcau para ma quimijliti on tlanotzalti : “ Xhuajlacan pampa ye oncaj tlachijchiutli nochi . ”

text: And they all with one consent began to make excuse . The first said unto him , I have bought a piece of ground , and I must needs go and see it : I pray thee have me excused .
text2: Pero nochimej opejquej sa tlamach ica notlamiyaj ica xhuelisquej yasquej ipan on tiotlac tlajcuajli . On achtoj tlacatl oquijtoj : “ Quinamantzin oniconcou se tlajli , niman ica oncaj nicontas . Nimitztlajtlanilia xnechtlapojpolhui ica xnias ipan on tiotlac tlajcuajli . ”

text: And another said , I have bought five yoke of oxen , and I go to prove them : I pray thee have me excused .
text2: On ocse oquijtoj : “ Nejhua onicou macuijli yunta huacax , niman ye niau niconmintas tla huelij cuajli tequitij . Tla ijcon xnechtlapojpolhui ica xnias ipan on tiotlac tlajcuajli . ”

text: And another said , I have married a wife , and therefore I cannot come .
text2: Niman ocse oquijtoj : “ Quemach oninonamictij , niman yejhua ica xnihuelis nias . ”

text: So that servant came , and shewed his lord these things . Then the master of the house being angry said to his servant , Go out quickly into the streets and lanes of the city , and bring in hither the poor , and the maimed , and the halt , and the blind .
text2: Quemaj on tequichihuilijquetl ohuajnocuepato niman nochi yejhua on tlen ica oquinanquilijquej , oquitlajtlajtohuilij on iteco . Ijcuacon on iteco ocualan niman oquijlij on itequichihuilijcau : “ Amantzin xhuiya ipan icalles niman iojhui in hueyican , niman nican xquinhuajhuica on yejhuan mayanquej , niman on yejhuan macocoxquej , niman icxitlajcotzitzintin , niman on ciegos niman on coxomej . ”

text: And the servant said , Lord , it is done as thou hast commanded , and yet there is room .
text2: Más saquin on tequichihuilijquetl oquijtoj : “ Señor , yonicchiu tlen otinechnahuatij niman oc oncaj campa notlalisquej ocsequimej más . ”

text: And the lord said unto the servant , Go out into the highways and hedges , and compel them to come in , that my house may be filled .
text2: Ijcuacon on iteco oquijlij : “ Xhuiya ipan on calles niman ipan on ojtin , niman xquinchihualti ocsequimej ma huajlacan para ma temi nochan .

text: For I say unto you , That none of those men which were bidden shall taste of my supper .
text2: Ijquin xchihua , pampa nemechijlia ica nion aquin de on yejhuan achtopa oniquinnotz xquicuasquej on tiotlac tlajcuajli yejhuan nictemacas . ”

text: And there went great multitudes with him : and he turned , and said unto them ,
text2: Miyec tlacatl cuitlapanhuijtiayaj Jesús , niman yejhua ohuajnocuep niman oquimijlij :

text: If any man come to me , and hate not his father , and mother , and wife , and children , and brethren , and sisters , yea , and his own life also , he cannot be my disciple .
text2: ― Tla yacaj huajlau notech , niman yej quintlajsojtla más itaj , inan , isihuau , iconehuan , icnihuan yejhuan tlacamej niman yejhuan sihuamej , niman hasta sa no yejhua más quitlajsojtla inemilis xquen nejhua , yejhua xhuelis nonomachtijcau yes .

text: And whosoever doth not bear his cross , and come after me , cannot be my disciple .
text2: Niman on yejhuan xquiselis on tlajyohuilistli ipan inemilis quen se tlacatl yejhuan quitqui icojnepanol ne campa quimictisquej niman xyas nohuan , xhuelis para yejhua nonomachtijcau yes .

text: For which of you , intending to build a tower , sitteth not down first , and counteth the cost , whether he have sufficient to finish it ?
text2: Cada semej nemejhuamej yejhuan quinequi quichijchihuas se torre , achtopa notlalia para quixtlalohua itomin tla caxilis para tlamis on torre .

text: Lest haply , after he hath laid the foundation , and is not able to finish it , all that behold it begin to mock him ,
text2: Tla quitlalia on cimiento niman quemaj xoc hueli tlami , tla ijcon , quitasquej ocsequimej niman pehuas cuejhuetzquilisquej .

text: Saying , This man began to build , and was not able to finish .
text2: Niman quijtosquej : “ Yejhua on tlacatl oquipehualtij on itequiu niman xohuel otlan . ”

text: Or what king , going to make war against another king , sitteth not down first , and consulteth whether he be able with ten thousand to meet him that cometh against him with twenty thousand ?
text2: Cada rey yejhuan yau para onohuisoquij ihuan ocse rey , achtopa quixtlalohua tla huelis quixnamiquis ican majtlactli mil isoldados on ocse rey yejhuan huajlau ican sempoajli mil isoldados .

text: Or else , while the other is yet a great way off , he sendeth an ambassage , and desireth conditions of peace .
text2: Niman tla xhuelis , ijcuac on ocse rey oc huejca nemi , itech quintitlanilis sequimej tlacamej para contlajtlanilisquej tlinon quinequi on ocse rey para ma nopiali yolsehuilistli .

text: So likewise , whosoever he be of you that forsaketh not all that he hath , he cannot be my disciple .
text2: Ijcon , tej , san aquinon de nemejhuamej yejhuan achtoj quixtlalos ica quipias tlajyohuilistli niman cahuas nochi tlen quipia huelis para yejhua nonomachtijcau yes .

text: Salt is good : but if the salt have lost his savour , wherewith shall it be seasoned ?
text2: ' On istatl sanoyej cuajli , pero tla quipolos on ica poyec , ¿ quen ijqui , tej , huelis ocsejpa poyec yes ? On melahuac xhuelis .

text: It is neither fit for the land , nor yet for the dunghill ; but men cast it out . He that hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Xoc huelis quitequitiltisquej para on tlajli nion para se achitzin tlalpalanajli , yej san quixinisquej . Tla nemejhuamej nenquipiaj nemotlamachilis , xcajsicamatican on tlen niquijtohua .

text: Then drew near unto him all the publicans and sinners for to hear him .
text2: Miyequej on yejhuan tlacobrarohua ica impuestos niman on tlajtlacolejquej quinisihuiayaj Jesús para caquisquej .

text: And the Pharisees and scribes murmured , saying , This man receiveth sinners , and eateth with them .
text2: Yejhua ica on fariseos niman on temachtijquej ican itlanahuatil Dios tlahueltlajtohuayaj niman ijquin quijtohuiliayaj Jesús : ― Yejhua in tlacatl quinselia on tlajtlacolejquej niman inhuan tlacua .

text: And he spake this parable unto them , saying ,
text2: Yejhua ica Jesús oquintlalilij yejhua in ejemplo :

text: What man of you , having an hundred sheep , if he lose one of them , doth not leave the ninety and nine in the wilderness , and go after that which is lost , until he find it ?
text2: ― Ma ticonijtocan ica semej nemejhuamej quipia cien borreguitos niman se oquipoloj . ¿ Xquincatehua on napoajli huan majtlactli huan chicnahui ne campa tlacualcan niman yau contejtemohua on se borreguito yejhuan oquipoloj hasta caman quinextia ?

text: And when he hath found it , he layeth it on his shoulders , rejoicing .
text2: Niman ijcuac conextia , ican pactli cuajnoquechpanoltia .

text: And when he cometh home , he calleth together his friends and neighbours , saying unto them , Rejoice with me ; for I have found my sheep which was lost .
text2: Niman ijcuac ajsi ichan , quinsentlalia itetlajsojcahuan niman inisiuchantlacaj niman quimijlia : “ Nohuan xpaquican , pampa yonicnextij on borreguito yejhuan onicpolojca . ”

text: I say unto you , that likewise joy shall be in heaven over one sinner that repenteth , more than over ninety and nine just persons , which need no repentance .
text2: Nejhua , tej , nemechijlia ica ne ilhuicac no sa no ijqui nochihua . Ompa más oncaj pactli ipampa se tlajtlacolej yejhuan noyolpatla xquen impampa on napoajli huan majtlactli huan chicnahui cuajcualtin tlacamej yejhuan xquipiaj tlinon ica noyolpatlasquej .

text: Either what woman having ten pieces of silver , if she lose one piece , doth not light a candle , and sweep the house , and seek diligently till she find it ?
text2: ' Noso ma ticonijtocan ica se sihuatl quipia majtlactli tomin tlachijchiutli ican plata niman se quipolohua . ¿ Xquitlicuiltia itlahuil niman pehua tlachpana chica ican miyec cuidado quitejtemohua on tomin hasta caman quinextia ?

text: And when she hath found it , she calleth her friends and her neighbours together , saying , Rejoice with me ; for I have found the piece which I had lost .
text2: Niman ijcuac quinextia , quinsentlalia itetlajsojcahuan niman inisiuchantlacaj niman quimijlia : “ Nohuan xpaquican pampa yonicnextij on tomin yejhuan onicpolojca . ”

text: Likewise , I say unto you , there is joy in the presence of the angels of God over one sinner that repenteth .
text2: Nemechijlia ica no ijqui oncaj pactli ne intzajlan on iilhuicactequitcahuan Dios ipampa se tlajtlacolejquetl yejhuan noyolpatla .

text: And he said , A certain man had two sons :
text2: No ijqui oquijtoj Jesús : ― Sen tlacatl quipiaya ome iconeu .

text: And the younger of them said to his father , Father , give me the portion of goods that falleth to me . And he divided unto them his living .
text2: Niman on yejhuan más conetl catca oquijlij itaj : “ Notaj , xnechxelohuili aman on tlin ticpia yejhuan noyaxca yes . ” Niman on tajtli oquintlajcoxelohuilij on tlen quipiaya .

text: And not many days after the younger son gathered all together , and took his journey into a far country , and there wasted his substance with riotous living .
text2: Ipan quesqui tonajli más saquin , on telpochtli yejhuan más conetl oquisentlalij nochi tlajtlamach tlen iyaxca niman oyaj huejca ipan ocse país campa otlan quinajahuiltia itomin ican se xcuajli nemilistli .

text: And when he had spent all , there arose a mighty famine in that land ; and he began to be in want .
text2: Pero ijcuac nochi yoquitlamijca on tomin , sanoyej opeu tlasojti tlacuajli ne ipan on país , niman opeu ajapismiqui .

text: And he went and joined himself to a citizen of that country ; and he sent him into his fields to feed swine .
text2: Quemaj oquitejtemoto tequitl itech se tlacatl yejhuan chanej ipan on país , niman on tlacatl oquititlan imijla para quintlapialis ica on ipitzohuan .

text: And he would fain have filled his belly with the husks that the swine did eat : and no man gave unto him .
text2: Niman sanoyej quinequiya quicuas on tlacuajli itoca algarrobas yejhuan quicuayaj on pitzomej , pero xacaj quimacaya .

text: And when he came to himself , he said , How many hired servants of my father ' s have bread enough and to spare , and I perish with hunger !
text2: Ijcuacon opeu ijquin quinemilia : “ Nochi on tequitquej ichan notaj quipiaj más tlacuajli san quech quinequij quicuaj , niman nejhua nican ye nimicticaj ican apistli .

text: I will arise and go to my father , and will say unto him , Father , I have sinned against heaven , and before thee ,
text2: Ninoquetztehuas niman nias ne campa nemi notaj , niman ijquin niquijlis : Ay notaj , yonitlajtlacoj itech Dios niman motech .

text: And am no more worthy to be called thy son : make me as one of thy hired servants .
text2: Aman xoc nechmelahua tinechitas quen nimoconeu . Aman sa xnechpohua quen semej yejhuamej on motequichihuilijcahuan . ”

text: And he arose , and came to his father . But when he was yet a great way off , his father saw him , and had compassion , and ran , and fell on his neck , and kissed him .
text2: Quemaj onotelquetz ocajsic ojtli niman oyaj ne ichan itaj . ' Ijcuac oc huejca huajlaya , on itaj ocontac niman oquicnelij . Onotlaloj oquinamiquito . Oquinapaloj niman oquitencuaj .

text: And the son said unto him , Father , I have sinned against heaven , and in thy sight , and am no more worthy to be called thy son .
text2: Niman on teconeu oquijlij itaj : “ Ay notaj , yonitlajtlacoj itech Dios niman motech . Aman xoc nechmelahua tinechitas quen nimoconeu . ”

text: But the father said to his servants , Bring forth the best robe , and put it on him ; and put a ring on his hand , and shoes on his feet :
text2: Pero on tajtli oquimijlij on itequichihuilijcahuan : ¡ Amantzin xcuaquican on yejhuan más cuajli tlaquentli , niman xtlaquentican ! Xtlaliltican se anillo ipan imajpil , niman no xcactican .

text: And bring hither the fatted calf , and kill it ; and let us eat , and be merry :
text2: Quemaj xcuajhuicacan on huacaxconetl yejhuan más tomahuac niman xmictican . ¡ Aman titlacuasquej ican paquilistli ! ¡ Aman ticchihuasquej se ilhuitl !

text: For this my son was dead , and is alive again ; he was lost , and is found . And they began to be merry .
text2: Ijcon ticchihuasquej , pampa yejhua in noconeu quen yomica , pero aman ocsejpa ye quipia nemilistli . Yejhua yopolijca , pero aman yones . Quemaj opejquej quichihuaj on ilhuitl .

text: Now his elder son was in the field : and as he came and drew nigh to the house , he heard musick and dancing .
text2: ' Ijcuac in nochijticatca , on teconeu yejhuan yencuiyotl nemiya ipan tepetl . Niman ijcuac ohuajnocuepato niman oajsic nisiu ichan , oconcac on tlapitzquej ichan niman no ocontac nijtotihua .

text: And he called one of the servants , and asked what these things meant .
text2: Quemaj ocontzajtzilij se tequichihuilijquetl niman oquitlajtoltij tlinon nochihuaya .

text: And he said unto him , Thy brother is come ; and thy father hath killed the fatted calf , because he hath received him safe and sound .
text2: On tequichihuilijquetl oquijlij : “ Oncaj ilhuitl pampa mocniu yohuajlaj . Niman motaj otlanahuatij ma quimictican on huacaxconetl yejhuan más tomahuac , pampa mocniu oyejcoc chicajticaj niman xcualo . ”

text: And he was angry , and would not go in : therefore came his father out , and intreated him .
text2: Pero on yencuiyotl teicniu ocualan hasta xquinequiya oncalaquis ne ichan . Yejhua ica itaj oquisaco para oquitlajtlanilij ma calaquiti .

text: And he answering said to his father , Lo , these many years do I serve thee , neither transgressed I at any time thy commandment : and yet thou never gavest me a kid , that I might make merry with my friends :
text2: Niman yejhua oquijlij itaj : “ Tejhua ticmatzticaj miyec xipan yonimitztequichihuilij , niman nochipa nimitztlacamati , pero xqueman tinechmaca nion se chito conetl para nicchihuas se ilhuitl inhuan notetlajsojcahuan .

text: But as soon as this thy son was come , which hath devoured thy living with harlots , thou hast killed for him the fatted calf .
text2: Pero aman oyejcoc yejhua in moconeu , yejhuan oquipopoloj motomin inhuan on sihuajahuilnemij , niman para yejhua ticmictia on huacax conetl yejhuan más tomahuac . ”

text: And he said unto him , Son , thou art ever with me , and all that I have is thine .
text2: Quemaj on tajtli oquijlij : “ Noconeu , tejhua nochipa nohuan tinemi niman nochi tlen nicpia tejhua moyaxca .

text: It was meet that we should make merry , and be glad : for this thy brother was dead , and is alive again ; and was lost , and is found .
text2: Pero aman nonequi ticchihuasquej ilhuitl niman tipaquisquej , pampa mocniu quen yomica , pero aman ocsejpa quipia nemilistli . Yejhua yopolijca , pero aman yones . ”

text: And he said also unto his disciples , There was a certain rich man , which had a steward ; and the same was accused unto him that he had wasted his goods .
text2: Jesús no oquimijlij on inomachtijcahuan : ― Nemiya se tlacatl yejhuan quinopiyaliaya miyec niman quipiaya se tequitquetl tlayecanqui . Niman yejhua in tlacatl yejhuan iteco on tequitquetl oquijlijquej ica on tequitquetl san quinempolohuilia itequiu .

text: And he called him , and said unto him , How is it that I hear this of thee ? give an account of thy stewardship ; for thou mayest be no longer steward .
text2: Quemaj on iteco oquinotz on tequitquetl tlayecanqui , niman oquijlij : “ ¿ Tlinon quijtosnequi yejhua in yejhuan moca nechijliaj ? Xnechcahuili nochi quen yau motequiu yejhuan yoticchiu , pampa aman tejhua xoc tinotequitcau yes tlayecanqui . ”

text: Then the steward said within himself , What shall I do ? for my lord taketh away from me the stewardship : I cannot dig ; to beg I am ashamed .
text2: Quemaj on tequitquetl tlayecanqui opeu quinemilia : “ ¿ Aman tlinon nicchihuas ? Noteco nechquixtilia on tequitl . Xnicojtic para nictequitis on tlajli , niman nipinahua ninotlajtlayehuis .

text: I am resolved what to do , that , when I am put out of the stewardship , they may receive me into their houses .
text2: Ye nicmatzticaj tlinon nicchihuas para nicpias aquin nechselisquej inchan ijcuac nejhua xnicpias tequitl . ”

text: So he called every one of his lord ' s debtors unto him , and said unto the first , How much owest thou unto my lord ?
text2: Quemaj cada sesentemej oquinnotz on yejhuan cuiquiliayaj iteco . On achtoj tlacatl oquitlajtoltij : “ ¿ Quech ticuiquilia noteco ? ”

text: And he said , An hundred measures of oil . And he said unto him , Take thy bill , and sit down quickly , and write fifty .
text2: Niman yejhua oquijlij : “ Nicuiquilia cien hueyi tlatemachijtli ica on aceite . ” Ijcuacon on tequitquetl tlayecanqui oquijlij : “ Nican oncaj tlin tictehuiquilia . Nimantzin xmotlali niman ocse xchijchihua yejhuan san ompoajli huan majtlactli . ”

text: Then said he to another , And how much owest thou ? And he said , An hundred measures of wheat . And he said unto him , Take thy bill , and write fourscore .
text2: Quemaj on ocse no oquitlajtoltij : “ Niman tejhua , ¿ quech ticuiquilia noteco ? ” Niman yejhua oquijlij : “ Cien tlatemachijtli ica on trigo . ” Ijcuacon oquijlij : “ Nican oncaj tlin tictehuiquilia , niman ocse xchijchihua yejhuan san de napoajli . ”

text: And the lord commended the unjust steward , because he had done wisely : for the children of this world are in their generation wiser than the children of light .
text2: Niman on tlacatl yejhuan iteco on xcuajli tequitquetl tlayecanqui oquiyecteneu pampa oquipix itlamachilis para oquichiu ijcon ipan on itequiu . Quemaj Jesús oquijtoj : ― Lástima pampa on tlalticpactlacamej más quimatij quen ijqui quitequitiltia on tlajtlamach ipan on tlin xcuajli , xijqui quen on iconehuan Dios quichihuaj ica on tlin cuajli .

text: And I say unto you , Make to yourselves friends of the mammon of unrighteousness ; that , when ye fail , they may receive you into everlasting habitations .
text2: ' Nejhua nemechijlia ica más cuajli ica nenquitequitiltiaj on riquezas de yejhua in tlalticpactli para quimpalehuisquej on mayanquej niman ijcon nenquipiasquej nemotetlajsojcahuan yejhuan ijcuac on riquezas tlamis mechselisquej ne ilhuicac campa para nochipa nennemisquej .

text: He that is faithful in that which is least is faithful also in much : and he that is unjust in the least is unjust also in much .
text2: ' Yejhuan quipia cuajli iyojlo itech on tlen achijtzin , no ipan on tlen miyec quipia cuajli iyojlo . Niman on yejhuan xcuajli quipia iyojlo itech on tlen achijtzin no ipan on tlen miyec xquipia cuajli iyojlo .

text: If therefore ye have not been faithful in the unrighteous mammon , who will commit to your trust the true riches ?
text2: Aman , tej , tla ipan on riquezas yejhuan oncaj ipan in tlalticpactli xcuajli nenquipiaj nemoyojlo , xacaj , tej , mechmactilis on tlen melahuac cuajli riquezas .

text: And if ye have not been faithful in that which is another man ' s , who shall give you that which is your own ?
text2: Niman tla ipan on tlen xnemoyaxca xnenquipiaj cuajli nemoyojlo , xacaj , tej , mechmacas on tlen nemoyaxca yes .

text: No servant can serve two masters : for either he will hate the one , and love the other ; or else he will hold to the one , and despise the other . Ye cannot serve God and mammon .
text2: ' Xacaj tetequichihuilijquetl hueli quitequichihuilia ome iteco , pampa se xcuelitas niman on ocse cuelitas , noso se quipialis cuajli iyojlo niman on ocse quitlalcahuis . Xhuelis tictequichihuilis Dios san secan ihuan on tomin .

text: And the Pharisees also , who were covetous , heard all these things : and they derided him .
text2: On fariseos , yejhuan quinejnequiyaj on tomin , cacticatcaj nochi on tlen Jesús quijtohuaya niman san cuejhuetzquiliaya .

text: And he said unto them , Ye are they which justify yourselves before men ; but God knoweth your hearts : for that which is highly esteemed among men is abomination in the sight of God .
text2: Ijcuacon Jesús oquimijlij : ― Nemejhuamej nenquichihuaj para nennesij quen sanoyej nencuajcualtin tlacamej imixpan on tlacamej , pero Dios quixmati nemoyojlo . Xmatican ica on tlen on tlacamej quiseliaj quen hueyixticaj , Dios xcuelita .

text: The law and the prophets were until John : since that time the kingdom of God is preached , and every man presseth into it .
text2: ' Hasta ipan on tonaltin ijcuac nemiya Juan on tlacuatequijquetl , on itlanahuatil Moisés niman intlamachtilhuan on tiotlajtojquej ipan onohuicaquej . Niman desde ijcuacon , noteijliaj on yencuic tlajtojli yejhuan techmachiltiaj quen ijqui Dios tlamandarohua . Niman aman nochimej quinchihualtiaj quen ijqui quincalactisquej campa Dios tlamandarohua .

text: And it is easier for heaven and earth to pass , than one tittle of the law to fail .
text2: ' Más huelis achtoj popolihuis on cielo niman on tlalticpactli , xquen yejhua on itlanahuatil toTeco quipolos se pitelotzin yejhuan más pitentzin .

text: Whosoever putteth away his wife , and marrieth another , committeth adultery : and whosoever marrieth her that is put away from her husband committeth adultery .
text2: ' Tla se tlacatl noxotonis itech isihuau niman ihuan ocse sihuatl nonamictis , quichihua sihuapajpatlalistli . Niman tla se tlacatl nonamictia ihuan on sihuatl yejhuan onoxotonij itech ihuehuentzin quichihua sihuapajpatlalistli .

text: There was a certain rich man , which was clothed in purple and fine linen , and fared sumptuously every day :
text2: ' Nemiya se tlacatl yejhuan ricoj catca . Yejhua notlaquentiaya quen yacaj rey ican on tlaquentli sanoyej patioj niman petlani . Niman mojmostla quichihuaya ilhuitl niman quicuayaj miyec tlajcuajli yejhuan sanoyej cuajli .

text: And there was a certain beggar named Lazarus , which was laid at his gate , full of sores ,
text2: Niman ne iquiahuatenco on tlacatl yejhuan ricoj catca notlaliaya se mayancatlacatl itoca Lázaro yejhuan nochi itlalnacayo tzotzoyoj catca .

text: And desiring to be fed with the crumbs which fell from the rich man ' s table : moreover the dogs came and licked his sores .
text2: Yejhua in mayancatlacatl quinequiya quicuas on tlen xiniya ne ipan imesa on tlacatl rico . Niman on chichimej quipajpalohuiliayaj itzotzohuan .

text: And it came to pass , that the beggar died , and was carried by the angels into Abraham ' s bosom : the rich man also died , and was buried ;
text2: Se tonajli on mayanqui omic , niman on ilhuicactequitquej ocuicaquej para nemis ihuan Abraham ne ilhuicac . On tlacatl yejhuan ricoj catca no omic , niman oquitocato .

text: And in hell he lift up his eyes , being in torments , and seeth Abraham afar off , and Lazarus in his bosom .
text2: On tlacatl yejhuan ricoj catca sanoyej tlajyohuiaya ne mictlan campa tetlajyohuiltiloyan , niman oajcotlachix nepa tlacpac campa ocontac Abraham ihuan Lázaro .

text: And he cried and said , Father Abraham , have mercy on me , and send Lazarus , that he may dip the tip of his finger in water , and cool my tongue ; for I am tormented in this flame .
text2: Quemaj ontzajtzic : “ Notaj Abraham , ¡ xnechpiali teicnelilistli ! Xnahuati Lázaro ma quipatzo icuatipan imajpil ican atl , niman ma huajla , ma quiseseliqui nonenepil , pampa sanoyej nitlajyohuijticaj ipan in tlitl . ”

text: But Abraham said , Son , remember that thou in thy lifetime receivedst thy good things , and likewise Lazarus evil things : but now he is comforted , and thou art tormented .
text2: Pero Abraham oquijlij : “ Noconeu , xquelnamiqui ica tejhua oticselij nochi tlen cuajli ipan monemilis , niman Lázaro oquiselij nochi tlen xcuajli . Pero aman yejhua quiselia paquilistli , niman tejhua titlajyohuiya .

text: And beside all this , between us and you there is a great gulf fixed : so that they which would pass from hence to you cannot ; neither can they pass to us , that would come from thence .
text2: Niman no oncaj se hueyi atlautli sanoyej tlacpac yejhuan techxelohua . Niman on yejhuan nican nemij yejhuan quinequij yasquej ompa on xhuelij , nion yejhuamej on yejhuan ompa on nemij xhuelij huajlahuij nican . ”

text: Then he said , I pray thee therefore , father , that thou wouldest send him to my father ' s house :
text2: Quemaj on tlacatl yejhuan ricoj catca oquijtoj : “ Tla ijcon , tej , notaj Abraham , nimitzicnotlajtlanilia xcontitlani Lázaro ichan notaj

text: For I have five brethren ; that he may testify unto them , lest they also come into this place of torment .
text2: campa niquimpia macuijli nocnihuan . Xcontitlani para ma quinmachiltiti , niman ijcon yejhuamej ma ca huajlasquej nican campa tetlajyohuiltiloyan . ”

text: Abraham saith unto him , They have Moses and the prophets ; let them hear them .
text2: Pero Abraham oquijlij : “ Yejhuamej ompa quipiaj on tlen oquijcuilojquej Moisés niman on tiotlajtojquej . Ma yejhuamej quincaquican . ”

text: And he said , Nay , father Abraham : but if one went unto them from the dead , they will repent .
text2: On tlacatl yejhuan ricoj catca oquijlij : “ Ca , notaj Abraham , yejhuamej xquincaquisquej . Pero tla yacaj comintas yejhuan yolihuis niman noquetztehuas intzajlan on mimiquej , yejhuamej cajcahuasquej ica quichihuaj on tlen xcuajli . ”

text: And he said unto him , If they hear not Moses and the prophets , neither will they be persuaded , though one rose from the dead .
text2: Pero Abraham oquijlij : “ Tla xquinequij caquisquej Moisés niman on tiotlajtojquej , no ijqui xtlaneltocasquej , masqui yacaj yolihuis niman noquetztehuas intzajlan on mimiquej niman quinnojnotzas . ”

text: Then said he unto the disciples , It is impossible but that offences will come : but woe unto him , through whom they come !
text2: Jesús oquimijlij on inomachtijcahuan : ― Nochipa onyas on tlajtlamach yejhuan quinchihualtis on tlacamej para ma tlajtlacocan . Pero ¡ lástima para on tlacatl yejhuan quinchihualtia ocsequimej tlajtlacohuaj !

text: It were better for him that a millstone were hanged about his neck , and he cast into the sea , than that he should offend one of these little ones .
text2: Más cuajli yesquia tla iquechpan quisalohuilisquiaj se tetl hueyi yejhuan imetl on molino , niman contlajcalisquiaj ipan mar , ijcuac xe quinchihualtia para semej in coconej ma tlajtlacocan .

text: Take heed to yourselves : If thy brother trespass against thee , rebuke him ; and if he repent , forgive him .
text2: Tla ijcon , xmotacan sa no nemejhuamej . ' Tla mocniu tlajtlacohua motech , xmelajcanotza ica on tlen oquichiu , niman tla noyolpatla , xtlapojpolhui .

text: And if he trespass against thee seven times in a day , and seven times in a day turn again to thee , saying , I repent ; thou shalt forgive him .
text2: Masqui chicomepa mitzchihuilis tlajtlacojli ipan se tonajli niman cada ves huajlas niman mitzalijlis : “ Aman xoc ocsejpa nicchihuas ” , tla ijcon quitocarohua tictlapojpolhuis .

text: And the apostles said unto the Lord , Increase our faith .
text2: On apóstoles oquijlijquej toTeco : ― Xtechmaca más tlaneltoctli .

text: And the Lord said , If ye had faith as a grain of mustard seed , ye might say unto this sycamine tree , Be thou plucked up by the root , and be thou planted in the sea ; and it should obey you .
text2: Quemaj on toTeco oquimijlij : ― Tla nenquipiasquiaj nemotlaneltoc , masqui sanoyej pitentzin quen yejhua on ixinachyo mostaza , huelisquia nenquijlisquiaj in cojtli sicómoro : “ Xmohuihuitla nican niman xmotocati ne ipan mar ” , niman on cojtli mechtlacamatisquia .

text: But which of you , having a servant plowing or feeding cattle , will say unto him by and by , when he is come from the field , Go and sit down to meat ?
text2: ' Tla semej nemejhuamej quipia se itequichihuilijcau niman tla yejhua yohuajnocuepato ne campa tlaxoponia noso quintlapixtiaya on huacaxtin , ¿ manin tiquijlia : “ Xcalaqui ; xmotlali niman titlacuas ” ?

text: And will not rather say unto him , Make ready wherewith I may sup , and gird thyself , and serve me , till I have eaten and drunken ; and afterward thou shalt eat and drink ?
text2: Ca , tejhua yej tiquijlia : “ Xnechchihuili tlen nicuas , niman xnemi nican para tiquitas tlen nechpolohua chica nejhua nitlacua niman natli . Quemaj quej tejhua huelis titlacuas niman tatlis . ”

text: Doth he thank that servant because he did the things that were commanded him ? I trow not .
text2: ¿ Manin ticmaca tlaxtlahuijli on motequichihuilijcau pampa oquichiu on tlen oticnahuatij ? Cuajli ticmatztoquej ica ca .

text: So likewise ye , when ye shall have done all those things which are commanded you , say , We are unprofitable servants : we have done that which was our duty to do .
text2: No ijqui ijcuac nemejhuamej tlamis nenquichihuasquej nochi tlen Dios mechnahuatia , nonequi nenquijtosquej : “ Tejhuamej xticuajcualtin titequitquej , pampa oticchijquej san on yejhuan nonequi ticchihuasquej . ”

text: And it came to pass , as he went to Jerusalem , that he passed through the midst of Samaria and Galilee .
text2: Ijcuac Jesús onojhuitlalij para Jerusalén , opanoc intzajlan on iregión Samaria niman Galilea .

text: And as he entered into a certain village , there met him ten men that were lepers , which stood afar off :
text2: Ijcuac oajsic ipan se pueblito , oquisquej oquinamiquitoj majtlactlimej tlacamej yejhuan quipiayaj on cualolistli yejhuan palania innacayo itoca lepra . Yejhuamej san huejca onomajmanquej

text: And they lifted up their voices , and said , Jesus , Master , have mercy on us .
text2: niman ijquin ocontzajtzilijquej Jesús : ― ¡ Jesús , Temachtijquetl , xtechicneli niman xtechpalehui !

text: And when he saw them , he said unto them , Go shew yourselves unto the priests . And it came to pass , that , as they went , they were cleansed .
text2: Ijcuac Jesús oquintac , oquimijlij : ― Xhuiyan ; xmoteitititij ne intech on tiopixquej . Niman chica yejhuamej yayaj , opajtiquej .

text: And one of them , when he saw that he was healed , turned back , and with a loud voice glorified God ,
text2: Quemaj semej yejhuamej , ijcuac onotac yopajtic , onocuep , niman ican chicahuac tlajtojli cueyiliaya Dios .

text: And fell down on his face at his feet , giving him thanks : and he was a Samaritan .
text2: Onotlacuenquetz ixpan Jesús onopachoj , niman ocajxitij ixayac hasta ipan tlajli , niman oquimacac tlaxtlahuijli . Niman on tlacatl chanej catca ne Samaria .

text: And Jesus answering said , Were there not ten cleansed ? but where are the nine ?
text2: Quemaj Jesús oquijtoj : ― ¿ Xnochimej on majtlactlimej opajtiquej ? ¿ Canon nemij on ocse chicnahuimej ?

text: There are not found that returned to give glory to God , save this stranger .
text2: ¿ San yejhua in yejhuan xhebreo ohuajnocuepato , para cueyilia Dios ?

text: And he said unto him , Arise , go thy way : thy faith hath made thee whole .
text2: Quemaj Jesús oquijlij on tlacatl : ― Xmoquetztehua niman xhuiya . Otipajtic pampa otitlaneltocac .

text: And when he was demanded of the Pharisees , when the kingdom of God should come , he answered them and said , The kingdom of God cometh not with observation :
text2: On fariseos oquitlajtoltijquej Jesús quemanon pehuas tlamandaros Dios , niman yejhua oquimijlij : ― On ica yejcos ijcuac Dios tlamandaros , on xquen itlaj hueyilistli yejhuan huelis yacaj quitas .

text: Neither shall they say , Lo here ! or , lo there ! for , behold , the kingdom of God is within you .
text2: Nion xnoteijlis : “ Ye nican oncaj ” noso “ Nepa oncaj ” pampa Dios ye nemotzajlan nemi listo para mechmandaros .

text: And he said unto the disciples , The days will come , when ye shall desire to see one of the days of the Son of man , and ye shall not see it .
text2: Quemaj oquimijlij on inomachtijcahuan : ― Yejcos on tonaltin ijcuac nemejhuamej nenquinequisquej para nejhua yejhuan oninochiu Tlacatl nihuajlas nemohuan masqui san se tonajli , pero xninemis nemohuan .

text: And they shall say to you , See here ; or , see there : go not after them , nor follow them .
text2: Niman nemisquej sequimej yejhuan mechijlisquej : “ Nican nemi ” noso “ Nepa nemi . ” Pero nemejhuamej ma ca xhuiyan , nion ma ca xquinhuicacan ,

text: For as the lightning , that lighteneth out of the one part under heaven , shineth unto the other part under heaven ; so shall also the Son of man be in his day .
text2: pampa ijcon quen ne iquisayan tonajli huajpehua nesi on tlapetlanajli niman on tlami hasta ne icalaquiyan on tonajli , sa no ijqui nochihuas ijcuac nejhua yejhuan oninochiu Tlacatl nihuajlas .

text: But first must he suffer many things , and be rejected of this generation .
text2: Pero achtopa ica oncaj sanoyej nitlajyohuis , niman nechixnamiquisquej on tlacamej yejhuan nemij ipan in tonaltin .

text: And as it was in the days of Noe , so shall it be also in the days of the Son of man .
text2: Ijcuac nejhua yejhuan oninochiu Tlacatl nihuajlas , on tlacamej no ijqui nohuicasquej ijcon quen on tlacamej onohuicaquej ipan on tonaltin ijcuac nemiya Noé .

text: They did eat , they drank , they married wives , they were given in marriage , until the day that Noe entered into the ark , and the flood came , and destroyed them all .
text2: Yejhuamej tlacuayaj niman atliyaj , niman nonamictiayaj niman quintemacayaj imichpochhuan para ma nonamictican , hasta ijqui oyejcoc on tonajli ijcuac Noé ocalac ijtic on barco . Niman quemaj ohuajlaj on apachihuilistli niman nochimej yejhuamej oamimiquej .

text: Likewise also as it was in the days of Lot ; they did eat , they drank , they bought , they sold , they planted , they builded ;
text2: Ijcuac nihuajlas no ijqui nohuicasquej on tlacamej quen onohuicaquej ipan on tonaltin ijcuac nemiya Lot . Tlacuayaj niman atliyaj , tlacohuayaj niman tlanamacayaj , tocayaj niman quinchijchihuayaj incal .

text: But the same day that Lot went out of Sodom it rained fire and brimstone from heaven , and destroyed them all .
text2: Pero ipan on tonajli ijcuac Lot oquis ne ipan on hueyican itoca Sodoma , otliquiau ican tlitl niman azufre , niman ijqui nochimej omiquej .

text: Even thus shall it be in the day when the Son of man is revealed .
text2: Ijcon nochihuas ipan on tonajli ijcuac nejhua yejhuan oninochiu Tlacatl nihuajnonextis .

text: In that day , he which shall be upon the housetop , and his stuff in the house , let him not come down to take it away : and he that is in the field , let him likewise not return back .
text2: ' Ipan on tonajli , tla yacaj nemis ne ipan ical , ma ca ma temo para conquixtis on tlajtlamach quipia icalijtic . Niman tla yacaj nemis ne ipan tepetl , ma ca ma huajnocuepa para ichan .

text: Remember Lot ' s wife .
text2: Xquelnamiquican tlinon ipan onochiu isihuau Lot .

text: Whosoever shall seek to save his life shall lose it ; and whosoever shall lose his life shall preserve it .
text2: On yejhuan quichihuas canica para quimaquixtis inemilis ipan in tlalticpactli , quipolos ialma . Pero on yejhuan quipolos inemilis san nopampa quimaquixtis ialma .

text: I tell you , in that night there shall be two men in one bed ; the one shall be taken , and the other shall be left .
text2: ' Nemechijlia ica ipan on tlayohua cochisquej omemej san secan . On se cuicasquej niman ocse cajtehuasquej .

text: Two women shall be grinding together ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: Omemej sihuamej san secan tistiasquej . On se cuicasquej niman ocse cajtehuasquej .

text: Two men shall be in the field ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: Omemej tlacamej nemisquej ne ipan tepetl . On se cuicasquej niman ocse cajtehuasquej .

text: And they answered and said unto him , Where , Lord ? And he said unto them , Wheresoever the body is , thither will the eagles be gathered together .
text2: Ijcuac ijcon oquicaquilijquej , oquitlajtoltijquej : ― ¿ Canon ijcon nochihuas , toTeco ? Niman yejhua oquimijlij : ― Campa tlajcaltos on yolqui yejhuan yomic , ompa nosentlalisquej on tzopilomej . Yejhua ijquin oquijtoj pampa no ijqui yes ne campa nemisquej on yejhuan xtlaneltocaj itech Dios . Ompa quinyolcuitisquej niman quintlajtlacolmacasquej .

text: And he spake a parable unto them to this end , that men ought always to pray , and not to faint ;
text2: Jesús oquintlalilij se ejemplo para quintitis ica nonequi nochipa quichihuasquej oración , niman xqueman cajcahuasquej .

text: Saying , There was in a city a judge , which feared not God , neither regarded man :
text2: Ijquin oquimijlij : ― Ipan se pueblo nemiya se juez teyolcuitijquetl . Yejhua xquitlacaitaya Dios , nion oquipix teicnelilistli para on tlacamej .

text: And there was a widow in that city ; and she came unto him , saying , Avenge me of mine adversary .
text2: Sa no ipan on pueblo no nemiya se sihuacahuajli yejhuan nochipa contaya on juez para quitlajtlaniliaya ma quipalehui para huelis quitlanis on yejhuan ihuan quipiaya tlahuejli .

text: And he would not for a while : but afterward he said within himself , Though I fear not God , nor regard man ;
text2: Miyecpa on juez xoquinec quipalehui on sihuacahuajli , pero más saquin ononemilij : “ Masqui xnictlacaita Dios nion nicpia teicnelilistli para tlacamej ,

text: Yet because this widow troubleth me , I will avenge her , lest by her continual coming she weary me .
text2: nicpalehuis yejhua in sihuatl san pampa sanoyej huajlajtinemi niman nechpajsolohua niman ma ca yej nechyolajxitis . ”

text: And the Lord said , Hear what the unjust judge saith .
text2: Niman on toTeco oquijtoj : ― Xcaquican on tlen oquijtoj on xcuajli juez teyolcuitijquetl .

text: And shall not God avenge his own elect , which cry day and night unto him , though he bear long with them ?
text2: Aman , tej , Dios no quimpalehuis on yejhuan oquintlapejpenij tla ican tonajli niman yehuajli itech nohueyicatzajtzilijtoquej . ¿ Nohuejcahuas ica quimpalehuis ?

text: I tell you that he will avenge them speedily . Nevertheless when the Son of man cometh , shall he find faith on the earth ?
text2: Nemechijlia ica xnohuejcahuas ica quimpalehuis . Pero ijcuac nejhua yejhuan oninochiu Tlacatl nihuajlas , ¿ niquinhuajnextis on tlacamej ipan in tlalticpactli yejhuan tlaneltocaj ?

text: And he spake this parable unto certain which trusted in themselves that they were righteous , and despised others :
text2: Jesús oquimijlij se ejemplo on yejhuan quinemiliaj ica yejhuamej más cuajcualtin niman quinchichihuaj on ocsequimej . Oquijtoj :

text: Two men went up into the temple to pray ; the one a Pharisee , and the other a publican .
text2: ― Omemej tlacamej oquichihuatoj oración ne ipan tiopan . Semej yejhuamej se fariseo catca niman ocse yejhuan tequitiya quen tlacobrarojquetl ican impuestos .

text: The Pharisee stood and prayed thus with himself , God , I thank thee , that I am not as other men are , extortioners , unjust , adulterers , or even as this publican .
text2: On fariseo ijcaticatca niman ijquin quichihuaya ioración : “ Oh Dios , noTajtzin , nimitzmaca tlaxtlahuijli pampa nejhua xnicchihua quen on ocsequimej yejhuan quiteixpachohuiliaj itlaj , niman xyolmelajquej niman sihuapajpatlaj . No ijqui nimitzmaca tlaxtlahuijli pampa xnicchihua quen yejhua in tlacobrarojquetl ican impuestos .

text: I fast twice in the week , I give tithes of all that I possess .
text2: Nejhua ocpa ninosahua ipan se semana , niman de nochi on tlen nictlani ompa niquixtia on diezmo niman nimitzmaca . ”

text: And the publican , standing afar off , would not lift up so much as his eyes unto heaven , but smote upon his breast , saying , God be merciful to me a sinner .
text2: Pero on tlacobrarojquetl san huejca onocau niman xquinequiya nion achijtzin para ajcotlachas ne ilhuicac , yej san noyelpanhuitequiya ican ajmantli niman quijtohuaya : “ ¡ Oh Dios , noTajtzin , xnechicneli ! Nejhua sanoyej nitlajtlacolej . ”

text: I tell you , this man went down to his house justified rather than the other : for every one that exalteth himself shall be abased ; and he that humbleth himself shall be exalted .
text2: Nemechijlia ica ijcuac on tlacobrarojquetl oyaj ichan , xoc quipiaya tlajtlacojli . Pero on fariseo xoquitlapojpolhuijquej , pampa on yejhuan nohueyilia , masqui xquinequis nocnelis , niman on yejhuan nocnelia , quihueyilisquej .

text: And they brought unto him also infants , that he would touch them : but when his disciples saw it , they rebuked them .
text2: On tlacamej quinhuajhuicayaj inconetzitzihuan itech Jesús para ma quincuamatoca . Pero ijcuac on nomachtijquej ijcon oquitaquej , opejquej quimajhuaj on yejhuan quinhuajhuicayaj on coconej .

text: But Jesus called them unto him , and said , Suffer little children to come unto me , and forbid them not : for of such is the kingdom of God .
text2: Pero Jesús oquinnotz on coconej ma huajlacan itech , niman oquimijlij inomachtijcahuan : ― Xquincahuacan on coconej notech ma huajlacan , niman ma ca xquinteltican , pampa on yejhuan yolyemanquej quen in coconej calaquisquej ne campa Dios tlamandarohua .

text: Verily I say unto you , Whosoever shall not receive the kingdom of God as a little child shall in no wise enter therein .
text2: Ica tlen melahuac nemechijlia ica on yejhuan xquiselis itequihuayo Dios quen yacaj conetl , xqueman calaquis campa Dios tlamandarohua .

text: And a certain ruler asked him , saying , Good Master , what shall I do to inherit eternal life ?
text2: Semej yejhuamej on tlayecanquej oquitlajtoltij Jesús : ― Cuajli temachtijquetl , ¿ tlinon nonequi nicchihuas para nicselis on yencuic nemilistli yejhuan para nochipa ?

text: And Jesus said unto him , Why callest thou me good ? none is good , save one , that is , God .
text2: Jesús oquijlij : ― ¿ Tlica tiquijtohua ica nicuajli ? Dios san yejhua iselti cuajli , niman tejhua ticnemilia ica nejhua xniDios .

text: Thou knowest the commandments , Do not commit adultery , Do not kill , Do not steal , Do not bear false witness , Honour thy father and thy mother .
text2: Tejhua tiquimixmati on tlen Dios tlanahuatia : “ Ma ca xsihuapajpatla , ma ca xtemicti , ma ca xtlachtequi , ma ca yacaj xtlajtolquetztehuili , xtlacaita motaj niman monan . ”

text: And he said , All these have I kept from my youth up .
text2: On tlacatl oquijlij : ― Nochi yejhua in desde niconetl nicuajtlacamatztiu .

text: Now when Jesus heard these things , he said unto him , Yet lackest thou one thing : sell all that thou hast , and distribute unto the poor , and thou shalt have treasure in heaven : and come , follow me .
text2: Ijcuac Jesús ijcon ocac , oquijlij : ― Oc mitzpolohua sa se cosa . Xhuiya mochan niman xnamaca nochi tlen ticpia niman on tomin xquinmaca on mayanquej . Tla ijcon ticchihuas , ticpias riquezas ne ilhuicac . Niman quemaj xhuajla niman xnechhuica .

text: And when he heard this , he was very sorrowful : for he was very rich .
text2: Pero ijcuac on tlacatl ijcon ocac , sanoyej onajman pampa sanoyej ricoj catca .

text: And when Jesus saw that he was very sorrowful , he said , How hardly shall they that have riches enter into the kingdom of God !
text2: Ijcuac Jesús oquitac ica on tlacatl onajman , oquijtoj : ― ¡ Sanoyej ohuijticaj para Dios quinmandaros on yejhuan ricos !

text: For it is easier for a camel to go through a needle ' s eye , than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Más sanoyej ohuijticaj para se rico calaquis ne campa Dios tlamandarohua xquen para se camello panos ipan on campa tlacoyoniaj ican aguja .

text: And they that heard it said , Who then can be saved ?
text2: San yejhua ica on , yejhuamej on yejhuan ocacquej oquitojquej : ― Tla ijcon , ¿ aquinon huelis maquisas ?

text: And he said , The things which are impossible with men are possible with God .
text2: Jesús oquimijlij : ― On tlen on tlacamej xhuelij quichihuaj , Dios quemaj hueli quichihua .

text: Then Peter said , Lo , we have left all , and followed thee .
text2: Pedro oquijlij : ― Xquita , tejhuamej yoticajquej nochi tlen ticpiayaj , niman tiquistinemij mohuan .

text: And he said unto them , Verily I say unto you , There is no man that hath left house , or parents , or brethren , or wife , or children , for the kingdom of God ' s sake ,
text2: Ijcuacon yejhua oquimijlij : ― Ica tlen melahuac nemechijlia ica san aquinon yejhuan quicahuas ichan , noso itajhuan , noso icnihuan , noso isihuau , noso iconehuan san ipampa itequiu Dios ,

text: Who shall not receive manifold more in this present time , and in the world to come life everlasting .
text2: quiselis miyec más ipan in tonaltin , niman ipan on tonaltin yejhuan huajlau quiselis nemilistli yejhuan para nochipa .

text: Then he took unto him the twelve , and said unto them , Behold , we go up to Jerusalem , and all things that are written by the prophets concerning the Son of man shall be accomplished .
text2: Jesús ocsecan oquinnotz on majtlactli huan ome nomachtijquej , niman oquimijlij : ― Aman tiahuij ne Jerusalén campa tenquisas nochi tlen on tiotlajtojquej oquijcuilojquej noca nejhua yejhuan oninochiu Tlacatl .

text: For he shall be delivered unto the Gentiles , and shall be mocked , and spitefully entreated , and spitted on :
text2: Nechtemacasquej , tej , intech on yejhuan xhebreos . Yejhuamej nechhuetzcasquej , nechhuijhuicaltisquej niman nechchijchasquej .

text: And they shall scourge him , and put him to death : and the third day he shall rise again .
text2: Nechhuijhuitequisquej niman quemaj nechmictisquej , pero ipan yeyi tonajli nejhua niyolihuis niman ninoquetztehuas ne ipan notlalcon .

text: And they understood none of these things : and this saying was hid from them , neither knew they the things which were spoken .
text2: Nochi yejhua on tlen oquimijlij xocajsicamatquej , pampa nochi on tlajtlamach tlen oquimijlij Dios xoquincahuilij ma cajsicamatican . Yejhuamej , tej , nion achijtzin xquimatiyaj tlinon ica tlajtlajtojticatca .

text: And it came to pass , that as he was come nigh unto Jericho , a certain blind man sat by the way side begging :
text2: Ijcuac Jesús oquinisihuij on hueyican itoca Jericó , se ciego yehuaticatca ipan ojtli notlajtlayehuiticatca .

text: And hearing the multitude pass by , he asked what it meant .
text2: Ijcuac on ciego ocac miyec tlacatl panoticaj ne campaca yejhua nemiya , oquitetlajtoltij tlinon nochijticaj .

text: And they told him , that Jesus of Nazareth passeth by .
text2: Niman oquijlijquej ica Jesús yejhuan hualehua Nazaret ompaca panoticatcaj .

text: And he cried , saying , Jesus , thou Son of David , have mercy on me .
text2: Quemaj on ciego otzajtzic : ― ¡ Jesús , huejca teixhuiu itech David , xnechicneli niman xnechpalehui !

text: And they which went before rebuked him , that he should hold his peace : but he cried so much the more , Thou Son of David , have mercy on me .
text2: On yejhuan tlayecapan yayaj ocajhuaquej niman oquijlijquej para ma ca sa ma nahuati , pero yejhua oc más tzajtziya : ― ¡ Huejca teixhuiu itech David , xnechicneli niman xnechpalehui !

text: And Jesus stood , and commanded him to be brought unto him : and when he was come near , he asked him ,
text2: Quemaj Jesús onoteltij niman otlanahuatij ma canilitij . Ijcuac ixpan yocuajhuiquilijquej , Jesús ijquin oquijlij :

text: Saying , What wilt thou that I shall do unto thee ? And he said , Lord , that I may receive my sight .
text2: ― ¿ Tlinon ticnequi ma nimitzchihuili ? Niman on ciego oquijlij : ― NoTeco , xchihua para ma nitlacha .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Receive thy sight : thy faith hath saved thee .
text2: Jesús oquijlij : ― ¡ Xseli motlachalis ! Nimantzin on ciego ohuel otlachix . Quemaj Jesús oquijlij : ― Aman oticselij motlachalis pampa otitlaneltocac ica nimitzpajtisquia . Ijcuacon yejhua oyaj ihuan Jesús , niman quihueyiliaya Dios . Niman nochimej tlacamej yejhuan oquitaquej yejhua on no oquiyectenejquej Dios .

text: And Jesus entered and passed through Jericho .
text2: Quemaj Jesús ocalac niman san opanotiquis ne ipan on hueyican itoca Jericó .

text: And , behold , there was a man named Zacchaeus , which was the chief among the publicans , and he was rich .
text2: Ipan on hueyican nemiya se tlacatl yejhuan rico catca . Yejhua intlayecancau catca on tlacobrarojquej ican impuestos . Yejhua itoca catca Zaqueo .

text: And he sought to see Jesus who he was ; and could not for the press , because he was little of stature .
text2: Yejhua quinequiya quitas aquinon Jesús , pero xhueliya quitaya pampa yejhua semi xhuejcapan catca niman sanoyej tojlan catca .

text: And he ran before , and climbed up into a sycomore tree to see him : for he was to pass that way .
text2: Ne campaca Jesús opanoc , oncatca se cojtli itoca sicómoro . Niman Zaqueo onotlaloj niman otlejcoto ne ipan on cojtli para ohuel oquitac Jesús .

text: And when Jesus came to the place , he looked up , and saw him , and said unto him , Zacchaeus , make haste , and come down ; for to day I must abide at thy house .
text2: Ijcuac Jesús ompaca panotiaya , onajcotlachix , niman oquijlij Zaqueo : ― Zaqueo , xhuajtemotetzi , pampa aman ica oncaj mochan ninocahuas .

text: And he made haste , and came down , and received him joyfully .
text2: Quemaj Zaqueo nimantzin ohuajtemoc , niman ican pactli oquiselij Jesús .

text: And when they saw it , they all murmured , saying , That he was gone to be guest with a man that is a sinner .
text2: Ijcuac ijcon oquitaquej , nochimej opejquej quichtacatlatohuiliayaj , niman quijtohuayaj tlica Jesús ocalaquito niman nocahua ichan se tlajtlacolej .

text: And Zacchaeus stood , and said unto the Lord ; Behold , Lord , the half of my goods I give to the poor ; and if I have taken any thing from any man by false accusation , I restore him fourfold .
text2: Quemaj Zaqueo ohuajnotelquetz niman oquijlij on toTeco : ― Xcaqui , noTeco , on tlen nicpia tlajcotipan niquinmacas on yejhuan mayanquej . Niman tla yacaj onicajcayajca para ohuel onictlachtequilij , naupa sa no ijqui nicuepilis on quech oniquichtequilijca .

text: And Jesus said unto him , This day is salvation come to this house , forsomuch as he also is a son of Abraham .
text2: Jesús oquijlij : ― Aman on yejhuan chantij nican ipan in cajli yoquiseliquej temaquixtilistli , pampa in tlacatl no tlaneltoca quen Abraham otlaneltocac .

text: For the Son of man is come to seek and to save that which was lost .
text2: Nejhua , tej , yejhuan oninochiu Tlacatl onihuajlaj para onictejtemoco niman oniquicmaquixtico on yejhuan ixpolijtoquej .

text: And as they heard these things , he added and spake a parable , because he was nigh to Jerusalem , and because they thought that the kingdom of God should immediately appear .
text2: Chica on tlacamej cacticatcaj on tlajtlamach yejhuan Jesús quimijlijticatca , oquintlalilij ocse ejemplo , pampa ye nisiu Jerusalén nemiya niman on tlacamej quinemiliayaj ica san yejcotetzis on ica Dios tlamandaros .

text: He said therefore , A certain nobleman went into a far country to receive for himself a kingdom , and to return .
text2: Yejhua ijquin oquimijlij : ― Nemiya se hueyixticaj tlacatl . In tlacatl ye quipiaya para yas huejca ipan ocse país campa conselis tlanahuatijli para rey yes , niman quemaj ocsejpa huajlas .

text: And he called his ten servants , and delivered them ten pounds , and said unto them , Occupy till I come .
text2: Ijcuac xe yaya ipan on país , oquinnotz majtlactlimej itequichihuilijcahuan para cada se quimacas huejhueyi tomin . Quemaj oquinmijlij : “ San chica nihuajlau , xtlacohuacan niman xtlanamacacan ica in tomin . ”

text: But his citizens hated him , and sent a message after him , saying , We will not have this man to reign over us .
text2: Pero on tlacamej chanejquej ipan on país quitlahuelitayaj on tlacatl . Yejhua ica yejhuamej oquintitlanquej quesquimej tlacamej yejhuan san ocuitlapanhuijquej para oquiteijlitoj : “ Xticnequij para yejhua in tlacatl torey yes . ”

text: And it came to pass , that when he was returned , having received the kingdom , then he commanded these servants to be called unto him , to whom he had given the money , that he might know how much every man had gained by trading .
text2: On tlacatl oquiselij tlanahuatijli para rey , niman quemaj onocuep para oyaj ipan ipaís . Ijcuac oajsic ichan , oquintlatitlanilij on yejhuan oquincahuilijtejca itomin . Yejhua oquintecuitlan para quimatis quech yoquitlan cada se .

text: Then came the first , saying , Lord , thy pound hath gained ten pounds .
text2: On achtoj tlacatl oyaj itech , niman oquijlij : “ Señor , motomin ocse majtlactli yoquitlan . ”

text: And he said unto him , Well , thou good servant : because thou hast been faithful in a very little , have thou authority over ten cities .
text2: Niman on rey oquijlij on tlacatl : “ Sanoyej cuajli tlen oticchiu . Tejhua ticuajli tequitquetl . Niman pampa oticpix cuajli moyojlo ipan on tlen achijtzin onimitzmacac , nimitzmactilis majtlactli pueblos para titequihuaj yes . ”

text: And the second came , saying , Lord , thy pound hath gained five pounds .
text2: Quemaj quej yejhua on ocse oyaj itech niman oquijlij : “ Señor , motomin ocse macuijli yoquitlan . ”

text: And he said likewise to him , Be thou also over five cities .
text2: Niman on rey no ijqui oquijlij : “ Tejhua nimitzmactilis macuijli pueblos para titequihuaj yes . ”

text: And another came , saying , Lord , behold , here is thy pound , which I have kept laid up in a napkin :
text2: Quemaj quej on ocse oyaj itech niman oquijlij : “ Señor , nican oncaj motomin yejhuan oniquejeu ican se pañito .

text: For I feared thee , because thou art an austere man : thou takest up that thou layedst not down , and reapest that thou didst not sow .
text2: Nejhua oninomojtij pampa tejhua tiyoltechicactic , niman ticmoyaxcatia on tlen xmoyaxca niman tictlani on itlanca on tlen tictemaca . ”

text: And he saith unto him , Out of thine own mouth will I judge thee , thou wicked servant . Thou knewest that I was an austere man , taking up that I laid not down , and reaping that I did not sow :
