text2: Ijcuacon on rey oquijlij : “ ¡ Xcuajli tequichihuilijquetl ! Sa no ican motlajtol nimitztlajtlacolmaca . Tejhua ticmatzticatca ica niyoltechicactic , pampa nicnoyaxcatia on tlen xnoyaxca niman nictlani itlanca on tlen nictemaca .

text: Wherefore then gavest not thou my money into the bank , that at my coming I might have required mine own with usury ?
text2: Tla ijcon , tej , ¿ tlica xoticalactij notomin ipan banco para tla yonejcoc nochan nicselijtejcosquia on itlanca ? ”

text: And he said unto them that stood by , Take from him the pound , and give it to him that hath ten pounds .
text2: Quemaj on rey oquimijlij on yejhuan ompa nemiyaj : “ Xcuilican on tomin niman xmacacan on yejhuan quipia majtlactli tomin . ”

text: ( And they said unto him , Lord , he hath ten pounds . )
text2: Niman yejhuamej oquijlijquej on rey : “ Pero Señor , yejhua ye quipia majtlactli . ”

text: For I say unto you , That unto every one which hath shall be given ; and from him that hath not , even that he hath shall be taken away from him .
text2: On rey oquimijlij : “ Nejhua , tej , nemechijlia ica on yejhuan quipia miyec , más quimacasquej . Pero on yejhuan san quipia achijtzin hasta on quech quipia cuilisquej .

text: But those mine enemies , which would not that I should reign over them , bring hither , and slay them before me .
text2: Niman on notlahuelicnihuan yejhuan xquinequiyaj niinrey yes , xnechinhuajhuiquilican niman nixpan xquinmictican . ”

text: And when he had thus spoken , he went before , ascending up to Jerusalem .
text2: Ijcuac Jesús otlan quiteijlia on ejemplo , otlejcoc ipan on ojtli para Jerusalén ne inyecapan on ocsequimej .

text: And it came to pass , when he was come nigh to Bethphage and Bethany , at the mount called the mount of Olives , he sent two of his disciples ,
text2: Ijcuac oquinnisihuij on pueblos intoca Betfagé niman Betania , yejhuan onoquej nisiu itech on tepetl itoca Olivos , oquintitlan omemej inomachtijcahuan ,

text: Saying , Go ye into the village over against you ; in the which at your entering ye shall find a colt tied , whereon yet never man sat : loose him , and bring him hither .
text2: niman ijquin oquimijlij : ― Xhuiyan ipan on pueblito yejhuan oncaj ne tlayecapan . Ne campa nemoncalactiasquej , nenquitasquej salijticaj se polocotzin yejhuan xqueman yacaj ipan tlejcohua . Xtojtomacan , tej , niman xnechajhuiquilican .

text: And if any man ask you , Why do ye loose him ? thus shall ye say unto him , Because the Lord hath need of him .
text2: Niman tla yacaj mechtlajtoltia tlica nenquitojtomaj , xquijlican ica nemoTeco quitequitiltis .

text: And they that were sent went their way , and found even as he had said unto them .
text2: On nomachtijquej oyajquej ipan on pueblito niman oquinextijquej ijcon quen Jesús oquimijlij .

text: And as they were loosing the colt , the owners thereof said unto them , Why loose ye the colt ?
text2: Ijcuac yejhuamej quitojtonticatcaj on polocotzin , on iteco oquintlajtoltij : ― ¿ Tlica nenquitojtomaj on polocotzin ?

text: And they said , The Lord hath need of him .
text2: On nomachtijquej oquinanquilijquej : ― Pampa on toTeco quitequitiltis .

text: And they brought him to Jesus : and they cast their garments upon the colt , and they set Jesus thereon .
text2: Niman ocuiquilijquej Jesús on polocotzin . Quemaj oquitlalijquej intlaquen ipan on polocotzin , niman oquitlejcoltijquej Jesús .

text: And as he went , they spread their clothes in the way .
text2: Chica Jesús yetiaya ipan on polocotzin , on tlacamej quisojtiayaj intlaquen ipan ojtli .

text: And when he was come nigh , even now at the descent of the mount of Olives , the whole multitude of the disciples began to rejoice and praise God with a loud voice for all the mighty works that they had seen ;
text2: Ijcuac Jesús oajsic ne campa pehuas temos ipan on tepetl itoca Olivos , nochimej on miyequej nomachtijquej opejquej paquij , niman quiyectenehuayaj Dios ican chicahuac tlajtoli pampa nochi on tlamajhuisoltin yejhuan oquitaquej .

text: Saying , Blessed be the King that cometh in the name of the Lord : peace in heaven , and glory in the highest .
text2: On nomachtijquej quijtohuayaj : ― ¡ Dios ma quitiochihua on Rey yejhuan huajlau ican itocatzin toTeco ! ¡ Ma onya yolsehuilistli ne ilhuicac , niman ma Dios quiseli hueyilistli !

text: And some of the Pharisees from among the multitude said unto him , Master , rebuke thy disciples .
text2: Quemaj sequimej fariseos yejhuan nemiyaj intzajlan on tlacamej oquijlijquej Jesús : ― Temachtijquetl , xquintlacahualti monomachtijcahuan .

text: And he answered and said unto them , I tell you that , if these should hold their peace , the stones would immediately cry out .
text2: Pero Jesús oquimijlij : ― Nejhua nemechijlia ica tla yejhuamej nocamatzacuasquej , yej in temej tzajtzisquej .

text: And when he was come near , he beheld the city , and wept over it ,
text2: Jesús sa nisiu yaya itech Jerusalén , niman ijcuac ocontac on hueyican , ochocac ,

text: Saying , If thou hadst known , even thou , at least in this thy day , the things which belong unto thy peace ! but now they are hid from thine eyes .
text2: niman oquijtoj : ― ¡ Tla ticajsicamatisquia ica ipan in tonajli huelisquia ticselisquia yolsehuilistli , xticselisquia icastigo Dios ! Pero aman yejhua on omitziyanilijquej niman xhueli ticmati .

text: For the days shall come upon thee , that thine enemies shall cast a trench about thee , and compass thee round , and keep thee in on every side ,
text2: Mopan yejcos on xcuajli tonaltin ijcuac on motlahuelicnihuan mitzyehualtzacuasquej ican se tepanchinantli . Sa no yejhuamej mitzyehualosquej niman nochihuiyan mitzmajmasquej .

text: And shall lay thee even with the ground , and thy children within thee ; and they shall not leave in thee one stone upon another ; because thou knewest not the time of thy visitation .
text2: Yejhuamej , tej , hasta ixco tlajli mitzcahuasquej . Yejhuamej quinmictisquej on mopan chanejquej , niman xmitzcahuilisquej nion se tetl nepanijtias , pampa xoticmat tlen tonajli omitznotzaco Dios para mitzmacas temaquixtilistli .

text: And he went into the temple , and began to cast out them that sold therein , and them that bought ;
text2: Quemaj Jesús ocalaquito ne ijtic on hueyi tiopan niman opeu quinhuajquixtia on yejhuan ompa tlanamacayaj niman tlacohuayaj .

text: Saying unto them , It is written , My house is the house of prayer : but ye have made it a den of thieves .
text2: Yejhua ijquin oquimijlij : ― Ipan on Yectlajcuilojli ijquin tlajcuilolnesticaj : “ Nochan itoca yes chanyotl campa quichihuasquej oración . ” Pero nemejhuamej yonencuepquej quen teostocajli campa on tlachtequej nosentlaliaj .

text: And he taught daily in the temple . But the chief priests and the scribes and the chief of the people sought to destroy him ,
text2: Jesús mojmostla temachtiaya ipan on hueyi tiopan , pero intlayecancau on tiopixquej , niman on temachtijquej ican itlanahuatil Moisés niman on tlayecanquej ipan on hueyican quitejtemohuiliayaj quen ijqui huelis quimictisquej .

text: And could not find what they might do : for all the people were very attentive to hear him .
text2: Pero xquimatiyaj quen ijqui huelis quimictisquej , pampa nochi tlacatl sanoyej quinequiya caquis nochi tlinon yejhua quijtohuaya .

text: And it came to pass , that on one of those days , as he taught the people in the temple , and preached the gospel , the chief priests and the scribes came upon him with the elders ,
text2: Se tonajli ne ipan on hueyi tiopan , Jesús quinmachtiaya on tlacamej niman quimijliaya on temachtijli yejhan quitemaca temaquixtilistli . Intlayecancahuan on tiopixquej niman on temachtijquej ican itlanahuatil Dios san secan ihuan on tlajtlajmatquej oajsiquej itech Jesús ,

text: And spake unto him , saying , Tell us , by what authority doest thou these things ? or who is he that gave thee this authority ?
text2: niman oquijlijquej : ― Xtechijli ¿ tlen tequihuajyotl ticpia para ticchihua yejhua in tlajtlamach ? ¿ Aquinon , tej , omitzmacac yejhua on tequihuajyotl ?

text: And he answered and said unto them , I will also ask you one thing ; and answer me :
text2: Niman Jesús oquimijlij : ― Nejhua no nicpia tlen nemechtlajtoltis .

text: The baptism of John , was it from heaven , or of men ?
text2: Xnechijlican , ¿ aquinon ocuajtitlan Juan para ma tlacuatequi ? ¿ Dios ocuajtitlan , noso on tlacamej ocuajtitlanquej ?

text: And they reasoned with themselves , saying , If we shall say , From heaven ; he will say , Why then believed ye him not ?
text2: Quemaj yejhuamej opejquej ijquin quinochtacatlajtlajtoltiayaj : ― ¿ Quen ijqui tiquijlisquej ? Tla tiquijtosquej ica Dios ocuajtitlan , yejhua ijquin techijlis : “ Tla ijcon , ¿ tlica , xonenquineltocaquej on tlen Juan oquijtoj nocanejhua ? ”

text: But and if we say , Of men ; all the people will stone us : for they be persuaded that John was a prophet .
text2: Niman tla tiquijtosquej ica on tlacamej ocuajtitlanquej , nochimej in tlacamej techmictisquej ican temej , pampa yejhuamej xometlamatij ica Juan itiotlajtojcau Dios .

text: And they answered , that they could not tell whence it was .
text2: Yejhua ica , tej , yejhuamej oquijlijquej Jesús ica xquimatij aquinon ocuajtitlan Juan para ma tlacuatequi .

text: And Jesus said unto them , Neither tell I you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Niman Jesús oquimijlij : ― Yejhua ica nejhua no xnemechijlis aquinon onechmacac tequihuajyotl para nicchihua yejhua in tlajtlamach .

text: Then began he to speak to the people this parable ; A certain man planted a vineyard , and let it forth to husbandmen , and went into a far country for a long time .
text2: Quemaj Jesús opeu quinnojnotza on tlacamej niman oquintlalilij yejhua in ejemplo : ― Sen tlalejquetl oquitocac miyec uvas , niman ijcuac yoquitocac oquintlanejtij sequimej medieros para quitlapilisquej ican on uvas . Niman on tlalejquetl onejcuanij niman oyaj ipan ocse país para miyec tonaltin .

text: And at the season he sent a servant to the husbandmen , that they should give him of the fruit of the vineyard : but the husbandmen beat him , and sent him away empty .
text2: Ijcuac oyejcoc on tonaltin para quitequisquej on uvas , on tlalejquetl yejhuan oquitocac on uvas oquititlan itequichihuilijcau para ma quintlajtlaniliti on medieros on quech yejhua quitocarohua quiselis . Pero yejhuamej oquimajmailijquej on tequichihuilijquetl niman ocotitlanquej . Xitlaj oquimacaquej .

text: And again he sent another servant : and they beat him also , and entreated him shamefully , and sent him away empty .
text2: Quemaj on tlalejquetl oquititlan ocse itequichihuilijcau , pero yejhua on tequichihuilijquetl no oquitlahuelixnamiquej niman oquimajmailijquej , niman oquititlanquej . Xitlaj oquimacaquej .

text: And again he sent a third : and they wounded him also , and cast him out .
text2: Quemaj on tlalejquetl oquititlan on ica yeyi itequichihuilijcau , pero on medieros ipan on uvasyoj no ocojcocojquej niman ocuajquixtijquej .

text: Then said the lord of the vineyard , What shall I do ? I will send my beloved son : it may be they will reverence him when they see him .
text2: ' Quemaj iteco on tlatoctli ijquin oquinemilij : “ ¿ Quen ijqui nicchihuas ? ¡ Ah , aman nicmati ! Nictitlanis notlajsojcaconeu . Cas ijcuac quitasquej quitlacaitasquej . ”

text: But when the husbandmen saw him , they reasoned among themselves , saying , This is the heir : come , let us kill him , that the inheritance may be ours .
text2: Pero ijcuac on medieros oquitaquej on teconeu , oquinojlijquej : “ Yejhua in iconeu on tlalejquetl . Ijcuac miquis itataj , yejhua yes iyaxca nochi in tlajli . Aman , tej , ma ticmictican iconeu para tejhuamej toyaxca yes . ”

text: So they cast him out of the vineyard , and killed him . What therefore shall the lord of the vineyard do unto them ?
text2: Yejhuamej , tej , ocuajquixtijquej on teconeu ne ipan on uvasyoj , niman oquimictijquej . Quemaj Jesús oquintlajtoltij : ― Aman , tej , iteco on uvasyo , ¿ tlinon quinchihuilis on xcuajcualtin medieros ?

text: He shall come and destroy these husbandmen , and shall give the vineyard to others . And when they heard it , they said , God forbid .
text2: Yejhua , tej , yas niman quinhuajmictis on medieros niman on tlatoctli ocsequimej quinmacasquej para cuidarosquej . Ijcuac on tlacamej ijcon ocacquej on ejemplo , oquimatquej ica on iteco on uvasyo quijtosnequi Dios , niman on xcuajcualtin tequitquej quijtosnequi sa no yejhuamej . Yejhua ica oquijtojquej : ― ¡ Xnejli ! Dios xquichihuas .

text: And he beheld them , and said , What is this then that is written , The stone which the builders rejected , the same is become the head of the corner ?
text2: Pero Jesús oquimixtlaloj , niman oquimijlij : ― Tla xijqui tej , ¿ tlinon quijtosnequi yejhua in Yectlajcuilojli ? Ijquin tlajcuilolnesticaj : On tetl yejhuan xoquiselijquej on tepanchijquej aman yejhua yacatztica .

text: Whosoever shall fall upon that stone shall be broken ; but on whomsoever it shall fall , it will grind him to powder .
text2: San aquinon ipan huetzis on tetl , tepojpostequis , niman tla on tetl yacaj ipan huetzis , quicuejcuechtilis .

text: And the chief priests and the scribes the same hour sought to lay hands on him ; and they feared the people : for they perceived that he had spoken this parable against them .
text2: Nimantzin on intlayecancahuan on tiopixquej niman on temachtijquej ican tlanahuatijli oquejecojquej ocajsiquej Jesús para contzacuasquej , pampa quimatzticatca ica on ejemplo oquintenehuilij yejhuamej . Pero xocajsiquej , pampa quinmacajsiyaj on tlacamej .

text: And they watched him , and sent forth spies , which should feign themselves just men , that they might take hold of his words , that so they might deliver him unto the power and authority of the governor .
text2: Yejhuamej , tej , oquintitlanquej on yejhuan notenehuaj cuajcualtin tlacamej para oquipijpiatoj Jesús . Yejhuamej oquichihualtijquej itlaj ma quijto yejhuan huelis ica quitemactilisquej itech on gobernador .

text: And they asked him , saying , Master , we know that thou sayest and teachest rightly , neither acceptest thou the person of any , but teachest the way of God truly :
text2: Yejhua ica ijquin oquitlajtoltijquej : ― Temachtijquetl , ticmatztoquej ica on tlen tiquijtohua niman tictemachtia yejhua tlen melahuac . Niman no ticmatztoquej ica xqueman titechicoita intech tlacamej , yej on tlacamej cuajli tiquintitia quen Dios quinequi para nohuicasquej .

text: Is it lawful for us to give tribute unto Caesar , or no ?
text2: Aman xtechijli : ¿ Itlanahuatil Moisés techcahuilia tontlatlaxtlahuasquej ican impuestos itech César yejhuan itequihuaj on país Roma ?

text: But he perceived their craftiness , and said unto them , Why tempt ye me ?
text2: Pero Jesús oquimat ica yejhuamej ican xcuajli inyojlo ijcon quitlajtoltiayaj san para cajcayahuasquej . Yejhua ica ijquin oquimijlij : ― ¿ Tlica nennechnequiliaj para ma niquijto itlaj yejhuan ica huelis nennechteixpanhuisquej ?

text: Shew me a penny . Whose image and superscription hath it ? They answered and said , Caesar ' s .
text2: Se xnechititican on tomin . ¿ Aquinon iyaxca yejhua in , niman aquinon itocayo nican tlajcuilolnesticaj ipan in tomin ? Yejhuamej oquijlijquej : ― On tlanahuatijquetl César yejhuan itequihua nochi on país itoca Roma .

text: And he said unto them , Render therefore unto Caesar the things which be Caesar ' s , and unto God the things which be God ' s .
text2: Quemaj Jesús oquimijlij : ― Tla ijcon , tej , xmacacan César on tlen yejhua iyaxca , niman xmacacan Dios on tlen yejhua iyaxca .

text: And they could not take hold of his words before the people : and they marvelled at his answer , and held their peace .
text2: Yejhuamej , tej , xohuelquej ocajcayajquej ica on tlen imixpan on tlacamej quijtohuaya . Yej , yejhuamej otlamojcaitaquej , pampa Jesús ijcon oquinnanquilij niman xoc onahuatquej .

text: Then came to him certain of the Sadducees , which deny that there is any resurrection ; and they asked him ,
text2: Oquitatoj Jesús sequimej saduceos yejhuan quijtohuaj ica xhuelis yolihuisquej niman noquetztehuasquej on mimiquej . Yejhuamej ijquin oquijlijquej Jesús :

text: Saying , Master , Moses wrote unto us , If any man ' s brother die , having a wife , and he die without children , that his brother should take his wife , and raise up seed unto his brother .
text2: ― Temachtijquetl , ipan itlanahuatil Moisés ijquin oquijcuiloj para tejhuamej . Tla se tlacatl miqui niman xican iconehuan cajtehua on sihuatl , icniu on tlacatl ica oncaj nonamictis ihuan on sihuacahuajli , niman ihuan tlascaltis para on coconej nemisquej quen iconehuan yesquia on icniu yejhuan omic .

text: There were therefore seven brethren : and the first took a wife , and died without children .
text2: Aman , tej , nemiyaj chicomemej icniutin yejhuan tlacamej . On yejhuan yencuiyotl ononamictij , niman quemaj omic , pero on sihuatl xoquitlascaltililij .

text: And the second took her to wife , and he died childless .
text2: Quemaj on ica ome teicniu ononamictij ihuan on sihuacahuajli , niman quemaj no omic in teicniu , niman on sihuatl xoquitlascaltililij .

text: And the third took her ; and in like manner the seven also : and they left no children , and died .
text2: Quemaj quej on ica yeyi teicniu ononamictij ihuan on sihuacahuajli , niman hasta ijqui oquijsatoj nochimej on icniutin . Nochimej , tej , omiquej , niman nion se xoquitlascaltililij on sihuatl .

text: Last of all the woman died also .
text2: Quemaj on sihuatl no omic .

text: Therefore in the resurrection whose wife of them is she ? for seven had her to wife .
text2: Ijcuac yolihuilos , ¿ catlejhua itech tesihuau yes de yejhuamej on chicomemej icniutin , pampa nochimej oquipixquej quen insihuau ?

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , The children of this world marry , and are given in marriage :
text2: Quemaj Jesús oquimijlij : ― Chica nemij ipan in tlalticpactli , on tlacamej niman on sihuamej nonamictiaj niman on tatajtin quintemacasquej imichpochhuan para ma nonamictican .

text: But they which shall be accounted worthy to obtain that world , and the resurrection from the dead , neither marry , nor are given in marriage :
text2: Pero ijcuac yolihuisquej niman noquetztehuasquej intzajlan on mimiquej , on yejhuan Dios quincahuilis ajsisquej ne ilhuicac , xoc nonamictisquej nion on tatajtin quintemacasquej inconehuan para ma nonamictican .

text: Neither can they die any more : for they are equal unto the angels ; and are the children of God , being the children of the resurrection .
text2: Xnonamictisquej pampa ompa xoc miquisquej . Yejhuamej , tej , quen on ilhuicactequitquej . Niman pampa yolihuij niman noquetztehuaj intzajlan on mimiquej , yejhuamej teconehuan itech Dios .

text: Now that the dead are raised , even Moses shewed at the bush , when he calleth the Lord the God of Abraham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob .
text2: Hasta Moisés otechmachiltij ica on mimiquej yolihuij niman noquetztehuaj . Ijcuac on tlacotepajsojli tlicuiticatca , toTeco Dios ompa oquijlij Moisés ica yejhua iDios Abraham , Isaac niman Jacob .

text: For he is not a God of the dead , but of the living : for all live unto him .
text2: Ticmatij ica Dios xejhua inDios on mimiquej , yej yejhua inDios on yoltoquej , pampa para yejhua melahuac nochimej quipiaj nemilistli .

text: Then certain of the scribes answering said , Master , thou hast well said .
text2: Quemaj sequimej temachtijquej ican on tlanahuatijli oquijlijquej Jesús : ― Temachtijquetl , cuajli on tlen otiquijtoj .

text: And after that they durst not ask him any question at all .
text2: Niman on saduceos xoc oquinemilijquej itlaj más quitlajtoltisquej .

text: And he said unto them , How say they that Christ is David ' s son ?
text2: Quemaj Jesús oquimijlij : ― ¿ Tlica nijtohua ica Cristo yejhuan Dios oquitlapejpenij para temaquixtis yejhua huejca teixhuiu itech David ?

text: And David himself saith in the book of Psalms , The LORD said unto my Lord , Sit thou on my right hand ,
text2: Tej , ipan on Salmos tlajcuilolnesticaj ica sa no David ijquin quijtohua : Dios oquijlij noTeco : “ Xmotlali nican ipan noyecma ,

text: Till I make thine enemies thy footstool .
text2: hasta caman ma nimitztlali tlayecanquetl intech on yejhuan motlahuelicnihuan . ”

text: David therefore calleth him Lord , how is he then his son ?
text2: Tla David ijcon oquijtoj ica Cristo yejhua iTeco , tla ijcon , tej , ¿ Quen ijqui Cristo hueli huejca teixhuiu itech David ?

text: Then in the audience of all the people he said unto his disciples ,
text2: Nochi tlacatl tlacacticatca ijcuac Jesús ijquin oquimijlij inomachtijcahuan :

text: Beware of the scribes , which desire to walk in long robes , and love greetings in the markets , and the highest seats in the synagogues , and the chief rooms at feasts ;
text2: ― Xmotacan sa no nemejhuamej intech on temachtijquej ican tlanahuatijli yejhuan cuelitaj tlaquenhuejhueyacquistinemij , niman quinequij ican miyec tetlacaitalistli ma quintlajpalocan neca ipan plaza , niman quinequij on más cuajli sietas ne ipan on tiopantin , niman ipan on ilhuimej quinequij nosehuisquej ipan on más huejhueyixtoquej sietas .

text: Which devour widows ' houses , and for a shew make long prayers : the same shall receive greater damnation .
text2: Yejhuamej , tej , no quinchancuiliaj on sihuacahualtzitzintin , niman sanoyej huejhueyac oraciones quijtohuaj imixpan on tlacamej para on tlacamej ma cuajli tlanemilican intech . Yejhuamej , tej , más hueyi castigo quiselisquej .

text: And he looked up , and saw the rich men casting their gifts into the treasury .
text2: Ijtic on hueyi tiopan Jesús ocomintac on ricos quitlaliayaj tomin ijtic on caja campa nosentlalia on huentomin .

text: And he saw also a certain poor widow casting in thither two mites .
text2: No ijqui oquitac se mayanqui sihuacahualtzintli yejhuan ocontlalij san ome cobre tomin ijtic on caja .

text: And he said , Of a truth I say unto you , that this poor widow hath cast in more than they all :
text2: Niman yejhua oquijtoj : ― Ica tlen melahuac nemechijlia ica yejhua in mayanqui sihuacahualtzintli más hueyi oquitlalij ihuentomin xquen nochimej ocsequimej .

text: For all these have of their abundance cast in unto the offerings of God : but she of her penury hath cast in all the living that she had .
text2: Nochimej on ocsequimej , tej , oquitlalijquej inhuentomin yejhuan yoquinsobraroj , pero in sihuatl , masqui mayanqui , oquitemacac nochi tlen quipiaya para notequipanos .

text: And as some spake of the temple , how it was adorned with goodly stones and gifts , he said ,
text2: Ijcuac sequimej inomachtijcahuan tlajtlajtojticatcaj ica on hueyi tiopan niman quen tlachijchiutli ican cualtetzitzintin temej niman yejhua ica on cualtetzitzintin tlajtlamach yejhuan ompa onotetlayocolijca quen ofrendas , Jesús oquijtoj :

text: As for these things which ye behold , the days will come , in the which there shall not be left one stone upon another , that shall not be thrown down .
text2: ― Yejcos on tonajli ijcuac nochi on tlen amantzin nenquitztoquej xoxotonis , niman nion se tetl xnocahuas ipan ocse tetl .

text: And they asked him , saying , Master , but when shall these things be ? and what sign will there be when these things shall come to pass ?
text2: Quemaj oquitlajtoltijquej : ― Temachtijquetl , ¿ quemanon nochihuas ? ¿ Tlen tlamajhuisojli noteititis ijcuac in tlajtlamach ye pehuas nochihuas ?

text: And he said , Take heed that ye be not deceived : for many shall come in my name , saying , I am Christ ; and the time draweth near : go ye not therefore after them .
text2: Jesús oquijtoj : ― Xmotacan sa no nemejhuamej , niman ma ca nenquimocahuilisquej mechcajcayahuasquej , pampa huajlasquej miyequej yejhuan ican noTocatzin cualijtojtiasquej : “ Nejhua niCristo ” , niman “ Aman yoyejcoc on tonajli . ” Pero nemejhuamej ma ca xhuiyan inhuan .

text: But when ye shall hear of wars and commotions , be not terrified : for these things must first come to pass ; but the end is not by and by .
text2: Niman ijcuac nencaquisquej ica oncaj guerras niman revoluciones , ma ca nemomojtisquej . Tej , nochi yejhua on ica oncaj achtopa nochihuas . Pero ijcuac ijcon nochihuas , oc xejhua tonajli para ipan in tlalticpactli tlatlajtlamis nimantzin .

text: Then said he unto them , Nation shall rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom :
text2: Jesús ocsejpa más oquijtoj : ― On tequihuajquej nohuijsoquisquej ihuan ocsequimej tequihuajquej , niman on países nomijmictisquej ihuan ocsequimej países .

text: And great earthquakes shall be in divers places , and famines , and pestilences ; and fearful sights and great signs shall there be from heaven .
text2: Temojtij tlalolinis ipan miyecan , niman onyas apistli niman miyec cualolistli . Niman ne ipan cielo miyec tlajtlamach temojtij nesis , niman huejhueyi tlamajhuisoltin .

text: But before all these , they shall lay their hands on you , and persecute you , delivering you up to the synagogues , and into prisons , being brought before kings and rulers for my name ' s sake .
text2: ' Pero ijcuac xe nochihua nochi yejhua in , mechajsisquej , niman mechtlahuelitasquej niman tlajtlamach ica mechtlajyohuiltisquej niman mechtlajtlacolmacasquej ne impan on tiopantin . No ijqui mechtzajtzacuasquej , niman imixpan on reyes niman gobernadores mechhuicasquej . Nochi yejhua in nochihuas san nopampa .

text: And it shall turn to you for a testimony .
text2: Ijcuac ijcon nemopan nochihuas , huelis noca nentenojnotzasquej .

text: Settle it therefore in your hearts , not to meditate before what ye shall answer :
text2: Xmoyolchicahuacan , tej , para ma ca sa nencomatztiasquej tlen tlajtojli nenquijtosquej para nemomanahuisquej .

text: For I will give you a mouth and wisdom , which all your adversaries shall not be able to gainsay nor resist .
text2: Ijcon xmoyolchicahuacan , pampa on tlen tlajtojli niman tlamatquilistli mechpolos , nejhua nemechmacas yejhuan nion se nemotlahuelicniu xhuelis quixicos nion xhuelis quixnamiquis .

text: And ye shall be betrayed both by parents , and brethren , and kinsfolks , and friends ; and some of you shall they cause to be put to death .
text2: Nemejhuamej hasta nemotajhuan , nemocnihuan , on yejhuan sa huejca nemochanecahuan niman nemotetlajsojcahuan sa no yejhuamej mechtemajcasquej . Niman sequimej nemejhuamej mechchihuilisquej para mechmictisquej .

text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name ' s sake .
text2: Niman san pampa nennechneltocaj , nochi tlacatl mechtlahuelitas .

text: But there shall not an hair of your head perish .
text2: Pero nion se nemotzon xpolihuis .

text: In your patience possess ye your souls .
text2: Niman tla nemelajcanemij ican nemotlaneltoc , ajsis on tonajli ijcuac nenquiselisquej on nemilistli yejhuan para nochipa .

text: And when ye shall see Jerusalem compassed with armies , then know that the desolation thereof is nigh .
text2: ' Ijcuac nenquitasquej ica miyec soldados yoquiyehualoj on Jerusalén , ijcuacon xmatican ica saniman xoxotonis .

text: Then let them which are in Judaea flee to the mountains ; and let them which are in the midst of it depart out ; and let not them that are in the countries enter thereinto .
text2: Ijcuacon on yejhuan nemisquej ne Judea ma ontlatlacsacan neca ipan tepemej . Niman on yejhuan nemisquej ne Jerusalén ma quisacan ompa , niman on yejhuan ipan tepetl nemisquej ma ca ma calaquican ocsejpa ne Jerusalén .

text: For these be the days of vengeance , that all things which are written may be fulfilled .
text2: Ijcon xchihuacan , pampa ipan on tonaltin onyas castigo . Ijcuacon , tej , tenquisas nochi tlen tlajcuilolnesticaj ipan in Yectlajcuilojli .

text: But woe unto them that are with child , and to them that give suck , in those days ! for there shall be great distress in the land , and wrath upon this people .
text2: Lástima para on sihuamej yejhuan ipan on tonaltin yocanquej inconetzin niman on sihuamej yejhuan ipan on tonaltin tlachichitisquej , pampa ipan on tonaltin miyec cocolistli onyas ipan in país niman se temojtij castigo quipiasquej on hebreos .

text: And they shall fall by the edge of the sword , and shall be led away captive into all nations : and Jerusalem shall be trodden down of the Gentiles , until the times of the Gentiles be fulfilled .
text2: Sequimej miquisquej ipan guerra , niman ocsequimej quintzacuasquej nochihuiyan países . Niman on yejhuan xhebreos quichojcholosquej on hueyican Jerusalén hasta tlamis on tonaltin quech quincahuilisquej ijqui quichihuasquej .

text: And there shall be signs in the sun , and in the moon , and in the stars ; and upon the earth distress of nations , with perplexity ; the sea and the waves roaring ;
text2: ' Quemaj onyas tlamajhuisojli ipan on tonaltzintli , ipan on metztli , niman impan on sitlalimej . Niman nican ipan in tlalticpactli on tlacamej yejhuan chantij ipan on países xquimatisquej tlinon quichihuasquej niman sanoyej nomojtisquej , pampa sanoyej temojtij caquistis on mar niman quen noquetztehuas on mar .

text: Men ' s hearts failing them for fear , and for looking after those things which are coming on the earth : for the powers of heaven shall be shaken .
text2: Chica nochi tlacatl quitasquej on tlen nochihuas ipan in tlalticpactli , yolpopolihuisquej ican innemojtil , pampa nochi quech cojtiticaj ne ipan cielo nolinis .

text: And then shall they see the Son of man coming in a cloud with power and great glory .
text2: Quemaj nechitasquej , nejhua yejhuan oninochiu Tlacatl , nihuajlas ipan se moxtli ican nohueyi poder niman ican nohueyilis .

text: And when these things begin to come to pass , then look up , and lift up your heads ; for your redemption draweth nigh .
text2: Ijcuac pehuas nochihuas in tlajtlamach , xmoyolehuacan niman sa xonajcotlachixtiacan , pampa saniman mechmaquixtisquej .

text: And he spake to them a parable ; Behold the fig tree , and all the trees ;
text2: Quemaj Jesús oquintlalilij yejhua in ejemplo : ― Xquitacan on cojtlaquilyotl itoca higuera niman no ocsequi cojtlaquilyotl .

text: When they now shoot forth , ye see and know of your own selves that summer is now nigh at hand .
text2: Ijcuac nenquitaj selia on cojtli , sa no nemejhuamej nenquimatij ica ye nisiu xompantla yes .

text: So likewise ye , when ye see these things come to pass , know ye that the kingdom of God is nigh at hand .
text2: Sa no ijqui , tej , ijcuac nenquitasquej ye nochijticaj on tlamahuijsoltin yejhuan yonemechijlij , xmatican ica ye nisiu para Dios quinmandaros nochi tlacatl .

text: Verily I say unto you , This generation shall not pass away , till all be fulfilled .
text2: ' Ica tlen melahuac nemechijlia ica nochi in tlamahuijsoltin nochihuas ijcuac xe miquij on tlacamej yejhuan nemij ipan in tonaltin .

text: Heaven and earth shall pass away : but my words shall not pass away .
text2: On cielo niman in tlalticpactli popolihuis , pero notlajtol xqueman popolihuis .

text: And take heed to yourselves , lest at any time your hearts be overcharged with surfeiting , and drunkenness , and cares of this life , and so that day come upon you unawares .
text2: ' Xmotacan sa no nemejhuamej . Ma ca xmoyoltechicahuacan ica on tlen xcuajli , nion ma ca xtlahuantinemican , nion itlaj xcomatztiacan on tlen ica nemotequipanosquej para ma ca huajlas on tonajli ijcuac xnencomatztoquej ica huajlas .

text: For as a snare shall it come on all them that dwell on the face of the whole earth .
text2: Ijcon quen se tlatlalilistli cajsi se yolqui ijcuac on yolqui quinemilia ica cuajli nemi , no yejcos on temojtij tonajli ipan nochi quech tlacatl yejhuan chanti ipan in tlalticpactli .

text: Watch ye therefore , and pray always , that ye may be accounted worthy to escape all these things that shall come to pass , and to stand before the Son of man .
text2: Nemejhuamej , tej , xnemican listos . Niman nochipa xchijtiacan oración para ijqui huelis nemomanahuisquej ipan nochi on tlajyohuilistli yejhuan nochihuas , niman para huelis nemomanasquej nixpan nejhua yejhuan oninochiu Tlacatl .

text: And in the day time he was teaching in the temple ; and at night he went out , and abode in the mount that is called the mount of Olives .
text2: Mojmostla Jesús temachtiaya ne ipan on hueyi tiopan , niman ica tlayohua yaya ne ipan on tepetl itoca Olivos .

text: And all the people came early in the morning to him in the temple , for to hear him .
text2: Niman mojmostla saniman cualcan nochi tlacatl yaya ne hueyi tiopan para concacquiya Jesús .

text: Now the feast of unleavened bread drew nigh , which is called the Passover .
text2: Ye nisiu catca para onyas on ilhuitl yejhuan nochihua ijcuac nocua on pan yejhuan xquipia tlaxocolilistli . On ilhuitl itoca pascua .

text: And the chief priests and scribes sought how they might kill him ; for they feared the people .
text2: Niman intlayecancahuan on tiopixquej niman on temachtijquej ican tlanahuatijli ichtaca quitejtemohuiliayaj quen ijqui quimictisquej Jesús , pampa quinmacajsiyaj on tlacamej .

text: Then entered Satan into Judas surnamed Iscariot , being of the number of the twelve .
text2: Quemaj Satanás ijtic ocalac Judas . Judas no itoca Iscariote , niman yejhua inhuan on majtlactli huan ome nomachtijquej tlapohuajli catca .

text: And he went his way , and communed with the chief priests and captains , how he might betray him unto them .
text2: Yejhua , tej , oyaj oquintato on intlayecancahuan on tiopixquej niman on yejhuan tlayecanquej ipan on hueyi tiopan para oquintlajtlajtohuilito ica quen ijqui huelis quinmactilis Jesús .

text: And they were glad , and covenanted to give him money .
text2: Yejhuamej , tej , opacquej , niman onotlajtolmacaquej para Judas quimacasquej tomin .

text: And he promised , and sought opportunity to betray him unto them in the absence of the multitude .
text2: Judas oquitlalij iyojlo san secan inhuan , niman opeu quitejtemohua quemanon cuajli para quitemactilis Jesús ijcuac on tlacamej xnemisquej itech .

text: Then came the day of unleavened bread , when the passover must be killed .
text2: Oyejcoc on tonajli para onyas on ilhuitl yejhuan nochihua ijcuac nocua on pan yejhuan xquipia tlaxocolilistli . Niman ipan on tonajli ica oncaj quihuentlaliaj on borreguito para quicuaj ipan on ilhuitl pascua .

text: And he sent Peter and John , saying , Go and prepare us the passover , that we may eat .
text2: Niman Jesús oquintitlan Pedro niman Juan ica in tlanahuatijli : “ Xhuiyan . Xchijchihuatij on tlacuajli para ticuasquej ipan on ilhuitl pascua . ”

text: And they said unto him , Where wilt thou that we prepare ?
text2: Yejhuamej oquijlijquej : ― ¿ Canon ticnequi ma ticchijchihuatij ?

text: And he said unto them , Behold , when ye are entered into the city , there shall a man meet you , bearing a pitcher of water ; follow him into the house where he entereth in .
text2: Jesús oquimijlij : ― Ijcuac nemejhuamej nencalaquisquej ipan on hueyican , nenquinamiquisquej se tlacatl yejhuan quitqui se tzotzocojli ican atl . Xcuitlapanhuican , tej , hasta ne campa oncalaquis ,

text: And ye shall say unto the goodman of the house , The Master saith unto thee , Where is the guestchamber , where I shall eat the passover with my disciples ?
text2: niman iteco on cajli ijquin xquijlican : “ On Temachtijquetl oquijtoj : ¿ Canon oncaj on calijtic campa niconcuas on tiotlac tlacuajli ipan on ilhuitl pascua inhuan on nonomachtijcahuan ? ”

text: And he shall shew you a large upper room furnished : there make ready .
text2: Niman yejhua mechititis se hueyi calijtic ne tlapani campa ye tlaojoncaj . Ompa , tej , xchijchihuacan on tlacuajli .

text: And they went , and found as he had said unto them : and they made ready the passover .
text2: Yejhuamej , tej , oyajquej niman ijqui oquinextijquej quen Jesús oquimijlij . Ompa , tej , oquichijchijquej on tlacuajli para tlacuasquej ipan on ilhuitl pascua .

text: And when the hour was come , he sat down , and the twelve apostles with him .
text2: Niman ijcuac oajsic hora para tlacuasquej , Jesús onosehuij itech on mesa inhuan inomachtijcahuan .

text: And he said unto them , With desire I have desired to eat this passover with you before I suffer :
text2: Quemaj Jesús oquimijlij : ― ¡ Sanoyej nicnequiya nemohuan nicuas in tlacuajli ijcuac xe nitlajyohuia !

text: For I say unto you , I will not any more eat thereof , until it be fulfilled in the kingdom of God .
text2: Pampa aman nemechijlia ica xoc ocsejpa nemohuan nicuas hasta on tonajli ijcuac tenquisas on tlen in tlacuajli quijtosnequi ne campa Dios tlamandarohua .

text: And he took the cup , and gave thanks , and said , Take this , and divide it among yourselves :
text2: Quemaj ocontilan se copa yejhuan quipia iyayo on uvas , niman ijcuac yoquimacac tlaxtlahuijli Dios , ijquin oquijtoj : ― Xconican yejhua in niman xmopanoltilijtiacan .

text: For I say unto you , I will not drink of the fruit of the vine , until the kingdom of God shall come .
text2: Nejhua , tej , nemechijlia ica xoc nemohuan niconis iyayo in uvas hasta ijcuac Dios pehuas tlamandaros .

text: And he took bread , and gave thanks , and brake it , and gave unto them , saying , This is my body which is given for you : this do in remembrance of me .
text2: Quemaj ocontilan on pan , niman ijcuac yoquimacac tlaxtlahuijli Dios , oquitlatlapan niman oquinmacac . Quemaj ijquin oquimijlij : ― In pan quixnescayotia notlalnacayo yejhuan nohuentlalis nemopampa . In xcuacan para ica xnechelnamiquican .

text: Likewise also the cup after supper , saying , This cup is the new testament in my blood , which is shed for you .
text2: Ijcuac yocuajquej on tlacuajli , no ijqui oquinmacac on copa niman oquijtoj : ― Yejhua in tlen aman nenconisquej ica in copa quixnescayotia on yencuic pacto yejhuan notzimpehualtis ica noyesyo , niman san nemopampa toyahuis .

text: But , behold , the hand of him that betrayeth me is with me on the table .
text2: ' Xquitacan , aman on tlacatl yejhuan nechtemactilis , nohuan nemi ipan in mesa .

text: And truly the Son of man goeth , as it was determined : but woe unto that man by whom he is betrayed !
text2: Ijcon , tej , nejhua yejhuan oninochiu Tlacatl nimiquis quen Dios otlanahuatij , pero ¡ lástima para on tlacatl yejhuan nechtemactilis !

text: And they began to inquire among themselves , which of them it was that should do this thing .
text2: Quemaj yejhuamej opejquej quinotlajtoltiaj aquinon on quitemactilis .

text: And there was also a strife among them , which of them should be accounted the greatest .
text2: Quemaj yejhuamej opeu notencuicuij ica on aquinon más hueyixtias .

text: And he said unto them , The kings of the Gentiles exercise lordship over them ; and they that exercise authority upon them are called benefactors .
text2: Pero Jesús oquimijlij : ― On reyes yejhuan xhebreos nochihuaj quen inteco on países . Niman on tlacamej quintenehuiliaj cuajcualtin tlacamej .

text: But ye shall not be so : but he that is greatest among you , let him be as the younger ; and he that is chief , as he that doth serve .
text2: Pero nemejhuamej xmechtocarohua ijcon nemohuicasquej . Yej ocse tlamantic . Yejhuan nemotzajlan más hueyixticaj nonequi nohuicas quen xhueyixticaj , niman yejhuan tlamandarohua nonequi nohuicas quen on yejhuan tepalehuijquetl .

text: For whether is greater , he that sitteth at meat , or he that serveth ? is not he that sitteth at meat ? but I am among you as he that serveth .
text2: ¿ Aquinon , tej , más hueyixticaj , on tlayecanquetl yejhuan tlacua ipan mesa , noso on tetlamacajquetl ? Niquijtohua ica on tlayecanquetl yejhuan tlacua . Pero nejhua , masqui nimotlayecancau , ninemi nemotzajlan quen se yejhuan tetlamaca .

text: Ye are they which have continued with me in my temptations .
text2: ' Nemejhuamej , tej , nochipa nohuan yonentlajyohuijtinenquej .

text: And I appoint unto you a kingdom , as my Father hath appointed unto me ;
text2: Yejhua ica , tej , nejhua nemechmaca se tequihuajyotl quen noTajtzin onechmacac .

text: That ye may eat and drink at my table in my kingdom , and sit on thrones judging the twelve tribes of Israel .
text2: Nenmatlisquej niman nentlacuasquej ipan nomesa . Niman nemotlalisquej ipan on huejhueyixtoquej sietas para nenquinyolcuitisquej niman nenquintlajtlacolmacasquej on majtlactli huan ome chanchanejquej itech Israel .

text: And the Lord said , Simon , Simon , behold , Satan hath desired to have you , that he may sift you as wheat :
text2: No ijqui oquijtoj toTeco : ― Simón , Simón , xcaqui . Nemoca yotlajtlan Satanás para mechtzejtzelos quen itlaj trigo ,

text: But I have prayed for thee , that thy faith fail not : and when thou art converted , strengthen thy brethren .
text2: pero nejhua moca yonictlajtlan itech Dios para ma ca ticpolos motlaneltoc . Niman ijcuac tejhua yotimoyolcuep , xquimpalehui mocnihuan para ma melajcanemican .

text: And he said unto him , Lord , I am ready to go with thee , both into prison , and to death .
text2: Simón oquijlij : ― NoTeco , nejhua ninemi listo para mohuan nechtzacuasquej niman hasta para mohuan nimiquis .

text: And he said , I tell thee , Peter , the cock shall not crow this day , before that thou shalt thrice deny that thou knowest me .
text2: Niman Jesús oquijlij : ― Pedro , nejhua nimitzijlia ica sa no aman ijcuac xe tzajtzi on caxtil , tejhua tiquijtos yexpa ica xtinechixmati .

text: And he said unto them , When I sent you without purse , and scrip , and shoes , lacked ye any thing ? And they said , Nothing .
text2: Quemaj Jesús oquimijlij : ― Ijcuac onemechtitlan niman onemechijlij ma ca xquitquican itlaj bolsa , nion tomin , nion cactin , ¿ itlaj omechpoloj ? Yejhuamej oquijtojquej : ― Xitlaj otechpoloj .

text: Then said he unto them , But now , he that hath a purse , let him take it , and likewise his scrip : and he that hath no sword , let him sell his garment , and buy one .
text2: ― Pero aman tla ticpia mobolsa niman motomin , xquitqui , niman tla xticpia moespada xnamaca motlaquen para xcohua moespada .

text: For I say unto you , that this that is written must yet be accomplished in me , And he was reckoned among the transgressors : for the things concerning me have an end .
text2: Pampa nejhua nemechijlia ica on tlen noca tlajcuilolnesticaj ipan on Yectlajcuilojli ica oncaj nochihuas . On Yectlajcuilojli ijquin quijtohua : “ Inhuan xcuajcualtin tlacamej oquipojquej . ” Nochi , tej , tlen noca tlajcuilolnesticaj tenquisas .

text: And they said , Lord , behold , here are two swords . And he said unto them , It is enough .
text2: Ijcuacon yejhuamej oquijtojquej : ― Xquita toTeco , nican oncaj ome espadas . Yejhua oquimijlij : ― ¡ Ah , xnencajsicamatij tlinon niquijtosnequi ! Ma ijqui .

text: And he came out , and went , as he was wont , to the mount of Olives ; and his disciples also followed him .
text2: Quemaj Jesús oquis , niman oyaj ipan on tepetl itoca Olivos inhuan on inomachtijcahuan quen miyecpa oquichiu .

text: And when he was at the place , he said unto them , Pray that ye enter not into temptation .
text2: Ijcuac oajsic , oquimijlij on inomachtijcahuan : ― Xchihuacan oración para ma ca on Satanás mechtlajcalis ipan tlajtlacojli .

text: And he was withdrawn from them about a stone ' s cast , and kneeled down , and prayed ,
text2: Quemaj Jesús oquintlalcahuij huejca quen se ica mahuejca ijcuac tlamotla ican tetl , niman onotlacuenquetz niman onohueyicatzajtzilij .

text: Saying , Father , if thou be willing , remove this cup from me : nevertheless not my will , but thine , be done .
text2: Niman oquijtoj : ― NoTajtzin , tla ticnequi , xnechmanahui para ma ca niquijyohuis in tlen sanoyej teajman . Pero ma ca nochihua quen nejhua nicnequi , yej ma nochihua quen tejhua ticnequi .

text: And there appeared an angel unto him from heaven , strengthening him .
text2: Quemaj se ilhuicactequitquetl yejhuan ne ilhuicac ohualeu , oquinotitij niman oquimacac yolchicahualistli .

text: And being in an agony he prayed more earnestly : and his sweat was as it were great drops of blood falling down to the ground .
text2: Niman pampa yejhua sanoyej noyolcocojticatca , ican más yolchicahualistli onohueyicatzajtzilij . Yejhua , tej , nitoniaya , niman itonil catca quen yestli huejhueyi yejhuan chipinticatca ipan tlajli .

text: And when he rose up from prayer , and was come to his disciples , he found them sleeping for sorrow ,
text2: Ijcuac otlan onohueyicatzajtzilij , ohuajnotelquetz , niman oyaj ne intech on inomachtijcahuan . Ijcuac intech oajsic , oquintac cochtoquej , pampa yoquinsiahuitij inajman .

text: And said unto them , Why sleep ye ? rise and pray , lest ye enter into temptation .
text2: Quemaj oquimijlij : ― ¿ Tlica nencochtoquej ? Xmotelquetzacan , niman xchihuacan oración para xmechtlatlatas on diablo .

text: And while he yet spake , behold a multitude , and he that was called Judas , one of the twelve , went before them , and drew near unto Jesus to kiss him .
text2: Jesús oc tlajtojticatca , ijcuac miyec tlacatl itech oajsic . Niman Judas yejhuan inhuan on nomachtijquej tlapohuajli catca , huajlaya tlayecapan , niman oquinisihuij Jesús para oquitencuaj .

text: But Jesus said unto him , Judas , betrayest thou the Son of man with a kiss ?
text2: Niman Jesús oquijlij : ― Judas ¿ ijcon tinechtencua para tinechtemactilia nejhua yejhuan oninochiu Tlacatl ?

text: When they which were about him saw what would follow , they said unto him , Lord , shall we smite with the sword ?
text2: Ijcuac inomachtijcahuan Jesús yejhuan ihuan ompa nemiyaj oquitaquej tlen ye nochijticaj , oquijlijquej : ― ToTeco , ¿ ma titeixnamiquican ican espada ?

text: And one of them smote the servant of the high priest , and cut off his right ear .
text2: Niman semej yejhuamej oquinacastzontec se tlacatl itlaquehual on más hueyi intlayecancau on tiopixquej . Oquitequilij inacas ipan iyecmacopa .

text: And Jesus answered and said , Suffer ye thus far . And he touched his ear , and healed him .
text2: Pero Jesús oquijtoj : ― Xmoteltican . Ma ijqui . Quemaj Jesús oquimatoquilij inacas on tlaquehuajli niman oquipajtij .

text: Then Jesus said unto the chief priests , and captains of the temple , and the elders , which were come to him , Be ye come out , as against a thief , with swords and staves ?
text2: Quemaj ijquin oquimijlij intlayecancahuan on tiopixquej , niman on tlayecanquej ipan on hueyi tiopan niman on tlajtlajmatquej yejhuan ohualejquej ocanacoj : ― ¿ Onennechajsicoj ican espadas niman cojtin quen yacaj nitlachtequetl yesquia ?

text: When I was daily with you in the temple , ye stretched forth no hands against me : but this is your hour , and the power of darkness .
text2: Mojmostla nemohuan ninemiya ne ipan ihueyi tiopan Dios , niman xonennechajsiquej , pero ipan in hora Dios mechcahuilia nenquichihuaj on tlen nenquinequij . Aman ipoder Satanás tetlani .

text: Then took they him , and led him , and brought him into the high priest ' s house . And Peter followed afar off .
text2: Quemaj ocajsiquej Jesús , niman ocuicaquej ne ichan on más hueyi intlayecancau on tiopixquej . Niman Pedro san huejca cuitlapanhuijtiaya .

text: And when they had kindled a fire in the midst of the hall , and were set down together , Peter sat down among them .
text2: Ompa itlajcotian on quiahuac otlatlatijquej , niman iyehualican on tlitl onotlajtlalijquej , niman Pedro no ompa intzajlan onotlalij .

text: But a certain maid beheld him as he sat by the fire , and earnestly looked upon him , and said , This man was also with him .
text2: Quemaj ijcuac se sihuatl tetequichihuilijquetl oquitac Pedro yehuaticaj itech on tlitl , oquixquechij niman oquijtoj : ― Yejhua in tlacatl no ompa ihuan nemiya .

text: And he denied him , saying , Woman , I know him not .
text2: Pedro oquinenec ican in tlajtojli : ― Sihuatl , nejhua xniquixmati .

text: And after a little while another saw him , and said , Thou art also of them . And Peter said , Man , I am not .
text2: Achijtzin más saquin , quej ocse oquitac Pedro niman oquijlij : ― Tejhua no inhuan tiquistinemiya . Pero Pedro oquijtoj : ― Ca , tlacatl , xnejhua .

text: And about the space of one hour after another confidently affirmed , saying , Of a truth this fellow also was with him : for he is a Galilaean .
text2: Canaj ipan se hora saquin , quej ocse oquimelajcaijtoj : ― In tlacatl melahuac ihuan quistinemiya , pampa yejhua no hualehua Galilea .

text: And Peter said , Man , I know not what thou sayest . And immediately , while he yet spake , the cock crew .
text2: Ijcuacon Pedro oquijtoj : ― Tlacatl , xnicmati tlinon on tiquijtojticaj . Quemaj nimantzin ijcuac Pedro oc tlajtojticatca , otzajtzic on caxtil .

text: And the Lord turned , and looked upon Peter . And Peter remembered the word of the Lord , how he had said unto him , Before the cock crow , thou shalt deny me thrice .
text2: Quemaj toTeco onomalacachoj niman ocontac Pedro . Ijcuacon Pedro oquelnamic on tlen yejhua yoquijlijca : “ Sa no aman ijcuac xe tzajtzi on caxtil tejhua tiquijtos yexpa ica xtinechixmati . ”

text: And Peter went out , and wept bitterly .
text2: Quemaj Pedro oquis ompa niman sanoyej oajmancachocac .

text: And the men that held Jesus mocked him , and smote him .
text2: On tlacamej yejhuan ipan inmahuan nemiya Jesús ica ohuetzcaquej niman oquihuijhuitequej .

text: And when they had blindfolded him , they struck him on the face , and asked him , saying , Prophesy , who is it that smote thee ?
text2: Oquixtlapachojquej niman oquixayacahuijhuitequej , niman ijquin oquijlijquej : ― Xtlajto tiotlajtojquetl . Xtechijli aquinon omitzhuitec .

text: And many other things blasphemously spake they against him .
text2: Niman miyec ocsequi tlamach quijliayaj para oquipijpinahuijquej .

text: And as soon as it was day , the elders of the people and the chief priests and the scribes came together , and led him into their council , saying ,
text2: Ijcuac ohuajtlanes , intlajtlajmatcahuan on tlayecanquej hebreos , niman intlayecancahuan on tiopixquej niman on temachtijquej ican tlanahuatijli onosentlalijquej niman ocuicaquej Jesús imixpan on tetlacanonotzquej . Ompa ijquin oquitlajtoltijquej Jesús :

text: Art thou the Christ ? tell us . And he said unto them , If I tell you , ye will not believe :
text2: ― Xtechijli tla tejhua tiCristo . Yejhua oquimijlij : ― Tla nemechijlis ica niCristo , xnennechneltocasquej .

text: And if I also ask you , ye will not answer me , nor let me go .
text2: Niman tla itlaj nemechtlajtoltis xnennechnanquilisquej nion xnennechmacahuasquej .

text: Hereafter shall the Son of man sit on the right hand of the power of God .
text2: Pero desde aman pehua nejhua yejhuan oninochiu Tlacatl niyehuatias iyecmacopa on Dios yejhuan nochi hueli .

text: Then said they all , Art thou then the Son of God ? And he said unto them , Ye say that I am .
text2: Quemaj nochimej oquijlijquej : ― ¿ Tla ijcon tejhua titeConeu itech Dios ? Jesús oquimijlij : ― Quemaj . Ijqui quen nemejhuamej nenquijtohuaj .

text: And they said , What need we any further witness ? for we ourselves have heard of his own mouth .
text2: Quemaj yejhuamej oquijtojquej : ― Xpolihui más tlateixpanhuijquej . Sa no tejhuamej yoticaquej tlen quijtohua .

text: And the whole multitude of them arose , and led him unto Pilate .
text2: Quemaj nochimej ohuajnotelquetzquej niman ocuicaquej Jesús ixpan Pilato .

text: And they began to accuse him , saying , We found this fellow perverting the nation , and forbidding to give tribute to Caesar , saying that he himself is Christ a King .
text2: Ompa ijquin opeu quiteixpanhuiyaj Jesús , niman oquijtojquej : ― Yejhua in tlacatl oticaquej quimajcomantinemi in tochantlacaj . Quimijlia ica xquitocarohua ontlatlaxtlahuasquej ica on impuestos ne itech César itequihuaj on país de Roma . Niman no notenehua yejhua Cristo , se rey .

text: And Pilate asked him , saying , Art thou the King of the Jews ? And he answered him and said , Thou sayest it .
text2: Niman Pilato oquitlajtoltij : ― ¿ Tejhua tiinRey on hebreos ? Jesús oquinanquilij : ― Ijqui quen tejhua tiquijtohua .

text: Then said Pilate to the chief priests and to the people , I find no fault in this man .
text2: Quemaj Pilato oquimijlij on intlayecancahuan on tiopixquej inhuan on tlacamej : ― Xitlaj nicnextilia tla itlaj xcuajli oquichiu in tlacatl .

text: And they were the more fierce , saying , He stirreth up the people , teaching throughout all Jewry , beginning from Galilee to this place .
text2: Pero yejhuamej más notencojtiliayaj para ipan más oquiteixpanhuijquej : ― Ican itlamachtil quimajcomantinemi nochi tlacatl chanej Judea . Ohuajpeu ne Galilea , niman aman hasta nanica yotlamico .

text: When Pilate heard of Galilee , he asked whether the man were a Galilaean .
text2: Ijcuac Pilato ijcon ocac , otlajtlan tla Jesús chanej ne Galilea .

text: And as soon as he knew that he belonged unto Herod ' s jurisdiction , he sent him to Herod , who himself also was at Jerusalem at that time .
text2: Ijcuac oquijlijquej ica melahuac yejhua chanej ne Galilea , oquititlanilij Herodes on gobernador de Galilea , yejhuan ipan on tonaltin nemiya ne Jerusalén .

text: And when Herod saw Jesus , he was exceeding glad : for he was desirous to see him of a long season , because he had heard many things of him ; and he hoped to have seen some miracle done by him .
text2: Ijcuac Herodes oquitac Jesús , sanoyej opac , pampa miyec tonaltin quinectinemiya quitas . Yoquimachiltijcaj yejhua ica on miyec tlajtlamach oquichiu , niman yejhua ica quinectinemiya quitas ma quichihua se milagro .

text: Then he questioned with him in many words ; but he answered him nothing .
text2: Miyec tlajtlamach oquitlajtoltij , pero Jesús xitlaj ica oquinanquilij .

text: And the chief priests and scribes stood and vehemently accused him .
text2: On intlayecancahuan on tiopixquej niman on temachtijquej ican tlanahuajtijli yejhuan ompa nemiyaj sanoyej quiteixpanhuiayaj .

text: And Herod with his men of war set him at nought , and mocked him , and arrayed him in a gorgeous robe , and sent him again to Pilate .
text2: Quemaj Herodes ihuan isoldados oquipijpinahuijquej niman ica onajahuiltijquej . Quemaj oquitlaquentijquej quen se rey ican se tlaquentli patioj . Niman Herodes ocsejpa oquititlan Jesús itech Pilato .

text: And the same day Pilate and Herod were made friends together : for before they were at enmity between themselves .
text2: Sa no ipan on tonajli Pilato niman Herodes onoyolsehuiquej . Achtoj yejhuamej notlahuelitayaj .

text: And Pilate , when he had called together the chief priests and the rulers and the people ,
text2: Quemaj Pilato san secan oquinsentlalij intlayecancahuan on tiopixquej , on tequihuajquej niman on tlacamej ,

text: Said unto them , Ye have brought this man unto me , as one that perverteth the people : and , behold , I , having examined him before you , have found no fault in this man touching those things whereof ye accuse him :
text2: niman ijquin oquimijlij : ― Ijcuac onennechajhuiquilijquej yejhua in tlacatl , onenquijtojquej ica yejhua quimajcomantinemi on tlacamej . Pero nemixpan yonicyolcuitij , niman nion se tlajtlacojli yejhuan ica nenquiteixpanhuiyaj xonicnextilij .

text: No , nor yet Herod : for I sent you to him ; and , lo , nothing worthy of death is done unto him .
text2: Nion Herodes xoquinextilij tlajtlacojli , pampa ocsejpa yonechajtitlanilij . Xquitacan , xitlaj oquichiu yejhuan quimelahua para yejhua miquis .

text: I will therefore chastise him , and release him .
text2: Aman nicastigaros , niman quemaj nicmacahuas .

text: ( For of necessity he must release one unto them at the feast . )
text2: Pilato ica oncatca para quinmacahuilis se tlacatl yejhuan tzacuticatca on tlacamej ipan on ilhuitl .

text: And they cried out all at once , saying , Away with this man , and release unto us Barabbas :
text2: Pero nochimej opejquej san secan ijquin otzajtziquej : ― ¡ Yejhua on ma ca xmacahua , yej xmacahua Barrabás !

text: ( Who for a certain sedition made in the city , and for murder , was cast into prison . )
text2: Barrabás ocajsiquej pampa onoquetztejca para quixtisquia on tequihuaj de Jerusalén , niman pampa otemictijca .

text: Pilate therefore , willing to release Jesus , spake again to them .
text2: Pilato ocsejpa oquinnotz on tlacamej , pampa quinequiya quimacahuas Jesús .

text: But they cried , saying , Crucify him , crucify him .
text2: Pero yejhuamej ocsejpa más chicahuac otzajtziquej : ― ¡ Xmajmasohualti ! ¡ Xmajmasohualti !

text: And he said unto them the third time , Why , what evil hath he done ? I have found no cause of death in him : I will therefore chastise him , and let him go .
text2: Pilato ica yexpa ijquin oquimijlij : ― ¿ Tlica ? ¿ Tlinon , tej , xcuajli oquichiu ? Nejhua xonicnextilij tlajtlacojli yejhuan quimelahua para miquis . Yejhua ica san nicastigaros , niman quemaj nicmacahuas .

text: And they were instant with loud voices , requiring that he might be crucified . And the voices of them and of the chief priests prevailed .
text2: Pero yejhuamej onotencojtilijquej niman otlanahuatijquej ma quimajmasohualtican ipan cojnepanojli . San secnec , tej , sanoyej otzajtziquej inhuan intlayecancahuan on tiopixquej , niman tlen oquinequej ma nochihua , onochiu .

text: And Pilate gave sentence that it should be as they required .
text2: Pilato onocalactij niman otlanahuatij ijcon quen yejhuamej quinequiyaj .

text: And he released unto them him that for sedition and murder was cast into prison , whom they had desired ; but he delivered Jesus to their will .
text2: Ijcon , tej , Pilato oquimacau on tlacatl yejhuan tzacuticatca pampa onoquetztejca para quixtisquia on tequihuaj de Jerusalén , niman pampa otemictijca . Oquimacau on yejhuan oquitlajtlanquej niman Jesús oquinmactilij quen yejhuamej oquinequej .

text: And as they led him away , they laid hold upon one Simon , a Cyrenian , coming out of the country , and on him they laid the cross , that he might bear it after Jesus .
text2: Ijcuac cuicaticatcaj Jesús para conmajmasohualtisquej ipan cojnepanojli , oquinahuatijquej se tlacatl itoca Simón yejhuan chanejquetl catca ne Cirene . Yejhua ohualeu imijla . Oquichihualtijquej ma quimama on cojnepanojli ne icuitlapan Jesús .

text: And there followed him a great company of people , and of women , which also bewailed and lamented him .
text2: Miyequej tlacamej ocuitlapanhuijquej inhuan miyequej sihuamej yejhuan ipampa chocatiayaj niman najmantiayaj .

text: But Jesus turning unto them said , Daughters of Jerusalem , weep not for me , but weep for yourselves , and for your children .
text2: Pero Jesús ohuajnocuep niman oquimijlij : ― Sihuamej de Jerusalén , ma ca nopampa xchocacan , yej sa no nemejhuamej nemopampa xchocacan niman impampa nemoconehuan .

text: For , behold , the days are coming , in the which they shall say , Blessed are the barren , and the wombs that never bare , and the paps which never gave suck .
text2: Ijcon xchocacan pampa yejcos on tonajli ijcuac ijquin nijtos : “ Dios quintiochihua on sihuamej yejhuan tetzacamej , on sihuamej yejhuan xqueman canaj inconeu niman on chichihualtin yejhuan xqueman tlachichitiaj . ”

text: Then shall they begin to say to the mountains , Fall on us ; and to the hills , Cover us .
text2: Quemaj on tlacamej pehuas quimijlisquej on tepemej : “ Topan xxinican ” , niman no quimijlisquej on tepetzitzintin : “ Xtechiyanacan . ”

text: For if they do these things in a green tree , what shall be done in the dry ?
text2: Tla nejhua yejhuan xnicpia tlajtlacojli nicselia in tlajyohuistli , tla ijcon ¿ tlinon , tej , impan nochihuas on ocsequimej yejhuan quipiaj tlajtlacojli ?

text: And there were also two other , malefactors , led with him to be put to death .
text2: San secan ihuan Jesús no cuicayaj ome xcuajcualtin tlacamej para quinmictisquej .

text: And when they were come to the place , which is called Calvary , there they crucified him , and the malefactors , one on the right hand , and the other on the left .
text2: Ijcuac oajsiquej ne campa itoca “ Micatzontecomatl ” , ompa , tej , Jesús oquimajmasohualtiquej ipan cojnepanojli , niman on omemej xcuajcualtin tlacamej no oquinmajmasohualtiquej ipan cojnepanoltin . Se nemiya iyecmacopa Jesús niman ocse ipan iopochmacopa .

text: Then said Jesus , Father , forgive them ; for they know not what they do . And they parted his raiment , and cast lots .
text2: Niman ijcuac Jesús ye quimajmasohualtijticatca ipan on cojnepanojli oquijtoj : ― NoTajtzin , xquintlapojpolhui , pampa xquimatij tlen quichihuaj . Niman on soldados onotlatlanquej para oquitaquej cada se tlinon quitquis de yejhua on itlaquen Jesús .

text: And the people stood beholding . And the rulers also with them derided him , saying , He saved others ; let him save himself , if he be Christ , the chosen of God .
text2: On tlacamej yejhuan ompa nemiyaj quitzticatcaj nochi tlen onochiu , niman on tequihuajquej ica melahuac quihuetzcayaj Jesús ica in tlajtojli : ― Yejhua oquinmaquixtij ocsequimej . Aman , tej , tla melahuac yejhua Cristo yejhuan Dios oquitlapejpenij , sa no yejhua ma nomaquixti .

text: And the soldiers also mocked him , coming to him , and offering him vinegar ,
text2: On soldados no huetzcayaj . Oquinisihuijquej niman oconitijquej vinagre .

text: And saying , If thou be the king of the Jews , save thyself .
text2: Niman ijquin oquijlijquej : ― Tla tejhua tiinRey on hebreos , sa no tejhua xmomaquixti .

text: And a superscription also was written over him in letters of Greek , and Latin , and Hebrew , THIS IS THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Niman icuapan oncatca se tlajcuilojli , ican tlajtoltin griego , latín niman hebreo . On tlajtojli ijquin quijtohuaya : “ In yejhua inRey on hebreos . ”

text: And one of the malefactors which were hanged railed on him , saying , If thou be Christ , save thyself and us .
text2: Semej yejhuamej on xcuajcualtin tlacamej yejhuan ompa ihuan pilcayaj , ijquin quijixcomacaya : ― Tla tiCristo , sa no tejhua xmomaquixti , niman tejhuamej no xtechmaquixti .

text: But the other answering rebuked him , saying , Dost not thou fear God , seeing thou art in the same condemnation ?
text2: Pero on ocse xcuajli tlacatl ocajhuatiaj itehuical , niman ijquin oquijlij : ― ¿ Xticmacajsi Dios , masqui sa no yejhua castigo tiquijyohuiya ?

text: And we indeed justly ; for we receive the due reward of our deeds : but this man hath done nothing amiss .
text2: Tejhuamej techmelahua ijquin ma titlajyohuican pampa on tlen xcuajli oticchijquej , pero yejhua in tlacatl xitlaj tlajtlacojli quipia .

text: And he said unto Jesus , Lord , remember me when thou comest into thy kingdom .
text2: Quemaj on tlacatl oquijlij Jesús : ― Jesús , xnechelnamiqui ijcuac tinemis quen Rey .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Verily I say unto thee , To day shalt thou be with me in paradise .
text2: Niman Jesús oquinanquilij : ― Ica tlen melahuac nimitzijlia ica aman nohuan tinemis ne ilhuicac .

text: And it was about the sixth hour , and there was a darkness over all the earth until the ninth hour .
text2: Ye canaj tlacualispan catca otlayohuatiac nochihuiyan , hasta ijqui oajsic yeyi hora ica tiotlac .

text: And the sun was darkened , and the veil of the temple was rent in the midst .
text2: Chica on tonajli xoc tlachaya , ne ijtic on hueyi tiopan on tlatzacuililtlaquentli ohuajtlajcotetzayan .

text: And when Jesus had cried with a loud voice , he said , Father , into thy hands I commend my spirit : and having said thus , he gave up the ghost .
text2: Quemaj Jesús otzajtzic chicahuac : ― NoTajtzin , ipan momatzin nimitzmactilia nonemilis . Ijcuac ijcon oquijtoj , omic .

text: Now when the centurion saw what was done , he glorified God , saying , Certainly this was a righteous man .
text2: Ijcuac on capitán romano oquitac tlinon onochiu , ijquin ocueyilij Dios , niman oquijtoj : ― Ica tlen melahuac , in tlacatl yolchipahuac catca .

text: And all the people that came together to that sight , beholding the things which were done , smote their breasts , and returned .
text2: Quemaj nochimej on tlacamej yejhuan ompa nemiyaj niman oquitaquej tlinon onochiu , oyajyajquej inchan niman noyelpanhuitequiyaj .

text: And all his acquaintance , and the women that followed him from Galilee , stood afar off , beholding these things .
text2: Pero nochimej iteixmatcahuan Jesús , niman on sihuamej yejhuan ohuapejquej cuajhuicatiayaj de ne Galilea , san huejca conitzticatcaj on tlajtlamach .

text: And , behold , there was a man named Joseph , a counseller ; and he was a good man , and a just :
text2: Nemiya se cuajli tlacatl itoca catca José yejhuan nochipa onohuicac quen quitocarohua . Yejhua chanej catca ipan on pueblo itoca Arimatea ne Judea . Yejhua tlapohuajli catca itech on tequihuajyotl yejhuan más hueyixticaj ne tiopan .

text: ( The same had not consented to the counsel and deed of them ; ) he was of Arimathaea , a city of the Jews : who also himself waited for the kingdom of God .
text2: Masqui yejhua tlapohuajli catca itech on tequihuajyotl , yejhua xocuelitac on tlen oquinemilijquej on ocsequimej nion on tlen oquichijquej . Yejhua , tej , quichaya quemanon pehuas tlamandaros Dios .

text: This man went unto Pilate , and begged the body of Jesus .
text2: Niman yejhua oyaj itech Pilato niman oquitlajtlanilito itlalnacayo Jesús .

text: And he took it down , and wrapped it in linen , and laid it in a sepulchre that was hewn in stone , wherein never man before was laid .
text2: Ijcuac yocuajtemoltij ne ipan cojnepanojli on itlalnacayo Jesús , oquitetejcuix ican se tlaquentli patioj , niman quemaj ocahuato ijtic se teostotl campa xqueman yacaj quitocayaj .

text: And that day was the preparation , and the sabbath drew on .
text2: Yoajsica on tonajli ijcuac notlatlajtlalilisquej para quejehuasquej on tonajli de nesehuijli yejhuan ye nisiu catca para pehuas .

text: And the women also , which came with him from Galilee , followed after , and beheld the sepulchre , and how his body was laid .
text2: On sihuamej yejhuan ohuajpequej cuajhuicatiaya Jesús de ne Galilea no oyajquej ihuan José . Yejhuamej oquitatoj on tlalcontli , niman quen ijqui oquitlalijquej itlalnacayo Jesús .

text: And they returned , and prepared spices and ointments ; and rested the sabbath day according to the commandment .
text2: Niman ijcuac onocuepquej inchan , oquicueltlaliquej on ajhuiyalistli tzacuanqui niman aceite para itlacayo Jesús . Quemaj quen tlanahuatia itlanahuatil Moisés , onosehuijquej ipan on tonajli de nesehuijli .

text: Now upon the first day of the week , very early in the morning , they came unto the sepulchre , bringing the spices which they had prepared , and certain others with them .
text2: Ipan on achtoj tonajli ipeuyan on semana , on sihuamej sanoyej huelipan oyajquej itech on tlalcontli . Yejhuamej oquitquiquej on chahualistli ajhuiyac yejhuan oquicueltlalijquej . Niman no oquinhuicaquej ocsequimej sihuamej .

text: And they found the stone rolled away from the sepulchre .
text2: Ijcuac ompa oajsiquej , oquitaquej ica on tetl yejhuan ica tentzacuticatca on tlalcontli ye cueptoya .

text: And they entered in , and found not the body of the Lord Jesus .
text2: Yejhuamej , tej , ocalaquitoj ijtic on tlalcontli , pero xoquinextijquej itlalnacayo Jesús .

text: And it came to pass , as they were much perplexed thereabout , behold , two men stood by them in shining garments :
text2: Chica yejhuamej xcajsicamatiyaj tlinon onochiu , nimantzin omemej tlacamej ican petlanqui tlaquentli ohuajnonextijquej ompa intech majmaniyaj .

text: And as they were afraid , and bowed down their faces to the earth , they said unto them , Why seek ye the living among the dead ?
text2: On sihuamej sanoyej onomojtijquej hasta ixco on tlajli onopachojquej . Pero on tlacamej oquimijlijquej on sihuamej : ― ¿ Tlica intzajlan on mimiquej nenquitejtemohuaj on yejhuan yolticaj ?

text: He is not here , but is risen : remember how he spake unto you when he was yet in Galilee ,
text2: Yejhua xnican nemi . Yejhua , tej , yoyoliu niman yonoquetzteu . Xquelnamiquican tlinon omechijlij ijcuac oc nemiya nemohuan ne Galilea .

text: Saying , The Son of man must be delivered into the hands of sinful men , and be crucified , and the third day rise again .
text2: Omechijlij ica yejhua yejhuan onochiu Tlacatl ica oncatca ipan inmahuan on tlajtlacolejquej quitemacasquej , niman ica quimajmasohualtiquej ipan cojnepanojli , niman ipan yeyi tonajli yolihuis niman noquetztehuas ipan itlalcon .

text: And they remembered his words ,
text2: Quemaj on sihuamej oquelnamiquej on tlen Jesús oquimijlijca .

text: And returned from the sepulchre , and told all these things unto the eleven , and to all the rest .
text2: Niman ijcuac yohuajnocuepatoj ne itech on tlalcontli , nochi oquintlajtlajtohuilijquej on majtlactli huan se apóstoles niman nochimej on ocsequimej .

text: It was Mary Magdalene , and Joanna , and Mary the mother of James , and other women that were with them , which told these things unto the apostles .
text2: On sihuamej yejhuan oquinmachiltitoj on apóstoles yejhuamej in : María yejhuan hualehua ne Magdala , Juana niman María on inan Jacobo inhuan on ocsequimej sihuamej .

text: And their words seemed to them as idle tales , and they believed them not .
text2: Pero on apóstoles san oquilocojmatquej on tlen yejhuamej oquimijlijquej niman xoquineltocaquej .

text: Then arose Peter , and ran unto the sepulchre ; and stooping down , he beheld the linen clothes laid by themselves , and departed , wondering in himself at that which was come to pass .
text2: Pero Pedro ohuajnotelquetz niman onotlaloj hasta ne itech on tlalcontli . Ijcuac yejhua onopachoj para ontlachix ijtic on tlalcontli , oquitac ica ocsecan onoquej on tlaquentin . Quemaj yejhua onocuep niman tlamojcaitaya ipampa on tlen onochiu .

text: And , behold , two of them went that same day to a village called Emmaus , which was from Jerusalem about threescore furlongs .
text2: Sa no ipan on tonajli , omemej on tlaneltocaquej yayaj ipan se pueblo itoca Emaús , yejhuan oncaj canaj majtlactli huan se kilómetros itech Jerusalén .

text: And they talked together of all these things which had happened .
text2: On omemej tlajtlajtojtiayaj nochi yejhua ica on tlen yonochijca .

text: And it came to pass , that , while they communed together and reasoned , Jesus himself drew near , and went with them .
text2: Chica yejhuamej tlajtlajtojtiayaj niman notencuicuitiayaj ica in tlajtlamach , sa no Jesús oquinnisihuij niman opeu inhuan nejnemi .

text: But their eyes were holden that they should not know him .
text2: Niman masqui quitayaj Jesús , tlinonon quintzacuiliaya para ma ca ma quimatican aquin yejhua .

text: And he said unto them , What manner of communications are these that ye have one to another , as ye walk , and are sad ?
text2: Quemaj Jesús oquimijlij : ― Chica nemejhuamej nennejnemij , ¿ Tlinon ica nemotencuicuitihuij ? ¿ Tlica nemajmanaj ?

text: And the one of them , whose name was Cleopas , answering said unto him , Art thou only a stranger in Jerusalem , and hast not known the things which are come to pass therein these days ?
text2: Semej yejhuamej , itoca Cleofas , oquinanquilij : ― Nochi tlacatl quimatzticaj tlinon yonochiu ipan in tonaltin ne Jerusalén . ¿ Tlen san tejhua de nochi quech ompa chanti ne Jerusalén xticmati on tlen yonochiu ?

text: And he said unto them , What things ? And they said unto him , Concerning Jesus of Nazareth , which was a prophet mighty in deed and word before God and all the people :
text2: Niman Jesús oquimijlij : ― ¿ Tlinon , tej , onochiu ? Niman yejhuamej oquijlijquej : ― On tlen onochiu itech Jesús yejhuan hualehua ne Nazaret . Yejhua tiotlajtojquetl catca niman ixpan Dios niman imixpan on tlacamej oquipix hueyi poder ica on tlen quichihuaya niman ica on tlen quijtohuaya .

text: And how the chief priests and our rulers delivered him to be condemned to death , and have crucified him .
text2: Pero intlayecancahuan on tiopixquej niman on tequihuajquej ipan on tiopan oquitemactilijquej para ma quitlajtlacolmacacan ipan miquilistli niman ma quimajmasohualtican ipan cojnepanojli .

text: But we trusted that it had been he which should have redeemed Israel : and beside all this , to day is the third day since these things were done .
text2: Tejhuamej ticuitiayaj yejhua quimaquixtisquia in país de Israel . Niman no , aman ye quipia yeyi tonajli ica ijcon onochiu .

text: Yea , and certain women also of our company made us astonished , which were early at the sepulchre ;
text2: Masqui no ijqui sequimej sihuamej yejhuan tohuan nopohuaj otechmojcatlachaltijquej aman . Ijcuac sa nimantzin , oyajquej ne itech on tlalcontli ,

text: And when they found not his body , they came , saying , that they had also seen a vision of angels , which said that he was alive .
text2: pero xoquinextijquej itlalnacayo Jesús ne ijtic on tlalcontli . Ijcuac onocuepquej , oquijtojquej yej oquitaquej sequimej ilhuicactequitquej quen intemicpan yejhuan oquimijlijquej ica Jesús nemi yolticaj .

text: And certain of them which were with us went to the sepulchre , and found it even so as the women had said : but him they saw not .
text2: Quemaj sequimej totehuicalhuan oyajquej itech on tlalcontli , niman oquitaquej quen on sihuamej oquijtojquej . Pero xoquitaquej Jesús .

text: Then he said unto them , O fools , and slow of heart to believe all that the prophets have spoken :
text2: Quemaj Jesús oquimijlij : ― ¡ Sanoyej mechpolohua cajsicamatilistli , niman sanoyej nemohuejcahuaj para nenquineltocaj nochi on tlen oquijtojquej on tiotlajtojquej !

text: Ought not Christ to have suffered these things , and to enter into his glory ?
text2: ¿ Tlen xoquijtojquej on tiotlajtojquej ica Cristo ica oncaj tlajyohuis ijcuac xe quiselia hueyilistli ?

text: And beginning at Moses and all the prophets , he expounded unto them in all the scriptures the things concerning himself .
text2: Quemaj opeu quinmelajcaijlia nochi on temachtijli campa quijtohua itech ica yejhua ipan in Yectlajcuilojli . Ohuajpeu ipan itlajcuilolhuan Moisés niman quemaj on ocsequimej tlajcuiloltin yejhuan on ocsequimej tiotlajtojquej oquijcuilojquej .

text: And they drew nigh unto the village , whither they went : and he made as though he would have gone further .
text2: Ijcuac oajsiquej ipan on pueblo campa yayaj , ones quen Jesús nejnemiya más tlayecapan .

text: But they constrained him , saying , Abide with us : for it is toward evening , and the day is far spent . And he went in to tarry with them .
text2: Pero yejhuamej onotencojtilijquej para ompa inhuan ma nocahua ican in tlajtojli : ― Nican tohuan xmocahua , pampa ye tiotlactijticaj , niman ye tlayohua . Yejhua ica Jesús ompa inhuan onocau .

text: And it came to pass , as he sat at meat with them , he took bread , and blessed it , and brake , and gave to them .
text2: Niman ijcuac ipan on mesa inhuan yehuaticatca , ocontilan on pan niman oquitiochiu . Quemaj oquitlapan niman oquinmamacac .

text: And their eyes were opened , and they knew him ; and he vanished out of their sight .
text2: Quemaj nimantzin oixtlajtlapojquej niman oquixmatquej ica yejhua Jesús , niman quemaj yejhua san ohuajnopoloj .

text: And they said one to another , Did not our heart burn within us , while he talked with us by the way , and while he opened to us the scriptures ?
text2: Niman ijquin quinojlayaj se ihuan ocse : ― ¿ Tlen xmelahuac sanoyej otechpactij chica techajnojnotztiaya ipan ojtli niman techajpantlantilijtiaya on tlen itech ica yejhua tlajcuilolnesticaj ipan on Yectlajcuilojli ?

text: And they rose up the same hour , and returned to Jerusalem , and found the eleven gathered together , and them that were with them ,
text2: Sa no ipan on hora , yejhuamej ocajsiquej inmojhui para Jerusalén campa oquinnextitoj on majtlactli huan se apóstoles niman on intehuicalhuan san secan nemiyaj .

text: Saying , The Lord is risen indeed , and hath appeared to Simon .
text2: On majtlactli huan se apóstoles oquijtojquej : ― Melahuac , tej , toTeco yoyoliu niman yonoquetzteu ipan itlalcon . Niman Simón yoquitac .

text: And they told what things were done in the way , and how he was known of them in breaking of bread .
text2: Quemaj on omemej tlaneltocaquej no oquitetlajtlajtohuilijquej tlinon impan onochiu ne ipan ojtli , niman quen ijqui oquimatquej ica Jesús oquinnotz ijcuac oquitlapan on pan .

text: And as they thus spake , Jesus himself stood in the midst of them , and saith unto them , Peace be unto you .
text2: Yejhuamej oc quijitojticatcaj on quen impan onochiu , ijcuac Jesús onotelquetztajsic ne intlajcotian niman ijquin oquintlajpaloj : ― Xyolsejtiacan .

text: But they were terrified and affrighted , and supposed that they had seen a spirit .
text2: Ican innemojtil niman incuecuetlacalis , quinemiliayaj quitztoquej san yacaj itonal .

text: And he said unto them , Why are ye troubled ? and why do thoughts arise in your hearts ?
text2: Pero Jesús oquimijlij : ― ¿ Tlica nemojcatlachaj ? ¿ Tlica nencahuiliaj on ometlamatilistli calaqui ipan nemoyojlo ?

text: Behold my hands and my feet , that it is I myself : handle me , and see ; for a spirit hath not flesh and bones , as ye see me have .
text2: Xquitacan nomahuan niman nocxihuan , niman xmatican ica sa no nejhua . Xnechmatocacan niman xnechitacan . Tla san yacaj itonal xnacayoj nion omiyoj quen nenquitztoquej nicpia .

text: And when he had thus spoken , he shewed them his hands and his feet .
text2: Ijcuac ijcon oquimijlij , oquintitij imahuan niman icxihuan .

text: And while they yet believed not for joy , and wondered , he said unto them , Have ye here any meat ?
text2: Pero oc xquineltocayaj , pampa tlamojcaitayaj niman sanoyej paquilistlamatiyaj . Yejhua ica Jesús oquimijlij : ― ¿ Itlaj nenquipiaj para nicuas ?

text: And they gave him a piece of a broiled fish , and of an honeycomb .
text2: Quemaj oquimacaquej sequi michin yejhuan tlihuaqui niman se achijtzin necutli .

text: And he took it , and did eat before them .
text2: Yejhua oquinselilij niman imixpan oquicuaj .

text: And he said unto them , These are the words which I spake unto you , while I was yet with you , that all things must be fulfilled , which were written in the law of Moses , and in the prophets , and in the psalms , concerning me .
text2: Quemaj oquimijlij : ― Ijcuac oc nemohuan ninemiya , onemechijlij ijquin : Ica oncaj tenquisas nochi on tlen noca tlajcuilolnesticaj ipan itlanahuatil Moisés niman ipan intlajcuilol on ocsequimej tiotlajtojquej niman on salmos .

text: Then opened he their understanding , that they might understand the scriptures ,
text2: Quemaj oquincajsicamachiltij on tlen oncaj ipan on Yectlajcuilojli .

text: And said unto them , Thus it is written , and thus it behoved Christ to suffer , and to rise from the dead the third day :
text2: Ijquin , tej , oquimijlij : ― Ijquin tlajcuilolnesticaj , ica Cristo ica oncatca miquis , niman ipan yeyi tonajli yolihuis niman noquetztehuas ne ipan itlalcon .

text: And that repentance and remission of sins should be preached in his name among all nations , beginning at Jerusalem .
text2: Niman no on yejhuan notenojnotzcahuan nonequi quinmachtisquej on tlacamej para ma noyolpatlacan , niman ijcon intlajtlacolhuan quintlapojpolhuilisquej . Yejhua in temachtijli quiteijlisquej ipan países nochihuiyan , pero yejhuamej ica oncaj pehuasquej nican Jerusalén .

text: And ye are witnesses of these things .
text2: In tlajtlamach nemejhuamej xteixpantilican .

text: And , behold , I send the promise of my Father upon you : but tarry ye in the city of Jerusalem , until ye be endued with power from on high .
