text2: Niman aman xcaquican , nemopan nicuajtitlanis on Espíritu Santo yejhuan noTajtzin omechilijca ica mechmacas . Pero xmocahuacan nican Jerusalén hasta ijcuac nenquiselisquej on poder yejhuan ne tlacpac hualehuas .

text: And he led them out as far as to Bethany , and he lifted up his hands , and blessed them .
text2: Quemaj Jesús oquinquixtij ipan on hueyican niman hasta Betania oquinhuicac . Ompa oquinhuajquetzteu imahuan niman oquintiochiu .

text: And it came to pass , while he blessed them , he was parted from them , and carried up into heaven .
text2: Chica quintiochijticatca , quintlalcahuijtiaya niman otlejcotiaj ne ilhuicac .

text: And they worshipped him , and returned to Jerusalem with great joy :
text2: Quemaj yejhuamej oquiyectenejquej Jesús , niman ican pactli onocuepquej para Jerusalén .

text: And were continually in the temple , praising and blessing God . Amen .
text2: Niman yejhuamej onocajquej ipan on hueyi tiopan niman quiyectenehuayaj Dios . Ma ijqui nochihua .

text: In the beginning was the Word , and the Word was with God , and the Word was God .
text2: Ijcuac nochi otzimpeu , ye nemiya iConeu Dios yejhuan Tlajtojli . Niman yejhua on yejhuan Tlajtojli ihuan Dios nemiya niman sa no yejhua Dios .

text: The same was in the beginning with God .
text2: Ijcon , tej , ye nemiya ihuan Dios ijcuac nochi otzimpeu .

text: All things were made by him ; and without him was not any thing made that was made .
text2: Dios oquitlalij nochi tlajtlamach tlen oncaj niman tlen yolticaj itechcopa yejhua on yejhuan Tlajtojli . Xijtlaj tlen oncaj nion on tlen yolticaj onochijchiu tla xyejhua .

text: In him was life ; and the life was the light of men .
text2: IConeu Dios quitemaca on nemilistli yejhuan para nochipa . Niman on nemilistli quitemaca tlamachilistli quen tlahuijli para on tlacamej cajsicamatisquej on tlajtlamach ica Dios .

text: And the light shineth in darkness ; and the darkness comprehended it not .
text2: Yejhua in tlamachilistli oncatcaj intzajlan on xcuajcualtin tlacamej niman xcuajcualtin espíritus , niman yejhuamej xhuelij quipopolohuaj on tlamachilistli .

text: There was a man sent from God , whose name was John .
text2: Dios ocuajtitlan se tlacatl itoca Juan .

text: The same came for a witness , to bear witness of the Light , that all men through him might believe .
text2: Yejhua ohuajlaj quen se teixpantiliquetl para oquiteixpantilico ica on yejhuan quitemaca tlamachilistli para ijcon nochimej huelisquej tlaneltocasquej .

text: He was not that Light , but was sent to bear witness of that Light .
text2: Juan xejhua on yejhuan tequichihua para cajsicamatisquej on tlajtlamach ica Dios , yej yejhua san quiteixpantilia ica oncaj on tlahuijli .

text: That was the true Light , which lighteth every man that cometh into the world .
text2: Yejhua in tlahuijli yejhua melahuac . Yejhua ohuajlaj ipan in tlalticpactli niman tequichihua para nochi tlacatl cajsicamatis on tlamachilistli yejhuan melahuac .

text: He was in the world , and the world was made by him , and the world knew him not .
text2: Yejhua on yejhuan Tlajtojli nemiya ipan in tlalticpactli . Masqui Dios oquitlalij in tlalticpactli itechcopa yejhua , on tlalticpactlacamej xoquixmatquej .

text: He came unto his own , and his own received him not .
text2: Ohuajlaj intech on hebreos niman on hebreos xoquiselijquej .

text: But as many as received him , to them gave he power to become the sons of God , even to them that believe on his name :
text2: Pero nochimej on yejhuan oquiselijquej niman itech otlaneltocaquej , oquinmacac permiso para onochijquej iconehuan Dios .

text: Which were born , not of blood , nor of the will of the flesh , nor of the will of man , but of God .
text2: Yejhuamej xteconehuan intech tlalticpactlacamej yejhuan tlacatij quen nochi tlacatl , nion huajtlacatij pampa innan niman intaj quinequij , yej otlacaticoj pampa Dios oquinec para tlacatisquej itech .

text: And the Word was made flesh , and dwelt among us , ( and we beheld his glory , the glory as of the only begotten of the Father , ) full of grace and truth .
text2: Niman on yejhuan Tlajtojli otlacat niman totzajlan onen . Yejhua sanoyej otetlajsojtlac niman otemachtij tlen melahuac . Niman otiquitaquej ihueyilis . On hueyilistli yejhua quipia pampa yejhua isenTeconeu toTajtzin .

text: John bare witness of him , and cried , saying , This was he of whom I spake , He that cometh after me is preferred before me : for he was before me .
text2: Juan oquiteixpantilij Cristo ijcuac oquijtoj : “ In yejhua nictenehuaya ijcuac oniquijtoj ica on yejhuan nechajtocatiaya ipan notequiu , yejhua más hueyixticaj xquen nejhua pampa ijcuac onitlacat yejhua ye nemiya . ”

text: And of his fulness have all we received , and grace for grace .
text2: Tinochimej ticselijtihuij itech ihueyilis sanoyej miyec tlatiochihualistli .

text: For the law was given by Moses , but grace and truth came by Jesus Christ .
text2: Moisés oquitemacac on tlanahuatijli pero on tetlajsojtlalistli niman on tlen melahuac ocuajquic Jesucristo .

text: No man hath seen God at any time ; the only begotten Son , which is in the bosom of the Father , he hath declared him .
text2: Xqueman yacaj quitaya Dios . Pero isenTeconetzin yejhuan toTajtzin sanoyej quitlajsojtla yejhua yoquipantlantij .

text: And this is the record of John , when the Jews sent priests and Levites from Jerusalem to ask him , Who art thou ?
text2: Juan oteixpantilij ijcuac on tlayecanquej hebreos chanejquej ne Jerusalén oquintitlanquej tiopixquej niman levitas itech para quitlajtoltisquej aquin yejhua .

text: And he confessed , and denied not ; but confessed , I am not the Christ .
text2: Yejhua ijquin oquinnanquijlij . Cuajli oquinmelajcaijlij : ― Nejhua xniCristo yejhuan Dios oquitlalij para tlamandaros .

text: And they asked him , What then ? Art thou Elias ? And he saith , I am not . Art thou that prophet ? And he answered , No .
text2: Quemaj oquitlajtoltijquej : ― Tla ijcon , ¿ aquin tejhua ? ¿ Tejhua titiotlajtojquetl Elías ? Niman Juan oquijtoj : ― Ca , xnejhua . Quemaj ijquin oquitlajtoltijquej : ― Tla ijcon , ¿ Tejhua titiotlajtojquetl on yejhuan ica oncaj huajlas ? Niman yejhua oquijtoj : ― Ca .

text: Then said they unto him , Who art thou ? that we may give an answer to them that sent us . What sayest thou of thyself ?
text2: Quemaj más oquitlajtoltijquej : ― Xtechijli , tej , aquin tejhua pampa ica oncaj ticpiasquej tlen tiquimijlisquej on yejhuan otechajtitlanquej . ¿ Tlinon tiquijtohua moca tejhua ?

text: He said , I am the voice of one crying in the wilderness , Make straight the way of the Lord , as said the prophet Esaias .
text2: Ijcuacon Juan oquinnanquilij : ― Nejhua on aquin tzajtzi ne campa tlapatlaco : “ Xmelajcatlalican nemoyojlo para nenhuelisquej nenquiselisquej toTeco . ” No ijqui niquijtohua quen oquijtoj on tiotlajtojquetl Isaías .

text: And they which were sent were of the Pharisees .
text2: On yejhuan oquinotzatoj Juan oquinhuajtitlancaj on fariseos .

text: And they asked him , and said unto him , Why baptizest thou then , if thou be not that Christ , nor Elias , neither that prophet ?
text2: Niman yejhuamej oquijlijquej : ― Tla ijcon , tla xtejhua tiCristo , nion tiElías , nion yejhua on tiotlajtojquetl yejhuan ica oncaj huajlas , ¿ tlica , tej , titlacuatequiya ?

text: John answered them , saying , I baptize with water : but there standeth one among you , whom ye know not ;
text2: Juan oquimijlij : ― Nejhua nitlacuatequiya ican atl , pero nemotzajlan ocse nemi yejhuan xnenquixmatij .

text: He it is , who coming after me is preferred before me , whose shoe ' s latchet I am not worthy to unloose .
text2: Yejhua nechajcuitlamanhuijtiu ipan notequiu . Niman nejhua nion achijtzin xnechmelahua nictojtomas icacmecayo , pampa más hueyixticaj xquen nejhua .

text: These things were done in Bethabara beyond Jordan , where John was baptizing .
text2: Nochi yejhua in onochiu ne campa itoca Betábara yejhuan nocahua ne ica iquisayan tonajli de on atentli Jordán campa Juan tlacuatequiaya .

text: The next day John seeth Jesus coming unto him , and saith , Behold the Lamb of God , which taketh away the sin of the world .
text2: Huajmostla Juan oquitac Jesús ye ompa quinnisihuijtiaya niman oquijtoj : ― Xquitacan yejhua on tlacatl . Yejhua quihuentlalisquej quen se borreguito para Dios quintlapojpolhuilis intlajtlacolhuan nochimej on tlalticpactlacamej .

text: This is he of whom I said , After me cometh a man which is preferred before me : for he was before me .
text2: In yejhuan nictenehuaya ijcuac oniquijtoj : “ Se tlacatl yejhuan nechajcuitlapanhuiya ipan notequiu yejhua más hueyixticaj xquen nejhua pampa ijcuac onitlacat , yejhua ye nemiya . ”

text: And I knew him not : but that he should be made manifest to Israel , therefore am I come baptizing with water .
text2: Sa no nejhua xnicmatiya aquin yejhua . Pero yejhua ica nihuajtlacuatequijtiu ican atl para on hebreos huelis quixmatisquej .

text: And John bare record , saying , I saw the Spirit descending from heaven like a dove , and it abode upon him .
text2: Niman no oquiteixpantilij Juan on tlen oquitac . Yejhua oquijtoj : ― Nejhua oniquitac quen ohuajtemoc ne ilhuicac on Espíritu Santo . Yejhua ohuajtemoc quen itlaj paloma niman ipan yejhua onocau .

text: And I knew him not : but he that sent me to baptize with water , the same said unto me , Upon whom thou shalt see the Spirit descending , and remaining on him , the same is he which baptizeth with the Holy Ghost .
text2: Nejhua hasta aman xnicmatisquia aquin yejhua , pero yejhua on yejhuan onechajtitlan ma nitlacuatequi ican atl onechijlij : “ Ijcuac tiquitas temos on Espíritu Santo niman on aquin ipan nocahuas , ticmatis ica on yejhua tlacuatequis ican Espíritu Santo . ”

text: And I saw , and bare record that this is the Son of God .
text2: Nejhua yoniquitac niman aman nicteixpantilia ica yejhua iConeu Dios .

text: Again the next day after John stood , and two of his disciples ;
text2: Huajmostla Juan ocsejpa ompa nemiya ihuan omemej inomachtijcahuan .

text: And looking upon Jesus as he walked , he saith , Behold the Lamb of God !
text2: Niman ijcuac oquitac ompaca panohuaya Jesús , oquijtoj : ― Xquitacan on tlacatl . On iborreguito Dios . Dios ocuajtitlan para quihuentlalisquej quen se borreguito .

text: And the two disciples heard him speak , and they followed Jesus .
text2: Quemaj ijcuac on omemej inomachtijcahuan Juan ocacquej on tlen yejhua oquijtoj , oquicuitlapanhuiquej Jesús .

text: Then Jesus turned , and saw them following , and saith unto them , What seek ye ? They said unto him , Rabbi , ( which is to say , being interpreted , Master , ) where dwellest thou ?
text2: Quemaj Jesús ontlachix icuitlapan niman ica oquitac cuajcuitlapanhuiyayaj on omemej tlacamej oquimijlij : ― ¿ Tlinon nenquitejtemohuaj ? Yejhuamej oquijlijquej : ― Temachtijquetl , ¿ canon tichanti ?

text: He saith unto them , Come and see . They came and saw where he dwelt , and abode with him that day : for it was about the tenth hour .
text2: Jesús oquimijlij : ― Xhuajlacan niman xquitacan . Quemaj oyajquej niman oquitaquej canon chanti , niman ompa ihuan onocajquej hasta queman otlayohuac pampa ye tiotlac catca , canaj ipan nahui hora ijcuac oyejcoquej .

text: One of the two which heard John speak , and followed him , was Andrew , Simon Peter ' s brother .
text2: Semej yejhuamej on omemej yejhuan ocacquej Juan niman oquicuitlapahuij Jesús , itoca Andrés yejhuan icniu Simón Pedro .

text: He first findeth his own brother Simon , and saith unto him , We have found the Messias , which is , being interpreted , the Christ .
text2: Achtoj ijcuac xe itlaj quichihuaya , Andrés oyaj quitejtemoto Simón on icniu , niman oquijlij : ― Yoticnextijquej on Mesías ― yejhuan quijtosnequi Cristo yejhuan Dios oquitlalij para ma tlamandaro .

text: And he brought him to Jesus . And when Jesus beheld him , he said , Thou art Simon the son of Jona : thou shalt be called Cephas , which is by interpretation , A stone .
text2: Quemaj Andrés ocuicac Simón ne campa Jesús nemiya . Niman ijcuac Jesús oquitac , oquijlij : ― Tejhua tiSimón iconeu Jonás , pero motoca yes Cefas ― yejhuan quijtosnequi Pedro .

text: The day following Jesus would go forth into Galilee , and findeth Philip , and saith unto him , Follow me .
text2: Huajmostla Jesús oquinemilij para yas ne Galilea . Niman ijcuac oquinextij Felipe , oquijlij : ― Xhuajla nohuan .

text: Now Philip was of Bethsaida , the city of Andrew and Peter .
text2: Felipe chanej catca ipan on pueblo itoca Betsaida campa no chantiyaj Andrés niman Pedro .

text: Philip findeth Nathanael , and saith unto him , We have found him , of whom Moses in the law , and the prophets , did write , Jesus of Nazareth , the son of Joseph .
text2: Quemaj Felipe oyaj niman oquinextij Natanael . Niman yejhua oquijlij : ― Yoticnextijquej on tlacatl yejhuan oquiteneu Moisés ipan on itlajcuilolamahuan ican tlanahuajtijli , niman no on tiotlajtojquej ica otlajcuilojcaj . Yejhua Jesús iconeu José yejhuan chanej ipan on pueblo itoca Nazaret .

text: And Nathanael said unto him , Can there any good thing come out of Nazareth ? Philip saith unto him , Come and see .
text2: Quemaj Natanael oquijtoj : ― ¿ Intech on tlacamej yejhuan chantij ne Nazaret huelis quisas se yejhuan tepalehuis ? Felipe oquijlij : ― Xhuajla niman xquitaqui .

text: Jesus saw Nathanael coming to him , and saith of him , Behold an Israelite indeed , in whom is no guile !
text2: Ijcuac Jesús oquitac Natanael quinisihuiaya , oquijtoj : ― Nican huajlau se yejhuan melahuac hebreo yejhuan xqueman tlacajcayahua .

text: Nathanael saith unto him , Whence knowest thou me ? Jesus answered and said unto him , Before that Philip called thee , when thou wast under the fig tree , I saw thee .
text2: Quemaj Natanael oquitlajtoltij : ― ¿ Quen tinechixmati ? Niman Jesús oquijlij : ― Ijcuac Felipe xe mitznotzaya , nejhua onicmat ica tinemiya ne itzintlan on cojtli itoca higuera .

text: Nathanael answered and saith unto him , Rabbi , thou art the Son of God ; thou art the King of Israel .
text2: Quemaj Natanael oquijlij : ― Temachtijquetl , tejhua tiiConeu Dios . Tejhua tiiRey on hebreos .

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Because I said unto thee , I saw thee under the fig tree , believest thou ? thou shalt see greater things than these .
text2: Jesús oquijlij : ― ¿ Tinechneltoca san ica onimitzijlij onimitzontac itzintlan on cojtli higuera ? Aman , tej , nimitzijlia ica más huejhueyi tlajtlamach tiquitas .

text: And he saith unto him , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Hereafter ye shall see heaven open , and the angels of God ascending and descending upon the Son of man .
text2: No ijqui oquijtoj Jesús : ― Ica tlen melahuac nemechijlia , ica nemejhuamej nenquitasquej tlapojtias on ilhuicac niman on iilhuicactequitcahuan Dios tlejcosquej niman temosquej nopan yejhuan oninochiu Tlacatl .

text: And the third day there was a marriage in Cana of Galilee ; and the mother of Jesus was there :
text2: Ipan yeyi tonajli más saquin , oncatca se tlanamictilistli ne ipan on pueblo itoca Caná de Galilea . Inan Jesús ompa nemiya .

text: And both Jesus was called , and his disciples , to the marriage .
text2: Niman Jesús ihuan inomachtijcahuan no oquinnotzquej ipan on tlanamictilistli .

text: And when they wanted wine , the mother of Jesus saith unto him , They have no wine .
text2: Inan Jesús , ijcuac otlan on vino ipan on ilhuitl , oquijlij Jesús : ― Xocuitlaj vino .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Woman , what have I to do with thee ? mine hour is not yet come .
text2: Pero Jesús oquijlij : ― Sihuatl , ¿ tlica tinechijlia nejhua ? Hasta aman xe ajsi on tonajli para nicchihuas milagros .

text: His mother saith unto the servants , Whatsoever he saith unto you , do it .
text2: Quemaj inan ijquin oquimijlij on yejhuan ompa tequichihuayaj : ― Xchihuacan nochi tlen yejhua mechijlis .

text: And there were set there six waterpots of stone , after the manner of the purifying of the Jews , containing two or three firkins apiece .
text2: Ompa oncatcaj chicuasen contin tlachijchiutin ican tetl niman ipan se contli hueli calaquiya canaj napoajli noso cien litros de atl . On hebreos quitequitiltiayaj on atl para nomajtequiayaj , niman ijcon nocahuayaj chipajquej ixpan Dios .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Fill the waterpots with water . And they filled them up to the brim .
text2: Jesús oquimijlij on tequichijquej : ― Xquintemacan in contin ican atl . Niman cuajli oquintemiltiquej .

text: And he saith unto them , Draw out now , and bear unto the governor of the feast . And they bare it .
text2: Niman quemaj Jesús oquimijlij : ― Aman xquixtican achijtzin niman xquitquilican on yejhuan tlayecanquetl ipan in ilhuitl . Niman yejhuamej ijqui oquichijquej .

text: When the ruler of the feast had tasted the water that was made wine , and knew not whence it was : ( but the servants which drew the water knew ; ) the governor of the feast called the bridegroom ,
text2: On tlayecanquetl ipan on ilhuitl xquimatiya canon ohualeu , yej san yejhuamej on tequichijquej quimatzticatcaj yejhuan oquixtijquej on atl . On tlayecanquetl oquimat on atl yejhuan tlacueptli vino niman quemaj oquinotz on montli

text: And saith unto him , Every man at the beginning doth set forth good wine ; and when men have well drunk , then that which is worse : but thou hast kept the good wine until now .
text2: niman oquijlij : ― Nochi tlacatl achtoj quitemaca on más huelic vino niman ijcuac on tenotzaltin miyec yoconiquej , quinmacaj on vino yejhuan xmás huelic . Pero tejhua yej otiquejeu on más huelic vino para más saquin tictemaca .

text: This beginning of miracles did Jesus in Cana of Galilee , and manifested forth his glory ; and his disciples believed on him .
text2: Yejhua in tlen Jesús oquichiu ne Caná de Galilea , yejhua iachtoj milagro . Yejhua in tlamajhuisojli oquiteititij ihueyilis , niman on inomachtijcahuan oquineltocaquej .

text: After this he went down to Capernaum , he , and his mother , and his brethren , and his disciples : and they continued there not many days .
text2: Ijcuac ijcon yonochiu , Jesús ihuan inan , icnihuan niman inomachtijcahuan oyajquej ne ipan on pueblo itoca Capernaum campa onenquej quesqui tonajli .

text: And the Jews ' passover was at hand , and Jesus went up to Jerusalem ,
text2: Quemaj ica ye nisiu huajlaya on ilhuitl itoca pascua yejhuan on hebreos quejehuayaj , Jesús oyaj ne ipan on hueyican Jerusalén .

text: And found in the temple those that sold oxen and sheep and doves , and the changers of money sitting :
text2: Ne ipan iquiahuac on hueyi tiopan , Jesús oquinnextito on yejhuan quinnamacayaj huacaxtin , borregos niman palomas . Niman no ompa oquinnextito on yejhuan quimpatiliayaj tomin on tlacamej ne campa yejyehuaticatcaj ipan inmesas .

text: And when he had made a scourge of small cords , he drove them all out of the temple , and the sheep , and the oxen ; and poured out the changers ' money , and overthrew the tables ;
text2: Ijcuac yejhua ijcon oquitac , oquichijchiu se tlachijchihualmecatl niman nochimej oquintlahuelhuijhuitec ihuan inborregos niman inhuacaxhuan . On yejhuan quitepatiliayaj tomin , oquinxixinilij intomin ipan tlajli , niman oquinxixinilij inmesa .

text: And said unto them that sold doves , Take these things hence ; make not my Father ' s house an house of merchandise .
text2: On tlanamacaquej ican palomas oquimijlij : ― ¡ Yejhua on xquejcuanican nican ! ¡ Ma ca xmercado chihuacan ipan ical noTajtzin !

text: And his disciples remembered that it was written , The zeal of thine house hath eaten me up .
text2: Quemaj on inomachtijcahuan oquelnamiquej on Yectlajcuilojli yejhuan quijtohua : “ Ican nochi noyojlo nictlacaita motiopan . ”

text: Then answered the Jews and said unto him , What sign shewest thou unto us , seeing that thou doest these things ?
text2: Quemaj on hebreos oquijlijquej : ― ¿ Catlejhua tlamahuisojli titechititis para tiquitasquej ica mitzmelahua ticchihuas yejhua in ?

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Destroy this temple , and in three days I will raise it up .
text2: Jesús oquimijlij : ― Xxoxotonican yejhua in tiopan niman ipan yeyi tonajli ocsejpa niquetztehuas .

text: Then said the Jews , Forty and six years was this temple in building , and wilt thou rear it up in three days ?
text2: Quemaj on hebreos oquijlijquej : ― Yejhua in tiopan ompoajli huan chichuasen xipan ohuejcajquej ica oquichijchijquej , ¿ niman tejhua san ipan yeyi tonajli ticchijchihuas ocsejpa ?

text: But he spake of the temple of his body .
text2: Pero on tiopan yejhuan Jesús quitenehuayaj sa no de yejhua itlalnacayo .

text: When therefore he was risen from the dead , his disciples remembered that he had said this unto them ; and they believed the scripture , and the word which Jesus had said .
text2: Yejhua ica , ijcuac Jesús oyoliu niman onoquetzteu ipan itlalcon , on inomachtijcahuan oquelnamiquej in tlen yejhua oquijtojca . Yejhua ica oquineltocaquej on Yectlajcuilojli niman on tlajtojli yejhuan oquimijlijca .

text: Now when he was in Jerusalem at the passover , in the feast day , many believed in his name , when they saw the miracles which he did .
text2: Ijcuac Jesús nemiya ne Jerusalén ipan on ilhuitl pascua , miyequej oquineltocaquej ijcuac oquitaquej on milagros yejhuan quichihuaya .

text: But Jesus did not commit himself unto them , because he knew all men ,
text2: Pero yejhua xoquitlalij iyojlo itech intlaneltoc pampa quimixmatiya ipan inyojlo nochimej .

text: And needed not that any should testify of man : for he knew what was in man .
text2: Xquipolohuaya para yacaj quijlis quen ijquimej on tlacamej pampa sa no yejhua quimatzticatca tlinon oncaj ipan inyojlo on tlacamej .

text: There was a man of the Pharisees , named Nicodemus , a ruler of the Jews :
text2: Nemiya se fariseo itoca Nicodemo yejhuan tlayecanquetl catca intech on hebreos .

text: The same came to Jesus by night , and said unto him , Rabbi , we know that thou art a teacher come from God : for no man can do these miracles that thou doest , except God be with him .
text2: Yehua in Nicodemo oyaj oquinotzato Jesús ijcuac tlayohua , niman oquijlij : ― Temachtijquetl , ticmatztoquej ica Dios omitzajtitlan para otitechmachtico , pampa xacaj hueli quiteititia ipoder ican milagros quen tejhua ticchihua tla Dios xihuan nemi .

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Verily , verily , I say unto thee , Except a man be born again , he cannot see the kingdom of God .
text2: Quemaj Jesús oquijlij : ― Ica tlen melahuac nimitzijlia , tla yacaj xoc sejpa tlacatis , xhuelis calaquis campa Dios tlamandarohua .

text: Nicodemus saith unto him , How can a man be born when he is old ? can he enter the second time into his mother ' s womb , and be born ?
text2: Niman Nicodemo oquitlajtoltij : ― Pero ¿ quen ijqui se tlacatl yejhuan yonoscaltij huelis ocsejpa tlacatis ? ¿ Tla ijcon huelis calaquis ijtic inan para ocsejpa tlacatis ?

text: Jesus answered , Verily , verily , I say unto thee , Except a man be born of water and of the Spirit , he cannot enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Niman Jesús oquijlij : ― Ica tlen melahuac nimitzijlia , tla yacaj tlacatl xnocuatequia ican atl niman xtlacati itechcopa on Espíritu Santo , xhuelis calaquis ne campa tlamandarohua Dios .

text: That which is born of the flesh is flesh ; and that which is born of the Spirit is spirit .
text2: Ijcuac se tlacati itech inan quiselia san nemilistli ipan itlalnacayo para nemis quen inan , pero ijcuac tlacati itech on Espíritu Santo quiselia yencuic nemilistli ipan ialma .

text: Marvel not that I said unto thee , Ye must be born again .
text2: Ma ca mitzmojcatlachalti on ica nimitzijlia : “ Ica oncaj ocsejpa titlacatis . ”

text: The wind bloweth where it listeth , and thou hearest the sound thereof , but canst not tell whence it cometh , and whither it goeth : so is every one that is born of the Spirit .
text2: On ajacatl tlalpitza san canon quinequi . Ticaqui on tlen yejhua caquistilia , pero xticmati canon hualehua niman canon yau . No ijqui , tej , on yejhuan tlacatij ican on Espíritu Santo .

text: Nicodemus answered and said unto him , How can these things be ?
text2: Quemaj Nicodemo oquitlajtoltij : ― ¿ Quen ijqui huelis nochihuas yejhua in ?

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Art thou a master of Israel , and knowest not these things ?
text2: Jesús oquinanquilij : ― ¿ Tejhua tihueyitemachtijquetl ipan Israel niman xticmati yejhua in tlajtlamach ?

text: Verily , verily , I say unto thee , We speak that we do know , and testify that we have seen ; and ye receive not our witness .
text2: Ica tlen melahuac nimitzijlia ica tejhuamej titlajtlajtohuaj ica on tlen ticmatij , niman ica on tlen yotiquitaquej ticteixpantiliaj , pero nemejhuamej temachtijquej xnenquineltocaj tlen temechijliaj .

text: If I have told you earthly things , and ye believe not , how shall ye believe , if I tell you of heavenly things ?
text2: Tla xnennechneltocaj ijcuac nemechnojnotza ica on tlajtlamach yejhuan quisa ipan in tlalticpactli , ¿ quen ijqui nennechneltocasquej tla nemechnojnotzas ica on tlajtlamach yejhuan quisa ne ilhuicac ?

text: And no man hath ascended up to heaven , but he that came down from heaven , even the Son of man which is in heaven .
text2: Xe yacaj tlejcohua ne ilhuicac , yej san nejhua yejhuan oninochiu Tlacatl onihuajtemoc ne ilhuicac .

text: And as Moses lifted up the serpent in the wilderness , even so must the Son of man be lifted up :
text2: Niman ijcon quen Moisés oquipiloj on cohuatl ne campa tlapatlaco , ica oncaj no ijqui nechajcopilosquej nejhua yejhuan oninochiu Tlacatl

text: That whosoever believeth in him should not perish , but have eternal life .
text2: para nochi on yejhuan nechneltocas xmiquis , yej quipias nemilistli para nochipa .

text: For God so loved the world , that he gave his only begotten Son , that whosoever believeth in him should not perish , but have everlasting life .
text2: Tej , Dios sanoyej oquintlajsojtlac on tlalticpactlacamej hasta oquitemacac isenteConetzin para nochi on aquin quineltocas xpolihuis , yej quipias yencuic nemilistli para nochipa .

text: For God sent not his Son into the world to condemn the world ; but that the world through him might be saved .
text2: Dios xocuajtitlan iConetzin , intech on tlalticpactlacamej para quintlajtlacolmacas , yej para on tlalticpactlacamej ma nomaquixtican itechcopa .

text: He that believeth on him is not condemned : but he that believeth not is condemned already , because he hath not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God .
text2: On yejhuan quineltoca xquitlajtlacolmacasquej , pero on yejhuan xquineltoca ye quipia tlajtlacolmacalistli san pampa xquineltoca isenteConetzin Dios .

text: And this is the condemnation , that light is come into the world , and men loved darkness rather than light , because their deeds were evil .
text2: Yejhuamej quiseliaj tlajtlacolmacalistli pampa ohuajlaj iConetzin Dios ipan in tlalticpactli niman oquintitij on cuajli ojtli para ipan nohuicasquej , pero xquinequij nohuicasquej ipan on cuajli ojtli , pampa yejhuamej quichihuaj on tlen xcuajli .

text: For every one that doeth evil hateth the light , neither cometh to the light , lest his deeds should be reproved .
text2: Nochimej yejhuan quichihuaj on tlen xcuajli quitlahuelitaj iConetzin Dios niman on cuajli ojtli yejhuan oquiteititij . Yejhuamej xhuajlahuij itech pampa xquinequij nopantlantis intlajtlacol .

text: But he that doeth truth cometh to the light , that his deeds may be made manifest , that they are wrought in God .
text2: Pero on yejhuan quichihuaj on tlen cuajli huajlahuij itech para nopantlantis ica quichihuaj on tlen Dios quinnahuatia .

text: After these things came Jesus and his disciples into the land of Judaea ; and there he tarried with them , and baptized .
text2: Ijcuac in yopanoc , Jesús oyaj inhuan inomachtijcahuan ne Judea campa quesqui tonaltin ompa inhuan onocau . Niman Jesús oquinnahuatij inomachtijcahuan ma tlacuatequican .

text: And John also was baptizing in Aenon near to Salim , because there was much water there : and they came , and were baptized .
text2: No ijqui Juan tlacuatequiaya ne Enón nisiu Salim pampa ompa oncatca miyec atl . On tlacamej huajlayaj itech niman yejhua quincuatequiaya .

text: For John was not yet cast into prison .
text2: Yejhua in onochiu ijcuac Juan xe cajsiyaj .

text: Then there arose a question between some of John ' s disciples and the Jews about purifying .
text2: Quemaj sequimej inomachtijcahuan Juan opejquej nocamatlanij inhuan sequimej hebreos yejhua ica on tlacuatequilistli . Yejhuamej quinequiya quimatisquej catlejhua tlacuatequilistli más cuajli , tla on yejhuan de Jesús noso on de Juan .

text: And they came unto John , and said unto him , Rabbi , he that was with thee beyond Jordan , to whom thou barest witness , behold , the same baptizeth , and all men come to him .
text2: Yejhua ica oyajquej niman oquijlijtoj Juan : ― Temachtijquetl , cuajli xcaqui ica on yejhuan mohuan nemiya ne ica iquisayan tonajli on atentli Jordán yejhuan tejhua ica otiteixpantilij , aman tlacuatequiya niman nochi tlacatl huajlau itech .

text: John answered and said , A man can receive nothing , except it be given him from heaven .
text2: Quemaj Juan oquimijlij : ― Xacaj huelis quipias itlaj tla Dios ne ilhuicac xcahuilis .

text: Ye yourselves bear me witness , that I said , I am not the Christ , but that I am sent before him .
text2: Nemejhuamej cuajli onennechcaquej ijcuac onemechijlij ica nejhua xniCristo , yej se yejhuan Dios ocuajtitlan iyecapan .

text: He that hath the bride is the bridegroom : but the friend of the bridegroom , which standeth and heareth him , rejoiceth greatly because of the bridegroom ' s voice : this my joy therefore is fulfilled .
text2: Ne campa nonamictilo , on montli yejhua quiselia sihuamontli . Niman itetlajsojcau on montli no sanoyej paqui ijcuac caqui tlajtlajtohua on montli . Nejhua quen itetlajsojcau on montli . Ijcon , tej , sanoyej nipaqui ijcuac nicaqui ica nochi tlacatl yau itech Jesús .

text: He must increase , but I must decrease .
text2: Yejhua ica , tej , ica oncaj más hueyixtias niman nejhua yej más nitemotias .

text: He that cometh from above is above all : he that is of the earth is earthly , and speaketh of the earth : he that cometh from heaven is above all .
text2: On yejhuan huatemohua ne ilhuicac más hueyixticaj xquen nochi tlacatl . On yejhuan chanej ipan in tlalticpactli san tlalticpactlacatl niman tlajtlajtohua ica on tlajtlamach yejhuan quisticaj ipan in tlalticpactli . Pero on yejhuan hualehua ne ilhuicac más hueyixticaj xquen nochi tlacatl .

text: And what he hath seen and heard , that he testifieth ; and no man receiveth his testimony .
text2: Yejhua quiteixpantilia ica on tlen yoquitac niman yocac , pero xacaj quineltoca on tlen yejhua quijtohua .

text: He that hath received his testimony hath set to his seal that God is true .
text2: Pero tla yacaj quineltoca on tlen quijtohua on yejhuan ohuajtemoc ne ilhuicac , quiteixpantilia ica Dios quijtohua on tlen melahuac .

text: For he whom God hath sent speaketh the words of God : for God giveth not the Spirit by measure unto him .
text2: On yejhuan Dios ocuajtitlan quitojhua on itlajtol Dios , pampa Dios oquimacac iEspíritu ican nochi ihueyilis .

text: The Father loveth the Son , and hath given all things into his hand .
text2: On Tajtli quitlajsojtla iConetzin , niman yoquimactilij nochi itequihuajyo ipan nochi tlen oncaj .

text: He that believeth on the Son hath everlasting life : and he that believeth not the Son shall not see life ; but the wrath of God abideth on him .
text2: Yejhuan quineltoca iConetzin Dios quipia nemilistli para nochipa , pero on yejhuan xquitlacamati xquipias yejhua in nemilistli , yej quiselis on temojtij itlahuel Dios .

text: When therefore the Lord knew how the Pharisees had heard that Jesus made and baptized more disciples than John ,
text2: ToTeco Jesús oquimat ica on fariseos oquimatquej ica yejhua quimpia más nomachtijquej niman tlacuatequiaya más xquen Juan .

text: ( Though Jesus himself baptized not , but his disciples , )
text2: Pero Jesús xtlacuatequiaya , yej san inomachtijcahuan tlacuatequiayaj .

text: He left Judaea , and departed again into Galilee .
text2: Niman ijcuac Jesús ijcon oquimat , oquis ne Judea para ocsejpa oyaj ne Galilea .

text: And he must needs go through Samaria .
text2: Niman ipan iojhui , ica oncatca para panos ipan on yehualican itoca Samaria .

text: Then cometh he to a city of Samaria , which is called Sychar , near to the parcel of ground that Jacob gave to his son Joseph .
text2: Oajsic , tej , ipan se pueblo ne Samaria itoca Sicar . Yejhua in pueblo oncatca san nisiu itech on tlajli yejhuan Jacob oquimacac José on iconeu .

text: Now Jacob ' s well was there . Jesus therefore , being wearied with his journey , sat thus on the well : and it was about the sixth hour .
text2: Ompa oncatca se pozo yejhuan quipiaya atl . On pozo cuitiayaj ipozo Jacob . Jesús onotlalij itenco on pozo pampa ye huajsiautiaya ipan iojhui . Ijcuacon canaj tlacualispan catca .

text: Art thou greater than our father Jacob , which gave us the well , and drank thereof himself , and his children , and his cattle ?
text2: ¿ Tlen tejhua ticnemilia más tihueyixticaj xquen on achtoj totaj Jacob yejhuan otechmacac in pozo ? Yejhua atliya nican niman no iconehuan , niman iyolcahuan atliyaj nican .

text: Jesus answered and said unto her , Whosoever drinketh of this water shall thirst again :
text2: Jesús oquijlij : ― On aquin coni yejhua in atl ocsejpa amiquis .

text: But whosoever drinketh of the water that I shall give him shall never thirst ; but the water that I shall give him shall be in him a well of water springing up into everlasting life .
text2: Pero aquin conis on atl yejhuan nicmacas xqueman amiquis , pampa on atl yejhuan nicmacas yejhua nochihuas ijtic quen itlaj ameyajli yejhuan quimacas nemilistli para nochipa .

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , give me this water , that I thirst not , neither come hither to draw .
text2: Quemaj on sihuatl oquijlij : ― Señor , xnechmaca yejhua on atl para ma ca ocsejpa namiquis , nion nihuajlas nicuajquixtis atl ijtic in pozo .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Go , call thy husband , and come hither .
text2: Jesús oquijlij : ― Xhuiya xcanati mohuehuentzin niman quemaj xhuajlacan nican .

text: The woman answered and said , I have no husband . Jesus said unto her , Thou hast well said , I have no husband :
text2: Niman on sihuatl ijquin oquinanquilij : ― Xnicpia nohuehuentzin . Quemaj Jesús oquijlij : ― On ica otiquijtoj xticpia mohuehuentzin , on melahuac ,

text: For thou hast had five husbands ; and he whom thou now hast is not thy husband : in that saidst thou truly .
text2: pampa macuijli mohuehuentzitzihuan yotiquimpix , niman on yejhuan aman ticpia xmohuehuentzin . Yejhua ica on melahuac tlen otiquijtoj .

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , I perceive that thou art a prophet .
text2: Niman ijcuac on sihuatl ijcon ocac , oquijlij Jesús : ― Señor , nejhua niquita ica tejhua titiotlajtojquetl .

text: Our fathers worshipped in this mountain ; and ye say , that in Jerusalem is the place where men ought to worship .
text2: On noachtojtajhuan samaritanos oquimahuistilijquej Dios nican ipan in tepetl , pero nemejhuamej yejhuan nenhebreos nenquijtohuaj ica nonequi ticmahuistilisquej ne Jerusalén .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Woman , believe me , the hour cometh , when ye shall neither in this mountain , nor yet at Jerusalem , worship the Father .
text2: Jesús oquijlij : ― Sihuatl , xnechneltoquili ica huajlau on tonaltin ijcuac nion nican ipan in tepetl nion ne Jerusalén xnenquimahuistilisquej Dios .

text: Ye worship ye know not what : we know what we worship : for salvation is of the Jews .
text2: Nemejhuamej yejhuan nensamaritanos xnenquimatij aquinon nenquimahuistiliaj , pero tejhuamej yejhuan tihebreos ticmatij aquinon ticmahuistiliaj pampa on temaquixtilistli quisa totech .

text: But the hour cometh , and now is , when the true worshippers shall worship the Father in spirit and in truth : for the Father seeketh such to worship him .
text2: Pero huajlau on tonajli niman sa no aman ijcuac on yejhuan melahuac quinequij quimahuistiliaj toTajtzin , quimahuistilisquej ne impan inyojlo niman ica tlen melahuac quen Dios quinequi . ToTatzin , tej , ijqui quinequi ma quichihuacan on yejhuan quimahuistiliaj .

text: God is a Spirit : and they that worship him must worship him in spirit and in truth .
text2: Dios yejhua Espíritu , niman on yejhuan quimahuistiliaj ica oncaj quichihuasquej impan inyojlo niman ica tlej melahuac quen Dios quinequi .

text: The woman saith unto him , I know that Messias cometh , which is called Christ : when he is come , he will tell us all things .
text2: On sihuatl oquijlij : ― Nejhua nicmatzticaj ica huajlas on Mesías yejhuan itoca Cristo . Ijcuac yejhua huajlas , nochi tlajtlamach techmelajcailis .

text: Jesus saith unto her , I that speak unto thee am he .
text2: Niman Jesús oquijlij : ― Sa no nejhua yejhuan nimitznojnotza .

text: And upon this came his disciples , and marvelled that he talked with the woman : yet no man said , What seekest thou ? or , Why talkest thou with her ?
text2: Niman quemaj oyejcoquej on inomachtijcahuan niman otlamojcaitaquej ica Jesús tlajtlajtohuaya ihuan se sihuatl . Pero xacaj oquitlajtoltij tlinon quinequiya on sihuatl , noso tlica tlajtlajtohuaya Jesús ihuan on sihuatl .

text: The woman then left her waterpot , and went her way into the city , and saith to the men ,
text2: Quemaj on sihuatl ocajteu itzotzocol niman oyaj ne ipan on hueyican , niman oquimijlito on tlacamej :

text: Come , see a man , which told me all things that ever I did : is not this the Christ ?
text2: ― Xhuajlacan , xquitaquij se tlacatl yejhuan onechpanextijlij nochi tlen yonicchiu . ¿ Manin yejhua Cristo ?

text: Then they went out of the city , and came unto him .
text2: Ijcuacon on tlacamej oquisquej ne ipan on hueyican niman oyajquej ne campa nemiya Jesús .

text: In the mean while his disciples prayed him , saying , Master , eat .
text2: Chica yejhua in onochiu , on inomachtijcahuan quitlajtlaniliayaj Jesús : ― Temachtijquetl , nimantzin xtlacua .

text: But he said unto them , I have meat to eat that ye know not of .
text2: Pero yejhua oquimijlij : ― Nejhua nicpia tlen nicuas yejhuan nemejhuamej xnenquimatij .

text: Therefore said the disciples one to another , Hath any man brought him ought to eat ?
text2: Ijcuac on nomachtijquej ijcon ocacquej , opeu notlajtoltiaj : ― ¿ Manin yej yacaj yoquitlacualtico ?

text: Jesus saith unto them , My meat is to do the will of him that sent me , and to finish his work .
text2: Pero Jesús oquimijlij : ― Ijcon quen nemotlalnacayo cojtiticaj ijcuac nentlacuaj , no ijqui noalma cojtiticaj ijcuac nicchihua tlen quinequi on yejhuan onechajtitlan para nitlamis itequiu . Yejhua ica , tej , in tequitl sa no ijqui quen notlacual .

text: Say not ye , There are yet four months , and then cometh harvest ? behold , I say unto you , Lift up your eyes , and look on the fields ; for they are white already to harvest .
text2: Nemejhuamej nenquijtohuaj : “ Oc polihui nahui metztli para pixcalos . ” Pero nejhua nemechijlia : Xquitacan nochimej on tlalticpactlacamej . Yejhuamej no ijqui quen se hueyi tlatoctli yejhuan yochicau para nopixcas .

text: And he that reapeth receiveth wages , and gathereth fruit unto life eternal : that both he that soweth and he that reapeth may rejoice together .
text2: On yejhuan quimpixca inalmas on tlacamej quiselia itlaxtlahuil , niman on yejhuan quimpixca quiselis nemilistli para nochipa . Tla ijcon , tej , on yejhuan tlatoca niman on yejhuan pixca san secan paquisquej .

text: And herein is that saying true , One soweth , and another reapeth .
text2: Tla ijcon , melahuac quen quijtohua se tlajtojli : “ Se tlatoca niman ocse pixca . ”

text: I sent you to reap that whereon ye bestowed no labour : other men laboured , and ye are entered into their labours .
text2: Nejhua onemechtitlan xpixcatij ne campa xonentocaquej . Ocsequimej otequitquej niman nemejhuamej sa nenquiseliaj on tlen yoquitequitquej .

text: And many of the Samaritans of that city believed on him for the saying of the woman , which testified , He told me all that ever I did .
text2: Niman miyequej samaritanos yejhuan chanejquej ipan on hueyican oquineltocaquej Jesús ipampa on tlen oquimijlij on sihuatl ijcuac oquiteixpantijlij : “ Onechpanextijlij nochi tlen nejhua yonicchiu . ”

text: So when the Samaritans were come unto him , they besought him that he would tarry with them : and he abode there two days .
text2: Yejhua ica , ijcuac on chanejquej Samaria ohualajquej , sanoyej oquitlajtlanilijquej para ompa inhuan ma nocahua niman Jesús ome tonajli ompa onocau .

text: And many more believed because of his own word ;
text2: Niman miyequej más otlaneltocaquej ijcuac ocacquej on tlen sa no yejhua quijtohuaya .

text: And said unto the woman , Now we believe , not because of thy saying : for we have heard him ourselves , and know that this is indeed the Christ , the Saviour of the world .
text2: Quemaj oquijlijquej on sihuatl : ― Aman ticneltocaj xsan pampa yejhua on tlen otitechijlij , yej no pampa sa no tejhuamej yoticacquej . Niman ticmatztoquej ica melahuac yejhua on temaquixtiquetl yejhuan quinmaquixtis on tlalticpactlacamej .

text: Now after two days he departed thence , and went into Galilee .
text2: Quemaj ipan ome tonajli Jesús oquis ne Samaria niman ocajsic iojhui para oyaj ne Galilea .

text: For Jesus himself testified , that a prophet hath no honour in his own country .
text2: Jesús sa no yejhua oquijtoj ica se tiotlajtojquetl xquitlacaitaj on yejhuan chanejquej .

text: Then when he was come into Galilee , the Galilaeans received him , having seen all the things that he did at Jerusalem at the feast : for they also went unto the feast .
text2: Ijcuac oajsic ne Galilea , on yejhuan ompa chanejquej cuajli oquiselijquej , pampa yejhuamej no oyajcaj ne Jerusalén ipan on ilhuitl pascua , niman oquitaquej nochi tlen yejhua ompa oquichiu .

text: So Jesus came again into Cana of Galilee , where he made the water wine . And there was a certain nobleman , whose son was sick at Capernaum .
text2: Quemaj Jesús ocsejpa ohuajlaj ne Caná campa on atl oquicuepca vino . Ompa nemiya se hueyixticaj itequitcau on rey , yejhuan ne ipan on hueyican Capernaum quipiaya se iconeu cualohuaya .

text: When he heard that Jesus was come out of Judaea into Galilee , he went unto him , and besought him that he would come down , and heal his son : for he was at the point of death .
text2: Ijcuac on hueyixticaj tequitquetl oquimat ica Jesús ohuaquis ne Judea niman ica yoyejcoc Galilea , oyaj oquitato niman oquicnotlajtlanilij para ma huiya ichan niman ma quipajti iconeu yejhuan ye micticatca .

text: Then said Jesus unto him , Except ye see signs and wonders , ye will not believe .
text2: Quemaj Jesús oquijlij : ― Nemejhuamej xnentlaneltocaj tla xnenquitaj tlamajhuisoltin niman milagros .

text: The nobleman saith unto him , Sir , come down ere my child die .
text2: Pero on hueyixticaj tequitquetl oquijlij : ― Señor , nimantzin xhuajla antes miquis noconeu .

text: Jesus saith unto him , Go thy way ; thy son liveth . And the man believed the word that Jesus had spoken unto him , and he went his way .
text2: Niman Jesús oquijlij : ― Xhuiya mochan . Moconeu xmiquis . On tlacatl oquineltocac tlinon Jesús oquijlij , niman oyaj .

text: And as he was now going down , his servants met him , and told him , saying , Thy son liveth .
text2: Ijcuac ye ajsiticatca ichan on itequitcahuan oquinamiquitoj niman oquijlijquej : ― Moconeu yopajtic .

text: Then inquired he of them the hour when he began to amend . And they said unto him , Yesterday at the seventh hour the fever left him .
text2: Quemaj oquintlajtoltij tlen hora opeu pajtitiu iconeu , niman oquijlijquej : ― Yalohua ipan la una ijcuac tiotlac ocau on totonqui .

text: So the father knew that it was at the same hour , in the which Jesus said unto him , Thy son liveth : and himself believed , and his whole house .
text2: Ijcuacon on tajtli oquelnamic ica sa no ipan on hora ijcuacon ijcuac Jesús oquijlij : “ Moconeu xmiquis . ” Yejhua ica , tej , ihuan nochi ichanchanejcahuan oquineltocaquej Jesús .

text: This is again the second miracle that Jesus did , when he was come out of Judaea into Galilee .
text2: In yejhua ica ome milagro oquichiu Jesús ijcuac ohuajquis ne Judea niman oyaj ne Galilea .

text: After this there was a feast of the Jews ; and Jesus went up to Jerusalem .
text2: Ijcuac in tlajtlamach yonochiu , Jesús oyaj ne Jerusalén campa on hebreos quichijticatcaj se ilhuitl para Dios .

text: Now there is at Jerusalem by the sheep market a pool , which is called in the Hebrew tongue Bethesda , having five porches .
text2: Ipan on hueyican , nisiu itech on tlatzacuilyotl itoca de las Ovejas , oncatca se campa naltilo yejhuan ica tlajtojli hebreo itoca Betesda . Ne campa naltilo quipiaya macuijli tlatzacuiltenco .

text: In these lay a great multitude of impotent folk , of blind , halt , withered , waiting for the moving of the water .
text2: Niman ompa ipan on tlatzacuiltenco tejtemiyaj miyequej cocoxquej yejhuan coxomej , ciegos niman on yejhuan sepohuiyaj . Yejhuamej quichixticatcaj ma nolini on atl ,

text: For an angel went down at a certain season into the pool , and troubled the water : whosoever then first after the troubling of the water stepped in was made whole of whatsoever disease he had .
text2: pampa san ajsiya on tiempo ijcuac se ilhuicactequitquetl temohuaya ne ijtic campa naltilo niman quinelohuaya on atl . Quemaj on yejhuan achtopa calaquiya ne ijtic on atl pajtiya masqui san catlejhua cualolistli quipiaya .

text: And a certain man was there , which had an infirmity thirty and eight years .
text2: Ompa nemiya se tlacatl yejhuan ye quipiaya sempoajli huan majtlactli huan chichueyi xipan ica cualohuaya .

text: When Jesus saw him lie , and knew that he had been now a long time in that case , he saith unto him , Wilt thou be made whole ?
text2: Ijcuac Jesús oquitac ompa onoc , niman oquitac ica ye huejcahui cualo , oquitlajtoltij : ― ¿ Ticnequi tipajtis ?

text: The impotent man answered him , Sir , I have no man , when the water is troubled , to put me into the pool : but while I am coming , another steppeth down before me .
text2: On cocoxqui oquijlij : ― Señor , xnicpia aquin nechcalactis ijtic on atl ijcuac nolinia . Ijcuac nicnequi nicalaquis , ocse achtopa calaqui .

text: Jesus saith unto him , Rise , take up thy bed , and walk .
text2: Jesús oquijlij : ― Xmotelquetza . Xcajcocui mopetl niman xhuiya .

text: And immediately the man was made whole , and took up his bed , and walked : and on the same day was the sabbath .
text2: Nimantzin on tlacatl opajtic , ocontilan ipetl niman onejnen . Pero yejhua in onochiu ipan on tonajli ijcuac nosehuiaj on hebreos .

text: The Jews therefore said unto him that was cured , It is the sabbath day : it is not lawful for thee to carry thy bed .
text2: Yejhua ica intlayecancahuan on hebreos oquijlijquej on yejhuan opajtic : ― Aman in tonajli para titosehuiaj . Itlanahuatil Moisés xmitzcahuilia para ticmomamaltis mopetl .

text: He answered them , He that made me whole , the same said unto me , Take up thy bed , and walk .
text2: On tlacatl oquimijlij : ― On yejhuan onechpajtij onechijlij : “ Xcajcocui mopetl niman xhuiya . ”

text: Then asked they him , What man is that which said unto thee , Take up thy bed , and walk ?
text2: Quemaj oquitlajtoltijquej : ― ¿ Aquinon omitzijlij : “ Xcajcocui mopetl niman xhuiya ” ?

text: And he that was healed wist not who it was : for Jesus had conveyed himself away , a multitude being in that place .
text2: Pero on tlacatl xquimatiya aquinon oquipajtij , pampa Jesús onejcuanij itech on miyec tlacatl yejhuan ompa nemiya .

text: Afterward Jesus findeth him in the temple , and said unto him , Behold , thou art made whole : sin no more , lest a worse thing come unto thee .
text2: Más saquin Jesús oquinextij ne ipan on hueyi tiopan , niman oquijlij : ― Xcaqui , aman yotipajtic . Ma ca ocsejpa titlajtlacos para ma ca mopan nochihuas itlaj yejhuan más temojtij .

text: The man departed , and told the Jews that it was Jesus , which had made him whole .
text2: Quemaj on tlacatl oyaj niman oquinmachiltijtetzito itlayecancahuan on hebreos ica on yejhuan oquipajtij yejhua Jesús .

text: And therefore did the Jews persecute Jesus , and sought to slay him , because he had done these things on the sabbath day .
text2: Yejhua ica , tej , on tlayecanquej tlamach ica oquipajsolojquej Jesús niman quimictisnequiyaj , pampa on tlen oquichiu ipan on tonajli ijcuac nosehuiaj on hebreos .

text: But Jesus answered them , My Father worketh hitherto , and I work .
text2: Pero Jesús oquimijlij : ― NoTajtzin hasta aman tequiti , niman nejhua no nitequiti .

text: Therefore the Jews sought the more to kill him , because he not only had broken the sabbath , but said also that God was his Father , making himself equal with God .
text2: Yejhua ica on itlayecancahuan on hebreos más quinequiyaj quimictisquej , pampa xsan xquitlacaitaya on nesehuiltonajli , yej no oquijtoj ica Dios yejhua iTaj , niman ijcon , tej , onoteneu ica yejhua nemi sa no ijqui quen Dios .

text: Then answered Jesus and said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , The Son can do nothing of himself , but what he seeth the Father do : for what things soever he doeth , these also doeth the Son likewise .
text2: Quemaj Jesús oquimijlij : ― Ica tlen melahuac nemechijlia ica nejhua yejhuan niiConeu Dios xhueli nicchihua itlaj noselti , yej san nihueli nicchihua on tlen niquita quichihua noTaj . On tlen noTaj quichihua no nicchihua .

text: For the Father loveth the Son , and sheweth him all things that himself doeth : and he will shew him greater works than these , that ye may marvel .
text2: Tej , noTaj nechtlajsojtla niman nechititia nochi tlen yejhua quichihua . Yejhua nechititis tlajtlamach yejhuan más huejhueyi xquen yejhua in para nicchihuas . Ijcon tej , nemejhuamej mechmojcatlachaltis .

text: For as the Father raiseth up the dead , and quickeneth them ; even so the Son quickeneth whom he will .
text2: Ijcon quen noTaj quinyolitis on mimiquej niman quinmacas nemilistli , nejhua yejhuan niiConeu no ijqui nicmacas nemilistli on yejhuan nicnequis nicmacas .

text: For the Father judgeth no man , but hath committed all judgment unto the Son :
text2: Niman noTaj xquiyolcuitia nion quitlajtlacolmaca yacaj tlacatl , yej nejhua onechmacac nochi on tequihuajyotl para niteyolcuitis niman nitetlajtlacolmacas ,

text: That all men should honour the Son , even as they honour the Father . He that honoureth not the Son honoureth not the Father which hath sent him .
text2: para nochimej ma nechtlacaitacan quen quitlacaitaj noTaj . Yejhuan xnechtlacaitaj , no xquitlacaitaj noTaj yejhuan onechajtitlan .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that heareth my word , and believeth on him that sent me , hath everlasting life , and shall not come into condemnation ; but is passed from death unto life .
text2: ' Ica tlen melahuac nemechijlia : Yejhuan cuajli caqui on tlen niquijtohua niman quineltoca on yejhuan onechajtitlan quipia nemilistli para nochipa . Niman xquitlajtlacolmacasquej , yej ialma yonomanahuij itech miquilistli , niman aman quipia nemilistli para nochipa .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , The hour is coming , and now is , when the dead shall hear the voice of the Son of God : and they that hear shall live .
text2: Ica tlen melahuac nemechijlia ye huajlau on tonajli niman sa no aman yoyejcoc ijcuac on mimiquej caquisquej notlajtol nejhua yejhuan niiConeu Dios , niman on yejhuan quitlacamatisquej nemisquej .

text: For as the Father hath life in himself ; so hath he given to the Son to have life in himself ;
text2: Ijcon quen noTajtzin quitemaca nemilistli para nochipa , no ijqui nejhua yejhuan niiConeu nictemaca nemilistli para nochipa .

text: And hath given him authority to execute judgment also , because he is the Son of man .
text2: Niman yonechmacac itlanahuatil para niteyolcuitis niman nitetlajtlacolmacas pampa oninochiu Tlacatl .

text: Marvel not at this : for the hour is coming , in the which all that are in the graves shall hear his voice ,
text2: Ma ca yejhua ica in xmojcatlachacan , pampa yejcos on tonajli ijcuac nochimej on mimiquej caquisquej notlajtol

text: And shall come forth ; they that have done good , unto the resurrection of life ; and they that have done evil , unto the resurrection of damnation .
text2: niman quisasquej ipan intlalcon . On yejhuan oquichijquej on tlen cuajli , yolisquej niman noquetztehuasquej ipan intlalcon para quipiasquej yencuic nemilistli yejhuan para nochipa . Pero on yejhuan oquichijquej on tlen xcuajli , yolisquej niman noquetztehuasquej para quintlajtlacolmacasquej .

text: I can of mine own self do nothing : as I hear , I judge : and my judgment is just ; because I seek not mine own will , but the will of the Father which hath sent me .
text2: ' Nejhua xhueli itlaj nicchihua itechcopa notequiyo . Nejhua niteyolcuitia niman nitetlajtlacolmaca quen Dios nechijlia . Yejhua ica niteyolcuitia niman nitetlajtlacolmaca quen quitocarohua pampa xnicchihua tlen nejhua nicnequi , yej tlen quinequi noTajtzin yejhua onechajtitlan .

text: If I bear witness of myself , my witness is not true .
text2: Tla sa no nejhua noca ninoteixpantilia nenhuelisquiaj nenquijtosquiaj ica on tlen niquijtohua xmelahuac .

text: There is another that beareth witness of me ; and I know that the witness which he witnesseth of me is true .
text2: Pero nemi ocse yejhuan noca quiteixpantilia , niman nejhua nicmati ica on tlen noca quijtohua melahuac .

text: Ye sent unto John , and he bare witness unto the truth .
text2: Onenquintitlanquej sequimej itech Juan , niman on tlen yejhua noca oquijtoj melahuac .

text: But I receive not testimony from man : but these things I say , that ye might be saved .
text2: Pero on tlen Juan noca oquijtoj xnechpolohua , yej san nemechelnamictia on tlen yejhua noca oquijtoj para huelis nennechneltocasquej niman nenmaquisasquej .

text: He was a burning and a shining light : and ye were willing for a season to rejoice in his light .
text2: Juan quen itlaj tlahuijli catca yejhuan tlicuiya niman cuajli tlahuilohuaya . Itlahuil omechititij on cuajli ojtli para ipan nemohuicasquej . Niman quesqui tonaltin onenquitlalijquej nemoyojlo ican paquilistli para nenyasquej ipan on cuajli ojtli .

text: But I have greater witness than that of John : for the works which the Father hath given me to finish , the same works that I do , bear witness of me , that the Father hath sent me .
text2: Pero nejhua nicpia noteixpantilijcau yejhuan más hueyi quijtosnequi xquen yejhua on tlen oquijtoj Juan . On tlen noTajtzin onechmacac para ma nicchihua quiteixpantilia ica melahuac noTajtzin onechajtitlan niman no in tlajtlamach nicchihua . Yejhuamej quiteititia ica melahuac noTajtzin onechajtitlan .

text: And the Father himself , which hath sent me , hath borne witness of me . Ye have neither heard his voice at any time , nor seen his shape .
text2: Niman noTajtzin yejhuan onechajtitlan no noca teixpantilia . Nemejhuamej xqueman onencacquej ijcuac tlajtlajtohua , xqueman onenquitaquej quen tlajtlacha .

text: And ye have not his word abiding in you : for whom he hath sent , him ye believe not .
text2: Nion itlajtol xhueli calaqui ipan nemoyojlo , pampa xnennechneltocaj nejhua yejhuan onechajtitlan .

text: Search the scriptures ; for in them ye think ye have eternal life : and they are they which testify of me .
text2: Nemejhuamej sanoyej nenquimomachtiaj on Yectlajcuilojli , pampa nenquinemiliaj ica nenquinextisquej nemilistli yejhuan para nochipa ijcuac yejhua nenquimomachtiaj . Yejhua ica mechtocarohua nenquimatisquej ica on Yectlajcuilojli yejhua mechtenquixtilia noca nejhua .

text: And ye will not come to me , that ye might have life .
text2: Pero nemejhuamej xnenquinequij notech nenhuajlasquej para nenquipiasquej yejhua on nemilistli .

text: I receive not honour from men .
text2: ' Nejhua xnictejtemohua para on tlacamej ma nechtlacaitacan .

text: But I know you , that ye have not the love of God in you .
text2: Pero nemechixmati niman nicmatzticaj ica xnenquitlajsojtla Dios .

text: I am come in my Father ' s name , and ye receive me not : if another shall come in his own name , him ye will receive .
text2: Nejhua onihuajlaj nemotech ican itocatzin noTajtzin , niman nemejhuamej xnennechseliaj . Pero tla huajlas ocse yejhuan tlajtlajtos ica sa no itlamachilis , on quemaj nenquiselisquej .

text: How can ye believe , which receive honour one of another , and seek not the honour that cometh from God only ?
text2: ¿ Quen ijqui , tej , huelis nentlaneltocasquej tla sa no nemejhuamej nenquimoseliliaj on tlacaitalistli niman xnenquitejtemohuaj on tetlacamatilistli yejhuan san yejhua Dios quitemaca ?

text: Do not think that I will accuse you to the Father : there is one that accuseth you , even Moses , in whom ye trust .
text2: Ma ca xnemilican ica nejhua nemechteixpanhuis itech noTajtzin . Yej mechteixpanhuis Moisés yejhuan itech yonenquitlalijquej nemotlamachalis .

text: For had ye believed Moses , ye would have believed me : for he wrote of me .
text2: Tla nemejhuamej melahuac nenquineltocasquiaj on tlen oquijtoj Moisés , no nennechneltocasquiaj , pampa yejhua otlajcuiloj noca nejhua .

text: But if ye believe not his writings , how shall ye believe my words ?
text2: Pero xnenquineltocaj on tlen yejhua oquijcuiloj . Yejhua ica , ¿ quen ijqui , tej , huelis nenquineltocasquej on tlen nejhua nemechijlia ?

text: After these things Jesus went over the sea of Galilee , which is the sea of Tiberias .
text2: Saquin ijcuac yejhua on onochiu , Jesús oyaj ipan ocse ilado on mar itoca Galilea yejhuan no itoca Tiberias .

text: And a great multitude followed him , because they saw his miracles which he did on them that were diseased .
text2: Sanoyej miyec tlacatl yayaj ihuan , pampa yoquitacaj on milagros yejhuan oquichiu ica oquimpajtij on cocoxquej .

text: And Jesus went up into a mountain , and there he sat with his disciples .
text2: Quemaj Jesús otlejcoc ipan se tepetl niman ompa onotlalij ihuan inomachtijcahuan .

text: And the passover , a feast of the Jews , was nigh .
text2: Ipan on tonaltin ye nisiu catca para on hebreos quichihuasquej on ilhuitl itoca pascua .

text: When Jesus then lifted up his eyes , and saw a great company come unto him , he saith unto Philip , Whence shall we buy bread , that these may eat ?
text2: Niman Jesús oquitac iyehualijcan ica miyec tlacatl quinisihuiya . Yejhua ica oquijlij Felipe : ― ¿ Canon ticohuasquej tlacuajli para nochi yejhua in tlacatl ?

text: And this he said to prove him : for he himself knew what he would do .
text2: Cuajli Jesús ye quimatzticatca tlinon quichihuas , pero yejhua ijcon oquijlij san para quitas tlinon quijtos Felipe .

text: Philip answered him , Two hundred pennyworth of bread is not sufficient for them , that every one of them may take a little .
text2: Niman Felipe oquijlij : ― Se tlacatl nonequi tequitis canaj ome ciento tonaltin para huelis cohuas pan para nochimej in tojlamej . Masqui Ijcon quichihuasquia xcajxilis nion siquiera para cada se quicuas pitentzin .

text: One of his disciples , Andrew , Simon Peter ' s brother , saith unto him ,
text2: Quemaj Andrés , yejhuan semej on inomachtijcau niman yejhuan icniu Simón Pedro , oquijlij :

text: There is a lad here , which hath five barley loaves , and two small fishes : but what are they among so many ?
text2: ― Nican nemi se oquichconetl yejhuan quipia macuijli pan tlachijchiutin ican cebada niman ome michintzitzintin . Pero ¿ tlinon quijtojticaj yejhua in achijtzin tlacuajli para in miyec tlacatl ?

text: And Jesus said , Make the men sit down . Now there was much grass in the place . So the men sat down , in number about five thousand .
text2: Ijcuacon Jesús oquijtoj : ― Xquimijlican ma nosehuican nochimej . Ne campa nemiyaj oncatca miyec sacatl niman ompa onosehuijquej canaj macuijli mil tlacamej , niman on sihuamej xtlapohualtij inhuan .

text: And Jesus took the loaves ; and when he had given thanks , he distributed to the disciples , and the disciples to them that were set down ; and likewise of the fishes as much as they would .
text2: Quemaj Jesús ocontilan on pan niman , ijcuac yoquimacac tlaxtlahuijli Dios , oquinmacac on inomachtijcahuan , niman on nomachtijquej oquinxexelohuilijquej nochimej on yejhuan ompa yejyehuaticatcaj . Sa no ijqui oquichiu ica on michimej niman nochimej yejhuamej oquimajxilij san quech quinequiyaj .

text: When they were filled , he said unto his disciples , Gather up the fragments that remain , that nothing be lost .
text2: Ijcuac yoixhuiquej , Jesús oquimijlij on inomachtijcahuan : ― Xsentlalican nochi on tlen onocau para ma ca itlaj ma ixpolihui .

text: Therefore they gathered them together , and filled twelve baskets with the fragments of the five barley loaves , which remained over and above unto them that had eaten .
text2: Ijcon , tej , oquisentlalijquej on tlatlajcotzitzintin tlen onocau itech on macuijli pan tlachijchiutin ican cebada niman oquitemiltiquej majtlactli huan ome chiquiutin .

text: Then those men , when they had seen the miracle that Jesus did , said , This is of a truth that prophet that should come into the world .
text2: Quemaj ijcuac on tlacamej oquitaquej on milagro yejhuan Jesús oquichiu , oquijtojquej : ― Melahuac in yejhua tiotlajtojquetl on yejhuan ye oncatca para huajlasquia ipan in tlalticpactli .

text: When Jesus therefore perceived that they would come and take him by force , to make him a king , he departed again into a mountain himself alone .
text2: Quemaj Jesús oquimat ica quinequiyaj quitehuilanasquej para quitlalisquej inrey . Yejhua ica ocsejpa onejcuanij niman iselti oyaj ne ipan on tepetl .

text: And when even was now come , his disciples went down unto the sea ,
text2: Ijcuac ohuajtlayohuac on inomachtijcahuan Jesús otemotoj ne itech mar .

text: And entered into a ship , and went over the sea toward Capernaum . And it was now dark , and Jesus was not come to them .
text2: Niman otlejcoquej ipan se barco niman opeu quipanahuiyaj on mar para ajsisquej ne Capernaum . Ye tlayohua catca niman Jesús oc xe huajnocuepaya intech .

text: And the sea arose by reason of a great wind that blew .
text2: Niman opeu chicahuac ajaca , niman tejmotij coxoniya on mar .

text: So when they had rowed about five and twenty or thirty furlongs , they see Jesus walking on the sea , and drawing nigh unto the ship : and they were afraid .
text2: Niman ijcuac yoquinejnenquej macuijli noso chicuasen kilómetros , oquitaquej Jesús nejnentiu ipan on atl niman ye quinisihuijtiaya on barco . Niman yejhuamej onomojtijquej .

text: But he saith unto them , It is I ; be not afraid .
text2: Pero yejhua oquimijlij : ― ¡ Nejhua niJesús , ma ca xmomojtican !

text: Then they willingly received him into the ship : and immediately the ship was at the land whither they went .
text2: Ijcuacon yejhuamej ican pactli oquiselijquej ne ipan barco , niman nimantzin sa oquitaquej yoajsiquej ne ipan on tlajli campa yayaj .

text: The day following , when the people which stood on the other side of the sea saw that there was none other boat there , save that one whereinto his disciples were entered , and that Jesus went not with his disciples into the boat , but that his disciples were gone away alone ;
text2: Ijcuac huajmostla , on tlacamej yejhuan onocajcaj ipan on ocse itenco on mar oquimatquej ica on nomachtijquej oyajquej ipan on san ica nochi barco ompa nemiya , niman ica Jesús xinhuan oyaj .

text: ( Howbeit there came other boats from Tiberias nigh unto the place where they did eat bread , after that the Lord had given thanks : )
text2: Pero saniman oyejcoquej sequimej barcos yejhuan ohualejquej ipan on hueyican itoca Tiberias . Yejhuamej oyejcoquej ne campa nisiu ocuajquej on pan ijcuac on toTeco oquimacac tlaxtlahuijli Dios .

text: When the people therefore saw that Jesus was not there , neither his disciples , they also took shipping , and came to Capernaum , seeking for Jesus .
text2: Niman ijcuac on tlacamej oquitaquej ica xompa nemiya Jesús nion inomachtijcahuan , ocalaquej ipan on barcos niman oyajquej oquitejtemotoj ne Capernaum .

text: And when they had found him on the other side of the sea , they said unto him , Rabbi , when camest thou hither ?
text2: Ijcuac on tlacamej oajsiquej ipan on ocse ilado on mar , oquinextitoj Jesús , niman oquitlajtoltijquej : ― Temachtijquetl , ¿ camanon otejcoc nican ?

text: Jesus answered them and said , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Ye seek me , not because ye saw the miracles , but because ye did eat of the loaves , and were filled .
text2: Pero Jesús oquimijlij : ― Ica tlen melahuac nemechijlia nemejhuamej nennechtejtemohuaj xpampa onencajsicamatquej tlen quijtosnequi on milagro yejhuan onicchiu yalohua ijcuac onemechtlacualtij , yej san pampa onentlacuajquej hasta campa onemixhuiquej .

text: Labour not for the meat which perisheth , but for that meat which endureth unto everlasting life , which the Son of man shall give unto you : for him hath God the Father sealed .
text2: Ma ca xtequitican ica on tlacuajli yejhuan saniman tlami , yej xtequitican ica on tlacuajli yejhuan quisa itech Dios yejhuan quitemaca nemilistli para nochipa . Nejhua yejhuan oninochiu Tlacatl mechmacas yejhua in tlacuajli pampa toTajtzin oquipantlatij ica nicpia on tlanahuatijli para ijquin nicchihuas .

text: Then said they unto him , What shall we do , that we might work the works of God ?
text2: Quemaj oquitlajtoltijquej : ― ¿ Tlinon nonequi ticchihuasquej para tictequitisquej on tlajtlamach yejhuan Dios quinequi ma ticchihuacan ?

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , This is the work of God , that ye believe on him whom he hath sent .
text2: Niman Jesús oquimijlij : ― On tlen Dios quinequi xchihuacan sa no yejhua in : Xnechneltocacan nejhua yejhuan onechajtitlan .

text: They said therefore unto him , What sign shewest thou then , that we may see , and believe thee ? what dost thou work ?
text2: Niman quemaj ijquin oquitlajtoltijquej : ― ¿ Tlen tlamajhuisojli titechititis para ma tiquitacan niman timitzneltocasquej ? ¿ Tlinon , tej , ticchihuas ?

text: Our fathers did eat manna in the desert ; as it is written , He gave them bread from heaven to eat .
text2: On Yectlajcuilojli quijtohua ica ne tlapatlaco on toachtojtajhuan ocuajquej on tlen itoca maná . Ijquin , tej , quijtohua on Yectlajcuilojli : “ Dios oquintlacualtij ica on pan yejhuan ne ilhuicac hualejticaj . ”

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Moses gave you not that bread from heaven ; but my Father giveth you the true bread from heaven .
text2: Jesús oquimijlij : ― Ica tlen melahuac nemechijlia : Moisés xejhua oquitemacac on pan yejhuan ilhuicac hualejticaj . Yej noTajtzin yejhua quitemaca on pan yejhuan melahuac ne ilhuicac hualejticaj .

text: For the bread of God is he which cometh down from heaven , and giveth life unto the world .
text2: Yejhua on pan yejhuan Dios quitemaca sa no yejhua on pan yejhuan ohuajtemoc ne ilhuicac niman quinmaca yencuic nemilistli on tlalticpactlacamej .

text: Then said they unto him , Lord , evermore give us this bread .
text2: Quemaj oquijlijquej : ― ToTeco , nochipa xtechmaca yejhua in pan .

text: And Jesus said unto them , I am the bread of life : he that cometh to me shall never hunger ; and he that believeth on me shall never thirst .
text2: Niman Jesús oquimijlij : ― Nejhua nipan yejhuan quitemaca yencuic nemilistli . Yejhuan notech huajlau xqueman apismiquis , niman yejhuan nechneltocas xqueman amiquis .

text: But I said unto you , That ye also have seen me , and believe not .
text2: Pero quen nejhua yonemechijlij , nemejhuamej xnennechneltocaj masqui yonennechitaquej .

text: All that the Father giveth me shall come to me ; and him that cometh to me I will in no wise cast out .
text2: Nochimej on quech nechinmacas noTajtzin huajlasquej notech , niman on yejhuan huajlasquej notech niquinselis .

text: For I came down from heaven , not to do mine own will , but the will of him that sent me .
text2: Ijquin nicchihuas pampa nejhua onihualeu ne ilhuicac xpara nicchihuas tlen nejhua nicnequi , yej para nicchihuas on tlen quinequi on yejhuan onechajtitlan .

text: And this is the Father ' s will which hath sent me , that of all which he hath given me I should lose nothing , but should raise it up again at the last day .
text2: Niman noTajtzin yejhuan onechajtitlan xquinequi nicpolos nion se on yejhuan yejhua onechmacac , yej ipan on sa ica nochi tonajli ma niquinyoliti niman ma niquinquetztehua ipan intlalcon .

text: And this is the will of him that sent me , that every one which seeth the Son , and believeth on him , may have everlasting life : and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Yejhua quinequi para nochimej on yejhuan quimatij aquinon nejhua yejhuan niiConeu Dios niman nechneltocaj , ma quipiacan nemilistli para nochipa . Niman nejhua niquinyolitis niman niquimquetztehuas ipan intlalcon ipan on sa ica nochi tonajli .

text: The Jews then murmured at him , because he said , I am the bread which came down from heaven .
text2: On hebreos opejquej tlahueltlajtohuaj pampa Jesús ijquin oquijtoj : “ Nejhua niyejhua on pan yejhuan ne ilhuicac hualejticaj . ”

text: And they said , Is not this Jesus , the son of Joseph , whose father and mother we know ? how is it then that he saith , I came down from heaven ?
text2: Niman oquijtojquej : ― ¿ Manin in xejhua Jesús , on iconeu José ? Tejhuamej tiquixmatij itaj niman inan . Yejhua ica ¿ quen ijqui , tej , aman quijtohua ica hualejticaj ne ilhuicac ?

text: Jesus therefore answered and said unto them , Murmur not among yourselves .
text2: Quemaj Jesús oquimijlij : ― Ma ca sa xtlahueltlajtotiacan .

text: No man can come to me , except the Father which hath sent me draw him : and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Xacaj hueli notech huajlau tla xquinotza noTajtzin . Niman nejhua nicyolitis niman niquetztehuas ipan itlalcon ipan on sa ica nochi tonajli .

text: It is written in the prophets , And they shall be all taught of God . Every man therefore that hath heard , and hath learned of the Father , cometh unto me .
text2: Ipan intlajcuilolamahuan on tiotlajtojquej ijquin quijtohua : “ Dios quinmachtis nochimej . ” Ijcon , tej , nochimej yejhuan quitencaquij toTajtzin niman quiseliaj on tlen yejhua quinmachtia , notech huajlahuij .

text: Not that any man hath seen the Father , save he which is of God , he hath seen the Father .
text2: Xacaj oquitac on toTajtzin , yej san nejhua yejhuan itech onihualeu oniquitac yejhua .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that believeth on me hath everlasting life .
text2: Ica tlen melahuac nemechijlia , ica on yejhuan nechneltoca quipia on nemilistli yejhuan para nochipa .

text: I am that bread of life .
text2: Nejhua niyejhua on pan yejhuan quitemaca on yencuic nemilistli yejhuan para nochipa .

text: Your fathers did eat manna in the wilderness , and are dead .
text2: On nemoachtojtajhuan ocuajquej yejhua on maná ne campa tlapatlaco . Xonenquej para nochipa , yej omiquej .

text: This is the bread which cometh down from heaven , that a man may eat thereof , and not die .
text2: Pero on yejhuan quicuasquej on pan yejhuan ne ilhuicac hualejticaj xmiquisquej .

text: I am the living bread which came down from heaven : if any man eat of this bread , he shall live for ever : and the bread that I will give is my flesh , which I will give for the life of the world .
text2: Nejhua niyejhua on pan yejhuan quitemaca nemilistli niman yejhuan ne ilhuicac ohualeu . Yejhuan quicuas yejhua in pan nemis para nochipa . On pan yejhuan nejhua nicmacas sa no yejhua nonacayo yejhuan nicuentlalis para on tlalticpactlacamej huelisquej nemisquej para nochipa .

text: The Jews therefore strove among themselves , saying , How can this man give us his flesh to eat ?
text2: Quemaj on hebreos opejquej sa no yejhuamej nocamahuisojquij . Quijtohuayaj : ― ¿ Quen ijqui , tej , huelis sa no inacayo techcualtis ?

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Except ye eat the flesh of the Son of man , and drink his blood , ye have no life in you .
text2: Jesús oquimijlij : ― Nejhua yejhuan onochiu Tlacatl ica tlen melahuac nemechijlia , tla nemejhuamej xnenquicuaj nonacayo niman xnenconij noyesyo , xnennemisquej para nochipa .

text: Whoso eateth my flesh , and drinketh my blood , hath eternal life ; and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Yejhuan quicua nonacayo niman coni noyesyo quipia nemilistli para nochipa , niman nejhua nicyolitis niman niquetztehuas ipan itlalcon ipan on sa ica nochi tonajli .

text: For my flesh is meat indeed , and my blood is drink indeed .
text2: Ijcon nochihuas pampa nonacayo yejhua melahuac tlacuajli , niman noyesyo yejhua melahuac atlilistli .

text: He that eateth my flesh , and drinketh my blood , dwelleth in me , and I in him .
text2: Yejhuan quicua nonacayo niman coni noyesyo nemis san secan nohuan , niman nejhua no ninemis san secan ihuan .

text: As the living Father hath sent me , and I live by the Father : so he that eateth me , even he shall live by me .
text2: ToTajtzin yejhuan onechajtitlan quipia nemilistli , niman nejhua itechcopa ninemi . Niman no ijqui , tej , yejhuan nechcuas san notechcopa nemis para nochipa .

text: This is that bread which came down from heaven : not as your fathers did eat manna , and are dead : he that eateth of this bread shall live for ever .
text2: Nejhua nipan yejhuan ne ilhuicac ohualeu . Yejhua in pan xijqui quen yejhua on maná yejhuan ocuajquej nemoachtojtajhuan niman omiquej . Yejhuan quicuas in pan yejhuan nictenehua , nemis para nochipa .

text: These things said he in the synagogue , as he taught in Capernaum .
text2: Jesús oquitemachtij yejhua in tlajtlamach ne ipan on tiopan yejhuan oncaj ne Capernaum .

text: Many therefore of his disciples , when they had heard this , said , This is an hard saying ; who can hear it ?
text2: Ijcuac miyequej inomachtijcahuan ijcon ocacquej , oquijtojquej : ― Yejhua in tlen quijtohua sanoyej ohuijticaj para ticselisquej . ¿ Aquinon huelis quiselis in temachtijli ?

text: When Jesus knew in himself that his disciples murmured at it , he said unto them , Doth this offend you ?
text2: Jesús oquimat ipan iyojlo ica xpacatlajtlajtohuayaj yejhua ica on , niman oquintlajtoltij : ― ¿ Mechtlahuelcuitia on yejhuan oniquijto ?

text: What and if ye shall see the Son of man ascend up where he was before ?
text2: ¿ Tlinon nenquinemilisquiaj tla nennechitasquiaj nejhua yejhuan oninochiu Tlacatl nitlejcohua ne campa achtoj ninemiya ?

text: It is the spirit that quickeneth ; the flesh profiteth nothing : the words that I speak unto you , they are spirit , and they are life .
text2: Ialma se tlacatl yejhua quimaca nemilistli itlalnacayo . Itlalnacayo xitlaj quijtosnequi tla quipolohua ialma . On notlajtol yejhuan yonemechijlij mechmaca nemilistli para nochipa ijcon quen ialma se tlacatl quimaca nemilistli itlalnacayo .

text: But there are some of you that believe not . For Jesus knew from the beginning who they were that believed not , and who should betray him .
text2: Pero nemotzajlan oc nemij sequimej on yejhuan xe tlaneltocaj . Jesús , tej , ye quimatzticatca aquinomej on yejhuan xtlaneltocayaj , niman aquinon on yejhuan quitemactilis .

text: And he said , Therefore said I unto you , that no man can come unto me , except it were given unto him of my Father .
text2: Niman oquijtoj : ― Yejhua ica in onemechijlij ica xacaj huelis notech huajlas , tla toTajtzin xquitlalia ipan iyojlo para ma huajla .

text: From that time many of his disciples went back , and walked no more with him .
text2: Desde ijcuacon opeu miyequej on yejhuan cuicatinemiyaj onocuepquej , niman xoc ihuan oquistinenquej .

text: Then said Jesus unto the twelve , Will ye also go away ?
text2: Yejhua ica Jesús oquintlajtoltij on majtlactli huan ome inomachtijcahuan : ― ¿ Nemejhuamej no nenquinequij nennechtlalcahuisquej ?

text: Then Simon Peter answered him , Lord , to whom shall we go ? thou hast the words of eternal life .
text2: Pero Simón Pedro oquijlij : ― NoTeco , ¿ aquinon huelis itech tiasquej ? San on motlajtoltzin yejhuan tiquijtohua yejhua quitemaca nemilistli yejhuan para nochipa .

text: And we believe and are sure that thou art that Christ , the Son of the living God .
text2: Niman aman tejhuamej yoticneltocaquej niman ye ticmatztoquej ica tejhua tiCristo , tiiConeu Dios yejhuan nochipa nemi .

text: Jesus answered them , Have not I chosen you twelve , and one of you is a devil ?
text2: Jesús oquimijlij : ― Masqui onemechtlapejpenij nemejhuamej majtlactli huan ome , nemotzajlan nemi se yejhuan quitequipanohua on diablo .

text: He spake of Judas Iscariot the son of Simon : for he it was that should betray him , being one of the twelve .
text2: Ijcuac Jesús ijcon oquijtoj , quitenejticatca Judas Iscariote , iconeu Simón , pampa Judas quitemactilisquia masqui yejhua tlapohuajli intech on majtlactli huan ome nomachtijquej .

text: After these things Jesus walked in Galilee : for he would not walk in Jewry , because the Jews sought to kill him .
text2: Ijcuac in yonochiu , Jesús quistinemiya ne Galilea . Xquinequiya quistinemis ne Judea pampa ompa itlayecancahuan on hebreos quinequiyaj quimictisquej .

text: Now the Jews ' feast of tabernacles was at hand .
text2: Inilhuiu on hebreos itoca tabernáculos ye nisiu catca

text: His brethren therefore said unto him , Depart hence , and go into Judaea , that thy disciples also may see the works that thou doest .
text2: niman icnihuan oquijlijquej : ― Ma ca nican xmocahua . Xhuiya ne Judea para on monomachtijcahuan yejhuan ompa nemij no ma quitacan on milagros yejhuan tictenehua ticchihua .

text: For there is no man that doeth any thing in secret , and he himself seeketh to be known openly . If thou do these things , shew thyself to the world .
text2: Tej , on yejhuan quinequi ma cuajli quixmatican xquichtacachihua on tlajtlamach yejhuan quichihua . Niman pampa tictenehua ica ticchihua in quen in tlajtlamach , xchihua ixpan nochi tlacatl .

text: For neither did his brethren believe in him .
text2: On icnihuan ijcon oquijlijquej pampa nion yejhuamej xquineltocayaj .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , My time is not yet come : but your time is alway ready .
text2: Quemaj Jesús oquimijlij : ― Oc xe yejco on tonajli para nias , pero para nemejhuamej san catlejhua tonajli cuajli para nenyasquej .

text: The world cannot hate you ; but me it hateth , because I testify of it , that the works thereof are evil .
text2: On tlalticpactlacamej xhuelis itlaj ica mechtlahuelitasquej nemejhuamej . Pero nejhua quemaj nechtlahuelitaj pampa niquinmixcomaca nochi on tlen tlajtlamach xcuajli quichihuaj .

text: Go ye up unto this feast : I go not up yet unto this feast ; for my time is not yet full come .
text2: Xhuiyan nemejhuamej ne ipan on ilhuitl . Nejhua xe niau pampa oc xe ajsi on tonajli para nias .

text: When he had said these words unto them , he abode still in Galilee .
text2: Niman ijcuac ijcon oquimijlij , onocau ne Galilea .

text: But when his brethren were gone up , then went he also up unto the feast , not openly , but as it were in secret .
text2: Saquin ijcuac yoyajquej icnihuan , yejhua no oyaj ne ipan on ilhuitl . Pero xoyaj teixpan , yej san ichtaca .

text: Then the Jews sought him at the feast , and said , Where is he ?
