text2: Itlayecancahuan on hebreos quitejtemohuayaj ne campa ilhuitl , niman quijtohuayaj : ― ¿ Manin canon nemi yejhua on tlacatl ?

text: And there was much murmuring among the people concerning him : for some said , He is a good man : others said , Nay ; but he deceiveth the people .
text2: Niman intzajlan on tlacamej miyequej tlajtlajtohuayaj . Sequimej quijtohuayaj : “ Yejhua se cuajli tlacatl . ” Pero ocsequimej quijtohuayaj : “ Ca . Xcuajli tlacatl pampa quincajcayahua on tlacamej . ”

text: Howbeit no man spake openly of him for fear of the Jews .
text2: Pero xacaj teixpan ica tlajtlajtohuaya pampa quinmacajsiyaj itlayecancahuan on hebreos .

text: Now about the midst of the feast Jesus went up into the temple , and taught .
text2: Yejhua on ilhuitl ye tlajcotipan yaya ijcuac Jesús ocalac ne ipan on hueyi tiopan , niman opeu temachtia .

text: And the Jews marvelled , saying , How knoweth this man letters , having never learned ?
text2: Niman itlayecancahuan on hebreos tlamojcaitayaj , niman quijtohuayaj : ― ¿ Quen quimati yejhua in miyec tlajtlamach , niman xonomachtij ?

text: Jesus answered them , and said , My doctrine is not mine , but his that sent me .
text2: Jesús oquimijlij : ― Notemachtil xnoyaxca . Onicselij itech on yejhuan onechajtitlan .

text: If any man will do his will , he shall know of the doctrine , whether it be of God , or whether I speak of myself .
text2: Tla yacaj quipia iyojlo para quichihuas on tlen Dios quinequi , huelis quimatis tla notemachtil hualehua itech Dios noso tla san nitemachtia on tlen nicnemilia .

text: He that speaketh of himself seeketh his own glory : but he that seeketh his glory that sent him , the same is true , and no unrighteousness is in him .
text2: On yejhuan tlajtlajtohua san on tlen yejhua quinemilia , quichihua san para on tlacamej ma cueyilican . Pero on yejhuan quichihua canica para yej ma quihueyilican on yejhuan otehuajtitlan , on yejhua quijtohua tlen melahuac niman xqueman tlacajcayahua .

text: Did not Moses give you the law , and yet none of you keepeth the law ? Why go ye about to kill me ?
text2: Masqui Moisés omechmacac on tlanahuatijli , nion semej nemejhuamej xnenquitlacamatij on tlanahuatijli . Yejhua ica , ¿ tlica nenquinequij nennechmictisquej ?

text: The people answered and said , Thou hast a devil : who goeth about to kill thee ?
text2: On tlacamej oquinanquilijquej : ― Mojtic nemi se xcuajli espíritu . ¿ Aquinon quinequi mitzmictis ?

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , I have done one work , and ye all marvel .
text2: Jesús oquimijlij : ― San ica on se tequitl onicchiu ipan on tonajli ijcuac on hebreos nosehuiaj niman nemochimej nentlamojcaitaj .

text: Moses therefore gave unto you circumcision ; ( not because it is of Moses , but of the fathers ; ) and ye on the sabbath day circumcise a man .
text2: Moisés omechnahuatij xtlalican on nescayotl itoca circuncisión ipan nemoquichconehuan . Moisés xejhua oquipehualtij , yej on iachtojtajhuan . Yejhua ica nenquitlaliaj on nescayotl ipan se oquichconetl niman nenquichihuaj masqui ipan on nesehuiltonajli .

text: If a man on the sabbath day receive circumcision , that the law of Moses should not be broken ; are ye angry at me , because I have made a man every whit whole on the sabbath day ?
text2: Tla nenquitlaliaj on nescayotl ipan se oquichconetl ipan on tonajli ijcuac on hebreos nosehuiaj para nenquitlacamatij itlanahuatil Moisés , tla ijcon ¿ tlica nennechtlahuelitaj ica onicpajtilij nochi itlalnacayo se tlacatl ipan on tonajli ?

text: Judge not according to the appearance , but judge righteous judgment .
text2: Ma ca xtetlajtlacolmacacan san isijcapan . Yej san xtlajtlacolmacacan yacaj tla melahuac nenquimatij ica oquichiu tlen xcuajli .

text: Then said some of them of Jerusalem , Is not this he , whom they seek to kill ?
text2: Sequimej yejhuan chantiyaj ne Jerusalén opeu quinotlajtoltiaj : ― ¿ Tlen xejhua in quitejtemojtinemij para quimictisquej ?

text: But , lo , he speaketh boldly , and they say nothing unto him . Do the rulers know indeed that this is the very Christ ?
text2: Aman , tej , nican tlajtlajtojticaj teixpan , niman xacaj itlaj quijlia . ¿ Manin on tequihuajquej melahuac quineltocaj ica in tlacatl yejhua Cristo yejhuan Dios oquitlalij para tlanahuatiquetl yes ?

text: Howbeit we know this man whence he is : but when Christ cometh , no man knoweth whence he is .
text2: Pero xejhua Cristo pampa tejhuamej ticmatztoquej canon ohualeu . Ijcuac huajlas Cristo , xacaj quimatis canon hualehuas .

text: Then cried Jesus in the temple as he taught , saying , Ye both know me , and ye know whence I am : and I am not come of myself , but he that sent me is true , whom ye know not .
text2: Ijcuac Jesús ijcon ocac , chica temachtijticatca ne ipan on hueyi tiopan , ican chicahuac tlajtojli oquijtoj : ― ¿ Melahuac nennechixmatij niman nenquimatztoquej canon nihualehua ? Nejhua xonihuajlaj san pampa nejhua onicnec , yej onihuajlaj pampa onechajtitlan on yejhuan melahuac . Niman nemejhuamej xnenquixmatij .

text: But I know him : for I am from him , and he hath sent me .
text2: Pero nejhua quemaj niquixmati pampa itech nihualehua , niman yejhua onechajtitlan .

text: Then they sought to take him : but no man laid hands on him , because his hour was not yet come .
text2: Quemaj quinequiyaj cajsisquiaj , pero xacaj ocajsic pampa oc xe ajsiya on tonajli para yejhua in nochihuas .

text: And many of the people believed on him , and said , When Christ cometh , will he do more miracles than these which this man hath done ?
text2: Pero miyequej oquineltocaquej , niman oquijtojquej : ― Ticneltocaj ica in tlacatl yejhua Cristo pampa xacaj huelis huajlas yejhuan quichihuas más milagros quen yejhua in tlacatl .

text: The Pharisees heard that the people murmured such things concerning him ; and the Pharisees and the chief priests sent officers to take him .
text2: On fariseos ocacquej tlinon quijtohuayaj ica Jesús , niman yejhua ica yejhuamej inhuan intlayecancahuan on tiopixquej oquintitlanquej on policías yejhuan tequitij ne ipan on tiopan para cajsisquiaj .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , Yet a little while am I with you , and then I go unto him that sent me .
text2: Niman Jesús oquijtoj : ― San quesqui tonaltin nemohuan ninemis , niman quemaj nias itech on yejhuan onechajtitlan .

text: Ye shall seek me , and shall not find me : and where I am , thither ye cannot come .
text2: Nemejhuamej nennechtejtemosquej pero xnennechnextisquej , pampa xhuelis nenyasquej ne campa nejhua ninemis .

text: Then said the Jews among themselves , Whither will he go , that we shall not find him ? will he go unto the dispersed among the Gentiles , and teach the Gentiles ?
text2: Quemaj on hebreos opeu sa no yejhuamej quinotlajtoltiayaj : ― ¿ Canon , tej , yas campa xhuelis ticonextisquej ? ¿ Manin yas intech on hebreos yejhuan chajchayajcachantij intzajlan on griegos niman cominmachtis on griegos ?

text: What manner of saying is this that he said , Ye shall seek me , and shall not find me : and where I am , thither ye cannot come ?
text2: ¿ Tlinon quijtosnequi on ica otechijlij : “ Nennechtejtemosquej pero xnennechnextisquej ” , niman “ Xhuelis nenyasquej ne campa nejhua ninemis ” ?

text: In the last day , that great day of the feast , Jesus stood and cried , saying , If any man thirst , let him come unto me , and drink .
text2: On sa ica nochi tonajli ipan on ilhuitl yejhua más hueyi quitosnequi . Ipan on tonajli Jesús onotelquetz niman ican chicahuac tlajtojli oquijtoj : ― Tla yacaj amiqui , ma huajla notech niman ma atli .

text: He that believeth on me , as the scripture hath said , out of his belly shall flow rivers of living water .
text2: On Yectlajcuilojli quijtohua ica yejhuan nechneltocas , ipan iyojlo ameyas se atl yejhuan quimacas nemilistli para nochipa . Niman on atl miyec yes quen itlaj atentli .

text: ( But this spake he of the Spirit , which they that believe on him should receive : for the Holy Ghost was not yet given ; because that Jesus was not yet glorified . )
text2: Yejhua in Jesús oquijtoj ica on Espíritu Santo yejhuan quiselisquej on yejhuan quineltocasquej . Ipan on tonaltin oc xe huajlaya on Espíritu Santo , pampa Jesús oc xe tlejcohuaya ne ilhuicac para quiselis hueyilistli .

text: Many of the people therefore , when they heard this saying , said , Of a truth this is the Prophet .
text2: Sequimej yejhuan nemiyaj intzajlan on tlacamej , ijcuac ijcon ocacquej , oquijtojquej : ― Tlacaj melahuac , in tlacatl yejhua tiotlajtojquetl yejhuan ica oncatca para huajlas .

text: Others said , This is the Christ . But some said , Shall Christ come out of Galilee ?
text2: Niman sequimej quijtohuayaj : ― Yejhua in yejhua Cristo yejhuan Dios oquitlalij para tlanahuatiquetl yes . Pero ocsequimej oquijtojquej : ― Yejhua in xejhua Cristo pampa Cristo xhualehuas Galilea .

text: Hath not the scripture said , That Christ cometh of the seed of David , and out of the town of Bethlehem , where David was ?
text2: On Yectlajcuilojli quijtohua ica Cristo ica oncaj huejca teixhuiu yes itech rey David niman ica tlacatis ne Belén sa no ipan on pueblo campa onen David .

text: So there was a division among the people because of him .
text2: Yejhua ica on tlacamej onotlajcoxelojquej ipampa Jesús .

text: And some of them would have taken him ; but no man laid hands on him .
text2: Sequimej quinequiyaj cajsisquiaj , pero xacaj oquimayau .

text: Then came the officers to the chief priests and Pharisees ; and they said unto them , Why have ye not brought him ?
text2: On policías yejhuan quitlajpiaj on tiopan onocuepquej ne campa nemiyaj on fariseos niman intlayecancahuan on tiopixquej . Quemaj ijquin oquintlajtoltijquej on policías : ― ¿ Tlica xonencuajhuicaquej ?

text: The officers answered , Never man spake like this man .
text2: Niman on policías otlananquilijquej : ― ¡ Xqueman yacaj tlajtlajtohuaya quen tlajtlajtohua yejhua on tlacatl !

text: Then answered them the Pharisees , Are ye also deceived ?
text2: Quemaj on fariseos oquimijlijquej : ― ¿ Omechcajcayau nemejhuamej no ?

text: Have any of the rulers or of the Pharisees believed on him ?
text2: ¿ Nenquitaj yacaj totlayecancau noso se fariseo yotlaneltocac ?

text: But this people who knoweth not the law are cursed .
text2: Pero on quech tojlamej yejhuan xquimatij itlanahuatil Moisés quiselisquej tlajtlacolmacalistli yejhuan Dios quinmacas .

text: Nicodemus saith unto them , ( he that came to Jesus by night , being one of them , )
text2: Nicodemo , yejhuan oquitatoya Jesús ijcuac tlayohua , niman yejhuan inhuan nopohua on fariseos , oquimijlij :

text: Doth our law judge any man , before it hear him , and know what he doeth ?
text2: ― Ipan totlanahuatil quijtohua ica xtihuelisquej tictlajtlacolmacasquej se tlacatl tla xachtopa ticyolcuitisquej para ticmatisquej on tlen oquichiu .

text: They answered and said unto him , Art thou also of Galilee ? Search , and look : for out of Galilee ariseth no prophet .
text2: Quemaj oquijlijquej : ― ¿ Tejhua no tihualehua ne Galilea ? Xmomachti on Yectlajcuilojli , niman tiquitas ica ne Galilea xqueman hualehuaj tiotlajtojquej .

text: And every man went unto his own house .
text2: Quemaj cada se oyaj ichan ,

text: Jesus went unto the mount of Olives .
text2: pero Jesús oyaj ne ipan on tepetl itoca Olivos .

text: And early in the morning he came again into the temple , and all the people came unto him ; and he sat down , and taught them .
text2: Huajmostla ijcuac ohuajtlanes , ocsejpa oyaj ne ipan on hueyi tiopan . Nochi tlacatl oquinisihuij , niman yejhua onotlalij niman opeu quinmachtia .

text: And the scribes and Pharisees brought unto him a woman taken in adultery ; and when they had set her in the midst ,
text2: Quemaj on temachtijquej ica on tlanahuatijli niman on fariseos ocuajhuicaquej se sihuatl yejhuan oquinextiquej ipan tlajtlacojli ihuan itlacau . Oquitlalijquej ne tlajcotian imixpan nochimej .

text: They say unto him , Master , this woman was taken in adultery , in the very act .
text2: Niman ijquin oquijlijquej Jesús : ― Temachtijquetl , yejhua in sihuatl oticnextijquej ihuan se tlacatl ipan tlajtlacojli .

text: Now Moses in the law commanded us , that such should be stoned : but what sayest thou ?
text2: On itlanahuatil Moisés technahuatia tictemojmotlasquej niman ticmictisquej in quen in sihuatl . ¿ Tejhua tej , quen tiquijtohua ?

text: This they said , tempting him , that they might have to accuse him . But Jesus stooped down , and with his finger wrote on the ground , as though he heard them not .
text2: Yejhuamej ijcon oquijlijquej san para oquitlatlataquej , niman ijqui ye huelisquiaj quiteixpanhuisquiaj . Pero Jesús ohuajnopachoj niman opeu tlajcuilohua ipan tlajli ican imajpil .

text: So when they continued asking him , he lifted up himself , and said unto them , He that is without sin among you , let him first cast a stone at her .
text2: Pero ica más quitlajtoltiayaj , yejhua ohuajnahuatequetz , niman oquimijlij : ― San aquinon yejhuan xqueman tlajtlacohua , yejhua achtoj ma quimotla .

text: And again he stooped down , and wrote on the ground .
text2: Niman ocsejpa onopachoj niman otlajcuiloj ipan tlajli .

text: And they which heard it , being convicted by their own conscience , went out one by one , beginning at the eldest , even unto the last : and Jesus was left alone , and the woman standing in the midst .
text2: Pero ijcuac yejhuamej ijcon ocacquej , oquimatquej ica oquintlajtlacolmacac intlamachilis , niman cada se de yejhuamej oquisquej . Achtoj opejquej on yejhuan más huehuetquej . Niman ijcuac nochimej yoquisquej , Jesús iselti onocau ihuan on sihuatl yejhuan ompa onocau ne ixpan .

text: When Jesus had lifted up himself , and saw none but the woman , he said unto her , Woman , where are those thine accusers ? hath no man condemned thee ?
text2: Quemaj Jesús ohuajnahuatequetz niman ica xoc yacaj oquitac yej san yejhua on sihuatl , oquijlij : ― Sihuatl , ¿ canon nemij on yejhuan mitzteixpanhuiyaj ? ¿ Xacaj omitztlajtlacolmacac ?

text: She said , No man , Lord . And Jesus said unto her , Neither do I condemn thee : go , and sin no more .
text2: Yejhua oquijlij : ― Ca , noTeco , xacaj . Quemaj Jesús oquijlij : ― Tej , nion nejhua xnimitztlajtlacolmaca . Aman xhuiya , pero ma ca ocsejpa titlajtlacos .

text: Then spake Jesus again unto them , saying , I am the light of the world : he that followeth me shall not walk in darkness , but shall have the light of life .
text2: Jesús ocsejpa oquinnotz on tlacamej niman oquimijlij : ― Nejhua quen se tlahuijli ipan in tlalticpactli yejhuan huelis quintlahuilhuis intlamachilis on tlalticpactlacamej para cajsicamatisquej . Yejhuan nechhuicas cajsicamatis tlajtlamach ica Dios niman on cajsicamatilistli quimacas yencuic nemilistli .

text: The Pharisees therefore said unto him , Thou bearest record of thyself ; thy record is not true .
text2: Ijcuacon on fariseos oquijlijquej : ― Tejhua sa no moca titlajtohua , niman on tlen tiquijtohua xmelahuac .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Though I bear record of myself , yet my record is true : for I know whence I came , and whither I go ; but ye cannot tell whence I come , and whither I go .
text2: Jesús oquimijlij : ― Tlen nejhua niquijtohua quemaj melahuac masqui sa no nejhua noca nitlajtohua , pampa nicmati canon nihualehua niman canon niau . Pero nemejhuamej xnenquimatij canon nihualehua nion canon niau .

text: Ye judge after the flesh ; I judge no man .
text2: Nemejhuamej nentetlajtlacolmacaj quen on tlalticpactlacamej quichihuaj . Pero nejhua xacaj nictlajtlacolmaca .

text: And yet if I judge , my judgment is true : for I am not alone , but I and the Father that sent me .
text2: Pero tla nitetlajtlacolmacasquia , notetlajtlacolmacalis melajqui yesquia , pampa xnoselti nitetlajtlacolmacas . NoTajtzin yejhuan onechajtitlan ihuan nitetlajtlacolmacasquia .

text: It is also written in your law , that the testimony of two men is true .
text2: Ipan nemotlanahuatil tlajcuilolnesticaj ijcuac omemej teixpantiliquej san se tlajtojli quijtohuaj , on tlen quijtohua melahuac .

text: I am one that bear witness of myself , and the Father that sent me beareth witness of me .
text2: Sa no nejhua noca ninoteixpantilia , niman noTajtzin yejhuan onechajtitlan , no yejhua noteixpantilis .

text: Then said they unto him , Where is thy Father ? Jesus answered , Ye neither know me , nor my Father : if ye had known me , ye should have known my Father also .
text2: Quemaj oquitlajtoltijquej : ― ¿ Canon nemi moTajtzin ? Jesús oquinnanquilij : ― Nemejhuamej xnennechixmatij , niman nion noTajtzin xnenquixmatij . Tla nennechixmatisquiaj , no nenquixmatisquiaj noTajtzin .

text: These words spake Jesus in the treasury , as he taught in the temple : and no man laid hands on him ; for his hour was not yet come .
text2: Jesús oquijtoj in tlajtlamach chica temachtiaya ne ijtic on hueyi tiopan campa quejehuaya on huentomin . Pero xacaj ocajsic , pampa oc xe yejcoya on tonajli para ijqui nochihuas itech .

text: Then said Jesus again unto them , I go my way , and ye shall seek me , and shall die in your sins : whither I go , ye cannot come .
text2: Jesús ocsejpa oquimijlij : ― Nejhua niau , niman nemejhuamej nennechtejtemosquej , pero nenmiquisquej ipan nemotlajtlacol . Tej , campa nejhua niau , nemejhuamej xhuelis nenyasquej .

text: Then said the Jews , Will he kill himself ? because he saith , Whither I go , ye cannot come .
text2: Quemaj on hebreos oquijtojquej : ― ¿ Manin yej nomictis sa no yejhua ? Cas quemaj , niman yejhua ica quijtohua xhuelis tiasquej campa yejhua yas .

text: And he said unto them , Ye are from beneath ; I am from above : ye are of this world ; I am not of this world .
text2: Jesús oquimijlij : ― Nemejhuamej nenquistoquej nican ipan tlalticpactli , pero nejhua onihualeu ne ilhuicac . Nemejhuamej onenhualejquej ipan in tlalticpactli , pero nejhua xonihualeu ipan in tlalticpactli .

text: I said therefore unto you , that ye shall die in your sins : for if ye believe not that I am he , ye shall die in your sins .
text2: Onemechijlij ica nenmiquisquej ican nemotlajtlacol . Tla xnennechneltocaj ica nejhua niCristo yejhuan Dios onechtlalij para nitlamandaros , nenmiquisquej ipan nemotlajtlacol .

text: Then said they unto him , Who art thou ? And Jesus saith unto them , Even the same that I said unto you from the beginning .
text2: Quemaj oquitlajtoltijquej : ― Tej , ¿ tlen aquin tejhua ? Niman Jesús oquimijlij : ― Nejhua desde ijcuac onipeu nitemachtia yonemechijlijca aquin nejhua .

text: I have many things to say and to judge of you : but he that sent me is true ; and I speak to the world those things which I have heard of him .
text2: Nicpia miyec tlajtlamach tlen nemoca niquijtos niman tlen nemechtlajtlacoltis . Pero noTajtzin yejhuan onechajtitlan yejhua quijtohua tlen melahuac . Niman tlen niquijtohua ipan in tlalticpactli on yejhua onicac itech .

text: They understood not that he spake to them of the Father .
text2: Pero yejhuamej xocajsicamatquej ica quitenehuaya on iTajtzin .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , When ye have lifted up the Son of man , then shall ye know that I am he , and that I do nothing of myself ; but as my Father hath taught me , I speak these things .
text2: Yejhua ica oquimijlij : ― Ijcuac nemejhuamej nennechmajmasohualtisquej ipan se cojnepanojli , nejhua yejhuan oninochiu Tlacatl , ijcuacon nenquimatisquej aquin nejhua . Niman nenquimatisquej ica xitlaj nicchihua yejhuan san nejhua nicnequi , yej san niquijtohua on tlen noTajtzin yonechmachtij .

text: And he that sent me is with me : the Father hath not left me alone ; for I do always those things that please him .
text2: On yejhuan onechajtitlan nohuan nemi . NoTajtzin xnoselti nechcahua , pampa nejhua nochipa nicchihua tlen yejhua cuelita .

text: As he spake these words , many believed on him .
text2: Ijcuac Jesús ijquin oquijtoj , miyequej oquineltocaquej .

text: Then said Jesus to those Jews which believed on him , If ye continue in my word , then are ye my disciples indeed ;
text2: Quemaj Jesús oquimijlij on hebreos yejhuan oquineltocaquej : ― Tla nenmelajcanemisquej ipan on tlen nemechijlia , nenmochihuasquej melahuac nennomachtijcahuan .

text: And ye shall know the truth , and the truth shall make you free .
text2: Nenquixmatisquej tlen melahuac , niman on tlen melahuac yejhua mechmanahuis .

text: They answered him , We be Abraham ' s seed , and were never in bondage to any man : how sayest thou , Ye shall be made free ?
text2: Yejhuamej oquijlijquej : ― Tejhuamej tiihuejcaconehuan Abraham niman xqueman yacaj otechpix tlanamactin . ¿ Quen ijqui , tej , tiquijtohua ica ticpiasquej temanahuilistli ?

text: Jesus answered them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Whosoever committeth sin is the servant of sin .
text2: Jesús oquimijlij : ― Ica tlen melahuac nemechijlia ica nochimej yejhuan tlajtlacohuaj , yejhuamej tlanamactin itech on tlajtlacojli .

text: And the servant abideth not in the house for ever : but the Son abideth ever .
text2: Sen tlanamactli xqueman tehuan tlapohuajli ipan se chanyotl , pero se teconeu quemaj nochipa tehuan tlapohuajli ipan on chanyotl .

text: If the Son therefore shall make you free , ye shall be free indeed .
text2: Tla nejhua yejhuan niiConeu Dios nemechmanahuis , nemejhuamej melahuac nennemisquej tlamanahuiltin intech nemotlajtlacolhuan .

text: I know that ye are Abraham ' s seed ; but ye seek to kill me , because my word hath no place in you .
text2: Ye nicmatzticaj ica nemejhuamej nenihuejcaconehuan Abraham . Pero nenquinequij nennechmictisquej , pampa xnenquiseliaj tlen nemechijlia .

text: I speak that which I have seen with my Father : and ye do that which ye have seen with your father .
text2: Nejhua nitlajtohua ica on tlen noTajtzin nechititia , niman nemejhuamej nenquichihuaj tlen nemotaj mechijlia .

text: They answered and said unto him , Abraham is our father . Jesus saith unto them , If ye were Abraham ' s children , ye would do the works of Abraham .
text2: Yejhuamej oquijlijquej : ― Tejhuamej totaj Abraham . Pero Jesús oquimijlij : ― Tla nemejhuamej melahuac nenteconehuan yesquiaj itech Abraham , nenquichihuasquiaj on tlajtlamach yejhuan oquichiu .

text: But now ye seek to kill me , a man that hath told you the truth , which I have heard of God : this did not Abraham .
text2: Pero masqui nemechijlia on tlen melahuac yejhuan Dios yonechijlij , nemejhuamej nenquinequij nennechmictisquej . ¡ Abraham xqueman itlaj ijcon oquichiu !

text: Ye do the deeds of your father . Then said they to him , We be not born of fornication ; we have one Father , even God .
text2: Nemejhuamej sa no yejhua nenquichihuaj on tlen quichihua nemotaj . Quemaj yejhuamej oquijlijquej : ― Tejhuamej xtiteichtacaconehuan . San se tajtli ticpiaj niman on yejhua Dios .

text: Jesus said unto them , If God were your Father , ye would love me : for I proceeded forth and came from God ; neither came I of myself , but he sent me .
text2: Niman Jesús oquimijlij : ― Tla melahuac Dios nemoTaj yesquia , nemejhuamej nennechtlajsojtlasquiaj , pampa nejhua nihualehua itech Dios niman aman nican ninemi . Xonihuajlaj san pampa onicnec , yej onihuajlaj pampa Dios onechajtitlan .

text: Why do ye not understand my speech ? even because ye cannot hear my word .
text2: ¿ Tlica xhueli nencajsicamatij on tlen nemechijlia ? On pampa xnenquinequij nenquiselisquej notemachtil .

text: Ye are of your father the devil , and the lusts of your father ye will do . He was a murderer from the beginning , and abode not in the truth , because there is no truth in him . When he speaketh a lie , he speaketh of his own : for he is a liar , and the father of it .
text2: Nemejhuamej nemotaj yejhua on diablo , niman nenquinequij nenquichihuasquej tlinon yejhua quinequi . On diablo desde otzimpeu in tlalticpactli temictijquetl . Xqueman quijtohua on tlen melahuac , pampa xquipia ipan iyojlo on tlen melahuac . Ijcuac quijtohua on tlen xmelahuac , san quijtohua quen nochipa nohuica , pampa yejhua tlacajcayajquetl niman yejhua intaj on yejhuan tlacajcayahuaj .

text: And because I tell you the truth , ye believe me not .
text2: Pero nejhua pampa niquijtohua on tlen melahuac , xnennechneltocaj .

text: Which of you convinceth me of sin ? And if I say the truth , why do ye not believe me ?
text2: ¿ Aquinon de nemejhuamej huelis nechititis ica nicpia se tlajtlacojli ? Niman tla niquijtohua tlen melahuac , ¿ tlica xnennechneltocaj ?

text: He that is of God heareth God ' s words : ye therefore hear them not , because ye are not of God .
text2: On yejhuan iconehuan Dios caquij on itlajtoltzin Dios . Pero nemejhuamej xneniconehuan Dios . Yejhua ica xnenquinequij nencaquisquej .

text: Then answered the Jews , and said unto him , Say we not well that thou art a Samaritan , and hast a devil ?
text2: Quemaj on hebreos oquijlijquej : ― ¿ Xtiquijtohuaj tlen melahuac ijcuac tiquijtohuaj ica tejhua tisamaritano niman mojtic huajlau on xcuajli espíritu ?

text: Jesus answered , I have not a devil ; but I honour my Father , and ye do dishonour me .
text2: Jesús oquimijlij : ― Nejhua xhuajlau notic nion se xcuajli espíritu . Yejhua in nopanextia pampa nictlacaita noTajtzin , pero nemejhuamej xnennechtlacaitaj .

text: And I seek not mine own glory : there is one that seeketh and judgeth .
text2: Nejhua xnictejtemohua para on tlacamej ma nechtlacaitacan . Nemi ocse yejhuan quintejtemohua tlacamej para ma nechtlacaitacan . Yejhua teyolcuitia niman tetlajtlacolmaca .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , If a man keep my saying , he shall never see death .
text2: Ica tlen melahuac nemechijlia ica on yejhuan quichihua on tlen nejhua niquijtohua , xqueman miquis .

text: Then said the Jews unto him , Now we know that thou hast a devil . Abraham is dead , and the prophets ; and thou sayest , If a man keep my saying , he shall never taste of death .
text2: Ijcuacon on hebreos oquijlijquej : ― Aman cuajli ticmatij ica ticpia se xcuajli espíritu . Abraham niman nochimej on tiotlajtojquej omiquej , niman tejhua tiquijtohua : “ Yejhuan quichihua on tlen nejhua niquijtohua , xqueman miquis . ”

text: Art thou greater than our father Abraham , which is dead ? and the prophets are dead : whom makest thou thyself ?
text2: ¿ Tla ijcon , tejhua más tihueyixticaj xquen totaj Abraham yejhuan omic ? Niman on tiotlajtojquej no omiquej . ¿ Aquinon ticuitia timochihua tejhua ?

text: Jesus answered , If I honour myself , my honour is nothing : it is my Father that honoureth me ; of whom ye say , that he is your God :
text2: Jesús oquimijlij : ― Tla sa no nejhua ninotlacaita , notlacaitalis xitlaj quijtosnequi . Pero noTajtzin quemaj nechtlacaita , on yejhuan nemejhuamej nenquijtohuaj ica nemoDios .

text: Yet ye have not known him ; but I know him : and if I should say , I know him not , I shall be a liar like unto you : but I know him , and keep his saying .
text2: Nemejhuamej xnenquixmatij , yej nejhua quemaj niquixmati . Tla niquijtosquia xniquixmati , tla ijcon nitlacajcayajqui yesquia no quen nemehuamej . Pero nejhua melahuac niquixmati niman nicchihua nochi on tlen yejhua quijtohua .

text: Your father Abraham rejoiced to see my day : and he saw it , and was glad .
text2: Abraham on nemoachtojtaj opac pampa oquimat ica nihuajtlacatisquia ipan in tlalticpactli . Yejhua itechcopa itlaneltoc onechitac niman yejhua ica opac .

text: Then said the Jews unto him , Thou art not yet fifty years old , and hast thou seen Abraham ?
text2: Quemaj on hebreos oquijlijquej Jesús : ― Nion ompoajli huan matlactli xipan xe ticpia , ¿ niman tiquijtohua ica otiquitac Abraham ?

text: Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Before Abraham was , I am .
text2: Jesús oquimijlij : ― Ica tlen melahuac nemechijlia : ijcuac Abraham xe nemiya , nejhua ye ninemiya .

text: Then took they up stones to cast at him : but Jesus hid himself , and went out of the temple , going through the midst of them , and so passed by .
text2: Quemaj ocontilancaj temej para quimojmotlasquiaj . Pero Jesús oniyan , niman oquisteu ne ipan on hueyi tiopan .

text: And as Jesus passed by , he saw a man which was blind from his birth .
text2: Ijcuac Jesús panotiaya , oquitac se tlacatl yejhuan otlacat ciego .

text: And his disciples asked him , saying , Master , who did sin , this man , or his parents , that he was born blind ?
text2: Niman on inomachtijcahuan oquitlajtoltijquej : ― Temachtijquetl , ¿ tlica otlacat ciego in tlacatl ? ¿ Tlen manin pampa otlajtlacojquej itajhuan , noso sa no yejhua otlajtlacoj ?

text: Jesus answered , Neither hath this man sinned , nor his parents : but that the works of God should be made manifest in him .
text2: Jesús oquimijlij : ― Otlacat ciego xpampa tla yejhua otlajtlacoj , noso itajhuan otlajtlacojquej . Yej ijcon otlacat para itech nopantlantis on tlen Dios hueli quichihua .

text: I must work the works of him that sent me , while it is day : the night cometh , when no man can work .
text2: Nejhua nicchihuas itequiu on yejhuan onechajtitlan ipan in tonaltin . Tej , huajlau on tonaltin ijcuac xacaj huelis tequitis .

text: As long as I am in the world , I am the light of the world .
text2: Chica ninemi ipan in tlalticpactli , niquintlamachilistia on tlacamej para cajsicamatisquej tlajtlamach itech ica Dios .

text: When he had thus spoken , he spat on the ground , and made clay of the spittle , and he anointed the eyes of the blind man with the clay ,
text2: Ijcuac ijcon yoquijtoj , ochijchac ipan tlajli , oquichijchiu achijtzin soquitl ican icualac , niman oquitlalilij ipan ixtololojhuan on ciego .

text: And said unto him , Go , wash in the pool of Siloam , ( which is by interpretation , Sent . ) He went his way therefore , and washed , and came seeing .
text2: Quemaj oquijlij : ― Xhuiya xmixpajpacati ne campa naltilo itoca Siloé . Siloé quijtosnequi “ on yejhuan notitlani . ” Yejhua ica on ciego oyaj niman onixpajpac , niman ijcuac ohuajnocuepato ye hueliya tlachaya .

text: The neighbours therefore , and they which before had seen him that he was blind , said , Is not this he that sat and begged ?
text2: Quemaj inisiuchantlacaj niman on yejhuan quixmatiyaj ica ciego catca oquijtojquej : ― ¿ Tlen yejhua in tlacatl xejhua on yejhuan notlajtlanechicohuiliaya ?

text: Some said , This is he : others said , He is like him : but he said , I am he .
text2: Sequimej quijtohuayaj : ― Quemaj , yejhua . Ocsequimej quijtohuayaj : ― Ca , xejhua , pero ijqui tlajtlachasnequi . Pero sa no yejhua quijtohuaya : ― Quemaj , melahuac nejhua .

text: Therefore said they unto him , How were thine eyes opened ?
text2: Quemaj oquitlajtoltijquej : ― ¿ Quen ijqui , tej , onochiu ica aman hueli titlacha ?

text: He answered and said , A man that is called Jesus made clay , and anointed mine eyes , and said unto me , Go to the pool of Siloam , and wash : and I went and washed , and I received sight .
text2: Yejhua oquimijlij : ― Yejhua on tlacatl yejhuan itoca Jesús oquichijchiu soquitl niman onechtlalilij ipan nixtololojhuan . Quemaj onechijlij : “ Xhuiya ne campa naltilo itoca Siloé niman xmixpajpaca . ” Oniaj , tej , niman ijcuac oninixpajpac , ohuel onitlachix .

text: Then said they unto him , Where is he ? He said , I know not .
text2: Quemaj oquitlajtoltijquej : ― ¿ Canon nemi on tlacatl ? Yejhua oquimijlij : ― Xnicmati .

text: They brought to the Pharisees him that aforetime was blind .
text2: Quemaj on yejhuan ciego catca ocuicaquej intech on fariseos .

text: And it was the sabbath day when Jesus made the clay , and opened his eyes .
text2: Ijcuac Jesús oquichijchiu on soquitl niman oquixtlapoj on ciego , on tonajli catca ijcuac on hebreos nosehuiayaj .

text: Then again the Pharisees also asked him how he had received his sight . He said unto them , He put clay upon mine eyes , and I washed , and do see .
text2: On fariseos oquitlajtoltijquej on tlacatl ica quen ijqui aman hueli tlachaya . Yejhua oquimijlij : ― Onechtlalilij soquitl ipan nixtololojhuan , niman oninixpajpac , niman aman nitlacha .

text: Therefore said some of the Pharisees , This man is not of God , because he keepeth not the sabbath day . Others said , How can a man that is a sinner do such miracles ? And there was a division among them .
text2: Quemaj sequimej fariseos oquijtojquej : ― On tlacatl ica ijcon oquichiu xhualehua itech Dios , pampa xquitlacamati on tlanahuatijli yejhuan technahuatia para ma ca ma titequitican ipan on tonajli ijcuac titosehuiayaj yejhuan tihebreos . Pero ocsequimej quijtohuayaj : ― ¿ Quen ijqui huelisquia quinchihuasquia in huejhueyi milagros tla yejhua tlajtlacolej yesquia ? Niman ijquin onotlajcoxelojquej .

text: They say unto the blind man again , What sayest thou of him , that he hath opened thine eyes ? He said , He is a prophet .
text2: Quemaj ocsejpa oquitlajtoltijquej on yejhuan ciego catca : ― Niman tejhua , ¿ tlinon tiquijtohua ica on tlacatl yejhuan omitzimpajtilij mixtololojhuan ? Niman yejhua oquijtoj : ― Nejhua niquijtohua ica yejhua se tiotlajtojquetl .

text: But the Jews did not believe concerning him , that he had been blind , and received his sight , until they called the parents of him that had received his sight .
text2: Pero itlayecancahuan on hebreos xquinequiyaj quineltocasquej ica yejhua ciego catca niman ica aman hueliya tlacha , hasta oquinnotzquej itajhuan on yejhuan opajtic ,

text: And they asked them , saying , Is this your son , who ye say was born blind ? how then doth he now see ?
text2: niman oquintlajtoltijquej : ― ¿ In yejhua nemotelpoch yejhuan nenquijtohuaj ciego otlacat ? ¿ Quen ijqui , tej , aman hueli tlacha ?

text: His parents answered them and said , We know that this is our son , and that he was born blind :
text2: On itajhuan oquijtojquej : ― Ticmatij ica in yejhua totelpoch niman ica ciego otlacat .

text: But by what means he now seeth , we know not ; or who hath opened his eyes , we know not : he is of age ; ask him : he shall speak for himself .
text2: Pero xticmatij quen ijqui aman hueli tlacha , nion xticmatij aquinon oquimpajtilij ixtololojhuan . Yejhua xtlajtoltican . Yejhua xoc conetl niman sa no yejhua huelis mechijlis quen ijqui opajtic .

text: These words spake his parents , because they feared the Jews : for the Jews had agreed already , that if any man did confess that he was Christ , he should be put out of the synagogue .
text2: On itlayecancahuan hebreos yonotlajtolmacacaj para cuajquixtisquej ne tiopan san aquinon yejhuan quiteixpantilis ica Jesús yejhua Cristo . Yejhua ica ijcon oquijtojquej on itajhuan pampa quinmacajsiyaj itlayecancahuan on hebreos .

text: Therefore said his parents , He is of age ; ask him .
text2: Yejhua ica itajhuan oquijtojquej : “ Yejhua xtlajtoltican . Yejhua xoc conetl . ”

text: Then again called they the man that was blind , and said unto him , Give God the praise : we know that this man is a sinner .
text2: Quemaj on hebreos ocsejpa oquinotzquej on tlacatl yejhuan ciego catca , niman oquijlijquej : ― Xtechijli ixpan Dios tlen melahuac . Tejhuamej ticmatztoquej ica on tlacatl tlajtlacolej .

text: He answered and said , Whether he be a sinner or no , I know not : one thing I know , that , whereas I was blind , now I see .
text2: Ijcuacon yejhua oquimijlij : ― Nejhua xnicmati tla yejhua tlajtlacolej noso ca . Yej tlinon nejhua nicmatzticaj , niciego catca niman aman nitlacha .

text: Then said they to him again , What did he to thee ? how opened he thine eyes ?
text2: Niman ocsejpa oquitlajtoltijquej : ― ¿ Tlinon omitzchihuilij ? ¿ Quen ijqui oquichiu para omitzimpajtilij mixtololojhuan ?

text: He answered them , I have told you already , and ye did not hear : wherefore would ye hear it again ? will ye also be his disciples ?
text2: Oquimijlij : ― Yonemechijlij niman xnennechneltoquiliaj . ¿ Tlica ocsejpa nenquinequij ma nemechijli ? ¿ Tlen no nenquinequij neninomachtijcahuan yesquej ?

text: Then they reviled him , and said , Thou art his disciple ; but we are Moses ' disciples .
text2: Quemaj ocajhuaquej , niman oquijlijquej : ― Tejhua tiinomachtijcau yejhua on tlacatl , pero tejhuamej tiinnomachtijcahuan Moisés .

text: We know that God spake unto Moses : as for this fellow , we know not from whence he is .
text2: Tejhuamej ticmatztoquej ica Dios oquinotz Moisés , pero yejhua on tlacatl , nion achijtzin xticmatij canon hualehua .

text: The man answered and said unto them , Why herein is a marvellous thing , that ye know not from whence he is , and yet he hath opened mine eyes .
text2: On tlacatl ijcuacon oquimijlij : ― ¡ Yejhua in nechtlatlachaltia ica nemejhuamej xnenquimatij canon hualehua niman nejhua onechimpajtilij nixtololojhuan !

text: Now we know that God heareth not sinners : but if any man be a worshipper of God , and doeth his will , him he heareth .
text2: Cuajli ticmatztoquej ica Dios xquincaqui on tlajtlacolejquej , yej san quincaqui on yejhuan quitlacaitaj niman quichihuaj on tlen yejhua quinequi .

text: Since the world began was it not heard that any man opened the eyes of one that was born blind .
text2: Xqueman oticaquej tla yacaj quimpajtilia ixtololojhuan se tlacatl yejhuan otlacat ciego .

text: If this man were not of God , he could do nothing .
text2: Tla yejhua in tlacatl xhualehuasquia itech Dios , xhuelisquia itlaj quichihuasquia .

text: They answered and said unto him , Thou wast altogether born in sins , and dost thou teach us ? And they cast him out .
text2: Quemaj oquijlijquej : ― Tejhua yejhuan otitlacat tenticaj ican tlajtlacojli , ¿ ticnemilia yej tejhua titechmachtis ? Niman ocuajquixtijquej ipan on tiopan .

text: Jesus heard that they had cast him out ; and when he had found him , he said unto him , Dost thou believe on the Son of God ?
text2: Jesús oquimat ica on yejhuan ciego catca ocuajquixtijquej ne ipan on tiopan . Niman ijcuac oquinamic , oquijlij : ― ¿ Ticneltoca iConetzin Dios ?

text: He answered and said , Who is he , Lord , that I might believe on him ?
text2: On tlacatl oquijlij : ― Señor , xnechijli aquinonon para huelis nicneltocas .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Thou hast both seen him , and it is he that talketh with thee .
text2: Jesús oquijlij : ― Yotiquitaca , niman sa no nejhua yejhuan ihuan titlajtojticaj .

text: And he said , Lord , I believe . And he worshipped him .
text2: Quemaj on tlacatl onotlacuenquetz ixpan Jesús , niman oquijlij : ― NoTeco , nimitzneltoca .

text: And Jesus said , For judgment I am come into this world , that they which see not might see ; and that they which see might be made blind .
text2: Quemaj oquijtoj Jesús : ― Nejhua onihuajlaj ipan in tlalticpactli para niquintlaxtlahuilis on tlacamej quen nonequi quiselisquej . On yejhuan xhuelij cajsicamatij on tlajtlamach ica Dios , yejhuamej niquimpalehuis para huelis cajsicamatisquej . Niman on yejhuan notenehuaj cajsicamatij , masqui xnejli , xniquimpalehuis para ma cajsicamatican . Ijcon tej , yejhuamej quen ciegos impan intlamachilis pampa xcajsicamatij on tlajtlamach itech ica Dios .

text: And some of the Pharisees which were with him heard these words , and said unto him , Are we blind also ?
text2: Quemaj sequimej fariseos yejhuan ompa ihuan nemiyaj , ijcuac ijcon ocacquej , oquitlajtoltijquej : ― ¿ Tiquijtosnequi ica tejhuamej quen ticiegos impan totlamachilis niman yejhua ica xticajsicamatij on tlajtlamach itech ica Dios ?

text: Jesus said unto them , If ye were blind , ye should have no sin : but now ye say , We see ; therefore your sin remaineth .
text2: Jesús oquimijlij : ― Tla xnencajsicamatisquiaj , xnenquipiasquiaj tlajtlacojli . Pero pampa nenquijtohuaj ica nencajsicamatij , on tlajtlacojli nemopan oncaj .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that entereth not by the door into the sheepfold , but climbeth up some other way , the same is a thief and a robber .
text2: Ica tlen melahuac nemechijlia , on yejhuan xcalaquis ipan itlatzacuilyou on corral campa nemij borregos , yej calaquis san canon , yejhua tlachtequetl .

text: But he that entereth in by the door is the shepherd of the sheep .
text2: Pero on yejhuan calaquis ipan on tlatzacuilyotl , yejhua tlajpixqui ica on borregos .

text: To him the porter openeth ; and the sheep hear his voice : and he calleth his own sheep by name , and leadeth them out .
text2: Se tlacatl quitlapohuilia on tlatzacuilyotl para ma calaqui on tlajpixqui . Quemaj on borregos yejhuan iyaxcahuan quitencaquij ijcuac quintocayotia . Quemaj quinquixtia .

text: And when he putteth forth his own sheep , he goeth before them , and the sheep follow him : for they know his voice .
text2: Niman quemaj ijcuac yoquinhuajquixtij nochimej iborregos , nejnemi inyecapan , niman on borregos quicuitlapanhuiaj pampa quitencaquij itlajtol .

text: And a stranger will they not follow , but will flee from him : for they know not the voice of strangers .
text2: Pero yejhuan xquixmatij xquicuitlapanhuiaj , yej ontlatlacsaj pampa xquitencaquij on yejhuan xquixmatij .

text: This parable spake Jesus unto them : but they understood not what things they were which he spake unto them .
text2: Jesús oquintlalilij yejhua in ejemplo , pero yejhuamej xocajsicamatquej tlinon quinequiya quimijlis .

text: Then said Jesus unto them again , Verily , verily , I say unto you , I am the door of the sheep .
text2: Yejhua ica Jesús ocsejpa oquimijlij : ― Ica tlen melahuac nemechijlia : nejhua nitlatzacuilyotl campa calaquij on borreguitos .

text: All that ever came before me are thieves and robbers : but the sheep did not hear them .
text2: Nochimej yejhuan achtoj de nejhua ohualajquej tlachtequej , pero on borregos xoquitencaquej .

text: I am the door : by me if any man enter in , he shall be saved , and shall go in and out , and find pasture .
text2: Nejhua nitlatzacuilyotl . Yejhuan notechcopa calaquis , nomaquixtis . Niman yejhua yes quen on se borrego yejhuan calaqui niman quisa ipan on corral niman quinextia tlen quicua .

text: The thief cometh not , but for to steal , and to kill , and to destroy : I am come that they might have life , and that they might have it more abundantly .
text2: On tlachtequetl huajlau san para tlachtequi , temictia niman tlaxoxotonia . Pero nejhua onihuajlaj para quipiasquej nemilistli , niman ipan innemilis nochi cuajli quisas .

text: I am the good shepherd : the good shepherd giveth his life for the sheep .
text2: ' Nejhua nicuajli tlajpixqui . On cuajli tlapixqui quitemaca inemilis impampa on borregos .

text: But he that is an hireling , and not the shepherd , whose own the sheep are not , seeth the wolf coming , and leaveth the sheep , and fleeth : and the wolf catcheth them , and scattereth the sheep .
text2: Pero on yejhuan tequiti san pampa quitlaxtlahuiliaj , ijcuac quita huajlau on yolqui lobo , quincahua on borregos niman cholojtehua , pampa yejhua xtlajpixqui niman on borregos xiyaxcahuan . Quemaj on yolquej quinmajsi on borregos niman quinchajchayahuaj .

text: The hireling fleeth , because he is an hireling , and careth not for the sheep .
text2: Yejhua in tlacatl cholojtehua pampa tequiti san ica quitlaxtlahuiliaj , niman para yejhua xitlaj quijtosnequi on borregos .

text: And other sheep I have , which are not of this fold : them also I must bring , and they shall hear my voice ; and there shall be one fold , and one shepherd .
text2: No niquimpia ocsequimej borregos yejhuan xtlapohualti ipan in corral . No ica oncaj niquinhuajhuicas . Yejhuamej cuajli quitencaquisquej notlajtol niman nechtlacamatisquej . Ijcon , tej , san secan nemisquej niman no san se tlapixqui nemis .

text: Therefore doth my Father love me , because I lay down my life , that I might take it again .
text2: ' NoTajtzin nechtlajsojtla pampa nictemaca nonemilis para noborregos . Niman quemaj ocsejpa ninoyolihuitis .

text: No man taketh it from me , but I lay it down of myself . I have power to lay it down , and I have power to take it again . This commandment have I received of my Father .
text2: Xacaj nechcuilia nonemilis , yej nejhua nictemaca ican cuajli noyojlo . Nihueli nictemacas nonemilis , niman no nihueli ocsejpa ninoyolitis . Ijcon noTajtzin onechnahuatij para nicchihuas .

text: There was a division therefore again among the Jews for these sayings .
text2: Ijcuac on hebreos ocacquej on tlajtoltin , ocsejpa xoquipixquej san se inyojlo .

text: And many of them said , He hath a devil , and is mad ; why hear ye him ?
text2: Miyequej yejhuamej quijtohuayaj : ― ¿ Tlica nenquicaquij in tlacatl ? Yejhua quipia se xcuajli espíritu niman loco .

text: Others said , These are not the words of him that hath a devil . Can a devil open the eyes of the blind ?
text2: Pero ocsequimej quijtohuayaj : ― Xacaj yejhuan quipia se xcuajli espíritu hueli ijcon tlajtohua . ¿ Tlen hueli se xcuajli espíritu quimpajtia imixtololojhuan on coxcatzitzintin ?

text: And it was at Jerusalem the feast of the dedication , and it was winter .
text2: Niman ne Jerusalén quipanoticatcaj on ilhuitl yejhuan nochihuaya para quimelnamictia on tlacamej ijcuac on tiopan yencuic catca . Ijcuacon invierno ijcuac sehua catca .

text: And Jesus walked in the temple in Solomon ' s porch .
text2: Jesús quistinemiya ne ipan on icorredor on hueyi tiopan itoca Icorredor Salomón .

text: Then came the Jews round about him , and said unto him , How long dost thou make us to doubt ? If thou be the Christ , tell us plainly .
text2: Niman on hebreos oquiteyehualojquej , niman oquijlijquej : ― ¿ Hasta quemanon titechometlamachilispias ? Tla tejhua tiCristo , amantzin cuajli xtechijli .

text: Jesus answered them , I told you , and ye believed not : the works that I do in my Father ' s name , they bear witness of me .
text2: Jesús oquimijlij : ― Yonemechijlij niman xonennechneltocajquej . On tlajtlamach yejhuan nicchihua ipan itocatzin noTajtzin nechteixpantiaj aquin nejhua .

text: But ye believe not , because ye are not of my sheep , as I said unto you .
text2: Pero nemejhuamej xnennechneltocaj pampa xnentejhuamej nentlapohualtin intech on noborregos .

text: My sheep hear my voice , and I know them , and they follow me :
text2: Noborregos nechtencaquij , niman nejhua niquimixmati niman nechcuitlapanhuiaj .

text: And I give unto them eternal life ; and they shall never perish , neither shall any man pluck them out of my hand .
text2: Nejhua niquinmaca on nemilistli yejhuan para nochipa , niman yejhuamej xqueman miquisquej , niman xacaj huelis nechincuijcuilis .

text: My Father , which gave them me , is greater than all ; and no man is able to pluck them out of my Father ' s hand .
text2: NoTajtzin yejhuan onechinmacac noborregos , yejhua más hueyi xquen yacaj ocse . Yejhua ica xacaj huelis quintecuilis itech .

text: I and my Father are one .
text2: Nejhua niman noTajtzin san se tinemij .

text: Then the Jews took up stones again to stone him .
text2: Quemaj on hebreos ocsejpa ocontilanquej temej para quimojmotlasquiaj .

text: Jesus answered them , Many good works have I shewed you from my Father ; for which of those works do ye stone me ?
text2: Niman Jesús oquimijlij : ― Nemixpan yonicchiu miyec tlajtlamach tlen cuajli itechcopa ipoder noTajtzin . ¿ Catlejhua de in tlajtlamach ica nennechmojmotlasnequij ?

text: The Jews answered him , saying , For a good work we stone thee not ; but for blasphemy ; and because that thou , being a man , makest thyself God .
text2: On hebreos oquijlijquej : ― Nion se ica on tlen cuajli oticchiu timitzmojmotlasnequij , yej pampa ticuijhuicaltia Dios ican motlajtol . Tejhua san titlacatl , pero timotenehua tiDios .

text: Jesus answered them , Is it not written in your law , I said , Ye are gods ?
text2: Jesús ijcuacon oquimijlij : ― Ipan nemotlanahuatil tlajcuilolnesticaj ica Dios oquijtoj : “ Nemejhuamej nendioses . ”

text: If he called them gods , unto whom the word of God came , and the scripture cannot be broken ;
text2: Ticmatij ica tlen quijtohua on Yectlajcuilojli xqueman huelis nopatlas . Dios oquintocayotij dioses yejhuamej on tlacamej yejhuan oquiselijquej itlajtoltzin .

text: Say ye of him , whom the Father hath sanctified , and sent into the world , Thou blasphemest ; because I said , I am the Son of God ?
text2: Yejhua ica , tej , tla Dios onechtlapejpenij niman onechajtitlan ipan in tlalticpactli , ¿ quen ijqui , tej , hueli nenquijtohuaj ica nicuijhuicaltia pampa oniquijtoj ica niiConeu ?

text: If I do not the works of my Father , believe me not .
text2: Tla xnicchihua itequiu noTajtzin , ma ca xnechneltocacan .

text: But if I do , though ye believe not me , believe the works : that ye may know , and believe , that the Father is in me , and I in him .
text2: Pero tla melahuac nicchihua itequiu , xneltocacan impampa on tlen tlajtlamach nicchihua masqui xnenquinneltocaj on tlen onemechijlij . Ijcon tej , xneltocacan para xmatican ica melahuac noTajtzin san se nohuan nemi , niman nejhua san se ihuan ninemi noTatzin .

text: Therefore they sought again to take him : but he escaped out of their hand ,
text2: Ocsejpa quinequiyaj cajsisquej , pero Jesús ocholojteu intech .

text: And went away again beyond Jordan into the place where John at first baptized ; and there he abode .
text2: Quemaj Jesús onocuep para oyaj ne ica iquisayan tonajli de on atentli Jordán niman onocau campa otlacuatequij Juan .

text: And many resorted unto him , and said , John did no miracle : but all things that John spake of this man were true .
text2: Miyec tlacatl oyaj oquitatoj , niman quijtohuayaj : ― Masqui Juan xitlaj tlamajhuisojli oquichiu , nochi tlen oquijtoj ica in tlacatl melahuac .

text: And many believed on him there .
text2: Niman ompa miyequej oquineltocaquej Jesús .

text: Now a certain man was sick , named Lazarus , of Bethany , the town of Mary and her sister Martha .
text2: Nemiya se tlacatl itoca catca Lázaro yejhuan cualohuaya . Yejhua chanej catca ne ipan on pueblo itoca Betania yejhuan no ipueblo María niman icniu Marta .

text: ( It was that Mary which anointed the Lord with ointment , and wiped his feet with her hair , whose brother Lazarus was sick . )
text2: Yejhua in María yejhua on yejhuan oquitequilijca toTeco , on ajhuiyalistli itoca nardo ipan icxihuan niman oquinhuajhuatz ican itzon . In María icniu Lázaro yejhuan cualohuaya .

text: Therefore his sisters sent unto him , saying , Lord , behold , he whom thou lovest is sick .
text2: On omemej sihuamej icniutin otlatitlanquej ma quijlitij Jesús : ― ToTeco , on motejtlajsocau cualo .

text: When Jesus heard that , he said , This sickness is not unto death , but for the glory of God , that the Son of God might be glorified thereby .
text2: Ijcuac Jesús ijcon ocac , oquijtoj : ― Yejhua on cualolistli xquimictis , yej san para noteititis ihueyilis Dios niman no itechcopa nechteititis nohueyilis nejhua yejhuan niiConeu Dios .

text: Now Jesus loved Martha , and her sister , and Lazarus .
text2: Jesús quitlajsojtlaya Marta inhuan icnihuan María niman Lázaro .

text: When he had heard therefore that he was sick , he abode two days still in the same place where he was .
text2: Pero masqui oquijlijquej ica Lázaro cualohuaya , ome tonajli más onocau ne campa nemiya .

text: Then after that saith he to his disciples , Let us go into Judaea again .
text2: Quemaj oquimijlij on inomachtijcahuan : ― Ma tihuian ne Judea ocsejpa .

text: His disciples say unto him , Master , the Jews of late sought to stone thee ; and goest thou thither again ?
text2: Ijcuacon on nomachtijquej oquijlijquej : ― Temachtijquetl , san quemach catca on hebreos yejhuan ompa chanejquej quinequiyaj mitzmictisquej ican temej , ¿ niman ocsejpa ticnequi tias ompa ?

text: Jesus answered , Are there not twelve hours in the day ? If any man walk in the day , he stumbleth not , because he seeth the light of this world .
text2: Jesús oquimijlij : ― ¿ Tlica xmelahuac quipia majtlactli huan ome horas on tonajli ? Tej , tla se quistinemi ican tonajli , xnajantiquisa pampa nochi nesi ican on tlahuijli yejhuan oncaj ipan in tlalticpactli .

text: But if a man walk in the night , he stumbleth , because there is no light in him .
text2: Pero tla se quistinemi ican yehuajli , najantiquisa pampa quipolohua tlahuijli .

text: These things said he : and after that he saith unto them , Our friend Lazarus sleepeth ; but I go , that I may awake him out of sleep .
text2: Quemaj oquimijlij Jesús : ― Totetlajsojcau Lázaro cochi , pero nicontlachaltis .

text: Then said his disciples , Lord , if he sleep , he shall do well .
text2: Quemaj on nomachtijquej oquijlijquej : ― ToTeco , tla san yococh , quijtosnequi huelis pajtis .

text: Howbeit Jesus spake of his death : but they thought that he had spoken of taking of rest in sleep .
text2: Pero Jesús quijtosnequiya ica Lázaro yomic , niman on nomachtijquej quinemiliayaj ica Lázaro san cochiya .

text: Then said Jesus unto them plainly , Lazarus is dead .
text2: Yejhua ica Jesús más cuajli oquimijlij : ― Lázaro yomic .

text: And I am glad for your sakes that I was not there , to the intent ye may believe ; nevertheless let us go unto him .
text2: Más cuajli para nemejhuamej ica xompa ninemiya ijcuac Lázaro cualohuaya , pampa aman huelis nicchihuas itlaj yejhuan mechpalehuis nentlaneltocasquej . Yejhua ica nipaqui . Ma tihuian , ma tiquitatij .

text: Then said Thomas , which is called Didymus , unto his fellowdisciples , Let us also go , that we may die with him .
text2: Quemaj Tomás , yejhuan no quijliayaj cohuatzin , oquimijlij on ocsequimej nomachtijquej : ― No ma tihuian para san secan ihuan Jesús timiquisquej .

text: Then when Jesus came , he found that he had lain in the grave four days already .
text2: Ijcuac Jesús oajsic oquimachiltijquej ica Lázaro ye quipia nahui tonajli ica tlaltoctoc .

text: Now Bethany was nigh unto Jerusalem , about fifteen furlongs off :
text2: Betania nisiu Jerusalén catca . San quipiaya canaj ome kilómetro huan tlajco ica huejca ,

text: And many of the Jews came to Martha and Mary , to comfort them concerning their brother .
text2: niman miyequej hebreos oyajquej quinnotzatoj Marta niman María para quinyoltlalisquej pampa omic inicniu .

text: Then Martha , as soon as she heard that Jesus was coming , went and met him : but Mary sat still in the house .
text2: Ijcuac Marta oquimat ica Jesús ompa ye ajsitiaya , oquis oquinamiquito , pero María onocau ne inchan .

text: Then said Martha unto Jesus , Lord , if thou hadst been here , my brother had not died .
text2: Niman Marta oquijlij Jesús : ― NoTeco , tla nican tinemisquia , nocniu xmiquisquia .

text: But I know , that even now , whatsoever thou wilt ask of God , God will give it thee .
text2: Pero nejhua nicmatzticaj ica Dios mitzmacas nochi tlen tictlajtlanilis .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Thy brother shall rise again .
text2: Jesús oquijlij : ― Mocniu ocsejpa yolihuis .

text: Martha saith unto him , I know that he shall rise again in the resurrection at the last day .
text2: Marta oquijlij : ― Quemaj , nejhua nicmatzticaj ica ocsejpa yolihuis ijcuac yolihuisquej niman noquetztehuasquej on mimiquej ipan on sa ica nochi tonajli .

text: Jesus said unto her , I am the resurrection , and the life : he that believeth in me , though he were dead , yet shall he live :
text2: Quemaj Jesús oquijlij : ― Nejhua niquinyolihuitia on yejhuan mimiquej niman niquinmaca nemilistli ocsejpa . Yejhuan nechneltocas , masqui miquis , nemis ocsejpa .

text: And whosoever liveth and believeth in me shall never die . Believest thou this ?
text2: Niman nochi yejhuan sanquen nemi niman nechneltoca , nemis para nochipa ne ilhuicac . ¿ Ticneltoca yejhua on ?

text: She saith unto him , Yea , Lord : I believe that thou art the Christ , the Son of God , which should come into the world .
text2: Yejhua oquijlij : ― Quemaj noTeco . Nejhua nicneltoca ica tejhua tiCristo yejhuan Dios ocuajtitlan para tlamandaros . Niman nicneltoca ica tejhua tiiConeu Dios yejhuan ye ijqui oncatca para huajlas ipan in tlalticpactli .

text: And when she had so said , she went her way , and called Mary her sister secretly , saying , The Master is come , and calleth for thee .
text2: Ijcuac ijcon yoquijtoj , Marta oyaj oquinotzato on icniu María , niman san oquichtacaijlij yejhua in : ― On Temachtijquetl nican nemi niman mitznotza .

text: As soon as she heard that , she arose quickly , and came unto him .
text2: Ijcuac María ijcon ocac , nimantzin onotelquetz niman oyaj oquitato Jesús .

text: Now Jesus was not yet come into the town , but was in that place where Martha met him .
text2: Jesús oc xe calaquiya ne ipan on pueblo , yej nemiya campa Marta oquinamiquito .

text: The Jews then which were with her in the house , and comforted her , when they saw Mary , that she rose up hastily and went out , followed her , saying , She goeth unto the grave to weep there .
text2: Niman ijcuac on hebreos yejhuan quiyoltlaliayaj María ne ichan oquitaquej ica María nimantzin oquis , oquicuitlapanhuiquej . Yejhuamej quinemiliayaj ica María yau ne itech on tlalcontli para ompa onchocas .

text: Then when Mary was come where Jesus was , and saw him , she fell down at his feet , saying unto him , Lord , if thou hadst been here , my brother had not died .
text2: Quemaj , ijcuac oajsic ne campa nemiya Jesús , María onotlacuenquetz icxitlan , niman oquijlij : ― NoTeco , tla nican tinemisquia , nocniu xmiquisquia .

text: When Jesus therefore saw her weeping , and the Jews also weeping which came with her , he groaned in the spirit , and was troubled ,
text2: Ijcuac Jesús oquitac ica María niman on hebreos yejhuan ompa ihuan oyejcoquej sanoyej chocaj , sanoyej onajman niman onomau inhuan ,

text: And said , Where have ye laid him ? They said unto him , Lord , come and see .
text2: niman oquintlajtoltij : ― ¿ Canon onenquitocaquej ? Niman oquijlijquej : ― ToTeco , xhuajla xquitaqui .

text: Jesus wept .
text2: Niman Jesús ochocac .

text: Then said the Jews , Behold how he loved him !
text2: Quemaj on hebreos oquijtojquej : ― Xquitacan quen sanoyej quitlajsojtlaya .

text: And some of them said , Could not this man , which opened the eyes of the blind , have caused that even this man should not have died ?
text2: Pero semej yejhuamej oquijtojquej : ― In yejhuan oquimpajtij ixtololojhuan on ciego , ¿ xhuelisquia itlaj quichihuasquia para Lázaro ma ca miquisquia ?

text: Jesus therefore again groaning in himself cometh to the grave . It was a cave , and a stone lay upon it .
text2: Jesús ican miyec iyolquexanalis oquinisihuij on tlalcontli . On tlalcontli se teostotl catca niman quipiaya se tetl yejhua quitzacuticatca on itenco .

text: Jesus said , Take ye away the stone . Martha , the sister of him that was dead , saith unto him , Lord , by this time he stinketh : for he hath been dead four days .
text2: Jesús oquijtoj : ― Xquejcuanican on tetl . Pero Marta yejhuan icniu on micatzintli , oquijlij : ― NoTeco , amantzin sanoyej yomoloniac pampa ye quipia nahui tonajli ica omic .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Said I not unto thee , that , if thou wouldest believe , thou shouldest see the glory of God ?
text2: Pero Jesús oquijlij : ― ¿ Tlen xonimitzijlij ica tla titlaneltoca tiquitas ihueyilis Dios ?

text: Then they took away the stone from the place where the dead was laid . And Jesus lifted up his eyes , and said , Father , I thank thee that thou hast heard me .
text2: Quemaj oquejcuanijquej on tetl . Niman Jesús oajcotlachix ne ilhuicac , niman oquijtoj : ― NoTajtzin , nimitzmaca tlaxtlahuijli pampa tinechcaqui .

text: And I knew that thou hearest me always : but because of the people which stand by I said it , that they may believe that thou hast sent me .
text2: Nejhua nicmatzticaj ica nochipa tinechcaqui , pero aman ijquin niquijtohua impampa in tlacamej yejhuan nican nemij , para ma quineltocacan ica tejhua otinechajtitlan .

text: And when he thus had spoken , he cried with a loud voice , Lazarus , come forth .
text2: Ijcuac ijcon oquijtoj , quemaj ica chicahuac tlajtojli oquinotz : ― ¡ Lázaro , xhuajquisa on pon !

text: And he that was dead came forth , bound hand and foot with graveclothes : and his face was bound about with a napkin . Jesus saith unto them , Loose him , and let him go .
text2: Niman on micatzintli ohuajquis ipan imahuan niman icxihuan tecuixticatca ican ilpicatl niman ixayac tecuixticatca ican tlaquentli . On hebreos ijcon quitequitiltiayaj ijcuac quintejcuiyaj on mimiquej . Jesús oquimijlij : ― Xtojtomacan niman xcahuilican ma huia .

text: Then many of the Jews which came to Mary , and had seen the things which Jesus did , believed on him .
text2: Miyequej hebreos yejhuan ohualejquej ihuan María oquineltocaquej ijcuac oquitaquej on tlen Jesús oquichiu .

text: But some of them went their ways to the Pharisees , and told them what things Jesus had done .
text2: Pero sequimej oyajquej oquintatoj on fariseos niman oquintlajtlajtohuilijquej on tlen Jesús oquichiu .

text: Then gathered the chief priests and the Pharisees a council , and said , What do we ? for this man doeth many miracles .
text2: Yejhua ica on fariseos niman intlayecancahuan on tiopixquej onosentlalijquej inhuan on tetlacanonotzquej niman oquijtojquej : ― ¿ Tlinon ticchihuasquej ? Yejhua in tlacatl quichijticaj miyec milagros .

text: If we let him thus alone , all men will believe on him : and the Romans shall come and take away both our place and nation .
text2: Tla ijqui ticahuilisquej ma quichihua , nochi tlacatl quineltocas niman on romanos quixoxotonisquej tohueyi tiopan niman in topaís .

text: And one of them , named Caiaphas , being the high priest that same year , said unto them , Ye know nothing at all ,
text2: Pero se de yejhuamej , itoca Caifás , yejhuan ipan on xipan on más hueyi intlayecancau catca intech on tiopixquej , oquimijlij : ― Nemejhuamej xitlaj nenquimatij .

text: Nor consider that it is expedient for us , that one man should die for the people , and that the whole nation perish not .
text2: Nemejhuamej xnencajsicamatij ica para tejhuamej más cuajli yes tla se tlacatl miquis para ma ca quixoxotonisquej nochi in país .

text: And this spake he not of himself : but being high priest that year , he prophesied that Jesus should die for that nation ;
text2: Pero Caifás ijcon oquijtoj xpampa melahuac ijqui oquis ipan iyojlo . Yejhua oquijtoj pampa yejhua on más hueyi intlayecancau catca intech on tiopixquej ipan on xipan , niman Dios oquitlamachilistij para ma quijto ica Jesús miquis ipampa on país campa chanejquej on hebreos .

text: And not for that nation only , but that also he should gather together in one the children of God that were scattered abroad .
text2: Niman ijcon oquijtoj xsan ipampa on país , yej no para quinsentlalis nochimej on iconehuan Dios yejhuan nochajchayajtinemij .

text: Then from that day forth they took counsel together for to put him to death .
text2: Yejhua ica desde ipan on tonajli on tequihuajquej hebreos oquinejnemilijquej quen ijqui quimictisquej Jesús .

text: Jesus therefore walked no more openly among the Jews ; but went thence unto a country near to the wilderness , into a city called Ephraim , and there continued with his disciples .
text2: Yejhua ica , tej , Jesús xoc quistinemiya ne intzajlan on hebreos , yej oquis ne Judea niman oyaj ne ipan se pueblo itoca Efraín yejhuan nisiu tlapatlaco . Ompa onocau inhuan inomachtijcahuan .

text: And the Jews ' passover was nigh at hand : and many went out of the country up to Jerusalem before the passover , to purify themselves .
text2: Ye nisiu catca para on hebreos quichihuasquej on ilhuitl pascua , niman miyec tlacatl yejhuan hualehuayaj nochihuiyan ipan on país oyaj ne Jerusalén para nochipahuasquej quen intlanahuatil on hebreos tlanahuatia .

text: Then sought they for Jesus , and spake among themselves , as they stood in the temple , What think ye , that he will not come to the feast ?
text2: Jesús quitejtemojtinemiyaj . Niman ijcuac ye nemiyaj ne ipan on hueyi tiopan , ijquin quinotlajtoltiayaj : ― ¿ Tlinon nenquinemiliaj ? ¿ Nenquinemiliaj ica huajlas ipan in ilhuitl , noso ca ?

text: Now both the chief priests and the Pharisees had given a commandment , that , if any man knew where he were , he should shew it , that they might take him .
text2: On fariseos niman intlayecancahuan on tiopixquej yotlanahuatijcaj ica tla se quimati canon nemi Jesús , ma quitemachiltican para huelis cajsisquej .

text: Then Jesus six days before the passover came to Bethany , where Lazarus was which had been dead , whom he raised from the dead .
text2: Chicuasen tonajli polihuia ica ajsis on ilhuitl pascua , Jesús oyaj ne ipan on pueblo itoca Betania . Lázaro on tlacatl yejhuan Jesús yoquiyolitijca niman yoquetztejca ne ipan itlalcon , chantiya ipan on pueblo .

text: There they made him a supper ; and Martha served : but Lazarus was one of them that sat at the table with him .
text2: Ompa oquichijchiquej se tlacuajli para quitlajsojcamachilisquej Jesús ica on tlen oquichiu . Marta quintlamacaya niman Lázaro tehuan ompa ihuan tlacuajticatca ipan on mesa .

text: Then took Mary a pound of ointment of spikenard , very costly , and anointed the feet of Jesus , and wiped his feet with her hair : and the house was filled with the odour of the ointment .
text2: Quemaj María ocuajquic canaj tlajco litro ajhuiyalistli itoca nardo , yejhuan sanoyej patioj . Niman ican on ajhuiyalistli oquimaltij icxihuan Jesús niman quemaj oquinhuajhuatz ican itzon . Ijtic on cajli oten ican iajhuiyalis on ajhuiyalistli .

text: Then saith one of his disciples , Judas Iscariot , Simon ' s son , which should betray him ,
text2: Quemaj Judas Iscariote , iconeu Simón , yejhuan no tehuan tlapohuajli catca intech on majtlactli huan ome inomachtijcahuan Jesús niman sa no yejhua , yejhuan quitemactilis , oquijlij :

text: Why was not this ointment sold for three hundred pence , and given to the poor ?
text2: ― ¿ Tlica xmás cuajli nonamacasquia in ajhuiyalistli ica yeyi ciento denarios niman ica on tomin tiquimpalehuisquiaj on mayanquej ?

text: This he said , not that he cared for the poor ; but because he was a thief , and had the bag , and bare what was put therein .
text2: Pero Judas ijcon oquijtoj xpampa melahuac quimicneliaya on mayanquej , yej pampa yejhua tlachtequetl . Yejhua quejehuaya on bolsa ican tomin niman quichtequiya sequi on tlen ipan on bolsa quitlaliayaj .

text: Then said Jesus , Let her alone : against the day of my burying hath she kept this .
text2: Quemaj Jesús oquijlij : ― Ma ca xpajsolo . Yejhua quejehuaya in ajhuiyalistli para nechmatlalosquia ipan notlalnacayo ipan on tonajli ijcuac nechtocasquej ne ipan notlalcon .

text: For the poor always ye have with you ; but me ye have not always .
text2: Nochipa nemotzajlan nenquimpiasquej on mayanquej , pero nejhua xnochipa nican nennechpiasquej .

text: Much people of the Jews therefore knew that he was there : and they came not for Jesus ' sake only , but that they might see Lazarus also , whom he had raised from the dead .
text2: Miyequej on hebreos oquimatquej ica Jesús nemiya ne Betania niman ompa oyajquej . Oyajquej xsan para contasquej Jesús , yej no para contasquej Lázaro yejhuan Jesús oquiyolihuitij niman oquetzteu ne intzajlan on mimiquej .

text: But the chief priests consulted that they might put Lazarus also to death ;
text2: Yejhua ica intlayecancahuan on tiopixquej oquitlalijquej inyojlo para no quimictisquiaj Lázaro ,

text: Because that by reason of him many of the Jews went away , and believed on Jesus .
text2: pampa san yejhua ipampa miyequej on hebreos ye notzijtzinquixtiayaj ne intech niman yej quineltocayaj Jesús .

text: On the next day much people that were come to the feast , when they heard that Jesus was coming to Jerusalem ,
text2: Huajmostla miyec tlacatl yejhuan ye nemiya ne Jerusalén para quipanosquej on ilhuitl pascua ocacquej ica Jesús ajsis ne Jerusalén .

text: Took branches of palm trees , and went forth to meet him , and cried , Hosanna : Blessed is the King of Israel that cometh in the name of the Lord .
text2: Yejhua ica oquitequej imahuan on soyatl niman oquisquej oquinamiquitoj Jesús . Yejhuamej ijquin tzajtzitiayaj : ― ¡ Ma quiseli yectenehualistli ! ¡ Ma Dios quitiochihua yejhua on yejhuan hualajticaj ican itocatzin toTeco ! ¡ Ma Dios quitiochihua on iRey Israel !

text: And Jesus , when he had found a young ass , sat thereon ; as it is written ,
text2: Jesús oquinextij se poloco niman ipan otlejcoc quen quijtohua on Yectlajcuilojli :

text: Fear not , daughter of Sion : behold , thy King cometh , sitting on an ass ' s colt .
text2: Ma ca xmomojtican nemejhuamej yejhuan nenchantij ipan on hueyican itoca Sión . Xquitacan , nemoRey . Hualetiu ipan se poloco .

text: These things understood not his disciples at the first : but when Jesus was glorified , then remembered they that these things were written of him , and that they had done these things unto him .
text2: Ijcuac on onochiu , inomachtijcahuan Jesús xocajsicamatquej on tlajtlamach . Pero ijcuac Jesús otlejcoc ne ilhuicac , oquelnamiquej ica nochi yejhua on ye ijqui tlajcuilolnesticatca yejhua itech , niman ica ijqui mero ipan onochiu .

text: The people therefore that was with him when he called Lazarus out of his grave , and raised him from the dead , bare record .
text2: On tlacamej yejhuan ihuan Jesús nemiyaj ijcuac oconotz Lázaro ne ipan itlalcon ijcuac oquiyolitij niman oquetzteu , quitetlajtlajtohuiliayaj nochi tlen oquitaquej .

text: For this cause the people also met him , for that they heard that he had done this miracle .
text2: Yejhua ica miyec tlacatl oyajquej quinamiquitoj Jesús pampa oquimatquej on milagros yejhuan oquichiu .

text: The Pharisees therefore said among themselves , Perceive ye how ye prevail nothing ? behold , the world is gone after him .
text2: Quemaj on fariseos oquinojlijquej : ― ¡ Xquitacan , xitlaj otictlanquej ! ¡ Xquitacan , nochi tlacatl ipan in tlalticpactli oquiselijquej yejhua !

text: And there were certain Greeks among them that came up to worship at the feast :
text2: Intzajlan on tlacamej yejhuan oyajquej Jerusalén para quimahuistiliaj Dios ipan on ilhuitl , nemiyaj sequimej yejhuan chanejquej catcaj ne Grecia .

text: The same came therefore to Philip , which was of Bethsaida of Galilee , and desired him , saying , Sir , we would see Jesus .
text2: Yejhuamej oquinisihuijquej Felipe yejhuan chanej catca ne Betsaida de Galilea , niman ijquin oquijlijquej : ― Señor , ticnequij tiquitasquej Jesús .

text: Philip cometh and telleth Andrew : and again Andrew and Philip tell Jesus .
text2: Felipe oyaj niman oquitlajtlajtohuilij Andrés on tlen oquijlijquej . Niman quemaj on omemej san secan oyajquej oquitlajtlajtohuilitoj Jesús on tlen quijtohuayaj .

text: And Jesus answered them , saying , The hour is come , that the Son of man should be glorified .
text2: Niman Jesús oquimijlij : ― Yoyejcoc on tonajli ijcuac nejhua yejhuan oninochiu Tlacatl nechhueyilisquej .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , Except a corn of wheat fall into the ground and die , it abideth alone : but if it die , it bringeth forth much fruit .
text2: Ica tlen melahuac nemechijlia ica tla xachtopa nimiquis , xhuelis nictemacas yencuic nemilistli . Nejhua no niijqui quen se iteyo on trigo . Tla se iteyo on trigo xnotoca ipan tlajli , xhueli quitlaquitia miyec , yej nocahua iselti . Pero tla notoca ipan tlajli , tla ijcon , noscaltia niman quitlaquitia miyec .

text: He that loveth his life shall lose it ; and he that hateth his life in this world shall keep it unto life eternal .
text2: Yejhuan quichihua canica para ma ca quipolos inemilis ipampa Cristo xquipias nemilistli yejhuan para nochipa . Pero on yejhuan quitemaca inemilis ipampa Cristo , quiselis nemilistli para nochipa .

text: If any man serve me , let him follow me ; and where I am , there shall also my servant be : if any man serve me , him will my Father honour .
text2: Tla yacaj quinequi nechtequipanos , ica oncaj yas nohuan , niman ijcon campa nejhua ninemis , no ompa nemis on yejhuan nechtequipanos . Tla yacaj nechtequipanos , noTajtzin quitlacaitas .

text: Now is my soul troubled ; and what shall I say ? Father , save me from this hour : but for this cause came I unto this hour .
text2: ' Aman sanoyej ninoyolcocohua . ¿ Tlinon niquijlis noTajtzin ? ¿ Niquijlis : “ NoTajtzin , xnechmanahui itech on tlajyohuilistli tlen aman nopan nochihuas ” ? ¡ Ca ! Xijcon niquijlis pampa yejhua ica on onihuajlaj ipan in tlalticpactli .

text: Father , glorify thy name . Then came there a voice from heaven , saying , I have both glorified it , and will glorify it again .
text2: NoTajtzin , xchihua para ma mitzhueyilican . Quemaj ocaquistic se tlajtojli ne ilhuicac yejhuan oquijtoj : “ Yonicchiu para ma nechhueyilican , niman ocsejpa nicchihuas para ma nechhueyilican . ”

text: The people therefore , that stood by , and heard it , said that it thundered : others said , An angel spake to him .
text2: Niman on tlacamej yejhuan ompa tlacacticatcaj oquijtojquej ica ocaquistic se tlacomonajli , niman ocsequimej quijtohuayaj ica se ilhuicactequitquetl ocuajnotz .

text: Jesus answered and said , This voice came not because of me , but for your sakes .
text2: Quemaj Jesús oquimijlij : ― On tlajtojli ocaquistic xpara nejhua nicaquis , yej para nemejhuamej nencaquisquej .

text: Now is the judgment of this world : now shall the prince of this world be cast out .
text2: Aman yoyejcoc on tonaltin ijcuac Dios quinyolcuitis niman quintlaxtlahuilis nochimej in tlalticpactlacamej . Niman aman yejhua quixtilis itequihuajyo on yejhuan itequihua in tlalticpactli .

text: And I , if I be lifted up from the earth , will draw all men unto me .
text2: Niman ijcuac nechmajmasohualtisquej ipan cojnepanojli nican ipan in tlalticpactli , sa no nejhua niquinyoltilanas nochimej notech .

text: This he said , signifying what death he should die .
text2: Ijcuac ijcon oquijtoj , oquitecaquistilij quen miquis ipan on cojnepanojli .

text: The people answered him , We have heard out of the law that Christ abideth for ever : and how sayest thou , The Son of man must be lifted up ? who is this Son of man ?
text2: Niman ijcuac on tlacamej ijcon ocacquej , oquijlijquej : ― On Yectlajcuilojli techmachiltia ica Cristo nemis para nochipa . Yejhua ica ¿ tlica , tej , tejhua tiquijtohua ica on yejhuan onochiu Tlacatl ica oncaj cajcopilosquej ? ¿ Aquinon on yejhuan onochiu Tlacatl ?

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Yet a little while is the light with you . Walk while ye have the light , lest darkness come upon you : for he that walketh in darkness knoweth not whither he goeth .
text2: Ijcuacon Jesús oquimijlij : ― Nejhua yejhuan nitequichihua para cajsicamatisquej on tlajtlamach ica Dios nemis nemotzajlan san quesqui tonaltin más . Yejhua ica xselican on tlaixmachilistli chica nenhuelij para ma ca on xtlaixmachilistli tetlanis . Yejhuan xcajsicamati , xquimati canica yau .

text: While ye have light , believe in the light , that ye may be the children of light . These things spake Jesus , and departed , and did hide himself from them .
text2: Nejhua nitequichihua para cajsicamatij tlajtlamach itech ica Dios . Yejhua ica , chica ninemi nemotzajlan , xnechneltocacan para nenquipiasquej tlaixmachilistli . Ijcuac Jesús otlan quijtohua in tlajtlamach , oyaj niman yejhuamej xoc oquimatquej canica oyaj .

text: But though he had done so many miracles before them , yet they believed not on him :
text2: Masqui Jesús oquichiu miyec milagros imixpan , xquineltocayaj .

text: That the saying of Esaias the prophet might be fulfilled , which he spake , Lord , who hath believed our report ? and to whom hath the arm of the Lord been revealed ?
text2: Ijcon yej oncatca para nochihuas on tlen oquijcuiloj on tiotlajtojquetl Isaías : ToTeco , ¿ aquinon yoquineltocac totemachtil ? Masqui oquitaquej mopoder , ¿ aquinon tlaneltoca ?

text: Therefore they could not believe , because that Esaias said again ,
text2: No xhueliyaj quineltocayaj , pampa Isaías ijquin no oquijcuilojca :

text: He hath blinded their eyes , and hardened their heart ; that they should not see with their eyes , nor understand with their heart , and be converted , and I should heal them .
text2: Dios oquinciegotilij niman oquinyoltechijcau . Ijquin oquichiu para ma ca ma cajsicamatican tlinon quijtosnequi on tlen oquitaquej , niman ma ca tlaneltocasquej impan inyojlo , niman para ma ca ma huajnocuepacan notech para niquintlapojpolhuis .

text: These things said Esaias , when he saw his glory , and spake of him .
text2: Yejhua in tlajtlamach oquijtoj Isaías pampa oquitac ihueyilis Jesús niman otlajtoj ica yejhua .

text: Nevertheless among the chief rulers also many believed on him ; but because of the Pharisees they did not confess him , lest they should be put out of the synagogue :
text2: Masqui ijcon , miyequej on hebreos oquineltocaquej Jesús , hasta on yejhuan tequihuajquej . Pero xquipantlantiayaj intlaneltoc pampa quinmacajsiyaj ica on fariseos quinhuajquixtisquej ipan on tiopan .

text: For they loved the praise of men more than the praise of God .
text2: Ijcon , tej , xquipantlantiayaj intlaneltoc pampa yejhuamej más cuelitayaj para tlacamej ma quintlacaitacan xej para Dios ma quintlacaita .

text: Jesus cried and said , He that believeth on me , believeth not on me , but on him that sent me .
text2: Jesús oquijtoj ican chicahuac tlajtojli : ― Yejhuan nechneltoca xsan nejhua nechneltoca , yej no quineltoca noTajtzin yejhuan onechajtitlan .

text: And he that seeth me seeth him that sent me .
text2: Niman on yejhuan nechita no quita on yejhuan onechajtitlan .

text: I am come a light into the world , that whosoever believeth on me should not abide in darkness .
text2: Nejhua onihuajlaj ipan in tlalticpactli para nictemacas cajsicamatilistli , niman ijcon , tej , san aquinon yejhuan nechneltocas quiselis tlamachilistli .

text: And if any man hear my words , and believe not , I judge him not : for I came not to judge the world , but to save the world .
text2: Tla yacaj caqui notlajtol niman xquitlacamati , xnejhua niquiyolcuitis nion niquitlajtlacolmacas , pampa nejhua onihuajlaj xpara niquinyolcuitis niman niquintlajtlacolmacas in tlalticpactlacamej , yej para niquinmaquixtis .

text: He that rejecteth me , and receiveth not my words , hath one that judgeth him : the word that I have spoken , the same shall judge him in the last day .
text2: Pero ye nemi aquin quiyolcuitis niman quitlajtlacolmacas on yejhuan xnechselia niman xquitlacamati notlajtol . On tlajtojli yejhuan yoniquijtoj on yejhua quiyolcuitis niman quitlajtlacolmacas ipan on sa ica nochi tonajli .

text: For I have not spoken of myself ; but the Father which sent me , he gave me a commandment , what I should say , and what I should speak .
text2: Ijcon nochihuas pampa nejhua xniquijitohua on tlen nicnemilia , yej noTajtzin , yejhuan onechajtitlan , onechnahuatij yejhua ica on tlen niquijtos niman nicteititis .

text: And I know that his commandment is life everlasting : whatsoever I speak therefore , even as the Father said unto me , so I speak .
text2: Niman nicmatzticaj ica on tlen noTajtzin onechnahuatij para nemechijlis , quitemaca on nemilistli yejhuan para nochipa . Yejhua ica on tlen nejhua niquijtohua , niquijtohua quen yejhua onechijlij .

text: Now before the feast of the passover , when Jesus knew that his hour was come that he should depart out of this world unto the Father , having loved his own which were in the world , he loved them unto the end .
text2: Sa se tonajli polihuiya ijcuac on hebreos quipanohuaj on ilhuitl itoca pascua . Jesús quimatzticatca ica yoyejcoc on tiempo para yejhua cajtehuas in tlalticpactli niman yas itech iTajtzin . Yejhua nochipa oquintlajsojtlac on iyaxcahuan yejhuan nemij ipan in tlalticpactli , pero aman quintitiaj quech ica sanoyej quintlajsojtla .

text: And supper being ended , the devil having now put into the heart of Judas Iscariot , Simon ' s son , to betray him ;
